description.zh-cn: 文化大革命（简称文革），是1966年5月16日至1976年10月6日发生在中国大陆，由毛泽东发动的一场重大政治运动。期间，中央书记处及总书记职务被撤销，大量领导人（如吴克华）受迫害，地方机构瘫痪，高考中断，教育体系遭受严重破坏。重庆等地发生了大规模武斗。故宫作为“四旧”的象征面临被毁威胁，后在周恩来干预下得以保全。文革对中国社会影响深远，被后世负面评价为“十年内乱”、“十年浩劫”，并受邓小平等人全面否定。该运动结束后提出了“两个凡是”方针。
description.en: The Cultural Revolution (referred to as the Cultural Revolution), initiated by Mao Zedong, was a major political movement that occurred in mainland China from May 16, 1966, to October 6, 1976. During this period, the Central Secretariat and the General Secretary's positions were abolished, many leaders (such as Wu Kehua) were persecuted, local institutions were paralyzed, the Gaokao was suspended, and the education system was severely damaged. Large-scale armed conflicts occurred in Chongqing and other areas. The Forbidden City, as a symbol of the 'Four Olds', faced the threat of destruction but was preserved through the intervention of Zhou Enlai. The Cultural Revolution had a profound and lasting impact on Chinese society, being negatively evaluated by later generations as 'ten years of civil strife' or 'ten years of catastrophe', and was completely rejected by Deng Xiaoping and others. The 'Two Whatevers' policy was proposed after this movement ended.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家，中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和第一代最高领导人。他曾任中共中央委员会主席，领导井冈山革命根据地建设和土地改革。据称向忠发曾提名他担任中华苏维埃共和国主席。执政期间，他推行“一边倒”外交政策，促成《中苏友好同盟互助条约》签订，并发动了反右运动、大跃进和文化大革命。1972年，他在中日建交谈判期间会见了日方代表团，并在1973年考虑设立一个类似中顾委的机构，但未能实现。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, politician, and theorist, and the main founder and first-generation paramount leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China. He served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the CPC, leading the establishment of the Jinggang Mountains revolutionary base and the Land Reform Movement. Xiang Zhongfa reportedly nominated him as Chairman of the Chinese Soviet Republic. During his rule, he pursued the 'Lean to One Side' foreign policy, facilitated the signing of the Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship, Alliance and Mutual Assistance, and launched political movements such as the Anti-Rightist Movement, the Great Leap Forward, and the Cultural Revolution. In 1972, he met the Japanese delegation during the negotiations for the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and Japan, and also considered establishing a body similar to the Central Advisory Commission in 1973, but it was not realized.

birth_place.zh-cn: 长沙府宁乡县花明楼镇炭子冲村

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一。早期曾在湖北省总工会担任向忠发的副手。后曾任中华人民共和国第二任主席、中共中央委员会副主席。他曾支持通过群众斗争进行土地改革，并推动了中国人民大学的建立。在七千人大会上，他批评大跃进，并将大饥荒成因归结为“三分天灾，七分人祸”，与毛泽东产生分歧。他曾率中共代表团出席苏共十九大，最终在文化大革命中被迫害致死。
description.en: A former major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. Early in his career, he served as Xiang Zhongfa's deputy at the Hubei Provincial General Labor Union. He later served as the second Chairman of the PRC and Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee. He supported carrying out land reform through mass struggles and promoted the establishment of Renmin University of China. At the Seven Thousand Cadres Conference, he criticized the Great Leap Forward, attributing the Great Famine to 'three parts natural disaster, seven parts man-made disaster', leading to disagreements with Mao Zedong. He led a CPC delegation to attend the 19th Congress of the CPSU and was ultimately persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

birth_place.zh-cn: 四川省广安市广安区协兴镇牌坊村

death_place.zh-cn: 北京市海淀区中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物，改革开放的总设计师。他曾任晋冀鲁豫及第二野战军政治委员、中共中央书记处总书记。1977年复出后，领导拨乱反正，平反冤假错案，恢复高考，并推动十一届三中全会确立改革开放路线。作为中顾委首任主任，他倡导并最终推动了该机构的撤销。他提出“一国两制”，主导废除干部终身制，支持浦东开发。晚年赏识胡锦涛。但他对八六学潮立场强硬，是六四戒严及清场的主要决策者。
description.en: A core figure of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China and the chief architect of Reform and Opening-up. He served as Political Commissar of the Shanxi-Hebei-Shandong-Henan Field Army and the Second Field Army, and as General Secretary of the Central Secretariat of the CPC. After his rehabilitation in 1977, he led the rectification of errors, rehabilitated unjust cases, restored the Gaokao, and promoted the establishment of the reform and opening-up policy at the 3rd Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee. As the first Director of the Central Advisory Commission, he advocated for its establishment and eventually pushed for its abolition. He proposed 'One Country, Two Systems', abolished lifelong tenure for cadres, and supported Pudong's development. In his later years, he appreciated Hu Jintao. However, he took a hardline stance on the 1986 student demonstrations and was a key decision-maker for the June Fourth crackdown and clearance.

birth_place.zh-cn: 湖北省黄州府黄冈县回龙山镇林家大湾村

death_place.zh-cn: 蒙古人民共和国肯特省巴特瑙劳布县苏布拉嘎盆地

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的现代政治人物、军事家，中华人民共和国元帅。曾任国防部部长、中共中央副主席、国务院副总理。他曾是原中国共产党和中华人民共和国主要领导人之一。在七千人大会上公开支持毛泽东路线，但私下对大跃进不满。毛泽东曾在中共九大上确立他为接班人，但庐山会议后分歧加剧。文革期间，他曾迫害贺龙，支持韦国清镇压造反派。最终在九一三事件中坠机身亡。
description.en: A modern Chinese politician and military strategist, Marshal of the People's Republic of China. He served as Minister of National Defense, Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, and Vice Premier of the State Council. He was one of the former main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. At the Seven Thousand Cadres Conference, he publicly supported Mao Zedong's line but privately expressed dissatisfaction with the Great Leap Forward. Mao Zedong had designated him as his successor at the Ninth National Congress of the CPC, but disagreements intensified after the Lushan Conference. During the Cultural Revolution, he persecuted He Long and supported Wei Guoqing in suppressing rebels. He eventually died in a plane crash during the September 13th Incident.

birth_place.zh-cn: 清朝江苏省淮安府山阳县驸马巷

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、革命家、军事家、外交家，中国共产党、中华人民共和国及解放军的主要创建者和领导人之一。在向忠发担任名义领袖期间，他是中共实际负责人之一。曾任中华人民共和国首任国务院总理兼外交部长，并长期担任全国政协主席。他早年领导南昌起义，签署《中苏友好同盟互助条约》。在任期间，代表中方签署《中日联合声明》并与尼克松签署《上海公报》。文革期间，他努力维持国家运转，下令保护故宫。他还曾与毛泽东组建523项目，报告“六十一人案”中央知晓，并估计土地改革运动死亡人数为83万。
description.en: A Chinese politician, revolutionary, military leader, and diplomat, and one of the principal founders and leaders of the Chinese Communist Party, the People's Republic of China, and the PLA. During Xiang Zhongfa's nominal leadership, he was one of the actual leaders of the CCP. He served as the first Premier of the State Council and Minister of Foreign Affairs of the PRC, and long-term Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee. In his early years, he led the Nanchang Uprising and signed the Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship, Alliance and Mutual Assistance. During his tenure, he signed the Sino-Japanese Joint Communiqué on behalf of China and co-signed the Shanghai Communiqué with Richard Nixon. During the Cultural Revolution, he strove to maintain normal state operations and ordered the protection of the Forbidden City. He also established Project 523 with Mao Zedong, reported that the Central Committee was aware of the 'Case of the 61', and estimated 830,000 deaths during the Land Reform Movement.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东第四任妻子，毛岸青继母，中国政治人物、演员、文艺理论家，原国家级副职领导人，曾任中央文化革命小组副组长。她是文化大革命期间中国共产党的主要领导人之一，“四人帮”之首，魏京生在文革期间曾对其产生怀疑。
description.en: Mao Zedong's fourth wife and a prominent member of the Gang of Four, of whom Wei Jingsheng became suspicious during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命时期中华人民共和国的重要政治人物，中国共产党高级领导人。作为“四人帮”核心成员，曾任上海市革委会主任、中央文革小组副组长、中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理。被《“571工程”纪要》视为林彪的主要政治对手。在“林彪、江青反革命集团案”中被判处死刑，缓期两年执行。
description.en: An important political figure and a high-ranking leader of the Communist Party of China during the Cultural Revolution. As a core member of the 'Gang of Four', he served as Director of the Shanghai Revolutionary Committee, Deputy Head of the Central Cultural Revolution Group, Standing Committee Member of the CPC Central Committee Political Bureau, and Vice Premier of the State Council. He was also considered by the 'Project 571 Outline' as Lin Biao's main political rival. He was sentenced to death with a two-year reprieve in the 'Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques'.

birth_place.zh-cn: 浙江省诸暨县直埠镇姚公埠村

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，“四人帮”成员之一。他曾任中央文革小组成员，是文革的理论旗手，并发表《评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉》。与张春桥等人一同被《“571工程”纪要》称为“文人力量”。作为中国文化大革命时期的重要政治人物，原国家级副职领导人，他在“林彪、江青反革命集团案”中被判处有期徒刑。
description.en: A Chinese politician and a member of the 'Gang of Four'. He served as a member of the Central Cultural Revolution Group, was a theoretical standard-bearer of the Cultural Revolution, and published 'Critique of the New Historical Drama 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office''. Along with Zhang Chunqiao and others, he was referred to as the 'literati force' in the 'Project 571 Outline'. As an important political figure during China's Cultural Revolution and a former national deputy leader, he was sentenced to imprisonment in the 'Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques'.

birth_place.zh-cn: 吉林省长春市绿园区西新镇开源村

death_place.zh-cn: 北京市首都医科大学附属复兴医院

description.zh-cn: “四人帮”成员之一，中国政治人物。曾任中共中央副主席、中共中央政治局常委等正国级领导职务。在“林彪、江青反革命集团案”中被判处无期徒刑。
description.en: A Chinese politician and a member of the 'Gang of Four'. He served as a national-level leader, including Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee and Standing Committee member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee. He was sentenced to life imprisonment in the 'Lin Biao, Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques case'.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东指定的接班人。在他逝世后，他领导粉碎“四人帮”，成为中国最高领导人。作为中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，他在文化大革命结束后，曾兼任中共中央主席、国务院总理和中央军委主席，是至今唯一一位同时出任党政军三大最高领导职务的领导人。他提出了“两个凡是”的执政原则。
description.en: Mao Zedong's designated successor, who led the smashing of the 'Gang of Four' after Mao's death, becoming China's paramount leader. A Chinese politician, he served as Chairman of the CCP Central Committee, Premier of the State Council, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission after the Cultural Revolution. He is the only leader to have simultaneously held these three highest party, government, and military positions. He is known for proposing the 'Two Whatevers' governing principle.

birth_place.zh-cn: 广东省嘉应直隶州雁洋

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中华人民共和国开国元帅，中共元老之一，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的创建者和缔造者之一。他曾任全国人大常委会委员长、中共中央副主席、国防部部长等职。在领导广东土改时，他采取了较温和的政策，为此受到毛泽东批评。在粉碎“四人帮”事件中，他起了决定性作用，并提出设立台湾特别行政区的构想。他也是凌孜的父亲。
description.en: A Chinese politician and one of the founding marshals of the People's Republic of China, and a veteran of the Communist Party of China. He served as Chairman of the NPC Standing Committee, Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, and Minister of National Defense. During land reform in Guangdong, he adopted a more moderate policy, which led to criticism from Mao Zedong. He played a decisive role in the smashing of the Gang of Four and proposed the concept of establishing a special administrative region for Taiwan. He was also Ling Zi's father.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物、原正国级领导人，文化大革命时期重要人物。他曾任中共中央办公厅主任、中央警卫部队领导，直接参与并负责粉碎“四人帮”事件的具体执行，深度参与了怀仁堂事变。阎明复任中央办公厅翻译组组长后期，汪东兴是其直接上级。他也是“凡是派”的主要成员之一，支持“两个凡是”原则，并曾阻挠为六十一人叛徒集团案平反。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, a former state-level leader, and an important figure during the Cultural Revolution. He served as Director of the General Office of the CCP Central Committee and led the Central Security Forces, directly participating in and responsible for the specific execution of smashing the 'Gang of Four' incident, including deep involvement in the Huairentang Incident. During the latter part of Yan Mingfu's tenure as head of the translation group of the General Office, Wang Dongxing was his direct superior. He was also one of the main members of the 'Whatever Faction', supporting the 'Two Whatevers' principle, and once obstructed the rehabilitation of the Case of the 61 Renegades.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一。曾任中国共产党安全和情报部长、中共中央副主席、中央文革小组顾问。他是文化大革命的主要人物和关键支持者之一，四人帮集团主犯，并因文革罪行受到批判。他也是“六十一人叛徒集团案”的主要制造者之一。在“反党小说《刘志丹》案”中起主要作用。死后被认定为林彪、江青反革命集团主犯之一，同时也是一位书法家。
description.en: A former major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as Minister of Public Security, Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, and advisor to the Central Cultural Revolution Group. As a key figure and supporter of the Cultural Revolution, he was a principal culprit of the 'Gang of Four' and was criticized for his crimes during the Cultural Revolution. He was also one of the main fabricators of the 'Case of the 61 Renegades' and played a key role in the 'Liu Zhidan Anti-Party Novel Case'. After his death, he was identified as one of the principal culprits of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary cliques. He was also a calligrapher.

birth_place.zh-cn: 福建省泉州市惠安县洛阳镇梅岭村
birth_place.en: Meiling Village, Luoyang Town, Hui'an County, Quanzhou, Fujian Province

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前政治人物及理论家，原国家级正职领导人。曾长期担任毛泽东的政治秘书，在文化大革命期间担任中共中央政治局常委、中央文革小组组长。九届二中全会后被隔离审查，后被划入林彪反革命集团，也是四人帮集团主犯之一。
description.en: A former political figure and theorist of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a former national-level principal leader. He served as Mao Zedong's political secretary for a long time. During the Cultural Revolution, he served as a Standing Committee Member of the CPC Politburo and Head of the Central Cultural Revolution Group. He was placed under isolation review after the Second Plenary Session of the Ninth Central Committee, and later classified as a member of the Lin Biao Counter-revolutionary Group and a principal offender of the Gang of Four.

death_place.zh-cn: 北京市东城区北京医院

description.zh-cn: 彭真，伟大的无产阶级革命家、政治家、杰出的国务活动家、坚定的马克思主义者，我国社会主义法制的主要奠基人，党和国家的卓越领导人之一，中共八大元老之一。曾任北京市委第一书记、文化革命五人小组组长。文化大革命初期被打倒，并在“彭、罗、陆、杨反党集团案”中首当其冲。复出后，曾任全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长、宪法修改委员会副主任委员。阎明复任全国人大常委会副秘书长期间，彭真是其直接上级。
description.en: Peng Zhen was a great proletarian revolutionary, politician, outstanding statesman, staunch Marxist, and a principal founder of China's socialist legal system. He was one of the eminent leaders of the Party and state, and one of the Eight Elders of the CCP. He served as the First Secretary of the Beijing Municipal Party Committee and head of the Five-Man Group for the Cultural Revolution. He was purged during the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, being the primary target in the 'Peng, Luo, Lu, Yang Anti-Party Clique' case. After his rehabilitation, he served as Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress and Deputy Chairman of the Constitution Revision Committee. When Yan Mingfu served as Deputy Secretary-General of the NPC Standing Committee, Peng Zhen was his direct superior.

birth_place.zh-cn: 大清四川省顺庆府南充县
birth_place.en: Nanchong County, Shunqing Prefecture, Sichuan Province, Great Qing

death_place.zh-cn: 西德巴登-符腾堡州海德堡

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国副国级领导人之一，无产阶级革命家、军事家、开国大将。曾任中共中央书记处书记、国务院副总理、中华人民共和国公安部首任部长、国防部副部长、解放军总参谋长等职。在文革初期被打倒，是“彭、罗、陆、杨反党集团案”成员之一，被授予中国人民解放军大将军衔。
description.en: One of the sub-national leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a proletarian revolutionary, military strategist, and a founding General. He served as Secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat, Vice Premier of the State Council, the first Minister of Public Security of the PRC, Deputy Minister of National Defense, and Chief of the PLA General Staff. He was purged during the Cultural Revolution as a member of the 'Peng, Luo, Lu, Yang Anti-Party Clique' and was awarded the rank of PLA General.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，曾任中宣部部长。在文革初期被指控为“彭、罗、陆、杨反党集团案”成员之一而被打倒。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, former head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee. He was denounced as a member of the 'Peng, Luo, Lu, Yang Anti-Party Clique' case during the early stages of the Cultural Revolution.

birth_place.zh-cn: 清四川省潼川府遂宁县双江镇
birth_place.en: Shuangjiang Town, Suining County, Tongchuan Prefecture, Sichuan Province, Qing Dynasty

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市中国人民解放军总医院
death_place.en: General Hospital of the People's Liberation Army, Beijing, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物、原国家级正职领导人、中国人民解放军高级将领。曾任中共中央办公厅主任，文革初期被打倒。历任中华人民共和国主席、中共中央政治局委员、中共中央军委副主席兼秘书长，是中共八大元老之一。他曾负责部署军队执行戒严；并以实际行动支持废除领导职务终身制。
description.en: A Chinese politician, former national-level state leader, and high-ranking general of the People's Liberation Army. He served as Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee and was purged during the early stages of the Cultural Revolution. His career also included serving as President of the People's Republic of China, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, and Vice Chairman and Secretary-General of the Central Military Commission. He was one of the Eight Elders of the CPC. He was responsible for deploying troops for martial law and demonstrated support for abolishing the lifelong tenure system for leading positions through his own retirement.

birth_place.zh-cn: 清朝湖南省湘潭县石潭镇

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市海淀区中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的杰出领导人之一，中华人民共和国元帅，中国人民解放军的创建者与领导者之一，军事家、政治家。他参与创建了井冈山革命根据地，后于1930年因杀害袁文才、王佐而被迫率部撤离。曾任八路军副总指挥、第一野战军司令员，在朝鲜战争期间担任中国人民志愿军首任司令员兼政治委员，是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署人之一，并在粟裕任总参谋长时任国防部长。1958年曾批判粟裕，后在庐山会议上因批评大跃进而被打倒，最终在文化大革命中被迫害致死。
description.en: One of the prominent leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a Marshal of the PRC, and one of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army. He was a military strategist and politician. He participated in establishing the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base, but was later forced to withdraw his troops in 1930 after the killing of Yuan Wencai and Wang Zuo. He served as Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the Eighth Route Army, Commander of the First Field Army, and the first Commander and Political Commissar of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army during the Korean War, and was one of the signatories of the Korean Armistice Agreement. He later served as Minister of National Defense when Su Yu was Chief of the General Staff. In 1958, he criticized Su Yu. He was purged during the Lushan Conference for criticizing the Great Leap Forward and subsequently persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国工农红军与中国人民解放军的主要创始人之一，南昌起义领导人之一。他曾指挥红二军团并与任弼时共同指挥红二方面军。曾任中华人民共和国国务院副总理、中央军事委员会副主席，并主持修建了大田湾体育场。在文化大革命中被迫害致死。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, one of the principal founders of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and the People's Liberation Army, and a leader of the Nanchang Uprising. He commanded the Red Second Army Corps and later the Second Front Army with Ren Bishi. He served as Vice Premier of the State Council and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission, and presided over the construction of Datianwan Stadium. He was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，原中共中央政治局常委。他曾被毛泽东派往广东以激进方式推进土地改革，并在当地担任主要领导职务。后曾任中央文革小组顾问。在文化大革命中被打倒并迫害致死。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a former member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee. He was sent by Mao Zedong to Guangdong to advance land reform in a radical manner, and held major leadership positions there. Later, he served as an advisor to the Central Cultural Revolution Group. He was overthrown and persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 明史学家、中国历史学家，因其剧作《海瑞罢官》在文革初期受到批判，被迫害致死。北京市副市长。
中国近现代小说家、散文家、剧作家，被广泛认为是中国近现代文学的代表人物。在文革初期因不堪迫害而投湖自尽。
中国著名翻译家，在文革初期与夫人一同自尽。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国第二代主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央主席、总书记，被认为是团派的创始人。文革后，他主持平反冤假错案，审定并推动了《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》一文的发表及真理标准大讨论、拨乱反正、改革开放并支持废除干部终身制，是改革开放早期的主要领导人之一，被视为改革派代表人物。1986年因处理八六学潮的方式被保守派批评，被迫辞职。其逝世是六四事件的导火索。
description.en: One of the second generation of leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as Chairman and General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and is considered the founder of the Tuanpai (Youth League Faction). After the Cultural Revolution, he presided over the redress of unjust, false, and wrong cases, reviewed and approved the publication of the article 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth', promoted the great discussion on the criterion of truth, rectified past errors, and pushed for reform and opening up, supporting the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for cadres. He was one of the main leaders in the early stages of Reform and Opening-up and was regarded as a representative of reformists. In 1986, he was criticized by conservatives for his handling of the 1986 student demonstrations and was forced to resign. His death was a catalyst for the Tiananmen Square protests of 1989.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人、政治人物，曾任国务院总理和中共中央总书记。早期被毛泽东派往广东参与并推进激进的土地改革工作。被视为中共党内改革派领袖。在胡耀邦辞职后代理中共中央总书记，他通过讲话限制了“反对资产阶级自由化”运动的扩大化，使其在1987年夏天基本结束。文革后支持改革开放，但在六四事件中，因同情学生运动、反对戒严而被免去中共中央总书记职务并被长期软禁。在阎明复任中共中央书记处书记期间，赵紫阳是其直接上级。
description.en: A prominent political figure and former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China. He served as Premier of the State Council and General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee. In his early career, he was sent by Mao Zedong to Guangdong to participate in and promote radical land reform work. He was regarded as a reformist leader within the Party. After Hu Yaobang's resignation, he became the acting General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, delivering a speech that curbed the expansion of the 'Anti-Bourgeois Liberalization Campaign' and effectively ending it by the summer of 1987. Supporting reform and opening up after the Cultural Revolution, he was dismissed from his post as General Secretary and placed under long-term house arrest for sympathizing with student movements and opposing martial law during the Tiananmen Square incident. He was also Yan Mingfu's direct superior when Yan served as a secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，齐桥桥的弟弟，中国共产党第五代中央领导集体的核心人物。自2012年起担任中华人民共和国最高领导人，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。他被官方认定为习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的主要创立者，并于任内通过宪法修正案取消了国家主席的任期限制。其间，他提出“一带一路”倡议，签署并公布了《香港国安法》，并通过反腐运动等措施削弱并边缘化了团派的政治影响力。一些政策被部分学者视为可能导致“文革2.0”。
description.en: Younger brother of Qi Qiaoqiao, he is a Chinese politician and core figure of the fifth generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China. He has served as the supreme leader of the People's Republic of China since 2012, currently holding the titles of General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He is officially recognized as the main founder of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, and during his tenure, a constitutional amendment was passed to remove the term limit for the presidency. During this period, he proposed the 'Belt and Road' initiative, signed and promulgated the Hong Kong National Security Law, and weakened and marginalized the political influence of the Tuanpai (Youth League Faction) through measures such as the anti-corruption campaign. Some of his policies are considered by certain scholars to potentially lead to a 'Cultural Revolution 2.0'.

en: Member of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党是中华人民共和国的执政党，也是土地改革运动的发起者和领导者。根据列宁主义，它是领导无产阶级专政的唯一政党。该党在第二次国共内战中取得胜利并建立了中华人民共和国。历史上，曾于井冈山建立革命根据地，领导抗日武装力量，并是四一二事件中的主要被清剿对象。中原大战使其得以喘息发展。李达等多人曾是其党员。
description.en: The Chinese Communist Party is the ruling party of the People's Republic of China and the initiator and leader of the Land Reform Movement. Following Leninism, it is the sole party leading the dictatorship of the proletariat. The party triumphed in the Chinese Civil War and established the People's Republic of China. Historically, it established revolutionary bases in Jinggangshan, led anti-Japanese armed forces, and was a primary target of the purge during the April 12th Incident. The Central Plains War allowed it to recuperate and expand. Li Da and many others were members.

description.zh-cn: 红卫兵是文化大革命时期中国大陆对大、中学生自发成立的群众组织的统称。他们以青年学生为主体，是文革初期冲击社会秩序的主要力量，进行了破四旧、大串联等活动，是“破四旧”运动的主要执行者。
description.en: Red Guards were a general term for mass organizations spontaneously formed by high school and university students in mainland China during the Cultural Revolution. Composed mainly of young students, they were the primary force impacting social order in the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, carrying out activities such as 'Destroy the Four Olds' and 'Great Link-ups', and were the main executors of the 'Destroy the Four Olds' movement.

location.zh-cn: 北京市海淀区钓鱼台国宾馆

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间中国共产党的最高领导机构之一，也是文化大革命的实际指挥机构。它实际取代了中央政治局和中央书记处的职能。
description.en: One of the highest leading bodies of the Chinese Communist Party during the Cultural Revolution and its actual command institution. It effectively replaced the functions of the Politburo and the Secretariat.

description.zh-cn: 由王洪文、张春桥、江青、姚文元四人组成的中共党内政治集团，在文化大革命期间形成并掌握重要权力。
description.en: A political faction composed of Wang Hongwen, Zhang Chunqiao, Jiang Qing, and Yao Wenyuan during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 指中华人民共和国于1959年至1961年间因三面红旗运动而发生全国性饥荒的一段时期，部分学者将1958年、1962年也划入饥荒时期。此次大饥荒共造成中国大陆1500万至5500万人的非正常死亡，被广泛视为人类历史上规模最大的饥荒之一，并导致毛泽东退居二线。
description.en: Refers to a period of nationwide famine in the People's Republic of China from 1959 to 1961, caused by the Three Red Banners movement. Some scholars also include the years 1958 and 1962 in this famine period. The Great Famine caused 15 to 55 million excess deaths in mainland China and is widely regarded as one of the largest famines in human history. This famine also led to Mao Zedong's semi-retirement.

location.zh-cn: 蒙古人民共和国温都尔汗

description.zh-cn: 1971年9月13日，中共中央副主席林彪及其家人乘机叛逃苏联途中，飞机在蒙古温都尔汗坠毁，机上人员全部遇难，标志着林彪集团的覆灭。此次政治事件对中国政局产生深远影响，梁兴初等人因此受到牵连。
description.en: On September 13, 1971, Lin Biao, Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, along with his family, attempted to defect to the Soviet Union by plane, which subsequently crashed in Öndörkhaan, Mongolia, killing everyone on board. This political event marked the demise of the Lin Biao group, had a profound impact on Chinese politics, and implicated figures such as Liang Xingchu.

description.zh-cn: 1976年4月在天安门广场发生的，以悼念周恩来、抗议“四人帮”为主题的群众自发抗议运动，后被定性为反革命事件。
description.en: A spontaneous mass protest movement that took place in Tiananmen Square in April 1976, centered on mourning Zhou Enlai and protesting the 'Gang of Four', which was later characterized as a counter-revolutionary incident.

description.zh-cn: 1976年10月6日，由时任中共中央第一副主席华国锋、中共中央副主席叶剑英、中共中央办公厅主任汪东兴等人策划发动，在北京市中南海怀仁堂拘捕“四人帮”及其在北京的骨干成员的政治事件，标志着文化大革命的结束。
description.en: A political event planned by Hua Guofeng, then First Vice Chairman of the CCP Central Committee, Ye Jianying, Vice Chairman of the CCP Central Committee, and Wang Dongxing, Director of the CCP General Office, to arrest the Gang of Four and their associates.

description.zh-cn: 文革结束后，由邓小平等人启动的，中华人民共和国于1978年12月起推行的一项以经济建设为中心，对内改革、对外开放为核心的社会经济政策与运动。这项政策带来的思想解放氛围，也是后来八六学潮发生的宏观背景。
description.en: The economic reform and opening-up policy implemented by the People's Republic of China since December 1978, initiated by Deng Xiaoping and others after the Cultural Revolution. Centered on economic development, internal reform, and external opening, this policy fostered an atmosphere of intellectual liberation, providing the macro context for the 1986 student demonstrations.

zh-cn: 林彪、江青反革命集团案
最高人民法院特别法庭
en: Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques
Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques
Special Court of the Supreme People's Court
Trial of the Gang of Four and the Lin Biao Counter-Revolutionary Clique
Trial of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院专门设立特别法庭，对林彪、江青两个反革命集团案的10名主犯进行公开审判。林彪集团和四人帮是文化大革命后，中华人民共和国政府对该反革命集团的官方称谓。
description.en: The Special Tribunal of the Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China was specifically established for the public trial of the ten principal offenders from the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary cliques. The Lin Biao clique and the Gang of Four was the official designation by the PRC government for this counter-revolutionary group after the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 民主柬埔寨（红色高棉）时期，由柬埔寨红色高棉政权进行的大规模屠杀事件，受中国文革影响。
全称《中国共产党中央委员会通知》，是指导“文化大革命”的纲领性文件，标志着文革的全面发动。

zh-cn: 炮打司令部——我的一张大字报

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东撰写，矛头直指刘少奇和邓小平。

zh-cn: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议
en: Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party since the Founding of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第六次全体会议通过的历史决议，是中共中央对建国以来若干重大历史问题作出的官方定论文件。该决议全面否定文化大革命，并对毛泽东的功过进行了评价，其中认定他在文革中犯有严重错误。
description.en: A historical resolution passed by the Sixth Plenary Session of the 11th CPC Central Committee, it is an official conclusion document by the CPC Central Committee on several major historical issues since the founding of the PRC. This resolution fully repudiated the Cultural Revolution and evaluated Mao Zedong's merits and demerits, concluding that he made serious mistakes during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治家、最高领导人，曾任苏共中央委员会总书记、部长会议主席。二战期间同盟国“三巨头”之一，在雅尔塔会议承诺对日作战，苏联出兵对日本投降影响重大。为扩大东亚影响力，他与毛泽东领导的中国签订新同盟条约，并帮助建立人民大学。他曾接见并重视向忠发，推动其党内晋升。赫鲁晓夫对其的全盘否定是中苏论战和文革的重要背景。
description.en: Soviet politician and supreme leader, who served as General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and Chairman of the Council of Ministers. As one of the 'Big Three' Allied leaders during World War II, he promised at the Yalta Conference to enter the war against Japan, and the subsequent Soviet invasion significantly impacted Japan's decision to surrender. For strategic considerations of expanding Soviet influence in East Asia, he agreed to sign a new alliance treaty with Mao Zedong's China and decided to assist China in establishing Renmin University. He also met with and showed appreciation for Xiang Zhongfa, promoting his advancement within the party. Khrushchev's complete repudiation of him served as an important background for the Sino-Soviet split and the Cultural Revolution.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 1927年由中国共产党中央执行委员会改组而来，是中国共产党的最高领导机构和中央权力机关。它由中国共产党全国代表大会选举产生中央政治局、中央政治局常务委员会和中央委员会总书记。时任主席毛泽东曾参与中日建交的决策过程。该机构在1947年批准并公布了《中国土地法大纲》，1979年正式为《刘志丹》案平反（1986年停止发行），并于2002年10月批准了神舟五号的飞行方案。
description.en: Restructured in 1927 from the Central Executive Committee, it is the highest leading body and central authority of the Communist Party of China. It elects the Political Bureau, its Standing Committee, and the General Secretary of the Central Committee through the National Congress. Its then-Chairman, Mao Zedong, was involved in the decision-making process for the normalization of Japan-China relations. The body approved and promulgated the 'Outline Land Law of China' in 1947, officially rehabilitated the 'Liu Zhidan' case in 1979 (though distribution was halted in 1986), and approved the flight plan for Shenzhou 5 in October 2002.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东领导的中国共产党在中华人民共和国发动的政治、经济及社会运动，旨在利用国家行政力量，通过农业和工业的平行增长，快速实现工业化和集体化，将国家从以农业为主的经济体转型成为一个现代化的共产主义社会，并试图实现超英赶美的目标。运动包括大炼钢铁、人民公社化等。然而，这场脱离现实的“跃进”最终导致了严重的经济困难、环境破坏和大饥荒，是三年困难时期的主要原因之一。
description.en: A political, economic, and social movement initiated by Mao Zedong and the Chinese Communist Party in the People's Republic of China. It aimed to rapidly industrialize and collectivize the country, transforming it from an agrarian economy into a modern communist society by utilizing state administrative power and achieving parallel growth in agriculture and industry, with the goal of surpassing the UK and US. Key components included the Great Steel Smelting and the People's Communes. However, this unrealistic 'Great Leap Forward' ultimately led to severe economic difficulties, environmental damage, and a great famine, being one of the main causes of the Three Years of Great Famine.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，中国政治家、经济管理家，中国共产党和中华人民共和国第一、二代中央领导集体重要成员及主要领导人之一。曾任重工业部部长、国务院副总理、中纪委第一书记，后接替邓小平担任中共中央顾问委员会第二任主任，并主张在中共十四大后废除中顾委。大饥荒后，他支持“三自一包”等经济调整政策，并以实际退休支持废除领导职务终身制。文革中被下放。六四事件中，他是保守派代表，支持对学生运动采取强硬措施，并曾推荐和保护李锐。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the CPC, a Chinese politician and economic administrator, and an important and main member of the first and second generation central leadership collectives of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as Minister of Heavy Industry, Vice Premier of the State Council, and First Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection. He later succeeded Deng Xiaoping as the second Director of the Central Advisory Commission and advocated for its abolition after the 14th National Congress of the CPC. After the Great Famine, he supported economic adjustment policies such as 'Sanzi Yibao' and supported the abolition of lifelong tenure for leading positions through his own retirement. He was sent down during the Cultural Revolution. During the June Fourth Incident, he was a conservative representative, supporting strong measures against student movements, and also recommended and protected Li Rui.

description.zh-cn: “走资本主义道路的当权派”的简称，是文革中用于攻击党政领导干部的罪名。
指在中国共产党第一代领导集体退下后，于1980年代至1990年代间，在中华人民共和国政治决策中拥有实际最高决策权的八位或更多位中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军元老。
description.en: Refers to the eight veteran members of the Communist Party of China who held actual decision-making power in the People's Republic of China during the 1980s and 1990s.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东思想理论体系，是中国共产党的指导思想之一，以毛泽东的名字命名。它以毛泽东为主要代表的中国共产党人，根据马克思列宁主义的基本原理，将中国长期革命和建设实践中的经验作了理论概括而形成的。
description.en: One of the guiding ideologies of the Communist Party of China, named after Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间在广西壮族自治区发生的一系列系统性大屠杀，并伴有食人事件。
description.en: A series of systematic massacres that occurred in the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region during the Cultural Revolution, accompanied by incidents of cannibalism.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，中国革命家、军事家、外交家，中华人民共和国十大元帅之一。他曾任国务院副总理、外交部部长、上海市市长。他参与创建了井冈山革命根据地。在“二月逆流”中反对文革。长期担任粟裕的直接领导和政治搭档。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a revolutionary, military commander, and diplomat, and one of the Ten Marshals of the PRC. He participated in the establishment of the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党革命家，中国人民解放军高级将领，中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任国务院副总理，为原国家级副职领导人。其在“二月逆流”中反对文革。
中华人民共和国于1955年授予建国元勋的最高军衔。
习仲勋是中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，陕甘边区革命根据地的主要创建者和领导者之一。“五马进京”事件核心人物之一，中共八大元老之一，并以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制。曾任西北野战军副政委、国务院副总理、中共中央书记处书记、全国人大常委会副委员长。1962年因审阅小说《刘志丹》手稿遭受长期迫害。后任中共广东省委第一书记，建议在深圳等地建立“贸易合作区”。他是习近平之父。
description.en: Xi Zhongxun was a prominent political figure in the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and one of the main founders and leaders of the Shaan-Gan Border Revolutionary Base Area. A core figure in the 'Five Horses Enter Beijing' incident and one of the Eight Elders of the CPC, he notably supported the abolition of lifelong tenure for leading positions through his own retirement. He served as Deputy Political Commissar of the Northwest Field Army, Vice Premier of the State Council, Secretary of the CCP Central Secretariat, and Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. In 1962, he was persecuted for reviewing the novel 'Liu Zhidan.' Later, as First Secretary of the CPC Guangdong Provincial Committee, he proposed 'trade cooperation zones' in Shenzhen. He is the father of current Chinese leader Xi Jinping.

birth_place.zh-cn: 山西省忻州直隶州定襄县蒋村
birth_place.en: Jiang Village, Dingxiang County, Xinzhou Prefecture, Shanxi Province

death_place.en: Peking Union Medical College Hospital, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，开国元勋，原副国级领导人，邓小平主政时期的中共八大元老之一。他曾任国务院副总理、中共中央顾问委员会副主任并长期主持日常工作。作为中国共产党和中华人民共和国的第一、二、三代主要领导人之一，他也是“六十一人叛徒集团案”的主要受害者，在文化大革命中被打倒监禁。他以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制，是薄熙来和薄小莹的父亲。
description.en: A Chinese Communist Party and People's Republic of China political figure, a founding father of the PRC, and a former deputy national leader. He was one of the Eight Elders of the CCP during Deng Xiaoping's administration. He served as Vice Premier of the State Council and Deputy Director of the Central Advisory Commission, presiding over its daily work for a long time. As one of the main leaders of the first, second, and third generations of the CCP and PRC, he was also a principal victim of the 'Case of the 61 Renegades' and was imprisoned during the Cultural Revolution. He supported the abolition of lifelong tenure for leading positions through his own retirement, and was the father of Bo Xilai and Bo Xiaoying.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国是位于东亚的社会主义国家，由中国共产党执政，1949年成立。建国初期推行土地改革，寻求苏联援助。在三年困难时期，虽国内发生严重饥荒，仍对外提供援助。1972年与日本建交，1997年恢复对香港主权，是金砖国家创始成员国。该国知名女画家有胡絜青。曾参与朝鲜战争，完成载人航天任务。与多国建交，但因网络审查致Google撤离。曾与越南发生战争，并被指控支持俄罗斯。政府压制国内批评者。
description.en: The People's Republic of China is a socialist country in East Asia, governed by the Chinese Communist Party, established in 1949. In its early years, it implemented land reform and sought Soviet aid. During the Three Years of Difficult Period, despite a severe domestic famine, it still provided foreign aid. It established diplomatic relations with Japan in 1972, resumed sovereignty over Hong Kong in 1997, and is a founding member of BRICS. Renowned female painter Hu Jieqing was from this country. It participated in the Korean War and completed human spaceflight missions. It established diplomatic relations with many countries, but Google withdrew due to internet censorship. It engaged in war with Vietnam and is accused of supporting Russia. The government suppresses domestic critics.

description.zh-cn: 1989年4月中旬，由高校学生发起的民主示威运动持续近两个月。广义上指波及中华人民共和国全境的示威，狭义上特指发生在北京天安门广场的示威及随后于6月4日凌晨的武力清场。这场政治风波导致时任中共中央总书记赵紫阳被撤职，第一代团派势力遭到清洗，阎明复亦因此被免去中共中央书记处书记等职务。八六学潮被认为是其前奏。
description.en: Beginning in mid-April 1989, student-led pro-democracy demonstrations lasted nearly two months. Broadly, it refers to protests across the People's Republic of China; more specifically, it denotes the student demonstrations in Beijing's Tiananmen Square and the subsequent crackdown, which concluded with military action on the morning of June 4. This political turmoil led to the dismissal of then CPC General Secretary Zhao Ziyang and the purge of the first-generation Tuanpai (Youth League Faction). Yan Mingfu was also dismissed from his post as secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat and other positions due to his actions during this event. The 1986 student demonstrations are considered its precursor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，78级大学生，现任中华人民共和国国务院总理。在中共二十届一中全会后成为排名第二的中共中央政治局常委，曾任中共上海市委书记、浙江省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician and a member of the Class of 1978, currently serving as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. He became the second-ranked member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC Central Committee after the First Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee, and previously served as Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee and Governor of Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长、中共中央政治局常委，曾任中共中央纪委书记、中共中央组织部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国主要领导人之一，中国共产党中央政治局常委。现任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席（接替汪洋），曾任中央书记处第一书记（蔡奇的前任），并担任中共二十大秘书长。他也是一名78级研究生。
description.en: Chinese politician, one of the principal leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He is currently a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (succeeding Wang Yang). He previously served as First Secretary of the Central Secretariat (predecessor to Cai Qi) and Secretary-General of the 20th CPC National Congress. He was also a postgraduate student of the Class of 1978.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市西城区人民大会堂

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关和国家立法机关，负责选举和罢免最高人民法院院长。
1919年5月4日发生于中国北京的爱国运动，以青年学生为主体，并有公民、市民和工商人士等社会阶层广泛参与。这场反帝、反封建运动，形式包括示威、请愿、罢课、罢工及暴力对抗政府。运动因巴黎和会山东问题及北洋政府外交失败而爆发，梁启超的电报是导火索之一。它最终迫使北洋政府拒签《凡尔赛条约》并罢免亲日官员，对中国近代史影响深远，并推动了新文化运动，使西学从器物、制度层面深入到思想文化层面。
description.en: A patriotic, anti-imperialist and anti-feudal movement that took place in Beijing, China, on May 4, 1919. It was primarily led by young students, with broad participation from citizens, merchants, and other social strata. The movement involved demonstrations, petitions, student and worker strikes, and violent confrontations with the government. It erupted due to the Shandong question at the Paris Peace Conference and the Beiyang government's diplomatic failure; Liang Qichao's telegrams were one of the direct triggers. The movement ultimately compelled the Beiyang government to refuse to sign the Treaty of Versailles and dismiss pro-Japanese officials. It had a profound impact on modern Chinese history, advancing the New Culture Movement and deepening the reception of Western learning from material and institutional levels to ideological and cultural spheres.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在第一次国共内战期间，于其革命根据地建立的政权。向忠发曾提名毛泽东担任其临时中央政府主席。
description.en: A state established by the Chinese Communist Party in its revolutionary base areas during the First KMT-CCP Civil War. Xiang Zhongfa once nominated Mao Zedong to serve as the chairman of its provisional central government.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在第二次国共内战时期的主要武装力量，由中国工农红军、八路军和新四军改编而来。后成为中华人民共和国的主要武装力量。曾计划进攻台湾，后因朝鲜战争放弃；也曾执行六四戒严和清场任务。倪匡年轻时曾加入其华东公安部队。
description.en: The main armed force of the Chinese Communist Party during the Second Chinese Civil War, reorganized from the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, Eighth Route Army, and New Fourth Army. It later became the primary armed force of the People's Republic of China. It had planned to attack Taiwan but was forced to abandon the plan due to the Korean War; it also carried out martial law and clearing operations on June Fourth. Ni Kuang joined its East China Public Security Force in his youth.

description.zh-cn: 1950年至1953年间在朝鲜半岛爆发的一场战争，它是朝鲜民主主义人民共和国（朝鲜）与大韩民国（韩国）之间的军事冲突。一方为朝鲜、中国人民志愿军，另一方为韩国、美国领导的联合国军。作为冷战时期的一场区域性冲突，它也导致美国介入台湾海峡，阻止了解放军攻台计划。战争最终以《朝鲜停战协定》的签署而告终，但未签订和平条约。毛泽东认为，中国在朝鲜战争中的表现赢得了苏联的信任，从而获得了更多的援助与合作。
description.en: A war fought on the Korean Peninsula from 1950 to 1953. It was a military conflict between the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (North Korea) and the Republic of Korea (South Korea). On one side were North Korea and the Chinese People's Volunteer Army (China), and on the other were South Korea and a United Nations force led by the United States. As a regional conflict during the Cold War, it also led to U.S. intervention in the Taiwan Strait, preventing the PLA's plan to invade Taiwan. The war ended with the signing of the Korean Armistice Agreement, but no peace treaty was signed. Mao Zedong believed that China's performance in the Korean War won the trust of the Soviet Union, leading to more aid and cooperation.

description.zh-cn: 一个由主权国家组成的全球性国际组织，二战后成立，加拿大是其创始国之一。它旨在促进国际合作、防止未来冲突，罗斯福是其关键推动者。其大会多次通过决议谴责俄罗斯的入侵行为。
description.en: A global international organization of sovereign states, founded after World War II, with Canada as a founding member. It aims to promote international cooperation and prevent future conflicts, with Roosevelt as a key driving force. Its General Assembly has passed multiple resolutions condemning Russia's invasion.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，亦是中华人民共和国政治人物，是1989年至2002年中国的实际最高领导人，也是中国共产党第三代中央领导集体的核心人物。他曾任上海市委书记，因处理《世界经济导报》事件获保守派赏识。六四事件后接替赵紫阳成为中共中央总书记，此后先后担任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军委主席。主政期间，他延续了废除干部领导职务终身制的政策，也是985工程思想的提出者，并在此期间发动了对法轮功的镇压。此外，在阎明复任中共中央统战部部长后期，江泽民是其直接上级。卸任中共中央总书记和中华人民共和国主席后，他继续担任中央军委主席，并在2003年获悉神舟五号任务成功后打电话表示祝贺。据传，他曾“钦点”唐英年为2012年香港特首人选。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, and also a politician of the People's Republic of China, who was the paramount leader of China from 1989 to 2002. He was also the core figure of the third generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China and a former General Secretary. During his time in power, he continued the policy of abolishing the lifelong tenure system for cadres and initiated the suppression of Falun Gong. Furthermore, Jiang Zemin was Yan Mingfu's direct superior during the latter part of Yan's tenure as head of the United Front Work Department. After stepping down as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President of the PRC, he continued to serve as Chairman of the Central Military Commission, and in 2003, he called to congratulate the successful completion of the Shenzhou 5 mission. It was also rumored that he had "handpicked" Henry Tang as the preferred candidate for the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election.

description.zh-cn: 1992年1月至2月，邓小平巡视中国南方城市（包括武昌、深圳、珠海、上海等地），并发表了一系列重要讲话，即著名的“南方谈话”。这些讲话对推动中国改革开放具有深远意义，不仅重新启动了因六四事件而停滞的改革进程，也深化了改革开放，对中国经济改革与发展产生了重要影响。
description.en: From January to February 1992, Deng Xiaoping toured Southern Chinese cities (including Wuchang, Shenzhen, Zhuhai, and Shanghai), delivering a series of vital speeches, famously known as the 'Southern Tour speeches'. These remarks held profound significance for China's reform and opening-up, effectively restarting the stalled reform process after the Tiananmen Square incident and deepening it, thus profoundly impacting China's economic reform and development.

description.zh-cn: 负责监管国家之间贸易规则，并监督成员经济体之间执行各项贸易协定的国际组织。
description.en: An intergovernmental organization that regulates and facilitates international trade.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛，中华人民共和国第四代主要领导人，中国共产党第四代中央领导集体的核心人物，同时被认为是第二代团派的核心人物。他曾于2002年至2012年担任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军委主席，是习近平的前任。在任期间，他亲临神舟五号发射现场，并于2005年签署主席令公布《治安管理处罚法》，还主持决定对陈良宇进行立案调查。他被认为是李克强的政治导师，于1983年将李克强引荐到共青团中央委员会。2012年，他卸任所有党政军职务实现“裸退”，完善了废除干部领导职务终身制的表现。
description.en: Hu Jintao, the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China and the core figure of the fourth generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China, is also considered the core figure of the second-generation Tuanpai (Youth League Faction). He served as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission from 2002 to 2012, preceding Xi Jinping. During his tenure, he personally observed the launch of Shenzhou 5, signed a presidential decree to promulgate the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law' in 2005, and presided over the decision to investigate Chen Liangyu. He is considered Li Keqiang's political mentor, having brought him into the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League in 1983. In 2012, he relinquished all party, government, and military positions in a 'naked retirement,' a move that perfected the abolition of lifelong tenure for cadres.

birth_place.zh-cn: 天津市北辰区宜兴埠镇

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。他曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命，并曾签署任命梁振英为香港第四任行政长官的国务院令。他还曾担任抗震救灾总指挥。在总理任内，他曾与杨利伟成功返回后与其通话表示祝贺。此外，他曾任中共中央办公厅主任、中共第十六、十七届中央政治局常委。他是温云松的父亲。据报道，他曾反对薄熙来晋升，并在薄熙来事件中公开要求重庆反思。他曾于2018年探望阎明复。据称曾被陈良宇顶撞。
description.en: A Chinese politician. He was appointed as Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress, and signed the State Council order appointing Leung Chun-ying as the fourth Chief Executive of Hong Kong. He also served as the commander-in-chief for earthquake relief. During his tenure as Premier, he spoke with Yang Liwei after his successful return to congratulate him. He also served as Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee and a member of the Standing Committee of the 16th and 17th Politburo of the CPC Central Committee. He is the father of Wen Yunsong. He reportedly opposed Bo Xilai's promotion and publicly called for Chongqing to reflect on the incident during Bo's downfall. He visited Yan Mingfu in 2018. Reportedly confronted by Chen Liangyu.

birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省合肥市
birth_place.en: Hefei, Anhui, People's Republic of China

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国上海市浦东新区
death_place.en: Pudong, Shanghai, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 李克强是中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，团派主要成员，曾任中共中央政治局常委、国务院总理，原正国级领导人。他被视为改革派学者型官员，其经济思想被称为“李克强经济学”。作为1977级大学生，他曾任国务院副总理，并在任总理期间推广“一带一路”倡议。他曾是薄熙来在中共十八大前的政治竞争对手，并主持二十大开幕会。由于习近平的集权，他被国际媒体评价为中国近代最弱势的总理之一。
description.en: Li Keqiang was a political figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a key member of the Tuanpai (Youth League Faction), who served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Premier of the State Council, a former national-level leader. He was regarded as a reform-minded, scholar-type official, and his economic philosophy was known as 'Likonomics'. A Class of 1977 university student, he was appointed Vice Premier and promoted the 'Belt and Road' initiative during his premiership. He was a political rival of Bo Xilai before the 18th CPC National Congress and presided over the opening ceremony of the 20th. Due to Xi Jinping's consolidation of power, he was evaluated by international media as one of the weakest premiers in modern Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 由中华人民共和国政府于2013年倡议并主导的国际经济合作倡议（由习近平提出），旨在加强区域互联互通，并形成跨国经济带。

zh-cn: 亚洲基础设施投资银行

description.zh-cn: 一个由中国倡议设立的多边开发银行，为“一带一路”等亚洲基建项目提供资金。
由严重急性呼吸系统综合征冠状病毒2（SARS-CoV-2）导致的2019冠状病毒病（COVID-19）所引发的全球大流行疫情，被定性为全球性重大突发公共卫生事件。在此期间，中国地方政府曾引用《治安管理处罚法》中关于“紧急状态”的条款实施疫情防控措施，故宫也于2020年初一度关闭。
description.en: A global pandemic caused by Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), designated as a major global public health emergency. During this period, local governments in China cited the 'state of emergency' clause in the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law' to implement pandemic control measures. The Forbidden City was also temporarily closed in early 2020 due to its impact.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国为应对2019冠状病毒病（COVID-19）大流行而采取的严格公共卫生防控政策。
description.en: A public health policy adopted by the Chinese government in response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

description.zh-cn: 北美洲的联邦共和国，实行总统制。与加拿大共享全球最长不设防边界。二战中作为同盟国主导对日战后占领；冷战中是苏联主要对手，朝鲜战争中领导联合国军。苏联解体后成为唯一超级大国，实现载人航天。对华关系复杂，其在1970年代对华战略的转变为中日建交创造了条件，也曾批评“一带一路”。是乌克兰主要军事援助国，参与利比亚军事干预，也是拉脱维亚在军事安全上所依赖的国家之一。近日，美国政府谴责伊朗镇压示威并支持抗议者，伊朗最高领袖则指责美国策划“暴乱”。李洪志自1998年起定居于此。
description.en: A federal republic in North America with a presidential system, sharing the world's longest undefended border with Canada. As a principal Allied power in WWII, it led Japan's post-war occupation; during the Cold War, it was the Soviet Union's main rival and led the UN Command in the Korean War. After the Soviet collapse, it became the sole superpower and achieved human spaceflight. Its relationship with China is complex; its strategic shift towards China in the 1970s created the conditions for the establishment of Sino-Japanese diplomatic relations, and it has also criticized the 'Belt and Road' initiative. It is a major military aid provider to Ukraine, participated in military intervention in Libya, and is one of the countries on which Latvia relies for military security. Recently, the U.S. government condemned Iran's crackdown on protests and supported demonstrators, while Iran's Supreme Leader accused the U.S. of orchestrating 'riots'. Li Hongzhi has resided here since 1998.

description.zh-cn: 由中国、俄罗斯等国发起的欧亚政治、经济和安全组织。
由巴西、俄罗斯、印度、中国、南非等新兴市场国家组成的合作机制，是世界经济增长的主要动力之一。

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)
中华人民共和国宪法（八二宪法）
en: 1982 Constitution of the People's Republic of China
Constitution of the People's Republic of China (1982)

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第四部宪法，也被称为“八二宪法”，是现行宪法。该宪法的颁行加强了民族区域自治制度的建设，其第三十一条规定了设立特别行政区的法律依据。它还规定了国家主席等领导职务的任期制，正式从法律上废除了领导干部职务终身制，并规定实行初等义务教育。
description.en: The fourth constitution of the People's Republic of China, also known as the '82 Constitution', is the current constitution. It stipulated term limits for leading positions such as the President, formally abolishing the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres in law, and also stipulates the implementation of compulsory primary education.

en: Constituent departments of the State Council
Constituent Department of the State Council
Constituent Departments of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 国务院组成部门是中华人民共和国国务院的组成机构类别，属于职能机构分类，承担国务院的基本行政管理职能。
description.en: The constituent departments of the State Council are a category of constituent bodies of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, belonging to a classification of functional bodies, and undertaking the basic administrative functions of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物、前领导人，曾任国务院副总理，也是一位农业政策专家。他支持“三自一包”等农业改革政策，在1962年北戴河会议上受到毛泽东批判并被降职。他也是“五马进京”事件核心人物之一。
description.en: A former leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Premier of the State Council and was an agricultural policy expert. He supported agricultural reform policies such as 'Sanzi Yibao', which led to criticism and demotion by Mao Zedong at the 1962 Beidaihe Conference. He was also one of the core figures in the 'Five Horses Enter Beijing' incident.

birth_place.zh-cn: 山西省归化城土默特塔布村

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫，蒙古族，是中国共产党和中华人民共和国的高级领导人、政治人物，原正国级领导人，有“蒙古王”之称。他曾任中国人民解放军开国上将、中华人民共和国副主席、全国人大常委会副委员长、国务院副总理、中共中央统战部部长等职，是中华人民共和国历史上官阶最高的少数民族人士。他曾在文革中被打倒，并领导并完成了《民族区域自治法》的制定。
description.en: An ethnic Mongol, a senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, known as the 'Mongol King'. He was an opening general of the People's Liberation Army and served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物、领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国国务院副总理、重工业部部长、中共中央办公厅主任。原正国级领导人，在文化大革命中受冲击。
description.en: A politician and one of the leaders of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China. Formerly a national-level leader, he served as Vice Premier of the State Council, Minister of Heavy Industry, and Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee. He was persecuted during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物、原正国级领导人、中国人民解放军高级将领。曾任中华人民共和国主席、全国政协主席。他是中共八大元老之一，中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一。在文化大革命中受到冲击，后参与策划粉碎四人帮事件。阎明复任全国政协副主席期间，他曾是阎明复的直接上级。
description.en: A Chinese Communist Party and People's Republic of China politician, former national-level leader, and senior general of the People's Liberation Army. He served as President of the People's Republic of China and Chairman of the National People's Political Consultative Conference. He was one of the Eight Elders of the CCP. Purged during the Cultural Revolution, he later participated in the planning to crush the Gang of Four. He was Yan Mingfu's direct superior when Yan served as Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

birth_place.zh-cn: 四川省江津县吴滩乡石院子

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的军事家、革命家和政治家，中华人民共和国十大元帅之一，曾任北京市市长，粟裕的前任代总参谋长，后在政治运动中批判粟裕。
中国共产党政治人物，曾任中共上海市委第一书记、上海市市长、国务院副总理。他曾向刘少奇建议将在押干部保释出狱。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China, he served as the First Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the CPC, Mayor of Shanghai, and Vice Premier of the State Council. He once suggested to Liu Shaoqi to bail out imprisoned cadres.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国高级领导人，中华人民共和国开国上将。文化大革命期间的重要人物，曾任北京市革委会主任、公安部部长。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, former Minister of Public Security of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 曾任国务院副总理。
中国共产党及中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级党和国家领导人。活跃于“文化大革命”中后期及“后毛泽东时代”。曾任国务院副总理、中央政法小组组长等职。他因深受毛泽东赏识和培养，在文革中后期进入中央核心。曾阻挠为六十一人叛徒集团案平反。中共十一届三中全会后在政治上受到排挤，于1980年2月辞去所有职务。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a former Vice-national level leader. He was active in the late stage of the Cultural Revolution and the post-Mao era. He served as Vice Premier of the State Council, head of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Group, and other positions. Highly appreciated and cultivated by Mao Zedong, he entered the central core leadership in the late Cultural Revolution. He once obstructed the rehabilitation of the Case of the 61 Renegades. After the Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the CPC, he was politically marginalized and resigned from all his positions in February 1980.

birth_place.zh-cn: 中华民国山西省武乡县
birth_place.en: Wuxiang County, Shanxi Province, Republic of China

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，中国人民解放军开国上将，中共八大元老之一。曾担任中华人民共和国副主席，接替乌兰夫。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who succeeded Ulanhu as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的军事家、革命家和政治家。曾任国防部部长，曾是许世友的上级。
中共元老，中华人民共和国政治家、外交家、军事家。曾任国务院副总理、国防部部长、中共中央军委秘书长，是习近平早期的上司。
description.en: CCP veteran, politician, diplomat, and military strategist of the People's Republic of China. He served as Vice Premier, Minister of Defense, and Secretary-General of the CPC Central Military Commission, and was Xi Jinping's early superior.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林是中国共产党和中华人民共和国的早期领导人、杰出的无产阶级革命家。他曾任中共中央政治局常委（包括第十三届）、国务院副总理、中共中央办公厅主任，长期担任党和国家财经工作领导职务。作为原正国级党和国家领导人，他被认为是保守派人物。
description.en: Yao Yilin was an early leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and an outstanding proletarian revolutionary. He served as a member of the Political Bureau Standing Committee (including the 13th), Vice Premier of the State Council, and Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee. He held leading positions in the Party and state's economic and financial work for a long time. As a former national-level leader, he was considered a conservative figure.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、外交官，时任中华人民共和国外交部部长，代表中方签署了《中日联合声明》。
description.en: Chinese politician and diplomat, then Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China, who signed the Sino-Japanese Joint Communiqué on behalf of the Chinese side.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国原正国级领导人，中共八大元老之一，中共党内改革派代表人物。他在改革开放初期在安徽推行农村改革，曾任国务院副总理、第七届全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长，并以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制。
description.en: A former top-level leader of the CPC and PRC, one of the Eight Elders, and a key reformist. He initiated rural reforms in Anhui during the early reform era, served as Vice Premier of the State Council and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the 7th National People's Congress, and supported the abolition of lifelong tenure through his own retirement.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国上将。曾任国防部部长，并指挥一江山岛战役。他也是联名签署反对武力镇压学生示威抗议信的七名退役将军之一。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army who commanded the Yijiangshan Islands Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的组成人员之一，是国家级副职领导人。
description.en: A member of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, holding a rank equivalent to a vice-premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，周恩来义子。曾任国务院总理、全国人大常委会委员长、中共中央政治局常委。他曾于任总理期间宣布开发浦东的决策，并于六四事件期间宣布戒严令，被认为是中共党内保守派的代表人物。他也是育才学校校友。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, foster son of Zhou Enlai. He served as Premier and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. During his tenure as Premier, he announced the decision to develop Pudong and declared martial law during the Tiananmen Square protests of 1989, being considered a representative figure of the conservative faction within the CCP. He was also an alumnus of Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院副总理。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级党和国家领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委、全国人大常委会委员长。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治家，原正国级领导人。他曾任中共中央政治局常委、中共中央组织部部长，作为中共元老，其对胡锦涛的赏识是胡后来得以执掌大权的重要因素。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a former national-level leader. He served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC Central Committee and Minister of the CPC Central Organization Department. As a CPC elder, his appreciation for Hu Jintao was a significant factor in Hu's later rise to supreme power.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理、中共中央政治局常委。在担任上海市市长、中共上海市委书记期间，提出了“开发浦东，振兴上海，服务全国，面向世界”的方针。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee. During his tenure as Mayor of Shanghai and Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee, he put forward the policy of 'developing Pudong, revitalizing Shanghai, serving the whole country, and facing the world'.

description.zh-cn: 李维汉与金维映之子，曾任全国人大常委会副委员长。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国的政治人物、军事领导人，中国人民解放军上将（1988年授予），曾任中华人民共和国国防部部长。秦天与秦卫江之父。
description.en: A political figure and military leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a General of the People's Liberation Army (awarded in 1988), former Minister of National Defense of the PRC. Father of Qin Tian and Qin Weijiang.

description.zh-cn: 原中共北京市委书记，后因贪腐案下台。
中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央政法委书记。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级正职领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理、对外贸易经济合作部部长、天津市副市长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, a former national-level principal leader, who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC Central Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, Minister of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation, and Vice Mayor of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级领导人。曾任中共中央政治局常委、上海市委书记，并在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会委员长。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China and a former national-level leader. He served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee, and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国上将，曾任国防部部长，时任解放军总参谋长，参与指挥戒严部队。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级领导人，有“中国铁娘子”之称。曾接替李岚清任对外经济贸易部部长，并担任过国务院副总理、国务委员、卫生部部长等职。据报道，她与薄熙来交恶，并阻止其接任副总理职位。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a former Deputy State Leader, known as the "Iron Lady of China." She succeeded Li Lanqing as Minister of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation, and also served as Vice Premier of the State Council, State Councilor, and Minister of Health. She reportedly had a poor relationship with Bo Xilai and blocked his succession to the Vice Premier position.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共上海市委书记、国务院副总理、中共中央政治局常委。其患病离职为中纪委调查上海社保案提供了契机。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, and a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo. His illness and departure from office provided an opportunity for the CCDI to investigate the Shanghai social security case.

description.zh-cn: 回族，中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任中共安徽省委书记。在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Hui ethnicity, appointed as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 原中共中央政治局常委、中央政法委书记。他因腐败问题在反腐运动中落马，被判无期徒刑。在本案中，曾作出批示，要求正确引导舆论，被指意图掩盖政府干预司法的事实。
description.en: Former Politburo Standing Committee member and Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission. He fell during the anti-corruption campaign due to corruption and was sentenced to life imprisonment. In a specific case, he issued an instruction to 'correctly guide public opinion,' which was seen as an attempt to cover up government interference in the judiciary.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国上将。曾任国防部部长、中央军委副主席，在神舟五号飞行期间与航天员杨利伟进行了“天地对话”。
description.en: Then Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission and Minister of National Defense, who conducted a 'space-to-ground call' with astronaut Yang Liwei during the Shenzhou 5 mission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，原正国级领导人，曾任全国人大常委会委员长、中共中央政治局常委、中华人民共和国国务院副总理。在薄熙来被免职后接任中共重庆市委书记，并公开否定“重庆模式”的存在。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as a Vice Premier of the State Council and later succeeded Bo Xilai as Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee after his dismissal. He publicly denied the existence of the 'Chongqing Model'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，原正国级领导人，曾任中华人民共和国副主席、北京市市长、中共中央纪律检查委员会书记，并在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, formerly a national-level leader, who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China, Mayor of Beijing, and Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC. He was also appointed as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国女性政治人物，团派主要成员。曾任中共中央政治局委员、中华人民共和国国务院副总理，并在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为国务委员。
description.en: A female Chinese politician and a key member of the Tuanpai (Youth League Faction). She served as a member of the Politburo of the CPC and Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, and was appointed as a State Councilor during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国上将，曾任国防部部长。在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为国务委员和中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, appointed as a State Councilor and a member of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共上海市委副书记，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为国务委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, appointed as a State Councilor during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前正国级领导人，曾任中共第十八届中央政治局常委、国务院副总理（并担任推进“一带一路”建设工作领导小组首任组长），以及中共天津市委书记。
description.en: Former member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP and Vice Premier of the State Council of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级领导人，团派主要成员。曾任中共中央政治局常委、第十三届全国政协主席、国务院副总理、中共广东省委书记、中共重庆市委书记。他是薄熙来在重庆市委书记职务上的前任及政治竞争对手。
description.en: Chinese politician, a key member of the Tuanpai (Youth League Faction), and a former top national leader. He served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC, Chairman of the 13th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC), Vice Premier of the State Council, Secretary of the CPC Guangdong Provincial Committee, and Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee. He was Bo Xilai's predecessor and political rival as Chongqing Municipal Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古族，原中共中央书记处书记，陈希的前任国家行政学院院长。
中国人民解放军上将，曾任国防部部长，并在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, appointed as a member of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国外交官及政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局委员、中央外事工作委员会办公室主任、国务委员、中华人民共和国外交部部长等职务。
description.en: A Chinese diplomat and politician of the Communist Party of China, who has served as a member of the Politburo, Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission, State Councilor, and Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政法委书记，傅政华担任公安部副部长时的上级。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, and was Fu Zhenghua's superior when he was Vice Minister of Public Security.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任上海市市长、代理市委书记（接替陈良宇），后任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理（接替张高丽），现任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物、副国级领导人。他曾是团派主要成员，一度被视为胡锦涛的隔代接班人，但在中共二十大上失势。现任第十四届全国政协副主席、党组副书记。
description.en: A political figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, holding a sub-national leadership position. He was a key member of the Tuanpai (Youth League Faction), once seen as Hu Jintao's designated successor, but lost power at the 20th CPC National Congress. He currently serves as the Vice Chairman and Deputy Party Secretary of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、经济学者，国务院副总理，习近平的童年朋友和亲密顾问，原国家级副职领导人。
description.en: Chinese politician, Vice Premier of China, a childhood friend and close advisor to Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军火箭军上将，曾任第二炮兵部队司令员、火箭军首任司令员、国防部部长。
中国政治人物、高级外交官，副国级领导人，77级大学生。现任中共第二十届中央政治局委员、中共中央外事工作委员会办公室主任，曾任外交部长、国务委员。
description.en: Chinese politician and senior diplomat, a member of the Class of 1977 and a sub-national leader. He is currently a member of the Politburo of the CCP and Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission, having previously served as Minister of Foreign Affairs and State Councilor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国公安部部长，国务委员，傅政华担任公安部副部长时的上级。
description.en: Chinese politician, Fu Zhenghua's superior when he was Vice Minister of Public Security.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，正国级领导人，现任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理（排名第一）、中央港澳工作领导小组组长。曾任中共中央办公厅主任（蔡奇的前任）。他也是一名78级大学生。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a national-level leader. He is currently a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC Central Committee, the First-ranked Vice Premier of the State Council, and leader of the Central Leading Group on Hong Kong and Macau Affairs. He previously served as Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee (predecessor to Cai Qi). He is also a member of the Class of 1978.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级领导人，现任中共中央政治局委员、国务院副总理、中央财经委员会办公室主任、中央金融委员会办公室主任、中央金融工作委员会书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Vice Premier of the State Council.

birth_place.zh-cn: 河南省信阳专区罗山县
birth_place.en: Luoshan County, Xinyang Prefecture, Henan Province

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级党和国家领导人。现任中共中央政治局委员、国务院副总理、国务院安全生产委员会主任。曾任重庆市市长，是唐良智的前任。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a sub-national level party and state leader. He is currently a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, and Director of the Work Safety Committee of the State Council. He previously served as Mayor of Chongqing, being Tang Liangzhi's predecessor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共第二十届中央政治局委员，中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
中华人民共和国陆军上将，曾任中华人民共和国第十三任国防部部长。
中国政治人物，中共中央书记处书记，副国级领导人。曾任傅政华的继任公安部常务副部长、北京市公安局局长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Fu Zhenghua's successor as Executive Vice Minister of Public Security and Director of the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 白族
中国共产党、中华人民共和国外交官及政治人物。曾任外交部部长、国务委员，原副国级领导人。
description.en: A Chinese diplomat who served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防部
en: Ministry of National Defense of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院负责履行国防职能的组成部门。中华人民共和国中央军事委员会的军事工作机关之一。
中国人民解放军海军上将，现任国防部部长

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防部部长

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防部的首长职位

birth_place.zh-cn: 四川省顺庆府仪陇县马鞍镇

death_place.zh-cn: 北京市东城区北京医院

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的优秀党员、中国人民伟大的革命战士和无产阶级革命家，党、国家和军队的卓越领导人之一，中国共产党、中华人民共和国及中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和创始人之一，中国近代革命家、军事家，中华人民共和国十大元帅之首。他参与创建了井冈山革命根据地。
description.en: One of the main founders and creators of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army. A modern Chinese revolutionary, military strategist, and the foremost of the Ten Marshals of the People's Republic of China. He participated in the establishment of the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会
中国人民革命军事委员会
中国共产党中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China
Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国中央军事委员会，通称中央军事委员会，简称中央军委、军委，是中国共产党和中华人民共和国武装力量最高军事领导机构的总称，包括中国共产党中央军事委员会、中华人民共和国中央军事委员会两个机构。受中国共产党中央委员会和全国人民代表大会领导。在土地革命战争后期、抗日战争和第二次国共内战时期，它是中国共产党的最高军事领导机构。——机构沿革：1926年11月上旬，为准备上海工人武装起义，中共中央决定将中央军事部改为中央军事委员会兼上海区军事委员会，周恩来任书记。1927年5月25日召开的中共中央政治局常委会将中央军事委员会改称中央军人部（仍习惯性称中央军事部）。1930年2月，军事部与军委合二为一。1931年11月25日，设中华苏维埃共和国中央革命军事委员会、负责红军作战和建设。仍设中央军事委员会。1937年7月，中革军委与中央军委改组中共中央革命军事委员会。1945年8月，新成立中央军事委员会。1949年，改称中国人民革命军事委员会，作为中华人民共和国成立初期的最高军事领导机构。1954年9月28日，通过首部宪法，设中共中央军事委员会。1982年12月4日，通过八二宪法，成立中华人民共和国中央军事委员会。此后，中共中央军委和国家中央军委的组成人员基本相同，实际上是“一个机构两块牌子”。
description.en: The supreme military leading body in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，曾任国防部副部长、总参谋长、中纪委常务书记、中共中央军委秘书长，因在庐山会议支持彭德怀被打成反党集团成员。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, he served as Deputy Minister of National Defense, Chief of the General Staff of the PLA, Standing Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, and Secretary-General of the CPC Central Military Commission. He was purged and labeled a member of an anti-Party clique for supporting Peng Dehuai at the Lushan Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海军大将，曾任国防部副部长
中国人民解放军开国上将，曾任国防部副部长。他曾与任弼时率领红六军团西征，并担任参谋长。
description.en: A founding general of the PLA. He, along with Ren Bishi, led the Red Sixth Army Corps on the Westward Expedition, during which Li Da served as Chief of Staff.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部
en: General Staff Department of the People's Liberation Army
People's Liberation Army General Staff Department

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军的最高军事指挥机关，负责组织领导全国武装力量的军事建设和作战指挥，并曾是中央军事委员会的军事工作机关。
description.en: Formerly the highest military command organ of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, responsible for organizing and leading the military construction and combat command of the national armed forces.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总政治部
en: General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军和中国工农红军的最高政治工作领导机关，也是中央军事委员会主管全军党务和政治工作的最高统率机构。该机构于2016年军事改革中被撤销，后重组为中央军事委员会政治工作部。
description.en: Formerly the highest leading organ for political work in the People's Liberation Army and the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army. It also served as the supreme command organ of the Central Military Commission responsible for party and political work throughout the military. This organization was abolished during the 2016 military reforms and subsequently reorganized into the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission.

death_place.zh-cn: 北京市中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的主要领导人之一、高级将领，无产阶级革命家、军事家。他是中国共产党和中华人民共和国的重要政治和军事人物，曾任副国级领导人。1955年被授予大将军衔，位列开国十位大将之首，并曾担任总参谋长、国防部副部长。在豫东战役和徐蚌会战中担任华东野战军主要指挥官。1958年，在军委扩大会议上受到彭德怀等人的批判。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army and a key commander of the East China Field Army during the Eastern Henan and Huaihai Campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 1959年中国共产党中央委员会在庐山召开的中共中央政治局扩大会议和八届八中全会。会议后期，彭德怀等人因对“大跃进”提出批评而遭到批判，并随后发起了“反右倾”斗争，此事件也被定性为一场政治案件。
description.en: An enlarged meeting of the Politburo and the 8th Plenary Session of the 8th Central Committee held by the CPC Central Committee in Lushan in 1959. During the later stage of the meeting, Peng Dehuai and others were criticized for their criticism of the Great Leap Forward, subsequently leading to the "Anti-Rightist" struggle and its designation as a political case.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，黄埔军校第一期毕业，是宋希濂的同乡和同学，并介绍宋希濂加入中国共产党。曾任国防部副部长，军事工程学院首任院长。此外，他还曾佐证康生叛变。
description.en: A general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, a graduate of the first class of the Whampoa Military Academy, a fellow townsman and classmate of Song Xilian, who introduced Song to the Chinese Communist Party. He also served as Vice Minister of National Defense and the first president of the Military Engineering Academy, and testified to Kang Sheng's defection.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军事将领、中华人民共和国开国上将，曾任国防部副部长、南京军区司令员，原副国级领导人。
中国人民解放军开国上将，首任空军司令员，曾任国防部副部长
中国人民解放军上将，曾任代总参谋长。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Acting Chief of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国上将，曾任国防部副部长
1979年中华人民共和国与越南社会主义共和国之间爆发的短暂边境战争，其起因是越南入侵柬埔寨及边境争端。
description.en: A brief border war fought in 1979 between the People's Republic of China and the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, sparked by Vietnam's invasion of Cambodia and border disputes.

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会联合参谋部

description.zh-cn: 中央军委的参谋机关

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会政治工作部
en: Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 中央军委的政治工作机关

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的多党合作和政治协商制度下的统一战线组织，是中国特色协商民主的主要载体和实践形式。它是中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式和多党合作、政治协商的重要机构。其第一届全体会议通过了《中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法》。巩俐曾任第九、第十届全国政协委员。
description.en: The organizational form of the Chinese people's patriotic united front and an important institution for multi-party cooperation and political consultation. Its First Plenary Session passed the Organic Law of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China. Gong Li served as a member of the 9th and 10th National Committees.

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference
Member of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国性组织，也是中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式。其全国委员会的成员具有委员身份。例如，徐发淦曾是其第七、八届委员。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, and the organizational form of the Chinese People's Patriotic United Front. Members of its National Committee are accorded the status of committee members. For instance, Xu Fagan was a member of its 7th and 8th committees.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的八个民主党派之一，在国共内战后期与中国共产党合作。
description.en: One of the eight democratic parties in the People's Republic of China, which cooperated with the Communist Party of China in the late stage of the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国除中国共产党以外的八个参政党的统称。
description.en: A collective term for the eight legally recognized political parties in the People's Republic of China other than the Communist Party of China.

zh-cn: 中国国民党革命委员会
en: Revolutionary Committee of the Chinese Kuomintang

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的民主党派之一。
中国民主党派，中华人民共和国的民主党派之一。

en: Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party

description.zh-cn: 由国民党左派邓演达、陈友仁、宋庆龄等发起组织的政党，是中华人民共和国的民主党派之一。
中华人民共和国的八个民主党派之一，是中国革命统一战线的一员。该党派由华侨社团发起，罗豪才曾任其中央委员会主席。
description.en: One of the eight democratic parties in the People's Republic of China, and a member of China's revolutionary united front. It was founded by overseas Chinese communities, and Luo Haocai served as the chairman of its central committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的全国性工会组织，也是中国大陆所有地方总工会和产业工会的领导机关。
description.en: The national trade union federation of the People's Republic of China, led by the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，中国农工民主党创始人和领导人之一。
中国文学家、历史学家、古文字学家、考古学家、社会活动家、政治人物。曾任中国科学院院长、中国科学技术大学首任校长、中国史学会主席，并为电子科技大学前身“成都电讯工程学院”题写校名。曾在育才学校讲学。在文革初期曾赞扬江青，后又批判。
description.en: Chinese writer, political figure and historian, who served as the chairman of the Chinese Historical Association and lectured at Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人之一，中华民国和中华人民共和国政治人物。他曾在向忠发担任总书记期间掌握中国共产党实权，推行了激进的“立三路线”，并一度是中共建政前实际最高领导人。
description.en: One of the early main leaders of the Communist Party of China and a political figure of both the Republic of China and the People's Republic of China.
