He held effective power within the Communist Party of China during Xiang Zhongfa's tenure as General Secretary, promoting the radical 'Lisan Line', and was once the de facto supreme leader before the establishment of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家、政治家。国民革命军第十九路军将领。
著名华侨实业家、慈善家、教育家、社会活动家。他是一名马来亚爱国华侨，创立了厦门大学，并组织南侨机工支援抗战。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国的早期领导人、重要政治人物，曾任副国级领导人。他也是中国共产党内主管民族工作的领导人，并曾就民族区域自治制度向毛泽东提供咨询。

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国庆节
en: National Day of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国庆日。
中华民国军事家、政治家，新桂系首领，反蒋联军的副总司令之一。曾任中华民国副总统，并在蒋中正下野后任代总统，指挥台儿庄战役。后被监察院弹劾。其部下曾有刘振东。
description.en: A Chinese military general and politician, leader of the New Guangxi clique and one of the deputy commanders-in-chief of the anti-Chiang coalition. He served as Vice President of the Republic of China and later as acting President after Chiang Kai-shek's resignation, notably commanding the Battle of Taierzhuang. He was impeached by the Control Yuan. Liu Zhendong was among his subordinates.

description.zh-cn: 1947年台湾发生的官民冲突事件，亦称反政府暴动。最终国民政府派遣军队武力镇压，造成大量民众死伤。事件中，中共台湾省工委部分成员曾参与武装反抗，傅兆林更亲身经历了高雄地区的镇压。
description.en: An anti-government uprising in Taiwan in 1947. Some members of the CPC Taiwan Provincial Work Committee participated in armed resistance, and Fu Zhaolin personally experienced the suppression in the Kaohsiung area.

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长
中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长
全国人大常委会委员长
en: Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会（中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关常设机关）的领导职务。
description.en: The leader of the permanent body of the highest state power organ of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)
中华人民共和国宪法修正案（2018年）
en: 2018 amendment to the Constitution of China
2018 Constitutional Amendment of the People's Republic of China
Constitutional Amendment of the People's Republic of China (2018)

description.zh-cn: 2018年3月11日，第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议以2958票赞成、2票反对、3票弃权表决通过《宪法修正案》。该修正案取消了《中华人民共和国宪法》中关于国家主席和副主席“连续任职不得超过两届”的规定，并将习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想写入《中华人民共和国宪法》。
description.en: This constitutional amendment removed the provision from the Constitution of the People's Republic of China that the President and Vice President 'shall serve no more than two consecutive terms', and also wrote Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era into the Constitution of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the democratic parties of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国现有的八个民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the eight legally recognized political parties in the People's Republic of China.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1927年至1937年期间（土地革命战争时期，又称第二次国内革命战争时期）领导的武装力量，也是中国人民解放军的前身。该武装力量参与创建了井冈山革命根据地。
description.en: The armed forces of the Communist Party of China from 1927 to 1937, during the Agrarian Revolutionary War (also known as the Second Revolutionary Civil War). They were the predecessors of the People's Liberation Army and participated in the establishment of the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base.

location.zh-cn: 北京市石景山区高井甲32号

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的陆上作战军种，是中华人民共和国的陆上武装力量，也是中国人民解放军的第一军种和主体力量。
description.en: The ground combat service of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, it is the terrestrial armed force of the People's Republic of China, and the primary and main force of the PLA.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的海上作战军种
description.en: The naval branch of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的空中作战军种，也是中华人民共和国的正规空中武装力量和中国人民解放军的第三军种。杨利伟曾在此服役担任歼击机飞行员。
description.en: The aerial warfare service branch of the People's Liberation Army. Yang Liwei served as a fighter pilot in this force.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军火箭军
中国人民解放军第二炮兵
中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队

location.zh-cn: 北京市海淀区清河街道

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的战略导弹部队，其前身为战略性独立兵种。该部队是第四军种，由中央军事委员会直接领导指挥，担负常规导弹目标打击和核打击及核子反击导弹战略作战等任务。
description.en: The strategic missile force of the People's Liberation Army. It was formerly an independent strategic branch and is the fourth service branch. Directly led and commanded by the Central Military Commission, it undertakes tasks such as conventional missile target strikes, nuclear strikes, and nuclear counter-missile strategic operations.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军事航天部队
中国人民解放军战略支援部队航天系统部

description.en: A military aerospace force of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, operating as a subordinate department of the PLA Strategic Support Force.

中国人民解放军总参谋部技术侦察部

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的信息支援部队

en: People's Liberation Army Joint Logistics Support Force

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军联勤保障部队，王抗平于2024年10月起担任司令员。
description.en: The Joint Logistics Support Force of the People's Liberation Army, with Wang Kangping serving as its commander since October 2024.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中共上海市委常委，中共第二十届中央政治局委员，中国共产党中央军事委员会副主席、中华人民共和国中央军事委员会副主席。
中央军委委员、中央军委联合参谋部参谋长
中央军委委员、中央军委纪委书记
发生在越南民主共和国（北越）与越南共和国（南越）及其盟友之间的一场长期战争。这场战争发生于20世纪中叶，期间北越军队曾因疟疾问题向中国求助，促成了523项目的启动，并引发了伯克利学生的大规模反战运动。
description.en: A prolonged war fought between the Democratic Republic of Vietnam (North Vietnam) and the Republic of Vietnam (South Vietnam) and their respective allies. This conflict, which occurred in the mid-20th century, saw North Vietnamese forces seek Chinese assistance for their malaria problem, leading to the initiation of Project 523, and also prompted large-scale anti-war movements by Berkeley students.

en: Second Taiwan Strait Crisis artillery duel

description.zh-cn: 第二次台湾海峡危机的主要军事行动，解放军对金门进行了大规模炮击。
description.en: The main military action of the Second Taiwan Strait Crisis, in which the PLA conducted a massive artillery bombardment of Kinmen.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争和第二次国共内战时期由中国共产党领导的武装力量之一，由南方八省红军和游击队改编而成。
description.en: One of the armed forces led by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在中国东北地区创建的抗日武装
1936年12月12日，张学良、杨虎城在西安发动“兵谏”（亦称军事政变），扣留了时任国民政府军事委员会委员长的蒋中正，要求停止内战、一致抗日。此次事件促成了第二次国共合作，并结束了第一次国共内战。
description.en: On December 12, 1936, Zhang Xueliang and Yang Hucheng launched a 'remonstrance by military force' (also known as a military coup) in Xi'an, detaining Chiang Kai-shek, the head of the Nationalist government's Military Affairs Commission. They demanded an end to the civil war and a united front against Japan. This event led to the Second United Front and ended the First Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 指1960年至1989年间，中华人民共和国与苏联之间发生的一系列政治、意识形态和军事上的疏远与对峙冲突。分歧同时覆盖国家利益和意识形态层面。大跃进是导致关系恶化的重要因素之一。期间，苏联政府撕毁合同、撤走专家，加剧了中国三年困难时期。这一状况最终导致两国关系破裂，且《中苏友好同盟互助条约》在1980年期满后未再续约。此紧张关系也是促使中国寻求与日本建交的背景之一。
description.en: Refers to a series of political, ideological, and military estrangement and confrontation conflicts between the People's Republic of China and the Soviet Union from 1960 to 1989. Differences covered both national interests and ideological levels. The Great Leap Forward was one of the important factors leading to the deterioration of relations. During this period, the Soviet government's tearing up of contracts and withdrawal of experts exacerbated China's Three Years of Difficult Period. This situation ultimately led to the breakdown of relations between the two countries, and the Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship, Alliance and Mutual Assistance was not renewed after its expiration in 1980. This tense relationship also served as one of the background factors that prompted China to seek the establishment of diplomatic relations with Japan.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队
en: People's Liberation Army Strategic Support Force

description.zh-cn: 已撤销的中国人民解放军军种
马克思列宁主义是对马克思主义和列宁主义的统称，是由列宁和斯大林发展的马克思主义理论。它是中国共产党的第一个官方意识形态和指导思想之一，也是20世纪多数社会主义国家的官方意识形态。
description.en: Marxism-Leninism is a general term for the theories of Marxism and Leninism, and a Marxist theory developed by Vladimir Lenin and Joseph Stalin. It served as the Chinese Communist Party's first official ideology and a guiding thought, and was also the official ideology of most socialist states in the 20th century.

description.zh-cn: 由江泽民提出的执政理念，后被确立为中国共产党指导思想之一。它要求中国共产党始终代表中国先进社会生产力的发展要求，代表中国先进文化的前进方向，代表中国最广大人民的根本利益，被认为是继承和发展了马克思列宁主义、毛泽东思想、邓小平理论。
description.en: A guiding ideology of the Chinese Communist Party proposed by Jiang Zemin, requiring the CCP to always represent the development trends of China's advanced social productive forces, the orientations of an advanced culture, and the fundamental interests of the overwhelming majority of the Chinese people.

zh-cn: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想
新时代中国特色社会主义思想
en: Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era

description.zh-cn: 由时任中共中央总书记习近平提出并创立的中国特色社会主义理论，是中国共产党的指导思想。其核心内容被概括为“十个明确”、“十四个坚持”和“十三个方面成就”。该理论于2017年中共十九大写入党章，并于2018年写入中华人民共和国宪法。
description.en: The theory of socialism with Chinese characteristics, primarily founded by Xi Jinping (then General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee), serves as the guiding ideology of the Communist Party of China. Its core content is summarized as 'Ten Clarifications,' 'Fourteen Adherences,' and 'Thirteen Aspects of Achievements'. It was written into the Party Constitution at the 19th Party Congress in 2017, and into the Constitution of the People's Republic of China in 2018.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军五大战区之一，王抗平曾在此担任副司令员。
description.en: One of the five theater commands of the People's Liberation Army, where Wang Kangping served as deputy commander.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南部战区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军五大战区之一

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军西部战区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军五大战区之一

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北部战区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军五大战区之一

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军五大战区之一
首任中国人民解放军陆军司令员

en: People's Liberation Army Support Base in Djibouti

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在海外的第一个军事基地

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第十四届国家最高权力机关

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的常设机关，通过了《香港国安法》。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China, which passed the Hong Kong National Security Law.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，中共第二十届中央政治局委员，全国人大常委会副委员长，副国级党和国家领导人。
中国作家、政治人物，全国人大常委会副委员长
中国政治人物，全国人大常委会副委员长。出身航天科技集团的省委书记之一
中国政治人物，全国人大常委会副委员长
中国政治人物，全国人大常委会副委员长
中国政治人物，副国级领导人。现任中共第二十届中央政治局委员、中央书记处书记、中央统战部部长。曾任中华人民共和国环境保护部部长（接替陈吉宁）、中共中央组织部部长（继任陈希）。
中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会会议和中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会会议的年度例行统称。例如，《穹顶之下》在2015年两会前夕发布，引发了与会代表和委员的热议；此外，2016年两会期间，要求习近平辞职的公开信发表，被视为敏感事件。
description.en: The collective term for the annual plenary sessions of the National People's Congress (NPC) and the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC) of the People's Republic of China. For instance, 'Under the Dome' was released on the eve of the 2015 Two Sessions, sparking heated discussions among delegates and members; additionally, the open letter demanding Xi Jinping's resignation was published during the 2016 Two Sessions, making it a sensitive event.

location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区西长安街街道

description.zh-cn: 位于中南海，是中国共产党和中华人民共和国国务院所在地，中共中央政治局的办公地点之一。它是中华人民共和国国务院、中共中央书记处和中共中央办公厅等重要机关的办公所在地，亦是中国部分党和国家领导人的居所。此外，这里也是光绪帝被长期软禁并最终逝世的地点。
中国革命家、政治家，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的创始人和早期领导人之一，中华人民共和国开国元勋。他曾担任中国共产党和中华人民共和国的法官及政治人物，并曾任中华人民共和国代主席，与宋庆龄共同担任国家副主席。他被誉为“延安五老”之一。董良翚之父，许涤新曾协助其工作。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary and statesman, one of the founders and early leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a founding father of the PRC. He served as a judge and political figure for the CPC and PRC, and also as acting chairman of the PRC, sharing the vice-chairmanship with Song Qingling. He was known as one of the 'Five Elders of Yan'an'. Father of Dong Lianghui, Xu Dixin once assisted him.

birth_place.zh-cn: 上海公共租界东有恒路628号C

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、社会活动家、孙中山遗孀，中华人民共和国名誉主席。
中国共产党内的理论家和政治家，曾任毛泽东秘书、中共中央政治局委员。

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会
en: 18th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party
18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于2012年11月8日至14日在北京召开的第十八次全国代表大会。
description.en: The 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, held in Beijing from November 8 to 14, 2012.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会
中华人民共和国国家监察机关
en: National Supervisory Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家监察机关。
description.en: The highest state supervisory agency of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院
en: Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高审判机关，负责审理陕西千亿矿权案的二审和终审，罗豪才曾任副院长。
description.en: The highest judicial organ of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the second instance and final adjudication of the 'Shaanxi Hundred-Billion-Yuan Mining Rights Case'. Luo Haocai also served as its Vice President.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民检察院
en: Supreme People's Procuratorate of the People's Republic of China

location.zh-cn: 北京市东城区北河沿大街147号

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高检察机关和最高法律监督机关。设有中共中央纪委、国家监委派驻的纪检监察机构。
description.en: The highest legal supervision organ of the People's Republic of China.

en: Chairman of the People's Republic of China
President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家元首职位。
description.en: The head of state of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席
en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家副元首。
description.en: The deputy head of state of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆政治及国际关系学者、网络名人、电视人。现任复旦大学中国研究院院长、特聘教授，国家高端智库理事会理事，上海春秋发展战略研究院高级研究员。
description.en: A Chinese political scientist and international relations scholar, internet celebrity, and television personality. He is the Director of the China Institute of Fudan University and a distinguished professor, a council member of the national high-end think tanks, and a senior research fellow at the Shanghai Chunqiu Institute for Development and Strategic Studies.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国元勋，中国共产党与中国工农红军主要领导者之一，中共五大书记之一。他曾与萧克率领红六军团西征，李达时任参谋长。作为中国共产党早期领导人，他于1948年发表文章纠正土改运动中的“左”倾偏向。
description.en: A founding father of the People's Republic of China, one of the primary leaders of the Communist Party of China and the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, and one of the 'Five Secretaries' of the CPC. He, along with Xiao Ke, led the Red Sixth Army Corps on the Westward Expedition, with Li Da serving as Chief of Staff. As an early leader of the CPC, he published an article in 1948 to correct 'leftist' deviations in the Land Reform Movement.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
中共中央政治局常务委员会
中共中央政治局常委会
中央政治局常务委员会
en: Politburo Standing Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China
Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee
Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China
Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Chinese Communist Party Central Committee
Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Communist Party of China Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的最高领导机构，也是中国共产党的最高权力常设机关。由7名成员组成，它是中央委员会的核心领导层、中央政治局的常设机构，并实际作为中国共产党和中华人民共和国的最高领导及决策机构。李克强曾于2007年至2022年担任常委。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and the permanent body of its highest authority. Composed of 7 members, it is the core leadership of the CPC Central Committee, the permanent body of the Political Bureau, and de facto serves as the top leadership and decision-making body for both the CPC and the PRC. Li Keqiang was a member from 2007 to 2022.

description.zh-cn: 中国近现代思想家、政治家、革命家，新文化运动的主要开创者、倡导者和领袖之一，并担任《新青年》杂志主编。他是中国共产党的主要创始人、早期领导人，也是中国共产党首任总书记，是向忠发的前任。民国初年，他反对将孔教立为国教。五四运动后，他积极投身政治活动，思想转向马克思主义。在其任期内，于四一二事件中被南京国民政府列为首要通缉犯。
description.en: A modern Chinese thinker, politician, and revolutionary, he was a key initiator, advocate, and leader of the New Culture Movement, and served as editor-in-chief of 'New Youth' magazine. He was a main founder and early leader of the Communist Party of China, and its first General Secretary, serving as predecessor to Xiang Zhongfa. In the early Republic of China, he opposed establishing Confucianism as the state religion. After the May Fourth Movement, he actively engaged in political activities, and his ideology shifted towards Marxism. During his tenure, he was listed as a primary wanted criminal by the Nanjing Nationalist Government following the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军创始人之一，中国共产党早期主要领导人。他曾反对共产国际任命其担任苏区中央局书记。后脱党，并因与中央分裂而被开除党籍。
description.en: One of the founders of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Liberation Army, and an early leader of the CCP. He opposed the Comintern's appointment of him as the secretary of the Soviet Area Central Bureau. Later, he left the party and was expelled due to a split with the central committee.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处
en: Secretariat of the Chinese Communist Party
Secretariat of the Central Committee of the CCP
Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。同时也是中国共产党的中央机构之一，直接领导中国科学技术协会。
description.en: The administrative body of the Politburo and its Standing Committee. It is also one of the central bodies of the Communist Party of China, directly leading the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人之一，曾两度担任中国共产党实际最高领导人，并在向忠发之前担任中共最高领导人，后被派回国纠正李立三路线。他是一位社会主义革命家、作家、诗人、翻译家、文学评论家。1935年被国民党逮捕，后在福建长汀被宋希濂奉命枪决。
description.en: An early principal leader of the Chinese Communist Party, who served as the actual highest leader twice, including before Xiang Zhongfa, and was later sent back to China to correct the Lisan Line. He was a socialist revolutionary, writer, poet, translator, and literary critic. He was arrested by the KMT in 1935 and later executed by order in Changting, Fujian, by Song Xilian's troops.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的早期领导人、政治人物，原国家级副职领导人，对外工作的开拓者之一。

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的伟大的无产阶级革命家、军事家、政治家，中华人民共和国十大元帅之一，南昌起义领导人之一，中国人民解放军的创始人和缔造者之一。时任中央军委战略小组组长，与邓小平在战争时期长期搭档。
description.en: A Chinese Communist military commander and politician, one of the Marshals of the People's Republic of China, one of the leaders of the Nanchang Uprising, and one of the founders of the People's Liberation Army. He was a long-term partner of Deng Xiaoping during the war period.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，西北军将领，与张学良共同发动西安事变。
description.en: Leader of the Northwestern Army and one of the instigators of the Xi'an Incident.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战时期“三大战役”之一，由中国人民解放军华东野战军、中原野战军在以徐州为中心，东起海州，西至商丘，北起临城，南达淮河的广大地区，对中华民国国军发动的战略性进攻战役。
description.en: One of the 'Three Great Campaigns' of the second Chinese Civil War, a strategic offensive launched by the People's Liberation Army's East China Field Army and Central Plains Field Army against the Republic of China Army.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party
Politburo of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Politburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China
Politburo of the Communist Party of China
Political Bureau of the Communist Party of China Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一，是其中央委员会的常设机构。在中央委员会全体会议闭会期间，行使中央委员会的职权。其组成人员是中国共产党和中华人民共和国的党和国家领导人。向忠发曾任主席。该机构曾作出对陈良宇立案调查的决定。
description.en: One of the central leadership bodies and a standing institution of the Chinese Communist Party's Central Committee. It exercises the functions and powers of the Central Committee when its plenary session is not in session. Its members are party and state leaders of the CCP and the People's Republic of China. Xiang Zhongfa once served as its chairman. This body also made the decision to investigate Chen Liangyu.

en: West Route Army of the Red Army

description.zh-cn: 1936年10月由中国工农红军红四方面军主力2.18万人，在甘肃靖远西渡黄河后，称河西部队，后改称西路军。
description.en: Formed in October 1936 by the main force of the Fourth Front Army of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army after crossing the Yellow River, it was tasked with establishing a base in Hexi and opening a route to the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期四川地方军队的称谓，朱德曾在此进行动员工作

birth_place.zh-cn: 清朝河南省陈州府项城县袁张营
birth_place.en: Yuanzhangying, Xiangcheng, Chenzhou, Henan, Qing dynasty

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯是清末民初的军事家、政治家，北洋军的创始者与领导者，也是北洋军阀的奠基人。他曾任山东巡抚，参与东南互保，并上奏创办山东大学堂。他曾逼迫清帝溥仪退位，后任中华民国临时大总统及第一任正式大总统。他意图建立中华帝国，期间曾将紫禁城三大殿等建筑改名，但未能正式登基。他被广泛认为是刺杀宋教仁的幕后主使。赵秉钧是其重要亲信。
description.en: Yuan Shikai was a military and politician during the late Qing dynasty and early Republic of China. He founded and led the Beiyang Army, laying the groundwork for the Beiyang warlords. He served as Governor of Shandong, participated in the Mutual Protection of Southeast China, and proposed the establishment of Shandong University. He forced Emperor Puyi's abdication, then served as the Provisional and first Formal President of the Republic of China. He attempted to establish the Empire of China, renaming buildings like the Forbidden City's three great halls, though he was never formally enthroned. He was widely considered the mastermind behind Song Jiaoren's assassination. Zhao Bingjun was one of his key confidants.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事人物，北洋军阀直系首领之一，也是直系的代表人物，以其军事才能闻名，是直系军阀的实际军事领导者，为北伐战争的讨伐对象。
description.en: A military figure of the Republic of China, one of the leaders and a representative figure of the Zhili clique of the Beiyang Warlords, known for his military skills and as the de facto military leader of the clique, who was an object of the Northern Expedition.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将和政治人物，奉系军阀领袖张作霖长子，东北军将领，西安事变发动者之一。他继承父业统治东北，并宣布东北易帜归顺国民政府。在中原大战后期，他于1930年9月18日发出电报，呼吁蒋、联双方停止内战，通电拥蒋，率军入关，影响了战局。他曾指挥东北军在中东路事件中与苏联作战。与堂兄张学成一同就读奉天讲武堂，后因张学成投靠日本而下令将其剿杀。
description.en: A prominent military and political figure of the Republic of China, the first son of warlord Zhang Zuolin. He was a leader of the Northeastern Army and one of the instigators of the Xi'an Incident. He inherited his father's rule over Northeast China and declared allegiance to the Nationalist Government. In the later stages of the Central Plains War, on September 18, 1930, he sent a telegram calling for an end to the civil war between Chiang's forces and the coalition, which constituted his decisive intervention in support of Chiang Kai-shek and influenced the outcome. He commanded the Northeastern Army against the Soviet Union during the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929. He attended the Fengtian Military Academy with his cousin Zhang Xuecheng, whom he later ordered killed for collaborating with the Japanese.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人之一，二十八个半布尔什维克成员。他曾任张闻天的前任（中共中央总书记），并在向忠发死后接任中共中央总负责人。他是第五次反围剿期间的实际领导者之一，后在黑茶山空难中遇难。
description.en: One of the early key leaders of the Communist Party of China and a member of the '28 Bolsheviks'. He served as Zhang Wentian's predecessor (General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee), and took over as the head of the CCP after Xiang Zhongfa's death. He was also one of the actual leaders during the Fifth Encirclement Campaign against the Red Army, and later died in the Heichashan air crash.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际派往中国的苏联军事顾问，曾在中国工农红军中担任指挥职务。
中华民国军事家、政治家，晋系军阀的创始人和最高领导人，亦是反蒋联军的“中华民国陆海空军总司令”。他长期统治山西，被称为“山西王”。美国《时代杂志》在1930年称其为“模范督军”，并认为他为山西带来了繁荣。
description.en: A military strategist and politician of the Republic of China, founder and supreme leader of the Jin clique, and also the commander-in-chief of the anti-Chiang coalition forces. He ruled Shanxi for a long period and was known as the "King of Shanxi". In 1930, Time Magazine called him a "model governor" who brought prosperity to Shanxi.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，新桂系核心代表人物，中华民国首任国防部部长，华中剿匪总司令。他曾任淞沪戒严司令部司令，是四一二事件的主要执行者之一。他曾与杨宇霆在冀东会晤，并于事件后奉命来台宣慰。他是白先勇之父。
description.en: A first-class general of the Republic of China Army, a representative figure of the New Guangxi clique, and a prominent KMT general. He served as the commander of the Shanghai Martial Law Command and was one of the main executors of the April 12th Incident. He also met with Yang Yuting in eastern Hebei.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争中八路军发动的一次大规模战役
1962年10月至11月发生在中华人民共和国和印度共和国之间的一场边境战争。
刘少奇的第六任妻子，曾任中华人民共和国第一夫人、物理学家、全国政协常委。
抗日战争期间，国民革命军与新四军之间发生的军事冲突，属于国共摩擦范畴。此次事件中，国民党军队袭击新四军，其军部遭到围攻。
原中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任副国级领导人及中共华东局第一书记（康生曾为其副手）。他是“五马进京”事件的核心人物之一，后因“高饶反党联盟”事件倒台并被打倒。
description.en: A former political figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as a vice-national level leader and the First Secretary of the CPC East China Bureau (with Kang Sheng as his deputy). He was one of the core figures in the 'Five Horses Enter Beijing' incident and was later purged due to the 'Gao-Rao Anti-Party Alliance' incident.

description.zh-cn: 杰出的无产阶级革命家和理论家、忠诚的马克思主义者，中国共产党早期重要领导人之一。曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国外交部副部长。他曾批准刘少奇保释干部的决定，后因在庐山会议支持彭德怀而被定为反党集团成员。
description.en: An outstanding proletarian revolutionary and theorist, a loyal Marxist, and one of the early important leaders of the Chinese Communist Party. He served as the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China. He approved Liu Shaoqi's decision to bail out cadres and was later labeled a member of an anti-Party group for supporting Peng Dehuai at the Lushan Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国杂交水稻育种专家，中国工程院院士，美国国家科学院外籍院士。因其在20世纪60-70年代对杂交水稻品种的研究，显著提高了中国及世界各地的粮食产量，被誉为“杂交水稻之父”。
description.en: A Chinese agronomist, member of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, and foreign associate of the U.S. National Academy of Sciences. He is renowned as the "Father of Hybrid Rice" for his research on hybrid rice varieties in the 1960s and 1970s, which significantly increased food production in China and around the world.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗巴列维王朝的末代国王，在1979年伊朗伊斯兰革命中被推翻。
description.en: The last Shah of the Pahlavi dynasty in Iran, overthrown in the 1979 Iranian Revolution.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部
en: Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管全国公安工作的组成部门，负责起草《中华人民共和国治安管理处罚法》。
description.en: A component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of nationwide public security work, which drafted the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law of the People's Republic of China'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在文化大革命结束后，时任中共中央主席华国锋提出的政治原则，即“凡是毛主席作出的决策，我们都坚决维护；凡是毛主席的指示，我们都始终不渝地遵循”。该方针旨在维持毛泽东时代的政策和思想路线。
description.en: A political principle proposed by Hua Guofeng, then Chairman of the CCP Central Committee, after the Cultural Revolution in the People's Republic of China. It states: 'We will resolutely uphold whatever policy decisions Chairman Mao made, and unswervingly follow whatever instructions Chairman Mao gave.' This principle aimed to maintain the policies and ideological line of the Mao Zedong era.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪中国死亡人数最多的一次地震。
中国政治人物，叶剑英长子，曾任全国政协常务副主席。
叶剑英次子。
叶剑英三子。
中华民国时期军事及政治人物，粤系军阀的代表人物。他曾炮轰总统府，也曾与孙中山合作但之后反目。
description.en: A military and political figure in the Republic of China era, representative of the Yue clique. He once cooperated with Sun Yat-sen but later became his opponent.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党左派领袖、革命家，曾任黄埔军校党代表。
description.en: A revolutionary of the Kuomintang, served as the Party Representative of the Whampoa Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党早期领导人之一，中华民国大陆时期政要、诗人。他曾是一位早期的革命者，策划暗杀时任摄政王的载沣。后任武汉国民政府主席，与蒋介石在分共方式上存在分歧，导致宁汉分裂。最终成为汪精卫政权的首脑。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Kuomintang and a prominent politician and poet during the Republic of China era on the mainland. He was an early revolutionary who plotted the assassination of the then Prince-Regent Zaifeng. He later served as chairman of the Wuhan Nationalist Government, where his disagreements with Chiang Kai-shek over the method of purging communists led to the Nanjing-Wuhan split. Eventually, he became the head of the Wang Jingwei regime.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家，北伐名将，中国人民解放军创建者之一，曾任新四军军长。
description.en: One of the founders of the People's Liberation Army, a key leader of the New Fourth Army, and a Chinese military strategist.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物、建筑师，曾任第64、65任内阁总理大臣。因平民出身被称为“庶民宰相”，但也因洛克希德事件等丑闻备受争议。他曾代表日方签署《中日联合声明》。
description.en: Japanese politician and architect who served as the 64th and 65th Prime Minister of Japan. Known as the 'commoner prime minister' for his humble origins, he was also controversial due to scandals like the Lockheed affair. He signed the Sino-Japanese Joint Communiqué on behalf of Japan.

birth_place.en: Futada Village, Kariwa District, Niigata Prefecture

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英的养女。
中华民国陆军二级上将，晋系重要将领。曾任国民党华北剿匪总司令，在平津战役中率部和平改编，促成北平解放，并于第二次国共内战末期投向中国共产党。他是一位中国军事家、政治家，曾任中华人民共和国水利部、水利电力部部长。
description.en: General (Second Class) of the Republic of China Army and an important general of the Jin clique. He was the former Commander-in-Chief of the Kuomintang's North China Bandit Suppression Headquarters and led his troops to accept peaceful reorganization during the Pingjin Campaign, facilitating the peaceful liberation of Beiping, and later defected with his troops to the Chinese Communist Party at the end of the Chinese Civil War. A Chinese military strategist and politician, he later served as Minister of Water Resources and Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来妻子，中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级领导人，中共八大元老之一，曾任全国政协主席。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国天津市的一所著名综合性研究型大学，由教育家严修、张伯苓创办。周恩来、姚依林、孟凡利等曾就读于此。
description.en: A famous comprehensive research university located in Tianjin, China, and Meng Fanli's alma mater.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部
en: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China

location.zh-cn: 北京市朝阳区朝阳门南大街2号

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管外交事务的组成部门，曾就此事件作出回应。
description.en: The department of the People's Republic of China government responsible for foreign affairs, which responded to this incident.

description.zh-cn: 林彪的妻子，林立果、林立衡之母，曾任中共第九届中央政治局委员，林彪反革命集团案主犯之一，在九一三事件中坠机身亡。
description.en: Wife of Lin Biao, mother of Lin Liheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军上将，曾任空军司令员。林彪反革命集团主犯之一。
description.en: An Air Force General of the People's Liberation Army, once served as Commander of the Air Force. One of the main culprits of the Lin Biao counter-revolutionary clique.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军中将，林彪反革命集团主要成员之一，曾任海军政治委员。
description.en: A Navy Vice Admiral of the People's Liberation Army, one of the main culprits of the Lin Biao counter-revolutionary clique.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，林彪集团主要成员，曾任总后勤部部长。林彪反革命集团主犯之一。
中国共产党早期领导人之一，革命烈士，在四一二事件后的搜捕中被杀害。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Communist Party of China, who was killed in the roundups following the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，曾任中共中央政治局主席、中共中央总书记。因出身工人阶级而被共产国际提拔，但实际领导权多由周恩来、李立三等人掌握。1931年在上海被国民政府逮捕后迅速叛变并被处决。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party (CCP), serving as Chairman of the CCP Central Politburo and General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee. He was promoted by the Comintern due to his working-class background, but actual leadership was often held by others like Zhou Enlai and Li Lisan. After his arrest by the Nationalist government in Shanghai in 1931, he quickly defected and was executed.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，中共驻共产国际代表团团长。共产国际派遣回国后，他逐渐取代向忠发成为中共实际领导人，并在向忠发死后代理总书记。他被认为是“左”倾教条主义的代表，国际派人物，二十八个半布尔什维克之一，也是瞿秋白的政治对手。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China (CCP), he served as the head of the CCP delegation to the Comintern. After being sent back to China by the Comintern, he gradually replaced Xiang Zhongfa as the de facto leader of the CCP, and later served as acting General Secretary after Xiang's death. He was considered a representative of 'left' dogmatism, a figure of the International Faction, one of the '28 and a half Bolsheviks', and a political opponent of Qu Qiubai.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，曾任美国副总统，并在1960年总统选举中作为共和党候选人与肯尼迪竞争。后成为美国第37任总统。其于1972年访华，推动了中美关系正常化，并为中日建交创造了条件。1973年，他在白宫会见了田中角荣。
description.en: American politician, served as Vice President, and competed with Kennedy as a Republican candidate in the 1960 presidential election. He later became the 37th President of the United States. His 1972 visit to China promoted the normalization of Sino-US relations and created conditions for the establishment of Sino-Japanese diplomatic relations. In 1973, he met with Kakuei Tanaka at the White House.

description.zh-cn: 美国外交家、政治家及国际关系专家，曾任美国国家安全顾问和国务卿。他亦曾对薄熙来主政时期的重庆发展持正面评价。
description.en: An American diplomat, political scientist, and international relations expert, who served as United States National Security Advisor and Secretary of State. He also once held a positive view of Chongqing's development during Bo Xilai's era.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军是中华人民共和国在朝鲜战争期间派遣并支援朝鲜的武装力量。以“志愿”军队名义参战，并是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一。
description.en: The Chinese People's Volunteer Army was the armed force dispatched by the People's Republic of China during the Korean War to aid North Korea. It participated under the guise of a 'volunteer' army and was a signatory to the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 彭德怀的第二任妻子。
晚清时期由曾国藩组建的湖南地方武装，其活动延续至民国初年，是清朝镇压太平天国的主要军事力量。
description.en: A regional army from Hunan organized by Zeng Guofan during the late Qing Dynasty. Its operations extended into the early Republic of China period, and it served as the primary military force for the Qing dynasty in suppressing the Taiping Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将。
中国人民解放军上将，长期负责中共情报保卫和特务工作，曾任中共中央社会部部长。
description.en: A senior general of the Chinese Communist Party, long responsible for intelligence and secret service work, who served as the head of the Central Social Affairs Department of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军和八路军高级指挥员，曾任八路军副参谋长。
中华民国陆军一级上将，黄埔军校第一期毕业，是蒋介石最信任的将领之一。曾参与东征、北伐、抗日战争和国共内战，号称“西北王”。
description.en: A first-class general of the Republic of China Army, a graduate of the first class of the Whampoa Military Academy, and one of Chiang Kai-shek's most trusted generals. He participated in the Eastern Expedition, Northern Expedition, Second Sino-Japanese War, and the Chinese Civil War, known as the 'King of the Northwest'.

birth_place.zh-cn: 大清浙江省宁波府镇海县
birth_place.en: Zhenhai County, Ningbo Prefecture, Zhejiang, Qing dynasty

death_place.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省台北市
death_place.en: Taipei, Taiwan Province, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国将领，青海王。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军新疆军区

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军五星上将，曾任美国陆军参谋长、联合国军总司令，并被任命为驻日盟军总司令，代表同盟国接受日本投降并主导了战后对日本的占领。
description.en: An American five-star general and Field Marshal of the Philippine Army, who was Chief of Staff of the United States Army, Commander-in-Chief of the United Nations Command, and Supreme Commander for the Allied Powers. He accepted Japan's surrender on behalf of the Allies and led the post-war occupation of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东与杨开慧的长子，毛岸青之兄，任彭德怀秘书，在朝鲜战争中阵亡。
朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的创建者和首任最高领导人，被尊为“共和国永远的主席”，曾任朝鲜总理。在朝鲜战争期间担任朝鲜人民军最高司令官，是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署人之一。
description.en: Founder and first supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. Served as the Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army during the Korean War and was one of the signatories of the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军元帅、中华人民共和国元帅，中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的创建者与领导人之一。他曾任中国人民解放军总政治部主任、中央人民政府最高人民检察署检察长。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Liberation Army and the People's Republic of China, and one of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army and the People's Republic of China. He also served as Director of the General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army and Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领及政治人物，西北军领袖，民国军阀，因其部队被称为“基督将军”。曾发动北京政变将溥仪逐出紫禁城，并创办了西北军第二军官学校。他也是反蒋联军的副总司令之一，曾应邀到育才学校演讲。
description.en: A warlord and political figure in the Republic of China, leader of the Guominjun (Northwest Army), known as the 'Christian General'. He founded the Northwest Army Second Military Officers' School and expelled Puyi from the Forbidden City during the Beijing Coup. He was also one of the deputy commanders-in-chief of the anti-Chiang coalition and was invited to give a speech at Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 红四方面军主要领导人之一，西路军政委。
位于德国哥廷根的公立研究型大学，朱德曾在此留学。
description.en: A public research university in Göttingen, Germany.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会
中共中央纪律检查委员会
十三届中央纪律检查委员会
en: Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Chinese Communist Party
Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关。该机构负责对薄熙来、陈良宇等事件立案调查，并据报道是推动香港修订《逃犯条例》的真正倡议者。
description.en: The highest internal disciplinary body of the Communist Party of China. It is responsible for investigating incidents involving figures like Bo Xilai and Chen Liangyu, and was reportedly the true initiator behind Hong Kong's push to amend the extradition law.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命是一场推翻清朝统治、建立中华民国的全国性资产阶级民主革命。革命始于1911年武昌起义，共和派促使清宣统帝退位。北洋军阀袁世凯利用军事实力逼迫清帝退位并攫取了革命果实。摄政王载沣顺应潮流辞职。此次革命曾获邵玉轩斥巨资资助。
description.en: The Xinhai Revolution was a nationwide bourgeois democratic revolution that overthrew the Qing dynasty and established the Republic of China. It began with the Wuchang Uprising in 1911, leading to the abdication of Emperor Xuantong. Warlord Yuan Shikai exploited his military power to force the emperor's resignation and seize the revolution's fruits. Prince-Regent Zaifeng resigned in response to the changing times. This revolution received significant funding from Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事人物、军阀，曾为冯玉祥部下，国民革命军将领。张作霖死后，张学成曾投靠于他。中原大战时，他加入反蒋联军并任第四方面军指挥官，后在该战役中失败。
description.en: A military figure and warlord of the Republic of China, formerly a subordinate of Feng Yuxiang and a general of the National Revolutionary Army. After Zhang Zuolin's death, Zhang Xuecheng once defected to him. During the Central Plains War, he joined the anti-Chiang coalition as the commander of the 4th Front Army and was later defeated in the war.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军陆军二级上将
清末民初著名军事家、政治家，梁启超在时务学堂的学生。他是护国运动的主要组织者和领导者，曾遭遇袁世凯派遣的刺客暗杀但幸免于难。
description.en: A famous military strategist and politician of the late Qing and early Republic of China periods. He was a student of Liang Qichao at the Academy of Current Affairs, a key organizer and leader of the National Protection War, and survived an assassination attempt by assassins sent by Yuan Shikai.

description.zh-cn: 林彪与叶群之子，中华人民共和国文化大革命时期政治人物。曾任解放军空军司令部办公室副主任兼作战部副部长，是《“571工程”纪要》的主要策划者。
description.en: Son of Lin Biao and Ye Qun, a political figure during China's Cultural Revolution. He served as Deputy Director of the Air Force Command Headquarters Office and Deputy Minister of the Combat Department, and was the main planner of the "Project 571 Outline".

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，林彪与叶群之女，林立果的姐姐，《空军报》副总编。
description.en: Chinese political figure, daughter of Lin Biao and Ye Qun.

description.zh-cn: 林彪的女儿。
越南民主共和国国防部长。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第四野战军
苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟（苏联），是由列宁和布尔什维克党建立的欧亚大陆北部的社会主义联邦制国家。作为共产国际总部，它在20世纪是社会主义阵营的领导者，冷战时期与美国对峙，成为两大超级大国。二战期间，苏联是同盟国主要成员，对中国提供援助并对日宣战，入侵满洲等。国共内战期间支援中国共产党，后与中华人民共和国结盟。1950年代末中苏交恶后，苏联撤走专家，对中国经济造成负面影响；1960年代后，苏联对中国构成安全威胁，促使中国寻求与西方国家缓和关系。它也是世界上第一个实现载人航天的国家。
description.en: The Union of Soviet Socialist Republics (USSR) was a socialist federal state in Northern Eurasia, founded by Lenin and the Bolshevik Party. As the headquarters of the Communist International, it was the leader of the socialist bloc in the 20th century, opposing the United States during the Cold War and becoming one of the two superpowers. During World War II, the USSR was a principal member of the Allied powers, providing aid to China and declaring war on Japan, invading Manchuria, etc. During the Chinese Civil War, it supported the Communist Party of China, and later allied with the People's Republic of China. After the Sino-Soviet split in the late 1950s, the Soviet Union withdrew experts, negatively impacting China's economy; after the 1960s, the USSR posed a security threat to China, prompting China to seek détente with Western countries. It was also the first country to achieve human spaceflight.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的第一任妻子。
毛泽东的第二任妻子，毛岸英之母，毛新宇的祖母。
毛泽东的第三任妻子，曾任第五届全国政协委员。
毛泽东和毛泽民的父亲。
description.en: Father of Mao Zedong and Mao Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东与杨开慧的次子，中国共产党党员，翻译家，毛新宇之父。
description.en: Second son of Mao Zedong, member of the Chinese Communist Party, and translator.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东与杨开慧三子，毛岸青之弟。
毛泽东与贺子珍的女儿，江青继女，李讷的姐姐。
中国文化大革命时期政治人物，毛泽东与江青的女儿，毛岸青的异母姊妹。
中国共产党财经干部，毛泽东之弟。曾化名周彬在新疆工作，后被新疆军阀盛世才杀害。
description.en: A financial cadre of the Communist Party of China and the younger brother of Mao Zedong. He worked in Xinjiang under the alias Zhou Bin and was later killed by the Xinjiang warlord Sheng Shicai.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东和毛泽民的弟弟。
description.en: Younger brother of Mao Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义的先驱，中国共产党的主要创始人之一、早期主要领导人，曾安排毛泽东在北京大学图书馆工作。1927年4月28日在北京被张作霖下令绞刑处决。
description.en: A pioneer of Chinese communism and one of the main founders of the Chinese Communist Party. He was executed by hanging in Beijing on April 28, 1927, under the orders of Zhang Zuolin.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人。他曾任新四军副军长兼政委、中共苏区中央分局书记，是新四军的创建人和主要领导人之一。早期曾在湖北省总工会担任向忠发的副手。他还曾安排护送瞿秋白转移，并在战略问题上与叶挺存在分歧。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party. He served as the Deputy Commander and Political Commissar of the New Fourth Army, and Secretary of the CPC Central Bureau in Soviet Areas, being one of the founders and principal leaders of the New Fourth Army. Earlier, he served as Xiang Zhongfa's deputy at the Hubei Provincial General Labor Union. He also arranged the transfer of Qu Qiubai and had disagreements with Ye Ting on strategic issues.

description.zh-cn: 印度首任总理。
位于西北欧的联邦君主立宪制国家，欧盟和北约的创始成员国之一。该国也是富通集团总部所在地。
description.en: A federal constitutional monarchy in Northwest Europe, it is one of the founding members of the EU and NATO. It is also home to the Fortis Group headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，曾任中央政治局常委，后被向忠发和李立三排挤出中央领导核心。
description.en: An early leader of the CCP and a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, who was later pushed out of the central leadership by Xiang Zhongfa and Li Lisan.

description.zh-cn: 由蒋中正在上海发动的针对中国共产党的武力清党行动，导致国共两党正式决裂，并成为第一次国共内战的导火索之一。
description.en: A violent purge of Chinese Communist Party members in Shanghai, initiated by Chiang Kai-shek, which led to the formal split between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party, and served as one of the catalysts for the First Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 日本陆军大将，甲级战犯，九一八事变和建立满洲国的策划者之一。
中华人民共和国开国上将，中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级副职领导人，中共八大元老之一。曾任中共中央组织部部长、中顾委副主任，并曾率部进入云南。
description.en: A founding general of the People's Liberation Army and a senior political figure in the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He was one of the Eight Elders of the CCP, serving as Head of the Organization Department of the CCP Central Committee and Vice Director of the Central Advisory Commission. He also led troops into Yunnan.

description.zh-cn: 中国空气动力学家和系统科学家，工程控制论创始人之一，中国载人航天奠基人，“两弹一星”功勋奖章获得者，被誉为“中国航天之父”、“中国导弹之父”。他还是中国科学院及中国工程院院士，曾任中国科学技术协会第三届主席。张纯如曾为其撰写传记《中国导弹之父——钱学森之谜》。
description.en: Chinese aerodynamicist and systems scientist, one of the founders of engineering cybernetics, and a founding figure of China's manned space program. He was awarded the 'Two Bombs, One Satellite' Meritorious Award and is known as the 'Father of Chinese Aerospace' and 'Father of Chinese Missiles'. He was also an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences and Chinese Academy of Engineering, and served as the third chairman of the China Association for Science and Technology. Iris Chang wrote his biography 'Thread of the Silkworm'.

death_place.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共北京市委第一书记
清末由孙中山在日本东京成立的革命政党，由华兴会等多个革命团体合并而成，是中国近代第一个全国性的革命政党。邵玉轩是其会员之一。
description.en: A revolutionary party founded by Sun Yat-sen in Tokyo, Japan, formed by the merger of several revolutionary groups including the Huaxinghui. Shao Yuxuan was one of its members.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会党校
en: Central Party School of the Chinese Communist Party
Central Party School of the Communist Party of China
Party School of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的机构，是中国共产党培养党的高中级领导干部和马克思主义理论干部的最高学府。薄一波曾在此学习。
description.en: An institution under the direct authority of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, serving as the highest academy for training high- and middle-ranking party officials and Marxist theorists. Bo Yibo once studied here.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军高级将领，陕甘边革命根据地的主要创建者之一。1936年4月战斗牺牲。小说《刘志丹》即是为纪念他而创作。
description.en: A high-ranking commander of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and one of the main founders of the Shaanxi-Gansu Border Revolutionary Base. The novel 'Liu Zhidan' was written in his memory.

death_place.en: Sanjiao Town, Zhongyang County, Shanxi Province

description.zh-cn: 宋庆龄之弟，中华民国政治家、外交家、金融家，曾任财政部长。
description.en: Chinese statesman, diplomat, and financier who served as Minister of Finance.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会
十三届中央顾问委员会
en: Central Advisory Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1982年至1992年期间设立的一个过渡性特殊机构，旨在解决中央领导机构的新老交替问题，安置年事已高的中央领导干部，并推动废除领导干部职务终身制。该机构也是对党中央的政治辅助和咨询机构。
description.en: A transitional and special body established by the Communist Party of China from 1982 to 1992. It aimed to address the succession of old and new cadres in central leadership, accommodate senior central leading cadres, and promote the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres. This body also served as a political auxiliary and advisory institution for the Party Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期党员，曾为邓小平（第二任妻子）、李维汉的妻子。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's second wife.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的长子。中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任全国政协副主席，残疾人权益倡导者。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's eldest son.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的次女。陈希的前任中国科学技术协会党组书记。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's second daughter.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的三女。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's third daughter.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的次子。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's second son.

zh-cn: 废除干部领导职务终身制
en: Abolition of the lifetime tenure system for leading cadres
Abolition of lifelong tenure for leading cadres

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国于1980年代推行的一项政治制度改革，旨在终结领导干部职务终身制，建立任期制和退休制度。为实现这一目标，还设立了中央顾问委员会作为过渡性机构，以取代事实上的终身任职。
description.en: A political system reform initiated by the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China in the 1980s. It aimed to end the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres and establish term limits and a retirement system. To achieve this goal, the Central Advisory Commission was also established as a transitional body to replace de facto lifelong tenure.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平为解决香港、澳门及台湾问题提出的构想，后成为中华人民共和国处理香港和澳门问题的基本国策。倪匡曾表示从不相信此政策。
description.en: A concept proposed by Deng Xiaoping to resolve the issues of Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan, which later became the basic state policy of the People's Republic of China for Hong Kong and Macau. Ni Kuang once stated that he never believed in this policy.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省的计划单列市，中国四大一线城市之一、粤港澳大湾区的中心城市之一、中国超大城市之一。它也是中国的第一个经济特区，改革开放的窗口。深圳是中国全国性经济中心、国际科技创新中心和对外开放门户，也是华商银行的注册地。
description.en: A sub-provincial city in Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China. It is one of the four first-tier cities in China, a central city in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area, and one of China's megacities. It is also China's first special economic zone and a window for reform and opening up. Shenzhen serves as a national economic center, an international technology and innovation hub, a gateway for foreign relations, and the place of registration for Hua Shang Bank.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省
location.en: Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，第39任美国总统。在其任内，发生了伊朗人质危机。
description.en: American politician, the 39th President of the United States. The Iran hostage crisis occurred during his term.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，曾任美国总统。
新加坡建国总理、政治家。他曾建议中共停止对外输出革命，并在新加坡与马来西亚合并及分离时期担任关键政治角色。在1997年大选后，他控告邓亮洪诽谤。他是李显龙的父亲。
description.en: Founding Prime Minister and politician of Singapore. He advised the CCP to stop exporting revolution and played a key political role during Singapore's merger with and separation from Malaysia. After the 1997 general election, he sued Tang Liang Hong for defamation. He is also known as the father of Lee Hsien Loong.

description.zh-cn: 法国汽车制造商，邓小平早年曾在此做工。
陈云长子，中国政治人物，原副国级领导人。曾任国家开发银行董事长、第十二届全国政协副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former national-deputy level leader, and the eldest son of Chen Yun. He has served as the Chairman of the China Development Bank and a Vice Chairman of the 12th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将，曾任国民革命军第五军军长、陆军第二兵团司令、徐州剿匪总司令部副总司令。在淮海战役中被俘。
description.en: A Lieutenant General of the Republic of China Army, who served as the commander of the 5th Corps, the 2nd Army Group, and the deputy commander of the Xuzhou Bandit Suppression General Headquarters. He was captured during the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代著名作家、思想家、设计师、新文化运动领袖之一。他曾任职于教育部，并提议将《永乐大典》残本交由京师图书馆收藏以加强保护。他也是瞿秋白在左翼文化运动中的战友。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer, thinker, designer, and one of the leaders of the New Culture Movement. While working for the Ministry of Education, he proposed transferring the remaining volumes of the Yongle Encyclopedia to the Capital Library for better preservation. He was also a comrade-in-arms of Qu Qiubai in the left-wing cultural movement.

description.zh-cn: 陈毅元帅之子。
description.en: Son of Marshal Chen Yi.

description.zh-cn: 壮族政治人物，曾任广西自治区主席、广西壮族自治区革命委员会主任，被认为是广西大屠杀的主要组织者。
description.en: A Zhuang ethnic politician, he served as Chairman of the Guangxi Autonomous Region and Director of the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region Revolutionary Committee, and was considered a primary organizer of the Guangxi Massacre.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级理论家，曾任中央文革小组成员。
中华人民共和国公安部管理的，主要关押最高级别政治犯的监狱。
description.en: A maximum-security prison in the People's Republic of China, primarily used for detaining high-ranking political prisoners.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命时期北京红卫兵“五大领袖”之一。
一所以人文社会科学为主的综合性研究型全国重点大学，直属于中华人民共和国教育部。
中国左翼作家、政治人物，长期负责中共情报工作，中华人民共和国成立后曾任上海市副市长。1955年因内奸罪被捕，1982年获得平反。
description.en: Chinese left-wing writer and politician who was in charge of the CCP's intelligence work for a long time. He served as the deputy mayor of Shanghai after the founding of the People's Republic of China. He was arrested in 1955 on charges of being a traitor and was rehabilitated in 1982.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家科学技术方面的最高学术机构，全国自然科学与高新技术综合研究发展中心，也是中国科学技术大学的创办及主管单位。
description.en: The highest academic institution in science and technology of the People's Republic of China, the national comprehensive research and development center for natural sciences and high technology, and also the founder and governing body of the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾是中山大学的前身，现为位于中国广州市的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: Formerly the predecessor of Sun Yat-sen University, it is now a major research university in Guangzhou, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任铁道部副部长。
description.en: An admiral in the People's Liberation Army of China, formerly served as Vice Minister of Railways.

description.zh-cn: 藏族政治人物，领导并完成了《民族区域自治法》的制定。
description.en: A Tibetan politician who led and completed the formulation of the Law on Regional Ethnic Autonomy.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军开国上将，张又侠之父。
中国人民解放军开国上将，时任第五兵团司令员，其部队在西南战役中俘虏了宋希濂。他是胡耀邦的表哥。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, then commander of the 5th Army Group, whose troops captured Song Xilian during the Southwest Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国正国级领导人，现任中共中央政治局常委、中央书记处排名第一的书记、中共中央办公厅主任。曾任中共三明市委副书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, a secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat, and Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee. Former Deputy Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中共中央政治局常委、中央纪委书记。曾任中共广东省委书记，并出席孟凡利就任深圳市委书记的干部会议。
description.en: Chinese politician. Currently a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection. He previously served as Secretary of the CPC Guangdong Provincial Committee and attended the cadre meeting for Meng Fanli's appointment as Shenzhen Party Secretary.

zh-cn: 有中国特色的社会主义

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党根据本国国情，将马克思主义基本原理与中国具体实际相结合而形成的政治经济理论，也是中国共产党和中华人民共和国的官方意识形态及国策。
description.en: A political and economic theory formulated by the Communist Party of China by adapting the basic principles of Marxism to the specific conditions of China.

en: Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟的执政党，将列宁主义纳入其官方学说。
description.en: The ruling political party of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共第二十届中央政治局委员。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级领导人。现任中共中央政治局委员、中央书记处书记、中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and a national-level leader. He is currently a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee, a secretary of the Central Secretariat, and the head of the CCP Central Propaganda Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共第二十届中央政治局委员，时任中共中央政法委书记
中国政治人物，中共中央书记处书记，中华人民共和国国家监察委员会主任，中华人民共和国总监察官。

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅
en: General Office of the Chinese Communist Party
General Office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的综合办事机构，负责日常文书、会务、安保、机要、通讯等工作，并为中共中央和中央直属机关提供服务。
description.en: The working body of the CPC Central Committee, responsible for daily clerical work, meeting arrangements, security, confidential matters, communications, etc.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部
en: Organization Department of the Chinese Communist Party
Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee
Organization Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China
Organization Department of the Communist Party of China Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的职能部门之一，负责党组织建设、干部队伍建设和人才工作。该部门于1979年递交报告，为小说《刘志丹》案平反。自2018年起，统一管理中央机构编制委员会办公室。
description.en: One of the functional departments of the CPC Central Committee, responsible for party organization construction, cadre team construction, and talent work. In 1979, this department submitted a report to rehabilitate the 'Liu Zhidan' novel case. Since 2018, it has centrally managed the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会统一战线工作部
中共中央统一战线工作部
en: United Front Work Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管统一战线工作的职能部门。
description.en: A functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for united front work.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会政法委员会
中国共产党中央政法委员会
en: Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission
Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的直属机构，负责领导和管理全国政法工作。该机构曾牵头成立联合调查组，对陕西千亿矿权案卷宗丢失等问题进行调查；佘孟孝曾在此任副秘书长。
description.en: An agency directly under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, responsible for leading and managing political and legal affairs nationwide. It once led a joint investigation team to investigate issues like the missing case files in the 'Shaanxi Hundred-Billion-Yuan Mining Rights Case'; She Mengxiao also served as its Deputy Secretary-General.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治家，原正国级领导人。曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央书记处书记、天津市市长。在六四事件中，他因反对实施戒严并支持赵紫阳而被免职。复出后曾任电子工业部部长、全国政协副主席等职务。他曾赏识李瑞环。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, former national-level leader. He served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and a secretary of the Central Secretariat of the CPC. He was dismissed from his party leadership positions for sympathizing with the student movement and supporting Zhao Ziyang during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests. After his political comeback, he served as Minister of Electronics Industry and Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会副委员长和会议秘书长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as a Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee and Secretary-General of the sessions of the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级副职领导人。曾任中共中央书记处书记、中共中央统战部部长、全国政协副主席等职。因在六四事件中的表现被撤职，后复出任民政部副部长，并长期从事慈善事业。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and a former deputy state leader. He served as a secretary of the Central Secretariat of the CPC and head of the United Front Work Department. He was dismissed for his actions during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, later returned to politics as Vice Minister of Civil Affairs, and was long involved in philanthropy.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级党和国家领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委、全国政协主席、天津市市长。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 杨尚昆的胞弟，解放军上将。曾任中共中央军委秘书长兼总政治部主任。在任总政治部主任期间，他参与指挥了戒严部队。
description.en: Younger brother of Yang Shangkun and a PLA general. He served as Secretary-General of the CPC Central Military Commission and Director of the General Political Department. During his tenure as Director of the General Political Department, he participated in commanding the martial law troops.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级正职领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央纪律检查委员会书记、中组部副部长。
description.en: Former Politburo Standing Committee member, once served as deputy head of the CCP Central Organization Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级党和国家领导人。曾任中央书记处书记、陈希的前任中共中央党校校长。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级领导人，第十七届中共中央政治局常委，曾任中央纪委书记。

death_place.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军前主要领导人之一，原副国级领导人，上将军衔（2014年被开除军籍），在反腐运动中落马。他曾在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army. He was appointed as a Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress, and later fell during the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，团派主要成员。曾任中华人民共和国副主席、中共中央政治局委员，为原副国级领导人。
description.en: A political figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a key member of the Tuanpai (Youth League Faction). He served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Politburo of the CPC, holding a former vice-national level leadership position.

description.zh-cn: 原中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央办公厅主任、中共中央书记处书记、全国政协副主席、中央统战部部长，是胡锦涛的首席助理。作为令狐路线的弟弟，他在反腐运动中落马，并被指是操盘整倒陈良宇的人之一。
description.en: Former Chinese political figure, who served as Director of the CCP General Office and a chief aide to Hu Jintao. As the younger brother of Linghu Luxian, he fell during the anti-corruption campaign and was also implicated in the downfall of Chen Liangyu.

description.zh-cn: 原中央宣传部部长
中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、全国人大常委会委员长。涉及胡锦涛二十大离场事件。

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会
en: 20th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区府右街12号
location.en: No. 12 Fuyou Street, Xicheng District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会选举产生的中央委员会，是中国共产党在2022年至2027年的最高领导机关，王抗平为候补委员。
description.en: The central leadership body elected by the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, serving as the highest leading body from 2022 to 2027. Wang Kangping serves as an alternate member of this committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物、力学工程师及航天领域专家，中共第二十届中央政治局委员、中共新疆维吾尔自治区党委书记。曾任中国航天科技集团公司总经理，出身航天科技集团的省委书记之一
中国政治人物及环境科学家。曾任中华人民共和国环境保护部部长（在《穹顶之下》发布后曾对其公开表示赞赏）、北京市市长。现任中共第二十届中央政治局委员、中共上海市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician and environmental scientist. He served as Minister of Environmental Protection (publicly praising 'Under the Dome' upon its release) and Mayor of Beijing. He is currently a member of the 20th CPC Central Committee Politburo and Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共第二十届中央政治局委员，天津市委书记。此前曾任中共重庆市委书记，在唐良智担任重庆市市长期间，是袁家军的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician. While Tang Liangzhi served as Mayor of Chongqing, Chen Min'er was the Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物及空间技术专家，副国级领导人。现任中共中央政治局委员、中共重庆市委书记，曾任浙江省人大常委会主任，并曾担任神舟五号任务载人飞船系统总指挥。
description.en: Chinese politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a space technology expert, holding a vice-national level leadership position. Currently a member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Party Secretary of Chongqing Municipality, and formerly Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress. He also served as Commander-in-Chief of the manned spacecraft system for the Shenzhou 5 mission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政治局委员、中国共产党广东省委员会书记。曾任中共杭州市委书记、中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, serving as the Party Secretary of Guangdong.

zh-cn: 中国共产党全国代表大会
en: National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party
National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机关，每五年举行一次，负责选举中央委员会等机构。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China, held every five years, responsible for electing bodies such as the Central Committee.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
en: General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party
General Secretary of the Central Committee of the CCP
General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1956年至1967年间以及1980年至1982年间设立于中央书记处的领导职务，负责处理中央书记处运作。此职务并非中共中央的主要负责人，与1982年起设立的党内最高领导人职务不同。
description.en: A leading position established within the Central Secretariat of the Communist Party of China between 1956-1967 and 1980-1982, responsible for managing the operations of the Central Secretariat. This position was not the main leader of the CPC Central Committee and is distinct from the supreme leader role established since 1982.

description.zh-cn: 中共第二十届中央政治局委员，北京市委书记。
原副国级领导人，曾任中共第十六届中央政治局委员、中共上海市委书记、上海市市长。因陈良宇事件被查处下台并判刑。
description.en: Chinese politician, former member of the 16th Politburo of the CCP, Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Committee, and Mayor of Shanghai. He was dismissed and sentenced due to his involvement in the Chen Liangyu incident.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的二子。中华人民共和国政治人物，77级大学生。曾任大连市市长、辽宁省省长、中华人民共和国商务部部长、中共重庆市委书记、中共中央政治局委员。2013年因受贿、贪污、滥用职权罪被判处无期徒刑。他被指是操盘整倒陈良宇的人之一，亦是习近平的政治对手。他曾是谷开来之夫，其前妻为李雪峰之女。
description.en: Bo Yibo's second son. A former Chinese politician, a member of the Class of 1977. He served as a member of the Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party, Party Secretary of Chongqing, Minister of Commerce, Governor of Liaoning, and Mayor of Dalian. In 2013, he was sentenced to life imprisonment for bribery, corruption, and abuse of power. He is considered a political rival of Xi Jinping. He was the husband of Gu Kailai, and his ex-wife is the daughter of Li Xuefeng.

description.zh-cn: 因王立军事件引发的，导致原中共中央政治局委员薄熙来被免职、调查、判刑等一系列政治事件。
原中共中央政治局委员、中共重庆市委书记，原国家级副职领导人。

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会
en: 20th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于2022年10月召开的全国代表大会。大会选举产生了第二十届中央委员会和中央纪律检查委员会。会后，多位团派高层未进入新一届中央委员会，标志着团派的政治影响力急剧下降。
description.en: The National Congress of the Communist Party of China was held in October 2022. It elected the 20th Central Committee and the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection. Following the congress, several high-level Tuanpai leaders did not enter the new Central Committee, marking a sharp decline in the faction's political influence.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央纪委书记，接替尉健行。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任北京市市长、市委书记，并担任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席（全国政协主席），原正国级领导人，是李瑞环的继任者。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He formerly served as Mayor and Party Secretary of Beijing, and as Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC). He was a former state-level leader and the successor to Li Ruihuan.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中央文明委主任
黄敬与范瑾的三子，俞强声之弟，中国共产党和中华人民共和国前正国级领导人。曾任中国共产党第十八届中央政治局常委、中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席、中共上海市委书记、中共湖北省委书记、建设部部长等职务。
description.en: Third son of Huang Jing and Fan Jin, younger brother of Yu Qiangsheng, a former national-level leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as a member of the 18th Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China, Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the CPC, Secretary of the Hubei Provincial Committee of the CPC, and Minister of Construction.

description.zh-cn: 时任抗日军政大学校长。中国政治家，曾任中央人民政府重工业部副部长、代部长。
description.en: Served as President of the Anti-Japanese Military and Political University. Chinese politician, formerly Vice Minister and Acting Minister of the Ministry of Heavy Industry of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党左派的杰出代表，妇女运动的领袖。
中国作家。
中国诗人，艾未未的父亲，曾担任育才学校文学组组长。
description.en: Chinese poet, the father of Ai Weiwei, and who served as the head of the literature group at Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 中国文艺评论家。
中国作家。
宋庆龄之父，原名韩教准。
宋庆龄之弟。

zh-cn: 中国国民党革命委员会中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党革命委员会中央委员会的简称，是中华人民共和国的民主党派之一。
中国共产党和国家领导人、社会活动家，长期负责中共的对外联络、统战、侨务、港澳等工作，是对外工作领导人之一。在被提名为国家副主席候选人后突然逝世。
description.en: A leader of the Communist Party of China and the state, and a social activist. He was long responsible for the CPC's external liaison, united front work, overseas Chinese affairs, and Hong Kong and Macao affairs, and was a prominent leader in foreign affairs. He died suddenly after being nominated as a candidate for Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代革命家、政治家、教育家、翻译家。曾任中华民国首任教育总长、北京大学校长、中央研究院首任院长等职。他革新北大，倡导“思想自由，兼容并包”的办学方针，开“学术”与“自由”之风，为五四运动培养了思想动力，期间私下支持学生并以辞职抗议政府镇压。他被毛泽东誉为“学界泰斗、人世楷模”，并曾提议将国立山东大学设于青岛。
description.en: A modern Chinese revolutionary, politician, educator, and translator. He served as the first Minister of Education of the Republic of China, President of Peking University, and the first President of Academia Sinica. He reformed Peking University, advocating for 'freedom of thought and inclusiveness,' fostering a spirit of 'academics' and 'freedom,' which cultivated intellectual momentum for the May Fourth Movement. During the movement, he privately supported students and resigned in protest against government suppression. He was praised by Mao Zedong as a 'titan of the academic world and a model for all,' and also proposed the establishment of National Shandong University in Qingdao.

description.zh-cn: 越南革命家，越南民主共和国的创立者。
description.en: Vietnamese revolutionary and the founder of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam.

zh-cn: 中国共产党上海市委员会
中国共产党上海市第十一届委员会
en: Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在上海市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Shanghai.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国财政部
en: Ministry of Finance of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 主管中华人民共和国财政工作的国务院组成部门。
中国人民解放军上将，作家，曾任国防大学政治委员，李先念女婿。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army, author, and former Political Commissar of the PLA National Defence University.

en: People's Liberation Army at the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests and massacre

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国北京的政治风波，中国政府动用军队对天安门广场的示威者进行武力镇压和清场。
中国剧作家，曾帮助过江青。
中国政治人物，毛泽东的侄子，毛泽民与朱旦华之子，在毛泽东晚年期间曾任中共中央政治局联络员。他是文化大革命时期的重要人物，作为江青的政治盟友和四人帮的支持者，后一同被捕。
description.en: Mao Zedong's nephew and son of Mao Zemin and Zhu Danhua, who served as his liaison during Mao's later years.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任上海市革命委员会副主任、中共上海市委书记。文革期间是王洪文的政治盟友，文革后被判刑。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Chairman of the Shanghai Municipal Revolutionary Committee and Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee. He was a political ally of Wang Hongwen during the Cultural Revolution and was sentenced after its end.

description.zh-cn: 它是中国国民革命军第八路军的简称，是抗日战争时期中国共产党领导的主要武装力量之一，由中国工农红军主力改编而成。
description.en: A unit of the National Revolutionary Army formed from the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国江苏省省会。
description.en: The capital of Jiangsu Province, People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 杨尚昆、彭德怀逝世的地点。
中国人民解放军上将，曾任中央军事委员会副主席，是张海阳的父亲。
description.en: A general (shangjiang) of the People's Liberation Army (PLA) of China, who served as Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He is the father of Zhang Haiyang.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在长沙批评“四人帮”的一系列谈话。
中国抗日战争是20世纪30至40年代，中华民国抵抗大日本帝国全面侵略的战争。九一八事变被视为其开端，全面爆发始于1937年，并持续至1945年。战争期间，国民政府迁都重庆，使重庆成为中国的战时首都。石双琪曾参加抗日自卫队。
description.en: The Sino-Japanese War was a full-scale conflict in the 1930s and 1940s, where the Republic of China resisted an invasion by the Empire of Japan. The Mukden Incident is considered its beginning, with the war fully erupting in 1937 and lasting until 1945. During the war, the Nationalist Government moved its capital to Chongqing, making it China's wartime capital. Shi Shuangqi also joined the anti-Japanese self-defense force.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫长子，曾任全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Eldest son of Ulanhu, former Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫的孙女，布赫之女，曾任内蒙古自治区政府主席。
description.en: Ulanhu's granddaughter, Buhe's daughter, former Chairwoman of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Government.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋的第一任妻子。
description.en: Ex-wife of Xi Zhongxun.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，中共元老习仲勋的第二任妻子，中国共产党中央委员会总书记习近平的生母，习明泽的祖母。
description.en: A member of the Communist Party of China, the second wife of the CCP elder Xi Zhongxun, the biological mother of Xi Jinping, General Secretary of the Communist Party of China Central Committee, and the grandmother of Xi Mingze.

description.zh-cn: 她是中共元老习仲勋与齐心的长女，中共中央总书记习近平的姐姐。她是一位企业家，曾任北京中民信房地产开发有限公司董事长，也是邓家贵的妻子。她拥有香港身份证和加拿大永久居留权。
description.en: She is the eldest daughter of CCP elder Xi Zhongxun and Qi Xin, and the elder sister of CCP General Secretary Xi Jinping. She is a businesswoman, formerly chairperson of Beijing Zhongminxin Real Estate Development Co., Ltd., and wife of Deng Jiagui. She holds a Hong Kong identity card and permanent residency in Canada.

zh-cn: 中国共产党广东省委员会
en: Guangdong Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在广东省的领导机关。
description.en: The leadership body of the Communist Party of China in Guangdong Province.

en: Leader of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在特定历史时期的最高领导人职务称谓，特指中国共产党中央委员会的最高领导人。1956-1967年及1980-1982年的中央委员会总书记不属于此范畴。
description.en: The title of the supreme leader of the Communist Party of China during a specific historical period, specifically referring to the supreme leader of its Central Committee. The General Secretary of the Central Committee during 1956-1967 and 1980-1982 did not fall into this category.

zh-cn: 二十八个半布尔什维克

description.zh-cn: 指20世纪20年代后期在苏联莫斯科中山大学学习并深受王明“左”倾思想影响的中共留苏学生群体。该群体是该校的一个政治派别，也是一个中共党内团体。王稼祥是其中之一。
人民公社是大跃进时期（1958-1983年）在中国农村推行的一种政社合一的社会基层组织形式。它是1958年将农业生产合作社合并而成的运动，作为农业集体化的高级阶段和社会改造运动，是“三面红旗”之一。其建立进一步剥夺了农民对土地的权利；同时，公共食堂制度的推行导致粮食浪费，平均主义的分配方式打击了农民的生产积极性，成为三年困难时期的重要成因。
description.en: The People's Commune was a grassroots social organization that integrated government administration and economic management, implemented in rural China during the Great Leap Forward (1958-1983). It was a movement initiated in 1958 to merge agricultural producers' cooperatives, serving as an advanced stage of agricultural collectivization and a social transformation movement, identified as one of the 'Three Red Flags'. Its establishment further deprived peasants of their rights to the land; meanwhile, the implementation of the public canteen system led to food waste, and the egalitarian distribution method dampened farmers' production enthusiasm, becoming a significant cause of the Three Years of Great Famine.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市的省级行政机关，也是其最高地方国家行政机关。北京体育大学曾由其与国家体委双重领导。
description.en: The highest local state administrative organ and provincial-level administrative body for Beijing, People's Republic of China. Beijing Sport University was once under its dual leadership with the State Sports Commission.

zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会
en: Beijing Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Beijing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在北京市的领导机关。北京体育大学的党组织关系隶属于该委员会。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Beijing. The party organization of Beijing Sport University is affiliated with this committee.

description.zh-cn: 李立三的儿子。
中国近代民主革命家，华兴会会长，宋教仁的挚友。曾任军政府战时总司令、陆军总长。
description.en: A Chinese modern democratic revolutionary, president of the Huaxinghui, and a close friend of Song Jiaoren. He served as wartime commander-in-chief and Minister of War for the military government.

birth_place.zh-cn: 湖南省常德府桃源县仙瑞乡上坊村湘冲
birth_place.en: Xiangchong, Shangfang Village, Xianrui Township, Taoyuan County, Changde Prefecture, Hunan Province

death_place.zh-cn: 江苏省沪海道上海县闸北区沪宁铁路医院
death_place.en: Huning Railway Hospital, Zhabei District, Shanghai County, Huhai Dao, Jiangsu Province

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命家，中华民国初期第一位倡导责任内阁制的政治家，华兴会和同盟会的主要领导人，国民党的主要筹建人及代理理事长。他于1913年3月20日在上海北站遇刺，并于22日不治身亡。此事件是二次革命的直接导火索。
description.en: A Chinese modern democratic revolutionary, the first politician to advocate for a cabinet responsibility system in the early Republic of China, a key leader of the Huaxinghui and the Tongmenghui, and a principal founder and acting chairman of the Kuomintang. On March 20, 1913, he was assassinated at Shanghai North Railway Station and died on the 22nd. This event was the direct trigger for the Second Revolution.

zh-cn: 中华民国临时政府 (1912年－1913年)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国建国初期，以京兆地方（北京）为首都的中央政府。始于1912年袁世凯就任临时大总统。在袁世凯去世后，该政府实际由北洋军阀各派系所控制，因大总统和国务总理主要由北洋军阀出身而得名。其于1914年设立了绥远特别区。五四运动期间，其在巴黎和会上的外交失败和对内镇压学生的做法引发了全国性的抗议。
description.en: The central government of the Republic of China in its early days, with its capital in Jingzhao (Beijing). It began with Yuan Shikai's inauguration as Provisional President in 1912. After Yuan Shikai's death, it was effectively controlled by various factions of the Beiyang Warlords, who predominantly held the positions of President and Premier. It established the Suiyuan Special Administrative Region in 1914. During the May Fourth Movement, its diplomatic failure at the Paris Peace Conference and its suppression of students sparked nationwide protests.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央人民政府内政部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Minister of Internal Affairs of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军高级将领，济南战役中被俘。

death_place.zh-cn: 河南省永城市陈官庄乡

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军二级上将，抗战期间曾任新编第二十二师师长与第五军军长，参与昆仑关战役与滇西缅北战役。国共内战期间任第二兵团司令，在徐蚌会战中阵亡。
description.en: A Lieutenant General of the Republic of China Army, posthumously promoted to General. He served as the commander of the New 22nd Division and the 5th Corps during the Second Sino-Japanese War, participating in the Battle of Kunlun Pass and the Battle of Northern Burma and Western Yunnan. During the Chinese Civil War, he commanded the 2nd Army Group and was killed in action during the Huaihai Campaign.

en: Party and State Leaders of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 一党制社会主义国家（如中华人民共和国和前苏联）的政治术语，指在中国共产党和国家机构层面，担任特定职务及级别的高级领导人的统称，这些职务分为国家级正职和国家级副职。
description.en: A political term in one-party socialist states (such as the People's Republic of China and the former Soviet Union), referring to high-level leaders in the Chinese Communist Party and state organs who hold specific positions and ranks, divided into national-level full and deputy ranks.

zh-cn: 中国共产党集体领导制度
en: Collective leadership system of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的组织原则和领导制度，旨在防止个人专断。
description.en: An organizational and leadership principle of the CPC aimed at preventing personal autocracy.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的长子。
description.en: Bo Yibo's eldest son.

zh-cn: 国务院财政经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 1979年至1980年间存在的国务院下属机构，后被中央财政经济领导小组取代。
description.en: A subordinate body of the State Council that existed from 1979 to 1980, later replaced by the Central Leading Group for Financial and Economic Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 1986年底由中国大陆各地高校学生发起的一场大规模学生示威游行，旨在争取民主选举、新闻自由等权利。该运动是中华人民共和国民主运动的一部分，对后续的政治事件产生了深远影响，并成为导致胡耀邦下台的导火索。
description.en: A large-scale student movement initiated by university students across mainland China at the end of 1986, aiming to demand rights such as democratic elections and freedom of the press. It was part of the Chinese democracy movement, had a profound impact on subsequent political events, and became the catalyst for Hu Yaobang's removal from office.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，一二·九运动的领导者和发动人之一，谷开来之父。
description.en: A major general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, one of the initiators of the December 9th Movement, and the father of Gu Kailai.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来与第一任妻子李丹宇之子，商人。
description.en: Son of Bo Xilai and Li Danyu, a businessman.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来与薄谷开来之子，薄一波之孙，投资人、律师。他曾与陈晓丹交往。
description.en: Son of Bo Xilai and Bo Gu Kailai, grandson of Bo Yibo. He is an investor and lawyer, and once dated Chen Xiaodan.

zh-cn: 中国共产党浙江省委员会
en: Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在浙江省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国最高学术研究机关。
description.en: The national academy of the Republic of China.

en: University of Science and Technology of China

description.zh-cn: 位于中国安徽省合肥市，隶属于中国科学院，是中华人民共和国理工科排名前列的公立研究型大学。该校是八六学潮的策源地，其学生曾率先发起游行抗议地方人大代表选举问题。此外，科大讯飞由该校背景的“讯飞信息科技有限公司”整体变更设立。
description.en: Located in Hefei, Anhui Province, China, and affiliated with the Chinese Academy of Sciences, this is a top-tier public research university in science and engineering. It was the origin of the 1986 student demonstrations, where its students first marched to protest local People's Congress deputy elections. Additionally, iFlytek was established through the overall transformation of 'Xunfei Information Technology Co., Ltd.', a company with ties to the university.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝诗人、官员，号称“诗仙”，与杜甫并称“李杜”。
唐代伟大的现实主义诗人，世称“诗圣”、“诗史”，与李白齐名，并称为“李杜”。其作品对白居易的讽谕诗创作有重要影响。
description.en: A great realist poet of the Tang dynasty, known as the 'Poet-Sage' and 'Poet-Historian', whose works significantly influenced Bai Juyi's satirical poetry.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任全国人大常委会副委员长。因受贿罪被判处并执行死刑。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as a Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. He was sentenced to death and executed for bribery.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央委员，曾任赵紫阳的政治秘书（兼中共中央政治体制改革研究室主任）。六四事件后被判刑，是中国异见人士，《零八宪章》的首批签署者之一。
description.en: Former member of the CPC Central Committee, political secretary to Zhao Ziyang (also serving as Director of the CPC Central Research Office for Political System Reform).
