Sentenced after the Tiananmen Square incident, he was a Chinese dissident and one of the first signatories of Charter 08.

description.zh-cn: 赫鲁晓夫之后的苏联最高领导人，曾任苏共中央总书记。其执政后期苏联经济陷入停滞。
description.en: The paramount leader of the Soviet Union after Khrushchev, serving as General Secretary of the CPSU.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个帝制王朝，由满族建立。初期沿用锦衣卫制度，后改为銮仪卫。它是太平天国运动的主要镇压者和第二次鸦片战争的主要参战方。其行政区划初称布政使司，后“省”获官方认可。甲午战争后编练包括北洋军前身在内的新军。日俄战争在其领土进行，战后影响立宪运动。载沣是其最后的实际统治者之一，并被福泽谕吉《脱亚论》视为应“绝交”的“恶友”。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty in Chinese history, established by the Manchu people. It initially adopted the Jinyiwei system, later changing it to the Luan Yi Wei (Imperial Guard of Honor). It was the primary suppressor of the Taiping Rebellion and a major combatant in the Second Opium War. Its administrative divisions were initially called 'Buzheng Shisi,' with 'province' later gaining official recognition. After the First Sino-Japanese War, it began training the New Army, including the predecessor of the Beiyang Army. The Russo-Japanese War was fought on its territory, influencing the start of the Constitutional Movement afterward. Zaifeng was one of its last de facto rulers, and it was considered a 'bad friend' by Fukuzawa Yukichi in 'Datsu-A Ron,' with whom Japan should break ties.

description.zh-cn: 赵紫阳次子。
description.en: Second son of Zhao Ziyang.

description.zh-cn: 赵紫阳之女，中国嘉德国际拍卖有限公司总经理。
description.en: Daughter of Zhao Ziyang, General Manager of China Guardian Auctions.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院总理
en: Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府（国务院）的首长，是中国的政府首脑。它负责领导中华人民共和国国务院，作为中央人民政府的最高领导人。李克强曾于2013年至2023年担任此职务。
description.en: The head of the Central People's Government (State Council) of the People's Republic of China, serving as China's head of government. It is responsible for leading the State Council and acts as the highest leader of the Central People's Government. Li Keqiang held this position from 2013 to 2023.

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席
en: Vice Chairperson of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference
Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席，属国家级副职党和国家领导人。
description.en: Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, a state-level deputy leader position.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理
en: Vice Premier of the State Council
Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的副总理，是国务院的副首长之一。其职责是协助总理工作，亦是中华人民共和国的最高行政首长之一。例如，李克强曾于2008年至2013年担任排名第一的副总理。
description.en: The Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China is one of the deputy heads of the State Council. Their responsibilities include assisting the Premier and being among the highest administrative leaders of the People's Republic of China. For example, Li Keqiang served as the first-ranking Vice Premier from 2008 to 2013.

en: History of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 政治体制改革，1980年代由邓小平、胡耀邦、赵紫阳等人推动的政治改革尝试。
苏联最后一任最高领导人，曾任苏联共产党中央委员会总书记。六四事件期间曾访华。
description.en: The last leader of the Soviet Union, serving as General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国南部沿海的省级行政区。它是徐发淦的籍贯地，河源市位于其境内；同时，也是杨竞衡的出生地。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division located on the southern coast of the People's Republic of China. It is Xu Fagan's ancestral home, with Heyuan City situated within its borders; it is also the birthplace of Yang Jingheng.

description.zh-cn: 日本第125代天皇。
指中共十四大前，杨尚昆、杨白冰兄弟被指意图夺取军权，最终被邓小平解除军权的政治事件。
description.en: Refers to the political incident before the 14th National Congress of the CPC, where brothers Yang Shangkun and Yang Baibing were accused of attempting to seize military power, ultimately leading to their removal from military authority by Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦长子，曾任中共中央统战部副部长。
前中共中央总书记胡耀邦因心脏病逝世，引发了大规模的悼念活动，成为六四事件的导火索。
中华民国陆军中将，蒋介石嫡系重要将领，抗日名将，黄埔军校第一期毕业。曾任第十一集团军总司令等职。他曾是瞿秋白在上海大学的学生，后负责羁押并执行对瞿秋白的枪决。1949年在国共内战中被俘，1959年获特赦。晚年移居美国，致力于中国和平统一。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the Republic of China Army, a key general loyal to Chiang Kai-shek, a famous anti-Japanese war hero, and a graduate of the first class of the Whampoa Military Academy. He served as the commander of the 11th Army Group. He was a student of Qu Qiubai at Shanghai University and later responsible for detaining and executing Qu Qiubai. He was captured in the Chinese Civil War in 1949 and was granted amnesty in 1959. In his later years, he moved to the United States and dedicated himself to the peaceful reunification of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于日本东京的著名私立大学，宋教仁曾在此留学。
description.en: A famous private university in Tokyo, Japan, where Song Jiaoren studied.

description.zh-cn: 中国顶尖高等学府，位于中国北京，是新文化运动和五四运动的中心。1917年，根据国民政府教育部的统一调整，接收了北洋大学法科。多位知名人士曾在此就读或任职，如李克强（在此获得了法学学士、经济学硕士和经济学博士学位）、林立果、徐旭生（曾任教授、教务长及哲学系主任）和罗豪才（曾完成大学学业并长期任教，任副校长）。黄立众也曾在此就读，后因言获罪被校长陆平开除。
description.en: A top institution of higher learning in Beijing, China, and the center of the New Culture Movement and the May Fourth Movement. In 1917, following a unified restructuring by the Ministry of Education of the Nationalist Government, it absorbed the law department of Peiyang University. Many notable figures have studied or worked here, including Li Keqiang (who earned his Bachelor of Laws, Master of Economics, and Doctor of Economics degrees), Lin Liguo, Xu Xusheng (who served as professor, dean of studies, and head of the philosophy department), and Luo Haocai (who completed his university studies and taught for many years, serving as Vice President). Huang Lizhong also studied here but was later expelled by President Lu Ping for his speech.

description.zh-cn: 由托洛茨基发展的马克思主义理论，与斯大林主义对立。
由弗拉基米尔·列宁于1919年3月创立的国际共产主义组织，总部设于苏联莫斯科，旨在推动世界革命。它是一个共产党和共产主义组织的国际联合组织，在中共早期对其有巨大影响，曾对中国共产党提供支援和指导，并支持向忠发成为中共最高领导人。其在华活动被国民党右派视为苏联赤化中国的证据。该组织于1943年6月10日宣告解散。
description.en: An international communist organization and federation of communist parties, founded in March 1919 under the leadership of Vladimir Lenin, headquartered in Moscow, Soviet Union. It advocated for world revolution, had a significant influence on the early Chinese Communist Party, provided support and direction to the CCP, and supported Xiang Zhongfa's rise to top leadership. Its activities in China were considered by the KMT right-wing as evidence of a Soviet plot to communize China. The organization announced its dissolution on June 10, 1943.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代散文家、文学理论家、评论家、诗人、翻译家、思想家，鲁迅的胞弟。在文革“破四旧”期间遭到批斗和抄家。
description.en: A modern Chinese essayist, literary theorist, critic, poet, translator, and thinker; the younger brother of Lu Xun. He was persecuted and his house was raided during the 'Destroy the Four Olds' movement of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 同济大学及华中科技大学同济医学院的源头。

zh-cn: 中国共产党江苏省委员会
en: Jiangsu Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在江苏省的领导机关
中国教育发展战略学会会长。
description.en: President of the Chinese Society of Education Development Strategy.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家通讯社，曾在1979年发表文章批判魏京生。
description.en: The state news agency of the People's Republic of China, which published an article criticizing Wei Jingsheng in 1979.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国铁道部
en: Ministry of Railways of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院主管铁路运输的组成部门，负责管理中国铁路事务。
description.en: Formerly a constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for managing its railway transportation affairs.

description.zh-cn: 李鹏长子，曾任中华人民共和国交通运输部部长
李鹏女儿，前中国大唐集团副总经理
李鹏次子
中国共产党早期农民运动领导人。
中华人民共和国新疆维吾尔自治区的一个特殊社会组织，实行党政军企合一体制。它是一个准军事化组织，负责新疆地区的屯垦戍边，并与新疆生产建设兵团实行“兵团、企业合一”的管理体制。
description.en: A special social organization in the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region of the People's Republic of China, which implements an integrated system of party, government, military, and enterprise. It is a quasi-military organization responsible for economic development and border defense in Xinjiang, operating under a 'corps-enterprise unified' management system with the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps.

description.zh-cn: 一部电视纪录片。
中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任北京市市长、山西省省长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Mayor of Beijing and former Governor of Shanxi.

birth_place.zh-cn: 浙江省衢州府江山县保安乡

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府情报首长、秘密警察首长，军事委员会调查统计局负责人。
description.en: Head of the Bureau of Investigation and Statistics of the Military Commission of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国记者
中国政治人物，曾任上海市市长、海峡两岸关系协会会长，多次举荐江泽民。
美国政治人物，第42任美国总统，乔治·沃克·布什的前任。他曾在金泳三执政期间与金泳三就第一次朝核危机等问题进行合作。在其1998年访华前，中国政府将魏京生流放到美国。
description.en: American politician, 42nd President of the United States, and predecessor of George W. Bush. He collaborated with Kim Young-sam on issues such as the First North Korean nuclear crisis during Kim's presidency. Before his visit to China in 1998, the Chinese government exiled Wei Jingsheng to the U.S.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦首任总统，苏联解体过程中的关键人物。
江泽民的生父。
江泽民的叔父与嗣父，中共烈士。
前中共中央总书记江泽民的夫人。
description.en: Wife of former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee Jiang Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国企业家，中国科学院前副院长，上海科技大学校务委员会主任，江泽民长子。
江泽民次子，江绵恒胞弟。
一种起源于中国的精神修炼及信仰体系，由李洪志于1992年公开传出。它是一个以“真、善、忍”为原则的灵修组织，也是一个气功修炼团体。该团体于1999年被中国政府取缔。
description.en: A spiritual practice and belief system that originated in China, publicly introduced by Li Hongzhi in 1992.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部原为建设若干所世界一流大学和一批国际知名高水平研究型大学而实施的教育计划。
中国共产党元老宋任穷之女，文化大革命期间北京师范大学女附中红卫兵的著名领袖人物。曾因给毛泽东佩戴红卫兵袖章并被赐名“要武”而闻名全国。后移居美国成为地质学者。
description.en: Daughter of the Chinese Communist Party veteran Song Renqiong, and a prominent leader of the Red Guards at the Beijing Normal University Affiliated Girls' Middle School during the Cultural Revolution. She became nationally famous for putting a Red Guard armband on Mao Zedong and being given the name 'Yaowu'. She later moved to the United States and became a geologist.

description.zh-cn: 由德国思想家卡尔·马克思和弗里德里希·恩格斯共同创立的理论体系，涵盖哲学、政治经济学和社会主义等领域，它是一种以历史唯物主义、辩证法和对资本主义的批判所发展而出的经济、政治和社会世界观。
description.en: A theoretical system founded by Karl Marx and Friedrich Engels, covering philosophy, political economy, and socialism.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省厦门市

description.zh-cn: 中国近代教育史上第一所华侨创办的大学，中华人民共和国教育部直属的全国重点大学，位于中国福建省厦门市的综合性研究型大学。一项研究结果显示，1977、1978年级的学生中，知识分子家庭出身的比例达到历史最高水平。
description.en: The first university founded by overseas Chinese in modern Chinese education history, a national key university directly under the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China, and a comprehensive research university located in Xiamen, Fujian Province, China. A research finding from the university indicated that the proportion of students from intellectual families in the Classes of 1977 and 1978 reached a historical high.

zh-cn: 中国共产党深圳市委员会
en: Shenzhen Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在深圳市的地方委员会，是该市党的领导机关和领导核心。
description.en: The local committee of the Communist Party of China in Shenzhen, serving as the Party's leadership body and core in the city.

description.zh-cn: 中国已退役职业网球运动员。
description.en: Retired Chinese professional tennis player.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级领导人，曾任中共浙江省委书记。现任中央港澳工作领导小组常务副组长、中共中央港澳工作办公室主任、国务院港澳事务办公室主任。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a former deputy national leader, currently serving as the executive deputy head of the Central Leading Group on Hong Kong and Macao Affairs, Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee, and Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部直属的综合性研究型大学，位于中国浙江省杭州市。1998年由原浙江大学、浙江医科大学、浙江农业大学、杭州大学合并组建。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province, China.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家发展和改革委员会
国家发展和改革委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门，是综合研究拟订经济和社会发展政策，进行总量平衡，指导总体经济体制改革的宏观调控部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, which is a macro-control department that comprehensively studies and formulates economic and social development policies, conducts aggregate balance, and guides the overall economic system reform.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，时任南投县长。

en: National Security Commission of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的决策和议事协调机构，负责国家安全工作。
朱镕基的儿子。
明朝开国皇帝，明太祖，年号洪武。他是朱镕基的祖先，明宣宗的曾祖父，朱高煦的祖父，李景隆是其外甥李文忠之子。孝慈高皇后马氏的丈夫，曾将马皇后比作唐太宗时的长孙皇后，并在其去世后誓言不再立后。他设立了锦衣卫。在位期间，他发动了包括空印案、胡惟庸案、蓝玉案、郭桓案在内的多起政治清洗。特别是通过胡惟庸案，他废除了中国的丞相制度，大大加强了皇权。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Ming Dynasty, known as the Hongwu Emperor. He was an ancestor of Zhu Rongji, the great-grandfather of Emperor Xuande, and the grandfather of Zhu Gaoxu; Li Jinglong was the son of his nephew Li Wenzhong. He was the husband of Empress Ma, whom he compared to Empress Zhangsun of the Tang dynasty, and after her death, he vowed not to install another empress. He was also the founder of the Jinyiwei. During his reign, he initiated several major political purges, including the Empty Seal Case, the Hu Weiyong case, the Lan Yu case, and the Guo Huan case. Notably, through the Hu Weiyong case, he abolished the chancellery system in China and greatly consolidated imperial power.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央银行。
description.en: The central bank of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国证券监督管理委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission.

zh-cn: 中国共产党重庆市委员会
en: Chongqing Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Chongqing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在重庆市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 美国投资银行，其经济学家吉姆·奥尼尔提出了“金砖四国”概念。
李克强的妻子，首都经济贸易大学英语教授。
description.en: Li Keqiang's wife, a professor of English at the Capital University of Economics and Business.

description.zh-cn: 李克强的弟弟，曾任国有重点大型企业监事会主席。
description.en: Li Keqiang's younger brother, who served as the Chairman of the Board of Supervisors for Key Large State-Owned Enterprises.

description.zh-cn: 为处理法轮功问题而成立的中共中央领导小组办公室。
位于中国上海市的顶尖研究型大学。
description.en: A top research university in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的著名高等学府，1951年由大夏大学和光华大学合并改制而成。
description.en: A prestigious institution of higher education located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 英国首相。
联合国秘书长。
刘云山出生地，今属内蒙古自治区土默特右旗。

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国民政部
en: Ministry of Civil Affairs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管社会行政事务的组成部门，主要负责民政事务。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for social administrative affairs, primarily civil affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共上海市委常委，中国纪检监察学院院长，前中华人民共和国国家监察委员会主任，首位拥有总监察官头衔的国家监察委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician who previously served as the President of the China Academy of Discipline Inspection and Supervision.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共北京市委书记。
中华人民共和国哲学社会科学研究的最高学术机构和综合研究中心，许涤新曾任副院长。
description.en: The highest academic institution and comprehensive research center for philosophy and social sciences in the People's Republic of China. Xu Dixin served as its vice president.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将。曾任中共中央政治局委员，并在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中央军事委员会副主席。后在反腐运动中落马。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army. He was a former Politburo member and was appointed as a Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress. He later fell during the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆企业家，阿里巴巴集团、淘宝网、支付宝的创始人，蚂蚁集团实际控制人
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, founder of Alibaba Group.

description.zh-cn: 韩国第20任总统，于2024年12月3日宣布全国戒严，引发政治危机，最终导致其被弹劾下台及逮捕。
description.en: Then-President of the Republic of Korea, who declared martial law on December 3, 2024, sparking a political crisis that led to his impeachment and arrest.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国第19任总统，于2018年与金正恩共同签署了《板门店宣言》。
description.en: The 19th President of the Republic of Korea, who co-signed the Panmunjom Declaration with Kim Jong-un in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾总统
中国传媒工作者、前中国中央电视台主持人，于2018年底曝光陕西千亿矿权案二审卷宗在最高人民法院丢失，引发舆论风暴。
description.en: A Chinese media worker and former host of China Central Television who, in late 2018, exposed the disappearance of the second-instance case files of the 'Shaanxi Hundred-Billion-Yuan Mining Rights Case' from the Supreme People's Court, sparking a public outcry.

description.zh-cn: 以色列总理
中华人民共和国女高音歌唱家、歌剧表演艺术家、国家一级歌唱演员，中共中央总书记习近平的妻子，曾任全国政协委员、解放军艺术学院院长。
description.en: Chinese folk singer, wife of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中国前驻英国大使柯华之女，习近平的第一任妻子。
description.en: First wife of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记习近平与歌唱家彭丽媛的独生女，齐桥桥的侄女。
description.en: Daughter of Xi Jinping and Peng Liyuan, and niece of Qi Qiaoqiao.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京的一所干部子弟学校，齐桥桥曾在此就读小学。
description.en: A school for children of cadres in Beijing, where Qi Qiaoqiao attended primary school.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共河北省委书记。
中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央组织部部长、中国科学技术协会党组书记，原副国级党和国家领导人，习近平在清华大学的室友。
description.en: Chinese politician, formerly served as the Head of the Organization Department of the CCP Central Committee and the Party Group Secretary of the China Association for Science and Technology. He was a former state leader at vice-national level and Xi Jinping's roommate at Tsinghua University.

zh-cn: 小约瑟夫·罗比内特·拜登

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第46任暨现任美国总统。
description.en: American politician serving as the 46th and current president of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前总统、政治人物及法学家，曾任中国国民党主席、台北市市长、法务部部长等职务。他于2015年追授张纯如褒扬令，并曾称魏京生为“民主先锋”。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and former President of the Republic of China, who also served as Chairman of the Kuomintang. He posthumously awarded a presidential citation to Iris Chang in 2015 and called Wei Jingsheng a 'pioneer of democracy'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，前中国共产党中央委员会总书记胡锦涛的夫人，曾任北京市城乡规划委员会副主任。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, wife of former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee Hu Jintao, and former deputy director of the Beijing Municipal Commission of Urban Planning.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央总书记胡锦涛与刘永清之子，现任中华人民共和国民政部副部长。
description.en: Son of former CCP General Secretary Hu Jintao and Liu Yongqing, currently serving as Vice Minister of Civil Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 指胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记、温家宝担任国务院总理时期的中华人民共和国中央领导集体。该届政府被认为需要打击削弱江泽民派系。
description.en: Refers to the central leadership of the People's Republic of China during the period when Hu Jintao was the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and Wen Jiabao was the Premier of the State Council. This administration was seen as needing to weaken the Jiang Zemin faction.

description.zh-cn: 2008年5月12日发生于中国四川的特大地震，是中华人民共和国成立以来破坏力最大的地震，也是唐山大地震后伤亡最惨重的一次。此次地震对都江堰及二王庙造成了损害，并因大量校舍倒塌引发社会广泛质疑，促使艾未未发起了公民调查活动。
description.en: A catastrophic earthquake occurred in Sichuan, China, on May 12, 2008. It was the most destructive and casualty-ridden earthquake since the Tangshan earthquake and the founding of the People's Republic of China. The event caused damage to Dujiangyan and the Erwang Temple, and the collapse of numerous school buildings led to widespread public questioning, prompting Ai Weiwei to initiate a citizens' investigation.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，亲民党创党主席、现任党主席，曾任台湾省省长。毕业于伯克利。
description.en: Republic of China politician, founding and current chairman of the People First Party, formerly governor of Taiwan Province, and an alumnus of Berkeley.

description.zh-cn: 指国家在非常时期采取的一种紧急措施。在1989年六四事件前夕，北京实施了戒严。
description.en: An emergency measure taken by a state in extraordinary times. Martial law was imposed in Beijing on the eve of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党内部主张并推动改革开放的政治派别，其主张包括深化市场化和政治体制改革。
中华人民共和国国务院前总理温家宝之子，中国商人和企业家，曾创立优创科技有限公司和新天域资本公司，并曾担任中国卫星通信集团董事长。
description.en: Son of Wen Jiabao, former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, a Chinese businessman and entrepreneur who founded Unihub Global Network and New Horizon Capital, and formerly served as the chairman of China Satcom.

description.zh-cn: 温家宝与张培莉之女，温云松之妹。曾在雷曼兄弟公司和瑞士信贷第一波士顿银行任职。
description.en: Daughter of Wen Jiabao and Zhang Peili, and sister of Wen Yunsong. She has worked at Lehman Brothers and Credit Suisse First Boston.

description.zh-cn: 指2012年2月6日至7日，时任重庆市副市长兼公安局局长王立军私自进入美国驻成都总领事馆滞留。该事件引发了一系列政治风波，直接导致了薄熙来的倒台和重庆模式的终结。
description.en: Refers to the incident on February 6-7, 2012, when then Vice Mayor of Chongqing and police chief Wang Lijun secretly entered and stayed at the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu. This event triggered a series of political turmoil, directly leading to the downfall of Bo Xilai and the end of the Chongqing Model.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治家，曾任俄罗斯总理，现任俄罗斯总统。他于2022年2月24日下令对乌克兰发动入侵（亦称“特别军事行动”）。魏京生赞同其“为保护本民族不再遭受种族清洗”的说法。
description.en: President of Russia, who on February 24, 2022, ordered a "special military operation" against Ukraine, launching the invasion. Wei Jingsheng agreed with his justification of 'protecting his people from ethnic cleansing'.

description.zh-cn: 黄敬与范瑾的长子，俞正声的大哥，原中华人民共和国国家安全部北美情报司司长，1986年叛逃美国。
description.en: Eldest son of Huang Jing and Fan Jin. He was the eldest brother of Yu Zhengsheng, and formerly served as the Director of the North American Intelligence Division of the Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China, defecting to the United States in 1986.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防科技大学

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖南省长沙市的中央军事委员会直属综合性大学，是中国人民解放军的军事院校，也是中国顶尖高校之一，正军级单位。作为中国人民解放军唯一一所“985工程”和“211工程”重点建设的综合性大学，该机构始建于1953年。早期曾位于哈尔滨市（1953年至1966年），是第一个五年计划国家156项重点工程之一。1970年，其主体由哈尔滨工程学院内迁长沙后更名。此外，该学院在哈尔滨的部分集体于1966年转业、退出军队序列后，曾更名为一所民用高校，并继续在该地办学至1970年。
description.en: A military academy located in Changsha, Hunan, China. It is the only comprehensive university under Project 985 and Project 211 directly administered by the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 前中华人民共和国铁道部部长。
德国总理
法国总统
蒋中正的母亲。
蒋中正的原配夫人，蒋经国之母。
蒋中正的妾，蒋纬国养母。

zh-cn: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

description.zh-cn: 美国第32任总统，大萧条期间推行了罗斯福新政，二战期间同盟国的关键领导人。
description.en: The 32nd President of the United States, who led the country through the Great Depression and was a key leader of the Allies during World War II.

death_place.zh-cn: 沃姆斯普林斯 (佐治亚州)

description.zh-cn: 英国政治家、演说家、军官、历史学家、作家与画家，曾两度担任英国首相，领导英国赢得第二次世界大战。
description.en: British statesman, orator, officer, historian, writer, and artist who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom twice, leading Britain to victory in the Second World War.

description.zh-cn: 此条目整合了两个与李锐相关的个体信息：一位是李锐的前妻，享受副部级离休干部待遇；另一位是李锐的父亲，同盟会成员，中华民国第一届国会众议员。
description.en: This entry integrates information about two individuals related to Li Rui: one is Li Rui's former wife; the other is Li Rui's father, a member of the Tongmenghui and a member of the House of Representatives in the first National Assembly of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 周永康长子。
周永康次子。
中国共产党内的一个非正式政治派系，以江泽民为核心。其成员多与前中共中央总书记江泽民有直接或间接的联系，主要从上海市的领导岗位提升至中央高层。陈良宇被视为该派系的重要成员。据博讯新闻称，该派系曾与温家宝存在权力斗争。
description.en: An informal political faction within the Communist Party of China, with Jiang Zemin as its core. Its members often have direct or indirect ties to former CCP General Secretary Jiang Zemin and were frequently promoted to central leadership from positions in Shanghai. Chen Liangyu was considered a key member of this faction. According to Boxun News, it was engaged in a power struggle with Wen Jiabao.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代民族工商业者的杰出代表，曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
中国政治人物，孟凡利的前任广东省省长和深圳市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Meng Fanli's predecessor as Governor of Guangdong and Party Secretary of Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政策研究室主任
原中共河北省委书记。
中国顶尖高校之一，隶属于中华人民共和国工业和信息化部，为C9联盟成员。在1970年至1973年间，其部分专业与哈军工二系合并搬迁至重庆，建立了临时教学单位。
原陕西省省长、省委书记，被赵发琦实名举报深度介入陕西千亿矿权案，干预司法，后于2019年1月被查。
description.en: Former Governor and Party Secretary of Shaanxi Province. He was publicly reported by Zhao Faqi for deep involvement and judicial interference in the 'Shaanxi Hundred-Billion-Yuan Mining Rights Case' and was subsequently investigated in January 2019.

description.zh-cn: 原中共青海省委书记、中共云南省委书记，后被查处。
中华人民共和国高级警官和政治人物。曾任中华人民共和国司法部部长、公安部常务副部长、北京市公安局局长等职。后因参加孙力军政治团伙，并涉嫌严重违纪违法被查处，被判处死刑，缓期二年执行；并被指主导了对艾未未的迫害。
description.en: A senior police officer and politician of the People's Republic of China. He served as Minister of Justice, Executive Vice Minister of Public Security, and director of the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau. He was later investigated for participating in Sun Lijun's political clique and serious violations of discipline and law, and was sentenced to death with a two-year reprieve; he was also allegedly behind the persecution of Ai Weiwei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，新党的共同创始人之一，曾任新党主席。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, one of the co-founders of the New Party.

description.zh-cn: 前中华人民共和国国家安全部副部长。
中国移动通信运营商，联动优势科技有限公司的创始股东之一。
description.en: A Chinese mobile communications operator and one of the founding shareholders of UMPay.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥的女儿，习仲勋外孙女，习近平外甥女。
description.en: Daughter of Qi Qiaoqiao, granddaughter of Xi Zhongxun, and niece of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军特级飞行员，空军上将。原副国级领导人，曾任中共中央政治局委员、中共中央军事委员会副主席（与张又侠同任）。在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间，他曾被任命为中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: A special-grade pilot and Air Force General of the People's Liberation Army. A former national leader at vice-state level, he served as a member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission of the CPC Central Committee (co-served with Zhang Youxia). During the 11th National People's Congress, he was appointed as a member of the Central Military Commission.

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会办公厅
en: General Office of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 位于北京市的学校
位于英国伦敦的一所著名公学。
description.en: A famous public school in England.

death_place.zh-cn: 重庆南山丽景度假酒店

description.zh-cn: 英国商人，与薄熙来家庭关系密切。在海伍德死亡案中，他被薄谷开来与张晓军合谋毒杀。
description.en: A British businessman with close ties to the Bo Xilai family. He was poisoned by Bo Gu Kailai and Zhang Xiaojun in the Death of Neil Heywood case.

description.zh-cn: 大连实德集团创始人，薄熙来案中的主要行贿人。
中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任重庆市副市长、公安局局长，是‘重庆打黑’行动的主要执行者。其进入美国驻成都总领事馆事件作为王立军事件的核心，直接引发了薄熙来下台。
description.en: A Chinese politician, who served as Vice Mayor and Public Security Bureau Chief of Chongqing, and was the main executor of the 'Chongqing Strike Black' campaign. His entry into the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu, a core event of the Wang Lijun incident, directly led to the downfall of Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 陈云的孙女，陈元之女。曾就读于杜克大学和哈佛大学商学院。
description.en: Granddaughter of Chen Yun, daughter of Chen Yuan. She studied at Duke University and Harvard Business School.

birth_place.zh-cn: 日治朝鲜庆尚南道巨济市
birth_place.en: Geoje, South Gyeongsang Province, Korea under Japanese rule

death_place.zh-cn: 韩国首尔特别市首尔大学校病院
death_place.en: Seoul National University Hospital, Seoul, South Korea

description.zh-cn: 韩国民主运动领袖、政治家，韩国第14任总统，也是韩国民主化后的首位文人总统。他曾是韩国国会历史上任期最长的议员之一，也是最年轻当选的议员。在执政期间致力于消除腐败，并将两位前总统推上法庭，但其任期后期因亚洲金融危机和亲属腐败丑聞而备受争议。
description.en: A leader of the South Korean democracy movement and politician, the 14th President of South Korea, and the first civilian president after democratization. He was one of the longest-serving members in the history of the National Assembly and the youngest member ever elected. During his tenure, he focused on eradicating corruption and brought two former presidents to justice, but his later term was marred by the Asian financial crisis and family corruption scandals.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北部战区海军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军三大舰队之一，现为中国人民解放军北部战区海军。
description.en: One of the three major fleets of the People's Liberation Army Navy, now known as the PLA Northern Theater Command Navy.

description.zh-cn: 中国最早实行对外开放政策的经济特区之一，也是林向荣的本籍地。
description.en: One of the first Special Economic Zones in China to implement the policy of opening up to the outside world, and also the native place of Lin Xiangrong.

description.zh-cn: 艾未未曾于1978年入读的中国高等艺术教育院校。
description.en: An institution of higher art education in China where Ai Weiwei enrolled in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事及政治人物，北洋军阀奉系首领。曾任中华民国陆海军大元帅、北洋政府末任国家元首。他与蒋介石协议共同驱逐共产国际势力，并搜查苏联使馆，处决了李大钊等共产党人。他是张学良之父、张作孚之兄，曾抚养并提拔侄子张学成。后在皇姑屯事件中被日军刺杀身亡。
description.en: A prominent military and political figure of the Republic of China and a leader of the Fengtian clique of the Beiyang Warlords. He served as Grand Marshal of the Army and Navy of the Republic of China and was the last head of state of the Beiyang Government. He notably agreed with Chiang Kai-shek to jointly expel Comintern influence, raided the Soviet embassy in Beijing, and executed Li Dazhao and other communists. He was the father of Zhang Xueliang and the elder brother of Zhang Zuofu, also raising and promoting his nephew Zhang Xuecheng in his army. He was later assassinated by the Japanese army in the Huanggutun Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国富商于文斗之女，张学良的原配妻子。在张学良的人生中扮演了重要角色。
description.en: Daughter of Chinese businessman Yu Wendou and the original wife of Zhang Xueliang. She played a significant role in Zhang Xueliang's life.

description.zh-cn: 张学良的四弟。
奉系将领，张学良的恩师与挚友。因遭杨宇霆排挤等原因起兵反奉，兵败后被处死。
description.en: A general of the Fengtian clique and a mentor to Zhang Xueliang. He rebelled against the Fengtian clique due to being sidelined by Yang Yuting and other reasons, and was executed after his defeat.

description.zh-cn: 北洋军阀执政时期奉系军阀重要将领，有“智囊”、“小诸葛”之称，后被张学良处决。
description.en: An important general of the Fengtian clique during the Beiyang government era, known as the 'mastermind' and 'little Zhuge', later executed by Zhang Xueliang.

description.zh-cn: 该部队作为大日本帝国陆军的组成部分，于1919年至1945年驻扎在中国东北地区。期间，它策划并执行了皇姑屯事件、九一八事变，扶植满洲国，最终在苏联发动的“八月风暴”攻势下投降。
description.en: A general army of the Imperial Japanese Army from 1919 to 1945, stationed in the northeastern region of China. It planned the Huanggutun Incident and the Mukden Incident, established the puppet state of Manchukuo, and ultimately surrendered following the Soviet 'August Storm' offensive.

description.zh-cn: 由张学良领导的军事集团，驻扎于中国东北地区。
description.en: A military group led by Zhang Xueliang, based in Northeast China.

description.zh-cn: 北洋军阀的主要派系之一，由张作霖领导，根据地在东北，并受日本支持。
description.en: One of the main factions of the Beiyang Warlords, led by Zhang Zuolin, based in Northeast China, and supported by Japan.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队政治委员、成都军区政治委员等职。其父为原中央军委副主席张震上将。
description.en: A general (shangjiang) of the People's Liberation Army (PLA) of China, who served as Political Commissar of the PLA Second Artillery Force and the Chengdu Military Region. His father is Zhang Zhen, a former Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 吴玉章的二哥
香港传媒机构。
中华人民共和国企业家，大连万达集团股份有限公司的创始人兼董事长。他曾是中国大陆首富，也是王思聪的父亲。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, founder and chairman of Dalian Wanda Group Co., Ltd. He was formerly the richest man in mainland China and is the father of Wang Sicong.

birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省绵阳专区
birth_place.en: Mianyang Prefecture, Sichuan, People's Republic of China

zh-cn: 大连万达集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国的跨国企业集团，总部位于北京，业务涵盖商业地产、文化、金融等多个领域。
description.en: A Chinese multinational conglomerate based in Beijing, with business interests in commercial property, culture, and finance.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的第二代最高领导人，金日成的长子，金平一的同父异母兄。曾任朝鲜劳动党总书记，被追封为“朝鲜劳动党永远的总书记”。
description.en: The second supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, the eldest son of Kim Il-sung, and the half-brother of Kim Pyong-il.

description.zh-cn: 联合国的专门机构，负责国际公共卫生事务，是国际公共卫生领域的领导者。
description.en: A specialized agency of the United Nations responsible for international public health.

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十七届中央委员会
en: 17th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会
en: 18th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
18th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会
en: 19th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会选举产生的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body elected by the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗总统，在阿米尼示威期间下令加大头巾执法力度，并同意调查玛莎·阿米尼之死。
description.en: President of Iran who ordered stricter enforcement of the hijab law during the Mahsa Amini protests and agreed to investigate the death of Mahsa Amini.

description.zh-cn: 2008年在中国发生的一起影响深远的食品安全事件，涉及多家奶粉企业的产品被检出含有三聚氰胺。
description.en: A far-reaching food safety incident that occurred in China in 2008, involving the detection of melamine in the products of multiple milk powder companies.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后兴建的第一家汽车制造厂。

zh-cn: 东风汽车集团有限公司
中华人民共和国教育部
en: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管教育事业和语言文字工作的组成部门，是华中科技大学、厦门大学的主管部门，并于1952年决定创办北京体育大学（时称中央体育学院）。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees the country's education sector and language-related work. It is the supervising authority for universities such as Huazhong University of Science and Technology and Xiamen University. Furthermore, in 1952, it decided to establish Beijing Sport University (then Central Institute of Physical Culture).

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第四任及第七任首相，被称为“马来西亚现代化之父”。他曾是安华的政治导师，后成为其主要政治对手，在1998年将其革职；两人后来在2018年结盟推翻国阵政府，但联盟因2020年政治危机而破裂。其对“一带一路”的态度从初期的批评和重新谈判转变为后期的支持。
description.en: Fourth and seventh Prime Minister of Malaysia, known as the "Father of Modernization of Malaysia". He was once Anwar's political mentor before becoming his main political rival, dismissing him in 1998; the two later allied in 2018 to overthrow the Barisan Nasional government, but the alliance collapsed during the 2020 political crisis. His stance on the 'Belt and Road' initiative evolved from initial criticism and renegotiation to later support.

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军将领、海军上将，曾任中共中央军事委员会委员、中华人民共和国中央军事委员会委员、中央军委政治工作部主任。2024年起因涉嫌严重违纪违法被调查，后被开除党籍军籍。
description.en: Former general and admiral of the People's Liberation Army Navy, who served as a member of the Central Military Commission and Director of the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission. He was investigated for suspected serious violations of discipline and law starting in 2024, and was later expelled from the Party and the military.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领。
中国人民解放军高级将领。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军
中国人民解放军第三十一军

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期成员、高层领导人，中华人民共和国政治人物，一二·九运动的组织和指挥者之一。俞强声之父，范瑾的丈夫。曾任中华人民共和国首任天津市市长、第一任第一机械工业部部长，并曾与江青同居。
description.en: An early member and high-ranking leader of the Communist Party of China, a politician of the People's Republic of China, and one of the organizers and commanders of the December 9th Movement. He was the father of Yu Qiangsheng and husband of Fan Jin. He served as the first mayor of Tianjin and the first minister of the First Ministry of Machine Building, and once cohabited with Jiang Qing.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育部直属的综合性全国重点大学，是世界一流大学建设高校（A类）、985工程、211工程重点建设高校。该校历史悠久，可追溯至多个前身，且有机构于1951年与之合校。
潜伏于美国中央情报局的中华人民共和国间谍。
中国商人，湖北人，企业家。他是齐桥桥的第二任丈夫，习近平的姐夫，习明泽的姑父。
description.en: Chinese businessman, a native of Hubei, an entrepreneur. He is the second husband of Qi Qiaoqiao, brother-in-law of Xi Jinping, and uncle of Xi Mingze.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省的省会，国家区域中心城市，位于福建省东部的闽江下游。它是福建省的政治、经济、文化、交通中心，也是习明泽的出生地。
description.en: The capital of Fujian Province, People's Republic of China, a national regional central city, located in the lower reaches of the Min River in the eastern part of Fujian Province. It serves as the political, economic, cultural, and transportation center of the province, and is also the birthplace of Xi Mingze.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国伦敦的一所世界顶尖公立研究型大学。
description.en: A world-leading public research university located in London, United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任上海市市长，中共上海市委副书记。曾任夏宝龙担任浙江省省长时的常务副省长；是刘鹤的妹夫。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently Mayor of Shanghai and Deputy Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee. He previously served as Executive Vice Governor when Xia Baolong was Governor of Zhejiang, and is the brother-in-law of Liu He.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，陈吉宁的继任北京市市长。
中国政治人物，曾任清华大学党委书记、中共中央宣传部常务副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who previously served as the Executive Deputy Head of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 由媒体人柴静于2015年推出的一部关于中国空气污染的调查纪录片，引发了社会巨大反响，但随后遭到中国官方全面封杀。
description.en: A 2015 documentary film by journalist Chai Jing concerning air pollution in China, which sparked widespread public discussion before being censored by Chinese authorities.

description.zh-cn: 中国记者、主持人、独立媒体人，也是《穹顶之下》纪录片的制作人、主讲人和调查记者。
description.en: Chinese journalist and media personality, who produced, hosted, and conducted the investigation for the documentary 'Under the Dome'.

zh-cn: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 巴西现任总统。
委内瑞拉总统。
美国国会参议院多数党领袖。
新加坡政治人物，现任新加坡国务资政，前任新加坡总理，是何晶的丈夫。
description.en: Singaporean politician, current Senior Minister of Singapore, former Prime Minister of Singapore, and husband of Ho Ching.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国（台湾）的主要政党之一，由党外运动人士于1986年创立。该党在大罢免运动中扮演了支持罢免泛蓝公职人员并动员的角色，也是卓荣泰内阁的执政党。此外，该党主张修宪废除考试院及监察院。陈明通于2002年加入该党。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China (Taiwan), founded in 1986 by Tangwai movement activists. It played a role in supporting and mobilizing for the recall of Pan-Blue public officials during the Great Recall movement and is also the ruling party of the Cho Jung-tai cabinet. Additionally, it advocates for constitutional amendments to abolish the Examination Yuan and the Control Yuan. Chen Ming-tong joined the party in 2002.

en: Legislator of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高立法机关，由中华民国立法院的成员组成，现负责对监察委员人事案行使同意权。
description.en: The unicameral legislature of the Republic of China (Taiwan), which currently holds the power to approve nominations for the Control Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领、政治人物，曾任中国国民党副主席、行政院院长、国防部部长、中华民国陆军一级上将。
台湾革命家、政治家和作家，曾任民主进步党主席，被誉为“台湾曼德拉”。他曾于2001年与访问台湾的魏京生会晤，陈明通也曾参加其有关两岸原则的记者会。此外，他还曾指控江鹏坚为调查局卧底。
description.en: A Taiwanese revolutionary, politician, and writer, former chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party, known as 'Taiwan's Mandela'. He met with Wei Jingsheng during his visit to Taiwan in 2001, and Chen Ming-tong also attended his press conference regarding cross-strait principles. Additionally, he once accused Chiang Peng-chien of being an undercover agent for the Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中国国民党主席、立法院副院长
中华人民共和国外交官。
中华人民共和国直辖市，夏宝龙的出生地。张学成在中原大战石友三部失败后曾逃至此地。
description.en: A municipality directly under the Central Government of the People's Republic of China. It is the birthplace of Xia Baolong, and Zhang Xuecheng fled here after Shi Yousan's forces were defeated in the Central Plains War.

description.zh-cn: 香港凤凰卫视记者、制片人，曾担任「风云对话」节目主持人。
马英九的妻子。
位于美国纽约市的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in New York City, United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、法学学者、教授与律师。曾任中华民国总统（第14－15任）、行政院大陆委员会主任委员、民主进步党主席等职务。在陈明通担任国家安全局局长、大陆委员会主任委员和副主任委员期间，是其上司。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), who served as the President of the Republic of China and was a former Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council. She was also Chen Ming-tong's superior during his tenures as Director-General of the National Security Bureau, Minister and Deputy Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍。曾任立法院院长、副院长、立法委员、中国国民党副主席等职，是中华民国宪政史上最资深的立法委员，也是国会全面改选后任期最长的立法院院长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and member of the Kuomintang. He served as President of the Legislative Yuan, Vice President, Legislator, and Vice Chairman of the Kuomintang. He is the most senior legislator in the constitutional history of the Republic of China and the longest-serving President of the Legislative Yuan since its full reelection.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末期政治人物，光绪帝异母弟，宣统帝溥仪生父。宣统年间，他担任监国摄政王，此职位是清朝末年为辅佐幼帝宣统帝而设立的。他也是清朝最后的实际统治者之一。
description.en: A political figure in the late Qing dynasty, half-brother of the Guangxu Emperor, and father of the Xuantong Emperor (Puyi). During the Xuantong era, he served as the Prince-Regent, a position established in the late Qing dynasty to assist the young Xuantong Emperor. He was also one of the last de facto rulers of the Qing dynasty.

en: Reorganized National Government of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 这是中国抗日战争时期由汪精卫在日本扶植下成立的亲日傀儡政权，首都设于南京。它被普遍认为是与大日本帝国合作的伪政府，曾力邀梅兰芳演出但遭拒绝。
description.en: Established by Wang Jingwei and fostered by Japan during the Second Sino-Japanese War, this pro-Japanese puppet government had its capital in Nanjing. It was widely regarded as a collaborationist regime that cooperated with the Empire of Japan, and famously invited Mei Lanfang to perform, which he refused.

description.zh-cn: 指1868年至1947年间的日本，推行帝国主义扩张政策。作为二战轴心国，它侵略中国，是中日战争主要参战方，关东军曾部署东北，并扶植汪精卫国民政府等傀儡政权，也是满洲国宗主国。其军队侵占香港，开启日占时期，并占领新加坡，对罗豪才童年造成创伤。它还赢得了日俄战争，对毛福梅死亡负直接责任。为防日本帝国主义复兴，《中苏友好同盟互助条约》曾明确以此为目标。
description.en: Refers to Japan from 1868 to 1947, which pursued an imperialist expansionist policy. As an Axis power in WWII, it invaded China, was a major combatant in the Sino-Japanese War, deployed the Kwantung Army in Northeast China, and established puppet regimes like the Wang Jingwei government, also acting as the suzerain of Manchukuo. Its military invaded Hong Kong, initiating the period of Japanese occupation, and occupied Singapore, causing trauma to Luo Haocai's childhood. It also won the Russo-Japanese War and was directly responsible for Mao Fumei's death. To prevent the resurgence of Japanese imperialism, the Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship, Alliance and Mutual Assistance explicitly aimed at this goal.

description.zh-cn: 汪兆铭响应近卫声明，主张中止抗战的电报
中华民国的最高行政机关。
description.en: The executive branch of the government of the Republic of China (Taiwan).

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府要员。战后被国民政府判处死刑，后减为无期徒刑，病死于狱中。
description.en: A key official in the Wang Jingwei regime. After the war, he was sentenced to death by the Nationalist Government, which was later commuted to life imprisonment. He died in prison from illness.

en: Death and state funeral of Mao Zedong

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东于1976年9月9日逝世。他的逝世导致中共党内出现权力真空，是粉碎‘四人帮’事件的直接导火索，也是文化大革命结束的关键事件之一。
description.en: Mao Zedong passed away on September 9, 1976. His death led to a power vacuum within the CCP, serving as a direct catalyst for the downfall of the 'Gang of Four' and one of the key events marking the end of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 位于东南亚中南半岛东端的社会主义国家，由越南共产党一党专政。于2025年成为金砖伙伴国。
description.en: A socialist state at the eastern edge of the Indochinese Peninsula in Southeast Asia, under the single-party rule of the Communist Party of Vietnam. It became a BRICS partner in 2025.

description.zh-cn: 时任越共中央总书记、中央军委书记
越南唯一的执政党，对越南行政、立法、司法各个部门的机构直接掌控。
description.en: The sole ruling party of Vietnam, directly controlling the executive, legislative, and judicial branches of government.

description.zh-cn: 日本第124代天皇。他是大日本帝国在二战期间的国家元首与军队最高统帅，并在战争末期做出接受《波茨坦宣言》、结束战争的最终决定，通过“玉音放送”向全国宣布投降。他也是田中角荣担任首相时的在位天皇。
description.en: The 124th Emperor of Japan. He reigned as the head of state and supreme commander of the military of the Empire of Japan during World War II, making the final decision to accept the Potsdam Declaration and end the war, and announcing the surrender to the nation via the Gyokuon-hōsō. He also reigned during Kakuei Tanaka's tenure as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 此事件标志着中国全面抗日战争的开始，事变后，许涤新得以获释。
description.en: This event marked the beginning of the Second Sino-Japanese War. After the incident, Xu Dixin was released.

description.zh-cn: 爱新觉罗·溥仪，清朝末代皇帝，也是中国历史上最后一位皇帝。由慈禧太后临终前指定继位，1924年被冯玉祥逐出紫禁城。后被关东军扶植为满洲国执政与皇帝，成为满洲国唯一一位君主。
description.en: Aisin-Gioro Puyi, the last emperor of the Qing dynasty and the last emperor of China. He was designated by Empress Dowager Cixi on her deathbed, expelled from the Forbidden City by Feng Yuxiang in 1924, and later installed by the Kwantung Army as the emperor of Manchukuo, becoming its sole monarch.

description.zh-cn: 一场1939年至1945年爆发的全球性军事冲突，主要由轴心国与同盟国之间进行。罗斯福领导美国加入同盟国参战，艾森豪威尔担任盟军在欧洲的最高指挥官。伯克利实验室承包了原子弹研发计划。加拿大在总理威廉·莱昂·麦肯锡·金的领导下对德宣战并参战。在此期间，拉脱维亚先后被苏联和纳粹德国占领。日本的投降标志着其亚洲战场的结束。战后，香港岛人口剧增，发展加速。
description.en: A global military conflict that broke out between 1939 and 1945, primarily involving the Axis and Allied powers. Roosevelt led the United States in joining the Allied powers, and Eisenhower served as the Supreme Commander of the Allied forces in Europe. Berkeley's laboratory undertook the atomic bomb development project. Canada, under Prime Minister William Lyon Mackenzie King, declared war on Germany and participated. During this period, Latvia was successively occupied by the Soviet Union and Nazi Germany. The surrender of Japan marked the end of its Asian theatre. Post-war, the population of Hong Kong Island surged, and its development accelerated.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争中首场大型会战，也是规模最大、战斗最激烈的战役之一，发生于上海。战后上海沦陷。
description.en: The first major battle of the Second Sino-Japanese War, and one of its largest and most intense, which took place in Shanghai. After the battle, Shanghai fell to Japanese forces.

description.zh-cn: 日本中国派遣军总司令官，代表日本在中国战区投降。
标志着第二次世界大战和中国抗日战争的结束。此次事件直接导致了汪精卫国民政府的终结，并使梅兰芳得以重返舞台。
description.en: The event marking the end of World War II and the Second Sino-Japanese War. It directly led to the collapse of the Wang Jingwei regime and enabled Mei Lanfang to return to the stage.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，国民革命军陆军二级上将。在枣宜会战中阵亡，是二战中同盟国牺牲的最高级别将领之一。

location.zh-cn: 美国加利福尼亚州山景城

description.zh-cn: 总部位于美国加利福尼亚州山景城的跨国科技公司，为Alphabet的子公司，专注于互联网相关服务和产品，业务范围涵盖互联网广告、互联网搜索、云计算等领域。
description.en: An American multinational technology company, a subsidiary of Alphabet Inc., specializing in Internet-related services and products, which include online advertising technologies, a search engine, cloud computing, software, and hardware.

description.zh-cn: Google公司在中华人民共和国的运营实体，曾运营google.cn。其搜索服务于2010年停止运营并转至香港。
description.en: The operating entity of Google in the People's Republic of China. Its search services ceased operations and were redirected to Hong Kong in 2010.

description.zh-cn: Google联合创始人，曾在斯坦福大学攻读博士学位。他坚决反对内容审查，支持退出中国市场。
description.en: Co-founder of Google, who was a Ph.D. student at Stanford University. He firmly opposed content censorship and supported withdrawing from the Chinese market.

description.zh-cn: 一家总部位于北京的中国跨国科技公司，专注于互联网相关服务、产品及人工智能。作为中国主要的搜索引擎公司和科技巨头，它曾是Google在中国的主要竞争对手。其搜索引擎曾将特定词语（如“温云松”）设为敏感词并限制搜索结果。此外，该公司还与奇虎360在不正当竞争、商标侵权、违反Robots协议等领域发生过多次法律诉讼。
description.en: A Chinese multinational technology company headquartered in Beijing, specializing in Internet-related services and products, and artificial intelligence. As a major search engine and technology giant in China, it was once Google's main competitor. Its search engine once designated specific terms (such as 'Wen Yunsong') as sensitive and restricted search results. Additionally, the company has been involved in multiple legal disputes with Qihoo 360 regarding unfair competition, trademark infringement, and violation of the Robots Exclusion Standard.

description.zh-cn: 雅虎公司是美国的一家互联网服务公司，曾是Google的竞争对手，也与其有过合作关系。其在中国的业务分支，曾于2004年由周鸿祎担任总裁。
description.en: Yahoo! Inc. is an American internet service company, a former competitor and partner of Google. Its Chinese business arm was led by Zhou Hongyi as president in 2004.

location.zh-cn: 中国大陆、台湾海峡、中缅边境
location.en: Mainland China, Taiwan Strait, China–Burma border

description.zh-cn: 20世纪中国爆发的规模最大、影响最深远的内战，分为两个阶段，是中国现代史的重大转折点。
description.en: The largest and most influential civil war in 20th century China, divided into two stages, marking a major turning point in modern Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 美国国会的两院之一。

en: Supreme Court of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦司法机构的最高级别法院。
美国两大主要政党之一，罗斯福和约翰·F·肯尼迪都曾是其党员。
description.en: One of the two major contemporary political parties in the United States, to which both Roosevelt and John F. Kennedy belonged.

description.zh-cn: 由英国统治的全球帝国，在1921年达到巅峰。它在鸦片战争中作为主要西方列强，与清朝进行了两次战争，其中是发动第二次鸦片战争的主要国家之一。此外，它也是新加坡在1824年至1963年间的宗主国。作为第二次世界大战的同盟国之一，汪精卫国民政府于1943年对其宣战。
description.en: A global empire ruled by the United Kingdom, which reached its peak in 1921. It was the main Western power in the Opium Wars, fighting against the Qing dynasty in both conflicts, and was one of the main countries that initiated the Second Opium War. It also served as the sovereign state of Singapore from 1824 to 1963. As one of the Allied powers in World War II, the Wang Jingwei regime declared war against it in 1943.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战后，以美国为首的西方阵营与以苏联为首的东方阵营（及其各自盟友）之间，围绕地缘政治展开的紧张对峙和政治对抗。美国总统艾森豪威尔的任期是冷战的关键时期。
description.en: A period of geopolitical tension and political confrontation after World War II, primarily between the Western Bloc, led by the United States, and the Eastern Bloc, led by the Soviet Union and their respective allies. Eisenhower's presidency was a key period of the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 2001年9月11日发生在美国本土的一系列自杀式恐怖袭击事件，由基地组织策划。
description.en: A series of four coordinated suicide terrorist attacks by the Islamic terrorist group al-Qaeda against the United States on September 11, 2001.

description.zh-cn: 美国于1861年至1865年发生的内战，是美国历史上规模最大、最惨烈的内战。交战双方为北方的联邦阵营与南方的邦联阵营，最终以联邦获胜、奴隶制度被废除告终。
description.en: The American Civil War, fought from 1861 to 1865, was the largest and most devastating civil war in U.S. history. It pitted the northern Union against the southern Confederacy, ultimately resulting in a Union victory and the abolition of slavery.

description.zh-cn: 美国牧师、社会运动家、民权运动领袖。
俄罗斯共产主义革命家、政治家、政治理论家和思想家，苏维埃俄国和苏联的主要缔造者和首任政府首脑，也是共产国际的创始人。其思想影响了中国共产党早期的民族政策。娜杰日达·阿利卢耶娃曾担任其办公室机要秘书。
description.en: Russian communist revolutionary, politician, political theorist, and thinker. He was the main founder and first head of government of Soviet Russia and the Soviet Union, and the founder of the Communist International. His thought influenced the early ethnic policy of the Chinese Communist Party, and Nadezhda Alliluyeva served as a confidential secretary in his office.

zh-cn: 乌克兰苏维埃社会主义共和国

description.zh-cn: 苏联的创始成员国。
苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟解体事件，指苏联于20世纪90年代初停止存在并分裂为多个主权国家的过程，此后列宁主义的影响力在一些国家下降。
苏联政治家，勃列日涅夫之后的苏联最高领导人。
苏联政治家，安德罗波夫之后的苏联最高领导人。
英国政治家，曾任英国首相。她曾与邓小平就香港前途问题进行谈判；马尔康·芮夫金曾在其内阁中担任苏格兰事务大臣。
description.en: British stateswoman who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom. She negotiated with Deng Xiaoping on the future of Hong Kong; Malcolm Rifkind served as Secretary of State for Scotland in her cabinet.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国商务部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管商业经济和贸易的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for commercial economy and trade.

location.zh-cn: 重庆南山丽景度假酒店

description.zh-cn: 英国商人尼尔·海伍德于2011年11月13日在重庆南山丽景度假酒店被杀害。尸体于11月14日被发现。后经调查，此为他杀刑事案件，嫌疑人为薄谷开来及薄熙来家庭佣工张晓军（男性）。张晓军系薄家勤务人员，且是谷开来谋杀尼尔·海伍德的同案犯。此案随后进行了对谷开来、张晓军故意杀害尼尔·伍德的司法审判。
description.en: An orderly of the Bo family and an accomplice in Gu Kailai's murder of Neil Heywood.

zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚朝鲜半岛北部的国家，由朝鲜劳动党实行一党专政。该国是朝鲜战争的主要参战方，其军队是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一。近期，该国被指控向俄罗斯提供武器及派遣士兵参与战争。
description.en: A main belligerent in the Korean War, whose army was one of the signatories of the Korean Armistice Agreement. It has also been accused of supplying weapons and sending soldiers to participate in the war on Russia's side.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚朝鲜半岛南部的共和制国家。朝鲜战争的主要参战方之一。由于时任总统李承晚的反对，大韩民国并未签署《朝鲜停战协定》。
description.en: A main belligerent in the Korean War. Due to the opposition of then-President Syngman Rhee, the Republic of Korea did not sign the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 根据联合国安理会决议成立，由美国领导的多国部队，在朝鲜战争中支援大韩民国并与中国人民志愿军作战。该司令部是《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一。
description.en: A multinational military force established under a UN Security Council resolution and led by the United States to support South Korea and fight against the Chinese People's Volunteer Army during the Korean War. The command is a signatory to the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 韩国独立运动家、政治家，大韩民国首任总统、首任国会议长。他曾因反对以三八线为界停战而拒绝在《朝鲜停战协定》上签字。
description.en: A Korean independence activist and politician, the first President of the Republic of Korea and the first Speaker of the National Assembly. He refused to sign the Korean Armistice Agreement due to his opposition to a ceasefire along the 38th parallel.

description.zh-cn: 美国第33任总统，罗斯福的最后一任副总统，在其逝世后接任总统。他批准对日本使用原子弹，并接受了日本的投降。
description.en: 33rd President of the United States, Roosevelt's final Vice President who succeeded him as President upon his death. He authorized the use of atomic bombs against Japan and accepted its surrender.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军五星上将，军事家、政治家，曾任第34任美国总统。第二次世界大战期间，他担任盟军在欧洲的最高指挥官。
description.en: An American military officer and statesman who served as the 34th president of the United States. He was a five-star general in the United States Army and served as Supreme Commander of the Allied Expeditionary Force in Europe during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的武装力量，是朝鲜战争的主要参战方和《朝鲜停战协定》的签署方之一。
description.en: The armed forces of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, a main belligerent in the Korean War and a signatory to the Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战的战区之一，地理范围包括东亚、东南亚、太平洋、印度洋和大洋洲。它是二战地理上规模最大的战场。
description.en: One of the theaters of World War II, with a geographical scope including East Asia, Southeast Asia, the Pacific Ocean, the Indian Ocean, and Oceania. It was the largest theater of war geographically in WWII.

description.zh-cn: 由美、英、中三国（同盟国）于1945年发表的对日最后通牒，要求日本无条件投降，否则将面临“迅速且完全的毁灭”。这份公告详细规定了日本投降的条款。在后来的《中日联合声明》中，日本政府曾表示坚持遵循该公告第八条的立场。
description.en: An ultimatum (declaration) issued by the United States, United Kingdom, and China (Allied Powers) in 1945, demanding Japan's unconditional surrender under threat of 'prompt and utter destruction'. This declaration detailed the terms for Japan's surrender. Later, in the Sino-Japanese Joint Communiqué, the Japanese government affirmed its adherence to Article 8 of this declaration.

description.zh-cn: 中、美、英三国元首发表，要求日本归还窃取于中国的领土。
由林立果及其“联合舰队”成员于1971年3月策划撰写，旨在推翻毛泽东统治的武装政变计划草稿。该计划详细记录了针对毛泽东的政变构想。
description.en: A draft armed coup plan, formulated by Lin Liguo and his 'United Fleet' members in March 1971, aimed at overthrowing Mao Zedong's rule. The plan detailed the concept of a coup against Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 负责中共中央领导人警卫工作的部队，代号为中共中央警卫团。
林彪的亲信之一，曾任解放军南京军区空军政委，是林立果“联合舰队”成员。
description.en: One of Lin Biao's confidants, he served as Political Commissar of the Nanjing Military Region Air Force of the People's Liberation Army and was a member of Lin Liguo's 'United Fleet'.

zh-cn: 江油未成年人欺凌事件

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省绵阳市江油市

description.zh-cn: 一宗因未成年人欺凌案及后续警方处理引发大规模警民冲突的群体性事件。
中华人民共和国西南地区的一个省份。
description.en: A province in Southwest China.

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家武装力量的组成部分，负责国内安全保卫。
description.en: A component of the armed forces of the People's Republic of China, responsible for internal security.

description.zh-cn: 中国的微博客网站，曾完全封锁与“温云松”相关的微博。
description.en: A Chinese microblogging website that once completely blocked posts related to 'Wen Yunsong'.

description.zh-cn: 中国记者，曾获世界新闻自由奖
中国维权律师、美国天主教大学访问学者

en: Armed Forces of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量，包括中国人民解放军、中国人民武装警察部队和民兵。
戴笠的继任者，先后掌管军统局、保密局、情报局。
指台湾作家刘宜良在美国遭枪杀的政治谋杀事件，因其笔名为“江南”而得名。此案牵涉到台湾的情报机构，并对蒋氏家族的声誉造成重创。
description.en: Refers to the political assassination of Taiwanese writer Henry Liu in the United States. The case implicated Taiwan's intelligence agencies and severely damaged the reputation of the Chiang family.

en: 3rd Division of the New Fourth Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十九集团军的前身之一

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家元首列表
中华人民共和国国家元首
en: List of state representatives of the People's Republic of China

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家机构

description.zh-cn: 中国少年儿童的群众组织，中国共产党领导下的儿童组织。
description.en: A mass organization for Chinese children, led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 法轮功的创始人、精神领袖。其出生日期存在争议，中国政府称其出生于1952年7月7日，李洪志本人称该日期为文革期间的错误登记，其实际生日为1951年5月13日。
description.en: Founder and spiritual leader of Falun Gong.

description.zh-cn: 中国官方媒体报导的事件，法轮功方面指其为政府导演的伪案，是镇压宣传战的转折点。
由法轮功学员创办的媒体机构。
美国的立法机构。
description.en: The legislature of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 一家总部位于美国的中国古典舞和传统音乐艺术团。
description.en: A US-based performing arts and entertainment company known for classical Chinese dance and traditional music.

description.zh-cn: 中国维权律师
日本现任天皇
日本现任内阁总理大臣。其领导的内阁在2025年3月表示《中日联合声明》不具有法律约束力。
description.en: Current Prime Minister of Japan. His cabinet stated in March 2025 that the Sino-Japanese Joint Communiqué is not legally binding.

description.zh-cn: 日本国会的下议院
传说中日本的初代天皇
镰仓幕府首任征夷大将军
由成吉思汗建立的横跨欧亚大陆的帝国，元朝的前身，后灭亡金朝与南宋。蒙哥是其第四位大汗。
description.en: An empire founded by Genghis Khan, of which Möngke was the fourth Great Khan.

description.zh-cn: 江户幕府首任征夷大将军
日本历史上的最后一个武家政权，也是最后一个封建军事政府。它在戊辰战争后被推翻。福泽谕吉曾受雇于幕府从事翻译工作，并随其使节团出访欧美。
description.en: The last feudal military government of Japan, which was overthrown after the Boshin War. Fukuzawa Yukichi was employed by the shogunate as a translator and accompanied its missions to the United States and Europe.

description.zh-cn: 指日本在19世纪后期、幕末至明治时代初期间推行的一系列政治、经济和社会近代化改革运动。旨在使日本现代化，摆脱并终结封建制度，建立现代国家。福泽谕吉是该运动重要的思想推动者之一。维新后武士的失业问题亦成为征韩论的背景之一。
description.en: A series of political, economic, and social modernization reforms implemented in Japan in the late 19th century, from the end of the Edo period to the beginning of the Meiji period. These reforms aimed at modernizing the country, abolishing its feudal system, and establishing a modern state. Fukuzawa Yukichi was a key intellectual promoter of this movement, and the resulting unemployment of the samurai class was one of the background factors for the Seikanron.

location.zh-cn: 朝鲜半岛、辽东半岛、山东、威海、黄海、澎湖

description.zh-cn: 1894年至1895年间清朝与大日本帝国之间因朝鲜问题爆发的一场大规模战争，以清朝惨败告终。中国的惨败极大地刺激了中国的知识分子，促使他们更积极、全面地向西方学习。福泽谕吉曾将其描述为“文野之战”并支持日本开战。战争赔款被用作建立京都帝国大学（京都大学前身）的资金来源之一。
description.en: A major war between the Qing dynasty of China and the Empire of Japan, primarily over the issue of Korea, which ended in a decisive defeat for the Qing. China's defeat was a major catalyst for Chinese intellectuals to more actively and comprehensively learn from the West. Fukuzawa Yukichi described it as a 'war between civilization and barbarism' and supported Japan's engagement in it. The war indemnity was used as one of the funding sources for the establishment of Kyoto Imperial University (the predecessor of Kyoto University).

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战时的军事同盟，由德国、意大利、日本等国组成。
大日本帝国对美国海军基地的突然袭击，导致美国加入第二次世界大战。
description.en: A surprise military strike by the Empire of Japan against the United States naval base, which led to the U.S. entry into World War II.

description.zh-cn: 前日本内阁总理大臣
日本国立研究型综合大学
位于日本京都的国立综合性研究型大学，前身是1897年成立的日本第二所旧制帝国大学——京都帝国大学。作为日本最高学府之一，京大以‘自由的学风’著称，是京都学派的发祥地，被誉为‘科学家的摇篮’。汤川秀树曾在此学习和工作多年。
description.en: A national comprehensive research university located in Kyoto, Japan. Its predecessor was Kyoto Imperial University, established in 1897 as the second Imperial University in Japan. As one of Japan's top academic institutions, it is known for its 'spirit of freedom', is the birthplace of the Kyoto School, and is regarded as a 'cradle of scientists'. Hideki Yukawa studied and worked here for many years.

zh-cn: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会
en: State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的特设机构，代表国家履行出资人职责，监管中央所属企业的国有资产，包括对中国移动通信集团有限公司的出资人职责。
description.en: A special commission of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, it represents the state in performing investor responsibilities and supervising state-owned assets of centrally-owned enterprises, including its investor responsibilities for China Mobile Communications Group Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 中国移动通信集团有限公司由其部分资产分拆组建，是中国电信运营商，曾与电讯盈科成立合资公司。
description.en: A Chinese telecommunications operator that formed a joint venture with PCCW.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部
en: Ministry of Industry and Information Technology

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国电信业监管机构
奇虎360于2011年3月在此上市，并于2016年7月完成私有化后摘牌。
description.en: Qihoo 360 was listed here in March 2011 and delisted in July 2016 after completing its privatization.

zh-cn: 科大讯飞股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 一家在深圳证券交易所上市的中国公司，主营业务范围包括语音支撑软件、行业应用产品/系统、信息工程和运维服务。
description.en: A Chinese company listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange, whose main business scope includes voice support software, industry application products/systems, information engineering, and operation and maintenance services.

description.zh-cn: 位于东欧的国家，自2022年2月24日起遭受俄罗斯的全面入侵。欧盟候选国。北约伙伴国，寻求加入北约。
description.en: A country in Eastern Europe that has been subjected to a full-scale invasion by Russia since February 24, 2022.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治家，曾任俄罗斯总统、前俄罗斯总理。
description.en: Russian politician, former President of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 由东斯拉夫人建立的第一个东斯拉夫国家
存在于1721年至1917年的历史国家。林则徐在新疆期间对其日益增长的威胁保持警惕，并认为其为中国未来的长远隐患。在第二次鸦片战争中，它扮演调停者角色，并借机迫使清政府签订不平等条约，通过《北京条约》从清朝攫取了外东北及中国北方大片领土。它也是日俄战争的参战国之一，但最终战败。
description.en: A historical state that existed from 1721 to 1917. During his exile in Xinjiang, Lin Zexu became wary of its growing threat and considered it a long-term danger to China. During the Second Opium War, it acted as a mediator and took the opportunity to force the Qing government to sign unequal treaties, thereby acquiring Outer Manchuria and other large territories in northern China through the Convention of Peking. It was also one of the combatants in the Russo-Japanese War, but was ultimately defeated.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯沙皇国沙皇，俄罗斯帝国皇帝

zh-cn: 俄罗斯苏维埃联邦社会主义共和国

description.zh-cn: 1904年至1905年间大日本帝国与俄罗斯帝国为争夺中国东北地区和朝鲜的控制权而爆发的战争。
description.en: A war fought between the Empire of Japan and the Russian Empire from 1904 to 1905 over rival imperial ambitions in Manchuria and Korea.

location.zh-cn: 中国东北地区、朝鲜、黄海、日本海
location.en: Northeast China, Korea, Yellow Sea, Sea of Japan

description.zh-cn: 日本化学家，1981年诺贝尔化学奖得主。
中华人民共和国最高人民检察院检察长。曾任中共上海市委副书记。
中央军事委员会办公厅原主任。
中国政治家，曾任司法部部长（傅政华的继任），后任江西省政协主席。2024年因严重违纪违法被查处。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as Minister of Justice (succeeding Fu Zhenghua) and later as Chairman of the Jiangxi Provincial CPPCC. He was investigated in 2024 for severe disciplinary violations.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯的长子，曾积极推动其父称帝。
description.en: Yuan Shikai's eldest son, who actively encouraged his father to become emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清末民初政治家，袁世凯的盟友。
晚清重臣、政治家和军事家，满洲正白旗人，慈禧太后的心腹。他是载沣的岳父，也是溥仪的外祖父。
description.en: A prominent minister, statesman, and military leader in the late Qing dynasty, a confidant of Empress Dowager Cixi, and the father-in-law of Zaifeng.

description.zh-cn: 晚清维新派领袖、政治家和思想家，梁启超的老师。他是戊戌变法的主要策划者和领导者之一。变法失败后流亡海外，组织保皇会，主张君主立宪。他还曾试图将儒家改造为国教（孔教）。
description.en: Leader of the late Qing reformists, a politician and thinker, and Liang Qichao's teacher. He was a key planner and leader of the Hundred Days' Reform. After the reform failed, he lived in exile, organized the Baohuang Hui (Protect the Emperor Society), and advocated for a constitutional monarchy. He also attempted to establish Confucianism as the state religion (the Confucian Church).

description.zh-cn: 清末维新派政治家、思想家，戊戌六君子之一。他曾于屠城三十余年后到访南京，记述了当地父老对湘军暴行“犹深愤恨”的情形。
description.en: A reformist politician and thinker of the late Qing Dynasty, and one of the 'Six Gentlemen of the Wuxu Reform'. He recorded local elders' 'deep hatred' for Xiang Army atrocities during a visit to Nanjing over thirty years after the massacre.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家。曾任军政府鄂军都督、大元帅，以及中华民国临时副总统、第一任副总统；后继任第二、三任大总统。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the first Vice President and the second and third President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家、军事人物，北洋军阀皖系首领。曾是袁世凯手下重要将领。历任参谋总长、国务总理、临时执政等职，并在赵秉钧辞职后代理国务总理。他在北洋政府时期发挥重要作用，因在清帝退位、抵制洪宪帝制和讨伐张勋复辟中的贡献，被誉为“三造共和”。
description.en: A Chinese politician and military figure, leader of the Anhui clique. He was an important general under Yuan Shikai. He served as Chief of the General Staff, Premier, and Provisional Chief Executive, and also as acting Premier after Zhao Bingjun's resignation. He played a significant role during the Beiyang Government period, and is known for his contributions in forcing the Qing emperor's abdication, resisting the Hongxian Monarchy, and suppressing the Manchu Restoration, earning him the moniker 'the three-time creator of the Republic'.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代政治活动家，筹安会发起人，积极推动袁世凯称帝。
description.en: A Chinese politician active in the late Qing and early Republican periods, founder of the Chou'anhui, who actively promoted Yuan Shikai's monarchical ambitions.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝的皇后，宣统帝（溥仪）的嗣母。她是清朝最后一位实际掌权者，宣统年间与载沣共同作为最高统治者，拥有重大事件的最终决定权。在宣统帝逊位时垂帘听政，并代表其颁布退位诏书。
description.en: The empress consort of the Guangxu Emperor and adoptive mother of the Xuantong Emperor. She was the last de facto ruler of the Qing dynasty. During the Xuantong era, she served as co-supreme ruler with Zaifeng, holding the final decision-making power on major events. She also issued the abdication edict on behalf of the emperor.

description.zh-cn: 中国金融科技公司

zh-cn: 中国证券监督管理委员会

location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区金融大街19号富凯大厦A座

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院直属事业单位，作为金融监管机构，负责证券、期货市场的监督管理。
description.en: A direct institution under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the supervision and management of the securities and futures markets.

description.zh-cn: 动作演员、功夫明星、佛教徒、慈善家、企业家
中国电子商务公司
中国浙江省省会。曾是南宋都城，亦是民族英雄岳飞遇害及安葬地。唐代诗人白居易曾任此地刺史，任内修筑西湖堤防、疏浚六井，政绩卓著。
description.en: The capital of Zhejiang Province, China. It was once the capital of the Southern Song Dynasty and is the site where the national hero Yue Fei was martyred and buried. During the Tang Dynasty, the poet Bai Juyi served as its prefect, achieving remarkable success, including constructing the West Lake embankment and dredging the Six Wells.

description.zh-cn: 中国声乐家，钱学森夫人。
香港著名武侠小说作家、《明报》创办人，与倪匡、黄沾、蔡澜并列为“香港四大才子”。他也是倪匡的好友，曾鼓励倪匡创作《卫斯理系列》。在其封笔后，还曾亲自为旗下的《明报》向古龙邀稿《陆小凤系列》。
description.en: A renowned Hong Kong wuxia novelist and founder of Ming Pao. He is known as one of the 'Four Great Talents of Hong Kong' along with Ni Kuang, James Wong and Chua Lam. He was also a close friend of Ni Kuang and encouraged him to create the 'Wisely Series'. After he stopped writing novels, he personally invited Gu Long to write the 'Lu Xiaofeng Series' for his newspaper, Ming Pao.

description.zh-cn: 鲁迅的伴侣，鲁迅的学生。
鲁迅与许广平之子。
位于日本仙台的一所国立大学
中国近代思想家、学者，鲁迅的老师。
中国现代作家、学者、翻译家、语言学家。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer, scholar, translator, and linguist.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆时期的直辖市行政建制，特指当时的上海市。这里是四一二事件的主要发生地，也是著名作家倪匡的出生地。
description.en: The administrative establishment of Shanghai City, a direct-administered municipality during the Republic of China mainland period. It was the primary location of the April 12th Incident and also the birthplace of the renowned writer Ni Kuang.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代作家、文学评论家、文化活动家和社会活动家。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer, literary critic, cultural and social activist.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛与刘永清的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Hu Jintao and Liu Yongqing.

description.zh-cn: 企业家，曾任新浪网CEO、董事长。胡海青的丈夫。
description.en: Entrepreneur, former CEO and chairman of Sina.com. Husband of Hu Haiqing.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学出资设立的国有独资有限责任公司。
中国大陆的一家网络媒体公司。
description.en: A Chinese online media company.

zh-cn: 胡锦涛中共二十大离场事件
胡锦涛二十大离场事件

description.zh-cn: 中共二十大闭幕会上，前中共中央总书记胡锦涛被工作人员从主席台带离会场。此事件被外界广泛解读为团派失势的象征性时刻。
description.en: The incident where former CPC General Secretary Hu Jintao was escorted off the rostrum by staff during the closing session of the 20th CPC National Congress. It was widely interpreted as a symbolic moment of the Tuanpai's loss of power.

description.zh-cn: 明朝是中国历史上继元朝之后的大一统王朝，也是最后一个由汉族统治的帝制王朝。由朱元璋建立，马皇后为其首位皇后。其间改行中书省为承宣布政使司，俗称“行省”。明成祖时期，北京故宫开始建造并作为其后的主要皇宫。
description.en: The Ming Dynasty was a unified imperial dynasty in Chinese history, following the Yuan Dynasty, and the last imperial dynasty ruled by Han Chinese. Founded by Zhu Yuanzhang, with Empress Ma as its first empress, it reformed the Central Secretariat into the Provincial Administration Commission, known as 'Xingsheng'. During the reign of the Yongle Emperor, the Forbidden City in Beijing was built and became the main imperial palace.

description.zh-cn: 由忽必烈建立的中国历史上由蒙古族建立的大一统王朝，追尊蒙哥为宪宗桓肃皇帝。其设立行中书省作为一级地方行政区划，官场上使用空印文书的习惯做法被明朝沿用，并最终引发了空印案。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty founded by Kublai Khan, and established by the Mongols, which posthumously honored Möngke as Emperor Xianzong Huansu. The bureaucratic practice of using empty-sealed documents, inherited from the Yuan, led to the Empty Seal Case in the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋的皇后，郭子兴的养女，朱高煦之祖母。她以贤惠、仁慈、节俭著称，常劝谏朱元璋，挽救大臣性命。同时，她不干预朝政，限制外戚势力，深受后人敬仰。
description.en: The empress consort of the Hongwu Emperor Zhu Yuanzhang, adoptive daughter of Guo Zixing, and grandmother of Zhu Gaoxu. She was renowned for her kindness, wisdom, and frugality, often advising the emperor and saving the lives of officials. She also refrained from interfering in court politics and limiting the power of imperial relatives, earning her deep respect from later generations.

description.zh-cn: 元末明初的群雄之一，汉政权建立者
明朝开国名将。体貌奇伟，勇力绝伦，猿臂善射，统军有方。官至中书平章军国重事，兼太子少保。曾封郑国公、鄂国公。北伐中原时暴卒军中，追封开平王，谥号忠武。
description.en: Founding general of the Ming Dynasty. Known for his exceptional bravery and military skill. He held high positions such as Grand Marshal and Junior Guardian of the Crown Prince, and was enfeoffed as the Duke of E. He died suddenly during the northern expedition against the Yuan and was posthumously created Prince of Kaiping with the posthumous name Zhongwu.

birth_place.zh-cn: 河南江北等处行中书省安丰路濠州怀远县
birth_place.en: Huaiyuan County, Haozhou, Anfeng Circuit, Henan Jiangbei Xingsheng

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国功臣、政治家、文学家。据《明史》记载，他被胡惟庸下毒害死。
description.en: A founding father, statesman, and literary figure of the Ming dynasty. According to the History of Ming, he was poisoned to death by Hu Weiyong.

description.zh-cn: 胡惟庸，明朝初年的宰相，同时也是明朝最后一任中书省丞相。他是胡惟庸案的核心人物，最终被朱元璋以谋反罪名诛杀。
description.en: Hu Weiyong was a chancellor in the early Ming dynasty and the last Chancellor of the Central Secretariat. He was the central figure in the Case of Hu Weiyong and was eventually executed by the Hongwu Emperor on charges of treason.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋嫡长子，洪武元年被立为皇太子，是明朝开国皇太子。他也是建文帝朱允炆之父。正史记载其为马皇后所生，但亦有异说。
description.en: The eldest son and heir apparent of Emperor Taizu, Zhu Yuanzhang, and the first crown prince of the Ming dynasty, designated in the first year of the Hongwu era. He was also the father of Emperor Jianwen, Zhu Yunwen. Official histories record him as the son of Empress Ma, though conflicting accounts exist.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第二位皇帝明惠宗朱允炆，朱元璋之孙，年号“建文”。在位期间，于洪武三十一年（1398年）追尊祖母马皇后。后在靖难之役中被其叔朱棣击败。
description.en: The second emperor of the Ming dynasty, Ming Huizong Zhu Yunwen, a grandson of Zhu Yuanzhang, reigned under the era name 'Jianwen'. During his reign, he honored his grandmother Empress Ma with a posthumous title in the 31st year of the Hongwu era (1398). He was later defeated by his uncle Zhu Di in the Jingnan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋第四子，明朝第三位皇帝，明成祖。原为燕王，通过靖难之役从其侄建文帝手中夺取皇位，年号永乐。他下令编纂《永乐大典》，并恢复加强了锦衣卫的权力。关于其生母，正史记载为马皇后，但有史料称其生母为䂵妃。他是朱高煦之父。
description.en: The fourth son of the Hongwu Emperor and the third Emperor of the Ming Dynasty, known as the Yongle Emperor. He seized the throne from his nephew, the Jianwen Emperor, through the Jingnan Campaign. He commissioned the compilation of the Yongle Encyclopedia and restored and strengthened the power of the Jinyiwei. His parentage is disputed; while official histories record Empress Ma as his mother, some historical sources claim he was born to Consort Gong. He was the father of Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 元末红巾军领袖，小明王

zh-cn: 中央外事工作委员会办公室
en: Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission
Foreign Affairs Office of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央外事工作委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission of the Communist Party of China.

zh-cn: 中共中央台湾工作办公室

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责处理台湾事务的机构，与中共中央台湾工作办公室为“一个机构两块牌子”。
description.en: An administrative agency under the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for Taiwan-related affairs. It shares the same office with the Taiwan Work Office of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，曾任中华人民共和国外交部部长。
description.en: Chinese diplomat who served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于西亚阿拉伯半岛的君主专制国家，政教合一，以石油经济为支柱。曾被邀请加入金砖国家，后暂缓申请。在阿拉伯之春后的地区冲突中扮演重要角色，如军事干预也门。该国曾被伊朗伊斯兰革命卫队总司令侯赛因·萨拉米指控支持阿米尼示威。
description.en: A monarchical absolute state located on the Arabian Peninsula in Western Asia, where religion and politics are integrated, and the economy relies on oil. It was invited to join BRICS but later postponed its application. It has also played a significant role in regional conflicts following the Arab Spring, such as its military intervention in Yemen. The country was accused by Hossein Salami, Commander-in-Chief of the IRGC, of supporting the Mahsa Amini protests.

description.zh-cn: 位于西亚的政教合一伊斯兰共和国，2024年加入金砖国家。该国被指控向俄罗斯提供无人机和弹道导弹，同时也是马赫萨·阿米尼示威的发生地。
description.en: A theocratic Islamic republic in Western Asia that joined BRICS in 2024. The country is accused of supplying drones and ballistic missiles to Russia and was also the site of the Mahsa Amini protests.

description.zh-cn: 欧盟外交与安全政策高级代表。
中华民国时期新疆省的统治者，下令处决了毛泽民、陈潭秋、林基路等人。
description.en: Ruler of Xinjiang Province during the Republic of China era, who ordered the execution of Mao Zemin, Chen Tanqiu, Lin Jilu, and others.

description.zh-cn: 令计划的妻子。
令狐路线的弟弟，曾将其在汇金立方的股份转给外甥女（令狐路线之女）王玲。
description.en: Younger brother of Linghu Luxian, who transferred his shares in Huijin Lifang to his niece Wang Ling (daughter of Linghu Luxian).

description.zh-cn: 神秘政商联盟组织
前中国中央电视台记者、主播，后因涉郭振玺案被判刑六年，现为投资人。
description.en: Former China Central Television reporter and anchor, later sentenced to six years in prison for his involvement in the Guo Zhenxi case, now an investor.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第9任皇帝，亦是在位时间最长的皇帝。在位前期开创开元盛世，后期因怠政导致安史之乱爆发。他曾征召李白入京任翰林供奉，并追封庄周为南华真人。其与杨贵妃的爱情故事是《长恨歌》的主题。
description.en: The 9th and longest-reigning emperor of the Tang Dynasty. He posthumously honored Zhuang Zhou as Nanhua Zhenren, and his love story with Yang Guifei is the subject of the 'Song of Everlasting Regret'.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝诗人，李白的好友与敬慕对象。
唐朝著名宦官，本名冯元一。他深得唐玄宗宠信，官至骠骑大将军，封齐国公。一生对玄宗忠心耿耿，但据说也曾因被李白冒犯而排挤他。
唐玄宗的贵妃，也是备受宠爱的宠妃，中国古代四大美女之一，文学作品《长恨歌》的主角。她在马嵬驿兵变中被赐死。有传闻称她曾因高力士中伤而排斥李白。
description.en: A beloved consort of Emperor Xuanzong of Tang and one of the Four Beauties of ancient China, she is also a central figure in the literary work 'Song of Everlasting Regret'. She was forced to commit suicide during the Mawei Mutiny. Rumors suggest she rejected Li Bai due to the slanders of Gao Lishi.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝名将，在平定安史之乱中起到关键作用。传说他曾受李白救助，后为获罪的李白求情。
description.en: A famous general of the Tang Dynasty who played a crucial role in suppressing the An Lushan Rebellion. It is said that he was once rescued by Li Bai and later interceded for the disgraced poet.

description.zh-cn: 东晋政治家，李白终身仰慕的历史人物之一。
中国古代的学术机构和官僚储备机构。在唐朝时期，它曾作为宫廷机构，李白在此担任翰林供奉。此机构也曾长期收藏《永乐大典》副本。
description.en: An academic and administrative institution in imperial China. During the Tang Dynasty, it served as a court institution, where Li Bai held the position of Hanlin Academician. The institution also long housed the duplicate manuscript of the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 起源于中国的本土民族宗教，以“道”为最高信仰，深受道家思想影响，后将庄周尊为南华真人。李白笃信道教，热切向往神仙不死。
description.en: An indigenous Chinese religion, deeply influenced by Taoist philosophy, which later revered Zhuang Zhou as Nanhua Zhenren.

description.zh-cn: 中国商人。
由首批入选985工程的九所高校组成的高校联盟。
位于中国南京市的著名高等学府。
description.en: A prestigious institution of higher education located in Nanjing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部直属综合性全国重点研究型大学，慎海雄的母校之一。
位于中国西安的著名高等学府，是周鸿祎的母校。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher learning in Xi'an, China, and the alma mater of Zhou Hongyi.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的公立大学，由中华人民共和国工业和信息化部直属。作为一所'双一流A类'、原'985工程'和'211工程'重点建设的全国重点大学，该校以航空航天工程和技术为特色，是一所顶尖研究型大学。
description.en: A public university located in Beijing, China, directly under the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China. As a national key university designated under 'Double First-Class A', former 'Project 985', and 'Project 211' initiatives, it is a top research university specializing in aeronautics and astronautics engineering and technology.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的公立大学。温云松在此获得工科学位；项昌乐在此获得学士、硕士和博士学位，并曾担任党委常务副书记等职务。
description.en: A public university in Beijing, China. Wen Yunsong obtained his engineering degree here; Xiang Changle obtained his bachelor's, master's, and doctoral degrees here, and previously served as Executive Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所著名综合性大学，是中华人民共和国教育部直属的全国重点大学，位于中国北京，是“双一流A类”、“985工程”、“211工程”重点建设大学。它是北京师范大学的前身之一。其体育系是1953年成立中央体育学院（北京体育大学前身）的基础。徐旭生曾任校长，徐发淦是其校友。
description.en: A renowned comprehensive university in China, it is a national key university directly under the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China, located in Beijing, China. It is designated as a 'Double First-Class A', 'Project 985', and 'Project 211' university. It is also one of the predecessors of Beijing Normal University. Its Department of Physical Education formed the basis for the establishment of the Central Institute of Physical Culture (predecessor of Beijing Sport University) in 1953. Xu Xusheng served as its chancellor, and Xu Fagan is an alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国辽宁省沈阳市的著名高等学府，一所以工科为主的综合性大学，阎明复曾就读于此。
description.en: A university that Yan Mingfu attended.

description.zh-cn: 作为东南大学的前身，其电讯工程相关专业于1956年并入组建电子科技大学。现为中央直管、教育部直属的研究型综合性大学。
位于中国湖北省武汉市的中国副部级研究型综合大学，“双一流A类”、“985工程”、“211工程”重点建设大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Wuhan, Hubei, China.

en: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省武汉市

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部直属的综合性重点大学，双一流A类、985工程、211工程重点建设大学。唐良智在此获得本科学位和经济学博士学位。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher learning located in Wuhan, China, where Tang Liangzhi obtained his bachelor's degree and a Ph.D. in Economics.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省广州市

description.zh-cn: 华南理工大学的前身，直属中华人民共和国教育部的公立综合性研究型大学。其电讯工程相关专业于1956年并入组建电子科技大学。此外，在1958年至1962年间，曾有一个机构自华南工学院分出，后又重新并入该学院。

en: University of Electronic Science and Technology of China

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省成都市

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部直属重点大学，双一流A类、985工程、211工程重点建设大学。
中国顶尖高校之一，隶属于中华人民共和国工业和信息化部，以发展航空、航天、航海（三航）为特色，是“双一流A类”、“985工程”、“211工程”重点建设大学，国防七子之一。其历史可追溯至1952年，当时由南京大学、交通大学、浙江大学的航空工程系在南京组建，并于1956年迁至西安，更名为西安航空学院，是西北工业大学的前身之一。
由SARS-CoV-2病毒引起的疾病。

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省省会。
description.en: The capital of Hubei Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 一场1929年至1933年之间开始的全球性经济大衰退，是第二次世界大战前最严重的全球经济衰退，也是罗斯福新政的背景。
description.en: A severe worldwide economic depression that was the context for Roosevelt's New Deal.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府的主要情报机构之一。张纯如在遗书中声称自己被该组织盯上。
