description.en: One of the principal intelligence agencies of the United States federal government. Iris Chang claimed in her suicide note that she was being targeted by this organization.

description.zh-cn: 企业家和商业巨头，SpaceX、特斯拉公司CEO及首席设计师，PayPal创始人，Solarcity主席，美国政府效率部负责人。宾夕法尼亚大学校友。
description.en: Entrepreneur and business magnate, CEO and Chief Designer of SpaceX, CEO and Product Architect of Tesla, Inc., founder of PayPal, chairman of SolarCity, and Head of the US Government Efficiency Department. An alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 中国工程院院士，呼吸病学专家。

en: Central University of Finance and Economics

description.zh-cn: 时任中国人民解放军第38集团军军长，因拒绝执行戒严命令而被撤职查办。
六四事件受害者，在六部口被坦克碾压致双腿截肢。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第八十二集团军
中国人民解放军第38集团军
en: 38th Army of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军的一支王牌部队，因在朝鲜战争中的出色表现被誉为“万岁军”。隶属北京军区，是参与戒严和清场行动的精锐部队之一。
description.en: An elite unit of the PLA Ground Force, acclaimed as the 'Long Live Army' for its outstanding performance in the Korean War. Affiliated with the Beijing Military Region, it was one of the elite units involved in martial law and clearing operations.

zh-cn: 北京高校学生自治联合会

description.zh-cn: 六四事件期间由北京各高校学生成立的独立学生组织。
社会运动人士、历史学者，中国1989年六四事件（八九民运）学生领袖之一。后流亡美国，他曾称呼魏京生为“民主斗士”。
description.en: One of the student leaders of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests in China, who later went into exile in the United States. He once called Wei Jingsheng a 'democracy fighter'.

description.zh-cn: 中国1989年六四事件学生运动领袖之一，天安门广场绝食行动发起人之一，人权活动家，企业高管，封从德前妻。
description.en: A student leader in the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, human rights activist, business executive, and the ex-wife of Feng Congde.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国作家、社会活动家、文艺评论家、人权活动家、持不同政见者。他曾是77级大学生，参与六四事件，是《零八宪章》主要起草人之一，并于2010年获得诺贝尔和平奖。魏京生曾批评将诺贝尔奖授予他的决定。
description.en: A Chinese writer, social activist, literary critic, human rights activist, and dissident. He was a member of the Class of 1977, participated in the Tiananmen Square protests, was a principal drafter of Charter 08, and was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 2010. Wei Jingsheng criticized the decision to award him the Nobel Prize.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间响应毛泽东号召‘造反’，并向当权派夺权的群众组织的统称，是文化大革命时期的政治派系，与保皇派对立。
description.en: A general term for mass organizations that responded to Mao Zedong's call to 'rebel' and seized power from the establishment during the Cultural Revolution. These were a political faction opposed to the Royalist faction.

description.zh-cn: 文革期间支持各地原有党政军领导的群众组织派别。
中华人民共和国的五个自治区之一。
description.en: One of the five autonomous regions of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央办公厅副主任兼秘书局局长，被认为是习近平的贴身秘书。

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公务员
en: Civil service of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国的国家公务员制度，是指依法履行公职、纳入国家行政编制、由国家财政负担工资福利的工作人员。规范中华人民共和国公务员管理的主要法律是其重要依据。
一所位于北京紫禁城内的博物馆，是文化和旅游部直属事业单位，首长高配副部长级。任万平曾在此担任副院长。
description.en: A museum located within Beijing's Forbidden City, directly affiliated with the Ministry of Culture and Tourism. Its highest-ranking official holds a vice-ministerial level, and Ren Wanping previously served as its deputy director.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京天安门广场东侧的综合性博物馆，收藏有神舟五号返回舱。它是文化和旅游部直属事业单位，首长高配副部长级。
description.en: A comprehensive museum located on the east side of Tiananmen Square in Beijing, China, which houses the Shenzhou 5 return capsule. It is a directly affiliated institution of the Ministry of Culture and Tourism, with its head ranked as a Vice Minister.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海的证券交易所，由中国证监会管理的事业单位，理事长高配副部长级。
description.en: A stock exchange located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 与中国烟草总公司一个机构两块牌子，属于中央行政企业。
中央行政企业，享受副部级政治经济待遇。

zh-cn: 中国投资有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 中央金融企业，享受副部级政治经济待遇。

en: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

description.zh-cn: 中国的大型国有商业银行，中央金融企业，享受副部级政治经济待遇。它是中国工商银行（亚洲）的母公司。
description.en: A large state-owned commercial bank in China, the parent company of ICBC (Asia).

description.zh-cn: 中央金融企业，享受副部级政治经济待遇。
民国时期的主要商业银行之一，后被国民政府增资控股。在成为中央金融企业后，享受副部级政治经济待遇。
description.en: One of the major commercial banks during the Republic of China period, later controlled by the Nationalist Government through increased capital. After becoming a central financial enterprise, it enjoys vice-ministerial political and economic treatment.

description.zh-cn: 中央金融企业，享受副部级政治经济待遇。

zh-cn: 中国航空工业集团公司
中国航空工业集团有限公司
en: Aviation Industry Corporation of China, Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 国有重要骨干企业（副部级央企）。
国有重要骨干企业（副部级央企）。
中国大型国有石油和天然气公司，国有重要骨干企业（副部级央企），在《穹顶之下》中被点名批评。其高层工程师随后撰文反驳片中观点。
description.en: A major state-owned oil and gas corporation in China, which was criticized by name in 'Under the Dome'. Its senior engineer later wrote an article refuting the film's claims.

description.zh-cn: 国有重要骨干企业（副部级央企）。
国有重要骨干企业（副部级央企）。
国有重要骨干企业（副部级央企）。
国有重要骨干企业（副部级央企）。
中央文化企业。
副省级城市，张艺谋的出生地
description.en: Zhang Yimou's birthplace

description.zh-cn: 中国黑龙江省的省会，副省级城市。是林立果和胡彦林的出生地。
description.en: The capital of Heilongjiang Province, China, a sub-provincial city, and the birthplace of Lin Liguo and Hu Yanlin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省省会、副省级市、国家中心城市。历史上，这里曾是东汉时期益州蜀郡的治所，也是张松的家乡。
description.en: The capital of Shu Commandery in Yi Province during the Eastern Han dynasty, and Zhang Song's hometown.

description.zh-cn: 中国辽宁省的一座副省级城市，也是杜吉洲的家乡。
description.en: A sub-provincial city in Liaoning Province, China, and also the hometown of Du Jizhou.

description.zh-cn: 对应正营职的军衔或警衔。
中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国司法部部长（傅政华的前任）、最高人民检察院检察长，现任中华人民共和国最高人民法院院长、中华人民共和国首席大法官。
description.en: Chinese political figure, formerly Minister of Justice (predecessor to Fu Zhenghua) and Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate, currently President of the Supreme People's Court and Chief Justice of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 陈希的前任中共中央组织部常务副部长。
中国政治人物、团派主要成员。曾任中华人民共和国最高人民法院院长，任内被指涉嫌干预陕西千亿矿权案的审理。现任全国政协副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician and a key member of the Tuanpai (Youth League Faction). He served as President of the Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China, during which tenure he was accused of interfering in the trial of the 'Shaanxi Hundred-Billion-Yuan Mining Rights Case'. He currently serves as a Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物、国家级副职领导人，中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席。曾任香港特别行政区行政会议非官守议员召集人，2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举当选并出任香港特别行政区第四任行政长官。
description.en: Hong Kong politician and current Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC. He was elected as the fourth Chief Executive of Hong Kong in the 2012 election, and previously served as the Convenor of the Non-official Members of the Executive Council of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国人民解放军上将。他曾任中央军事委员会委员、中国人民解放军总政治部主任、总装备部部长。他还是中国载人航天工程总指挥，并宣布了神舟五号发射成功与任务圆满完成。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China and a General (Shang Jiang) of the People's Liberation Army. He served as a member of the Central Military Commission, Director of the PLA General Political Department, and Director of the PLA General Armaments Department. He was also Commander-in-Chief of the China Manned Space Program, announcing the successful launch and completion of the Shenzhou 5 mission.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事人物
中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任中国人民解放军总政治部主任，后在接受组织谈话期间自杀身亡。
description.en: A high-ranking general in the People's Liberation Army, former Director of the PLA General Political Department, who committed suicide during an investigation.

description.zh-cn: 清朝奠基者，后金开国皇帝，后被追尊为清太祖。他是塔克世与宣皇后的长子。他统一女真各部，并在与明朝的战争中屡获胜利。但在宁远之战中被袁崇焕击败并负伤，不久后去世。
description.en: The founder of the Qing dynasty and the Later Jin dynasty, posthumously honored as Emperor Taizu of Qing. He was the eldest son of Taksi and Empress Xuan. He unified the Jurchen tribes and achieved numerous victories in wars against the Ming Dynasty. However, he was defeated and wounded by Yuan Chonghuan at the Battle of Ningyuan, dying shortly thereafter.

description.zh-cn: 由女真族首领努尔哈赤于1616年建立的政权，是清朝的前身。在其存续期间，与明朝在辽东地区展开了长期的军事对抗。
description.en: A khanate established by the Jurchen leader Nurhaci in 1616, the predecessor to the Qing dynasty. During its existence, it engaged in long-term military conflict with the Ming Dynasty in the Liaodong region.

description.zh-cn: 明末农民起义军领袖，大顺政权的建立者与大顺皇帝。他率军攻入北京导致明朝灭亡，并曾将锦衣卫改名为龙衣卫。但随后在一片石之战中被清吴联军击败。其军队被认为是焚毁《永乐大典》正本的可能原因之一。
description.en: Leader of the peasant rebellion in the late Ming dynasty, founder and emperor of the Dashun regime. He led his army to capture Beijing, causing the fall of the Ming dynasty, and once renamed the Jinyiwei to Longyiwei (Dragon-Clad Guard). However, he was later defeated by the Qing-Wu allied forces at the Battle of Shanhai Pass. His army is also considered a possible cause for the destruction of the original manuscript of the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 明末清初军事家、政治家。曾任辽东总兵，手握关宁铁骑，于一片石之战中投降多尔衮，引清兵入关，被封为平西王。晚年发动三藩之乱，建立吴周政权，自称皇帝。
description.en: A military general and politician in the late Ming and early Qing dynasties. He served as a late Ming general, commanding the Guan-Ning Army in the Liaodong region. During the Battle of Shanhai Pass, he surrendered to Dorgon, allowing Qing forces to enter the pass, and was subsequently enfeoffed as the Prince of Pacifying the West. In his later years, he initiated the Revolt of the Three Feudatories and established the Wu Zhou dynasty, declaring himself emperor.

description.zh-cn: 中国清朝第六位皇帝，年号乾隆，清高宗，雍正帝第四子，孝圣宪皇后之子。他实际掌握中国最高权力长达六十三年零四个月，是中国历史上实际执掌国家最高权力时间最长的皇帝。在位期间，他下令开四库馆并从《永乐大典》中辑佚，同时对紫禁城进行了大规模的增建和改建，奠定了其现今的大部分格局。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Qing dynasty, known by his reign name Qianlong, was Emperor Gaozong of Qing, the fourth son of Emperor Yongzheng, and son of Empress Xiaoshengxian. He de facto held supreme power in China for 63 years and four months, making him the longest-reigning ruler in Chinese history. During his reign, he ordered the establishment of the Siku Quanshu project and the recovery of lost texts from the Yongle Encyclopedia, while also undertaking large-scale additions and renovations to the Forbidden City, laying the foundation for much of its current layout.

description.zh-cn: 1840年至1842年清朝与大英帝国之间的一场侵略战争，战争的导火线是清政府的禁烟运动，其中著名的事件是虎门销烟。战争以中国失败并赔款割地告终，签订了中国近代史上第一个不平等条约《南京条约》。
description.en: A war fought between the Qing dynasty and the British Empire from 1840 to 1842. The conflict was triggered by the Qing government's campaign against the British opium trade, which culminated in the destruction of opium at Humen. The war concluded with a Chinese defeat and the signing of the Treaty of Nanking.

description.zh-cn: 第一次鸦片战争后清政府与英国签订的条约，是中国近代史上第一个不平等条约。条约内容包括割让香港岛、开放五个通商口岸及赔款。
description.en: The treaty signed between the Qing government and Great Britain after the First Opium War, and the first of the unequal treaties in modern Chinese history. Its terms included the cession of Hong Kong Island, the opening of five treaty ports, and payment of reparations.

description.zh-cn: 清末拜上帝会创始人，太平天国运动的领袖及太平天国的建立者和天王。其子为洪天贵福。
description.en: Founder of the God Worshipping Society in the late Qing Dynasty, leader of the Taiping Rebellion, founder and Heavenly King of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom. His son was Hong Tianguifu.

description.zh-cn: 太平天国是由洪秀全在清朝后期建立的农民起义政权，与清朝对峙并进行了长达14年的战争。其军事力量在天京城破时，城中守军约有万余人。
description.en: The Taiping Heavenly Kingdom was a rebel state established by Hong Xiuquan during the late Qing Dynasty, which engaged in a 14-year war with the Qing government. Its military force numbered around 10,000 defenders when Tianjing fell.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期政治家、战略家、理学家、文学家，中兴四大名臣之一，湘军的创立者和统帅。他曾向清廷奏报攻克金陵战果时，称杀敌十万余，有学者认为此为夸大战功。
description.en: A Chinese statesman, military general, Confucian scholar, and writer of the late Qing dynasty, and one of the Four Great Ministers of the Restoration. He was the founder and commander of the Xiang Army. In his report to the Qing court on the capture of Jinling, he claimed to have killed over 100,000 enemies, a figure some scholars believe to be an exaggeration.

description.zh-cn: 中国清朝晚期女性皇室成员、政治人物，同治、光绪年间的实际最高统治者，亦是光绪帝名义上的母亲。她在执政期间指定溥仪继位并任命载沣为摄政王。曾于义和团运动期间向多国宣战，引发八国联军之役，其权威在东南互保事件中受到严重挑战。
description.en: A female royal member and political figure in the late Qing dynasty, she was the de facto supreme ruler during the Tongzhi and Guangxu reigns, and the nominal mother of Emperor Guangxu. During her rule, she appointed Puyi as the successor and Zaifeng as the Prince-Regent. She declared war on multiple foreign powers during the Boxer Rebellion, leading to the invasion by the Eight-Nation Alliance, and her authority was severely challenged by the Mutual Protection of Southeast China.

zh-cn: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室
中央网络安全和信息化领导小组办公室
国家互联网信息办公室

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室，是中共中央委员会的办事机构。它与国家互联网信息办公室一个机构两块牌子，负责中国互联网内容审查和监管。
description.en: The Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission of the People's Republic of China is the working body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. It operates under two names with the Cyberspace Administration of China, and is responsible for internet content censorship and regulation in China.

zh-cn: 中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区维护国家安全公署
en: Office for Safeguarding National Security of the Central People's Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 根据《香港国安法》设立的中央人民政府驻港机构，同时也是中共中央委员会的派出机关。负责监督、指导、协调、支持香港特区履行维护国家安全的职责，并可在特定情形下直接行使管辖权。
description.en: A Central People's Government agency established in Hong Kong under the National Security Law, also serving as a dispatch agency of the CPC Central Committee. It is responsible for supervising, guiding, coordinating, and supporting the HKSAR in fulfilling its duties to safeguard national security, and can exercise jurisdiction directly in specific situations.

zh-cn: 国务院港澳事务办公室
en: Hong Kong and Macao Work Office
Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院负责香港和澳门事务的办事机构，是中共中央港澳工作办公室的加挂牌子。
description.en: The working body of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for Hong Kong and Macao affairs, operating concurrently as the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 公务员行政级别。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军开国少将
en: Major General of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军和武警部队的军衔等级，包括将官军衔。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army of China.

zh-cn: 直辖市 (中华人民共和国)

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。

zh-cn: 中国共产党新疆维吾尔自治区委员会
中共新疆维吾尔自治区党委
en: Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Regional Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在新疆维吾尔自治区的领导机关。
中华人民共和国公务员体系中第四级别的干部。
description.en: One of the administrative levels for civil servants in the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海关总署

description.zh-cn: 民军议和全权总代表
政治家、外交家，官立山东大学堂首任校长。曾任中华民国第一任内阁总理，后因赵秉钧奉袁世凯之命发起的反唐运动而被迫辞职。
description.en: Politician and diplomat, and the first principal of the Official Shandong University. He served as the first Premier of the Republic of China, later forced to resign due to the anti-Tang movement initiated by Zhao Bingjun under Yuan Shikai's orders.

birth_place.zh-cn: 大清广东省广州府新会县潮居都茶坑乡
birth_place.en: Chakeng, Xinhui, Guangzhou, Guangdong, Great Qing

death_place.zh-cn: 中华民国北平协和医院
death_place.en: Peking Union Medical College Hospital, Beiping, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国近代思想家、政治家、教育家、史学家、文学家。作为戊戌变法领袖之一，他也是清末民初中国知识界及政治界的领军人物。他曾倡导君主立宪，后反对袁世凯称帝及张勋复辟。作为巴黎和会中国代表团顾问，他从巴黎致电通报外交困境，是五四运动爆发的信息源头。他还是清华国学研究院四大导师之一，梁思成之父，晚年专注于文化教育与学术研究，对西学东渐贡献巨大。
description.en: A prominent Chinese thinker, politician, educator, historian, and writer. As one of the leaders of the Hundred Days' Reform, he was also a leading figure in China's intellectual and political circles during the late Qing Dynasty and early Republic. He advocated for constitutional monarchy, later opposing Yuan Shikai's imperial ambitions and Zhang Xun's restoration attempt. As an advisor to the Chinese delegation at the Paris Peace Conference, his telegram from Paris reporting on the diplomatic crisis was the source of information that led to the outbreak of the May Fourth Movement. He was also one of the four great tutors at the Tsinghua Institute of Chinese Studies and the father of Liang Sicheng. In his later years, he focused on cultural education and academic research, making significant contributions to the dissemination of Western knowledge.

description.zh-cn: 因台风暴雨导致的严重水库溃坝灾难，其根本原因与大跃进时期水利工程质量问题有关。
时任台湾省行政长官兼台湾省警备总司令，是二二八事件中的关键人物。
description.en: The Governor of Taiwan Province and concurrently Commander-in-Chief of Taiwan Provincial Garrison Command at the time of the February 28 Incident, and a key figure in it.

description.zh-cn: 台湾第一位哲学博士，国立台湾大学教授及《民报》社长，在二二八事件后被带走失踪。

death_place.zh-cn: 直隶省顺天府白米斜街
death_place.en: Baimi Xiejie, Shuntian Fu, Zhili Province

description.zh-cn: 晚清重臣，洋务派和清流派的主要代表人物。他历任山西巡抚、两广总督、湖广总督、军机大臣等职，官至体仁阁大学士。倡导“中学为体，西学为用”，创办了汉阳铁厂等一系列近代工业和教育机构。他曾镇压自立军起义，并是东南互保的核心人物之一。他与曾国藩、李鸿章、左宗棠并称“晚清四大名臣”，曾建议慈禧太后给予载沣“摄政王”的封号。
description.en: A prominent official of the late Qing dynasty, a key representative of the Westernization Movement and the Qingliu school. He held various high-ranking positions including Governor of Shanxi, Viceroy of Liangguang, Viceroy of Huguang, and Grand Councilor, eventually rising to the rank of Grand Secretary of the Tiren Cabinet. Advocating 'Chinese learning as the essence, Western learning for practical use', he founded a series of modern industrial and educational institutions such as the Hanyang Iron Works. He suppressed the Self-Strengthening Army Uprising and was one of the key figures in the Mutual Protection of Southeast China. Known as one of the 'Four Great Officials of the Late Qing' alongside Zeng Guofan, Li Hongzhang, and Zuo Zongtang, he once suggested to Empress Dowager Cixi that Zaifeng be given the title of 'Prince-Regent'.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家、软件工程师、天使投资人，小米集团创始人、董事长兼首席执行官，金山软件董事长。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, software engineer, angel investor, founder, chairman and CEO of Xiaomi Inc., and chairman of Kingsoft.

description.zh-cn: 中国诗人、学者。
位于美国北卡罗来纳州的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in North Carolina, United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国职业外交官，现任中华人民共和国外交部副部长。曾任外交部新闻司司长，是陆慷的继任者。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, currently serving as Vice Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China. She previously served as Director-General of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, succeeding Lu Kang.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，现任中华人民共和国外交部新闻司副司长、发言人。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as Deputy Director-General and spokesperson of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国职业外交官，中国共产党党员。现任中华人民共和国外交部新闻司副司长、外交部发言人。
description.en: A professional diplomat of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Communist Party of China. He currently serves as the Deputy Director-General of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and a spokesperson for the ministry.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，现任外交部新闻司副司长、发言人。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as Deputy Director-General and spokesperson of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，曾任外交部部长。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, formerly Minister of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央台湾工作办公室主任、国务院台湾事务办公室主任
香港企业家、电影及电视制作人、娱乐业大亨、慈善家，邵维铭的父亲。他也是亚洲影视大亨，功夫片鼻祖，邵玉轩的第六子。
description.en: Hong Kong film and television producer, entertainment mogul, philanthropist, father of Shao Vee-Meng. He was also an an Asian film and television tycoon, progenitor of kung fu films, and the sixth son of Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 语言学家、音乐家。
清末洋务派代表人物、政治家、企业家和教育家。曾任天津海关道、铁路大臣，上奏成立北洋大学堂并任首任督办，亦是南洋公学创始人。他还是东南互保的参与者，曾下令地方电信局扣押清廷宣战诏书。
description.en: A representative figure of the Self-Strengthening Movement in the late Qing Dynasty, he was a politician, entrepreneur, and educator. He served as the Daotai of Tianjin Customs and Minister of Railways. He proposed the establishment of Peiyang University in 1895, serving as its first supervisor, and was also the founder of Nanyang Public School. He participated in the Mutual Protection of Southeast China, ordering local telegraph offices to withhold the Qing court's imperial edict of war.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学院院士，上海交通大学校长。
红杉资本(中国)，携程，如家创始人。
中国人民解放军空军现任司令员，空军上将军衔。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵
en: People's Liberation Army Navy Air Force

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军的空中力量。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区空军
中国人民解放军空降兵军
en: People's Liberation Army Air Force Airborne Corps

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军的兵种机关。
曾任中共上海市委常委
曾任中共上海市委副书记
曾任中共上海市委常委
曾任中共上海市委副书记、常委
曾任中共上海市委常委
中国政治人物，曾任中共上海市委副书记、常委，现任中国证券监督管理委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共上海市委常委，后被查
马尔康·芮夫金的母校。
description.en: The alma mater of Malcolm Rifkind.

zh-cn: 伊利诺伊大学厄巴纳-香槟分校
伊利诺伊大学香槟分校

description.zh-cn: 张纯如毕业并获得新闻学位的大学。
description.en: The university where Iris Chang graduated with a degree in journalism.

description.zh-cn: 美国情报机构，据报道曾对西北工业大学发起网络攻击。
清朝第十一位皇帝，也是入关后的第九位。他是奕𫍽第二子，由慈禧太后指定继承咸丰帝之位，于1875年登基。登基时，距离湘军南京屠城已过十余年，南京城仍未从破坏中恢复。在位期间，他施行新政，主导戊戌变法，并批准创办了山东大学堂和中国近代第一所新式大学北洋大学堂。戊戌变法失败后，他被软禁。
description.en: The eleventh emperor of the Qing dynasty, and the ninth after its entry into Shanhai Pass. He was the second son of Yixuan, designated by Empress Dowager Cixi to succeed Emperor Xianfeng, and ascended the throne in 1875. At the time of his ascension, more than a decade had passed since the Nanjing Massacre by the Xiang Army, and the city of Nanjing had still not recovered from the destruction. During his reign, he implemented New Policies, led the Hundred Days' Reform, and approved the establishment of Shandong University and Peiyang University, the first modern university in China. After the failure of the Hundred Days' Reform, he was placed under house arrest.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家，2012年诺贝尔文学奖得主。
description.en: Chinese novelist, winner of the 2012 Nobel Prize in Literature

birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省胶州专区高密县

description.zh-cn: 电子科技大学校友，山西省省长。
中国的一个省级行政区，令狐路线的出生地所在省份，也曾是晋系军阀的根据地。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division of China, the home province of Linghu Luxian, and formerly the base of the Jin warlord clique.

description.zh-cn: 电子科技大学校友，歌手。
20世纪初由四所美国及英国基督教教会联合在北京开办的著名教会大学。1952年院系调整时部分社会科学并入中国人民大学。
description.en: A university in Beijing, China, that was formed out of the merger of four Christian colleges between the years 1919 and 1952.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民大学现任校长。
19世纪末发生于中国清朝的一场以“扶清灭洋”为口号的农民运动，亦指随后导致的八国联军侵华事件。这场武装冲突对孔祥熙的早年生活造成了冲击。事变后，清廷派载沣赴德国为德国公使被杀一事道歉。
description.en: An armed conflict and peasant movement that occurred in late 19th century Qing China, commonly known by the slogan 'Support the Qing, exterminate the foreigners.' It also refers to the subsequent invasion by the Eight-Nation Alliance. This conflict significantly impacted H. H. Kung's early life. Following the incident, Zaifeng was dispatched to Germany to apologize for the killing of the German minister.

description.zh-cn: 书画家、国学家
孔子，中国春秋末期鲁国的思想家、教育家、哲学家，儒家学派的创始人与主要代表人物。他传统上被认为撰写了《十翼》（易传）以解读《周易》。庄子曾借盗跖之口对其进行批评，其思想和相关文物在“破四旧”中被视为主要的攻击目标。
description.en: Confucius, an ancient Chinese philosopher, educator, and thinker from the late Spring and Autumn period of Lu, is regarded as the founder and principal representative of the Confucian school of thought. He is traditionally credited with writing the 'Ten Wings' (Yizhuan) to interpret the I Ching. Zhuangzi notably criticized him through the character Robber Zhi. His ideas and related cultural relics were primary targets of attack during the 'Destroy the Four Olds' movement.

description.zh-cn: 现任教育部党组书记、部长，曾任中国科学技术协会党组书记。
description.en: Currently serves as the Party Group Secretary and Minister of Education. Formerly served as the Party Group Secretary of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 华裔物理学家，1957年诺贝尔物理学奖得主。
中国天体物理学家，时任中国科学技术大学副校长。他的民主思想和演讲对学生产生了重要影响，被认为是八六学潮的精神领袖之一。后因此被撤职并开除党籍。
description.en: A Chinese astrophysicist and then-Vice President of the University of Science and Technology of China. His democratic ideas and speeches had a significant influence on students, and he was considered one of the spiritual leaders of the 1986 student demonstrations. He was subsequently dismissed from his post and expelled from the party.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军现任司令员，陆军上将军衔。
中国人民解放军上将。现任陆军政治委员，曾任战略支援部队航天系统部政治委员。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army. Currently Political Commissar of the Army, previously Political Commissar of the Aerospace Systems Department of the Strategic Support Force.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北京卫戍区
中国人民解放军东部战区陆军
中国人民解放军陆军第七十一集团军
中国人民解放军陆军第七十二集团军

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间由南开大学、北京大学、清华大学联合组建的大学。
华裔数学家，被誉为“微分几何之父”，曾在伯克利任教，并发起了美国国家数学科学研究所的建立。
description.en: Chinese-American mathematician who taught at Berkeley and initiated the establishment of the Mathematical Sciences Research Institute.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，现任中国人民解放军火箭军司令员。
一系列涉及中国人民解放军火箭军多名高级将领的腐败及泄密调查，以及中央军委装备发展部、相关军工企业和高校的腐败案件。
中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军火箭军司令员。
晚清重臣、湘军将领、清末甘陕总督、政治家、军事家、外交家、实业家、改革家、诗人。他曾在林则徐退休返乡途中与其彻夜长谈，深受其关于新疆及俄国威胁的见解影响，后来领导收复新疆。
description.en: A prominent statesman, general, and national hero of the late Qing dynasty. He had a lengthy discussion with Lin Zexu during Lin's retirement journey and was deeply influenced by Lin's views on Xinjiang and the Russian threat, which later guided his campaign to recover Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学教师，著名知识分子
位于美国麻萨诸塞州波士顿市的一所大学
中国科学院院士，曾任北京航空航天大学校长。

death_place.zh-cn: 台北市北投区台北荣民总医院
death_place.en: Taipei Veterans General Hospital, Beitou District, Taipei

description.zh-cn: 中国近代政治家、书法家，中华民国开国元勋之一，国民党元老。曾长期担任监察院院长达34年，被誉为“当代草圣”，也是国立西北农林专科学校创始人之一。
description.en: A modern Chinese politician, calligrapher, and one of the founding fathers of the Republic of China. He served as the President of the Control Yuan for 34 years and is hailed as the 'Contemporary Sage of Cursive Script'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市、国家中心城市、超大城市。位于中国西南部、长江上游地区，是西部大开发的重要战略支点。有文字记载的历史达3000多年，是巴蜀文化的发祥地。抗日战争时期曾为中华民国战时首都。1997年因三峡工程的需要再次成为直辖市。在特定时期，作为“重庆模式”的实施地引起广泛关注。此外，陈元执掌的国家开发银行曾向其批准大量贷款。
description.en: A direct-administered municipality, national central city, and megacity of the People's Republic of China. Located in southwestern China and the upper reaches of the Yangtze River, it is a crucial strategic point for the Western Development. With a recorded history of over 3000 years, it is the birthplace of Bashu culture. It served as the wartime capital of the Republic of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War. In 1997, it was re-established as a direct-administered municipality due to the needs of the Three Gorges Project. It gained widespread attention as the place where the 'Chongqing Model' was implemented. Additionally, the China Development Bank, led by Chen Yuan, approved substantial loans to the city.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军现任司令员，也是第九任司令员。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区海军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军的前身，于江苏泰州白马庙乡成立。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南部战区海军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军三大舰队之一，现为中国人民解放军南部战区海军。
description.en: One of the three major fleets of the People's Liberation Army Navy, now known as the PLA Southern Theater Command Navy.

description.zh-cn: 中国苗族女高音歌唱家，曾任中国人民解放军海军政治工作部文工团团长、中国音乐家协会副主席。
description.en: A Chinese Miao female singer, former head of the Song and Dance Troupe of the Political Work Department of the People's Liberation Army Navy, and former vice-chairman of the Chinese Musicians' Association.

birth_place.zh-cn: 湖南省湘西土家族苗族自治州古丈县岩头寨镇

description.zh-cn: 中华民国立法委员、台湾政治人物、前艺人
欧洲联盟是一个由27个欧洲国家共同建立的政治、经济及司法的超主权实体，总部设在布鲁塞尔。该组织与北约有紧密合作关系。拉脱维亚于2004年加入该联盟。
description.en: The European Union is a political, economic, and judicial supranational entity jointly established by 27 European countries, with its headquarters in Brussels. This organization maintains close cooperative relations with NATO. Latvia joined the union in 2004.

description.zh-cn: 中世纪欧洲的王国，其国王丕平献土创立了教宗国。
神圣罗马帝国是一个自962年建立，延续至1806年的欧洲国家。它以德意志民族为主体，版图横跨中欧与南欧。其皇帝被视为古罗马帝国的合法继承者和西方基督教世界的世俗领袖。在经历了三十年战争和拿破仑战争的削弱后，帝国于1806年解体。
description.en: The Holy Roman Empire was a European state that existed from 962 to 1806. Predominantly German, its territory spanned Central and Southern Europe. Its emperors were regarded as the legitimate successors to the ancient Roman Empire and the secular leaders of Western Christendom. After being weakened by the Thirty Years' War and the Napoleonic Wars, the empire was dissolved in 1806.

description.zh-cn: 法国波旁王朝国王，在法国大革命中被处决。
法国的一段社会激进与政治动荡的时期，对法国历史以及全欧洲都留下了深刻而深远的影响。
description.en: A period of radical social and political upheaval in France that had a lasting impact on French history and on Europe as a whole.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第一帝国的缔造者、法国大革命中崛起的军事家和政治家，后成为法兰西第一帝国皇帝。他通过军事行动和政治决策，特别是拿破仑战争，极大地改变了欧洲政治格局，并直接导致了神圣罗马帝国的解体。
description.en: Founder of the First French Empire, a military strategist and statesman who rose during the French Revolution, later becoming Emperor. Through his military campaigns and political decisions, especially the Napoleonic Wars, he profoundly reshaped the European political landscape and directly led to the dissolution of the Holy Roman Empire.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第二共和国的唯一一位总统和法兰西第二帝国的唯一一位皇帝。他曾以“教会的保护者”名义派兵保护罗马，阻止意大利王国占领（即教宗国）。
description.en: The only president of the French Second Republic and the only emperor of the Second French Empire. He protected Rome with French troops in his capacity as 'protector of the Church', preventing its capture by the Kingdom of Italy (i.e., the Papal States).

description.zh-cn: 1870年至1940年间的法国共和政府。在第二次世界大战中被纳粹德国击败后解体。
description.en: The republican government of France from 1870 to 1940. It collapsed after the defeat by Nazi Germany in World War II.

location.zh-cn: 欧洲、亚洲、非洲、大西洋、太平洋

description.zh-cn: 一场1914年至1918年发生的全球性军事冲突，始于欧洲，萨拉热窝事件是其直接导火索。美国在伍德罗·威尔逊总统的领导下于1917年参战。中国作为战胜国参与战后巴黎和会，但山东问题未能得到公平处理，成为五四运动的国际背景。
description.en: A global military conflict (1914-1918) originating in Europe, directly triggered by the Sarajevo incident. Woodrow Wilson led the United States to enter the war in 1917. China participated as a victorious nation in the post-war Paris Peace Conference, but the unfair handling of the Shandong Problem became the international backdrop for the May Fourth Movement.

description.zh-cn: 1949年5月23日在美、英、法三国占领区成立。作为欧盟创始成员国之一，其国家主导的工业发展模式和强权政策曾成为明治日本效仿的对象。近期，德国政府批评伊朗政权镇压示威，并呼吁欧盟对伊朗实施进一步制裁。
description.en: Established on 23 May 1949 in the zones occupied by the United States, the United Kingdom, and France. As one of the founding members of the EU, its state-led industrial development model and strong-arm policies became a model for Meiji Japan. Recently, the German government criticized the Iranian regime for suppressing protests and called on the EU to impose further sanctions on Iran.

description.zh-cn: 法国军事将领、政治家及法国元帅。第一次世界大战中因凡尔登战役的胜利而成为民族英雄，但在第二次世界大战期间领导与纳粹德国合作的维希法国政府，战后被判叛国罪。
description.en: A French general, politician, and Marshal of France. He became a national hero for his victory at the Battle of Verdun in World War I, but led the collaborationist Vichy France regime with Nazi Germany during World War II, for which he was convicted of treason.

location.zh-cn: 维希 (事实), 巴黎 (法定), 西格马林根 (流亡)
location.en: Vichy (de facto), Paris (de jure), Sigmaringen (in exile)

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，由菲利普·贝当领导的法国国家政权。它最初在法国未被德军占领的南部地区成立，名义上中立，但与纳粹德国合作，并于1942年后被德国完全控制。
description.en: During World War II, this French state was led by Philippe Pétain. Initially established in the southern, unoccupied zone of France, it was officially neutral but collaborated with Nazi Germany and became fully controlled by Germany after 1942.

description.zh-cn: 一个由欧洲和北美国家组成的国际军事联盟，旨在实现集体防御和防务合作。它包括2个北美国家和30个欧洲国家，加拿大是其创始国之一，拉脱维亚于2004年加入。俄罗斯对其东扩的担忧是发动战争的宣称理由之一。
description.en: An international military alliance formed by European and North American countries, aiming for collective defense and cooperation. It comprises 2 North American and 30 European states, with Canada as one of its founding members and Latvia joining in 2004. Russia's concerns about its eastward expansion were one of the stated reasons for the war.

description.zh-cn: 法国前总统，任内推动法国重返北约军事指挥结构。
美国及其盟友以伊拉克拥有大规模杀伤性武器为由发动的军事行动，推翻了萨达姆政权。这场始于2003年的军事冲突中，加拿大拒绝了美国提出的加入邀请。
description.en: A military operation launched by the United States and its allies, citing Iraq's possession of weapons of mass destruction, which overthrew the regime of Saddam Hussein. In this military conflict, which began in 2003, Canada declined the United States' invitation to join.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史学家、教育家，曾在国民参政会上揭发孔祥熙贪腐。
description.en: Chinese historian and educator who exposed H. H. Kung's corruption at the People's Political Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国诗人
中国儒家经典之一。
中国男子短跑运动员，暨南大学体育学院院长。
中国田径运动员，奥运会冠军，华东师范大学校友。
中国企业家，华为技术有限公司创始人、集团总裁。
原北京大学哲学系党总支书记，因贴出“全国第一张马列主义的大字报”而成为文革时期的风云人物。
中国药物化学家，中国中医科学院终身研究员兼首席研究员，青蒿素和双氢青蒿素的发现者，北京大学医学院校友。因其在抗疟药方面的贡献，于2015年获得诺贝尔生理学或医学奖。
description.en: A Chinese pharmaceutical chemist, lifetime researcher and chief researcher at the China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences, and the discoverer of artemisinin and dihydroartemisinin. An alumna of Peking University Medical School. She was awarded the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine in 2015 for her contributions to antimalarial drugs.

description.zh-cn: 华裔物理学家，1957年诺贝尔物理学奖得主，国立西南联合大学校友，中国科学院院士。
中国企业家，百度公司创始人、董事长兼首席执行官，北京大学校友。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, co-founder, chairman, and CEO of Baidu.

description.zh-cn: 华裔物理学家，被誉为“物理学第一夫人”，毕业于伯克利。
description.en: Chinese-American physicist, an alumna of Berkeley.

description.zh-cn: 音乐家、美术教育家、书法家、戏剧活动家。
位于美国马里兰州巴尔的摩的私立研究型大学。伍德罗·威尔逊在此获得哲学博士学位，张纯如在此获得文学硕士学位，张孝骞也曾在此进行研究。
description.en: A private research university in Baltimore, Maryland, where Woodrow Wilson earned his Ph.D., Iris Chang obtained her Master of Arts degree, and Zhang Xiaoqian once conducted research.

description.zh-cn: 中国农业大学的历史源头，中国现代农业高等教育的起源地。
直系军阀将领，曾任北洋政府教育总长、交通部长。
文学家、小说家、散文家和考古学专家。
散文家、学者、文学批评家、翻译家。
德国哲学家、政治经济学家、社会学家、历史学者、新闻从业员、革命理论家及革命社会主义者，马克思主义的创始人之一。
description.en: A German philosopher, economist, historian, political theorist, and revolutionary socialist, one of the founders of Marxism.

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家、社会科学家、记者、商人、政治思想家和社会主义者。他与马克思共同发展出共产主义理论，是马克思最亲密的朋友和长期合作伙伴。
description.en: German philosopher, social scientist, journalist, businessman, political thinker, and socialist. He co-developed communist theory with Marx and was his closest friend and long-term collaborator.

description.zh-cn: 一种联系人与神祇或超自然、神圣存在的文化体系，或以热情和坚定地信念而坚持信仰的原则或理论体系。
description.en: A cultural system that connects humanity to supernatural or sacred entities, or a system of principles or theories held with ardor and faith.

description.zh-cn: 梵蒂冈城是位于意大利首都罗马市区内的内陆城邦，由天主教会最高权力机构圣座（即罗马教廷）直接统治，为世界领土面积最小的国家。
description.en: An independent city-state and enclave located within Rome, Italy. The Vatican City State is ruled by the Pope, the bishop of Rome and head of the Catholic Church.

description.zh-cn: 一种社会经济体系和政治意识形态，列宁主义的目标是通过暴力革命和无产阶级专政来实现。
description.en: A socio-economic system and political ideology.

description.zh-cn: 一种以生产资料私有制为基础的社会经济体系，是列宁主义革命和马克思异化论所批判的对象。
description.en: A socioeconomic system based on private ownership of the means of production, which is the object of Leninist revolution and critique in Marx's theory of alienation.

description.zh-cn: 从社会革命党中分裂出的左翼派系，后被列宁主义革命政权镇压。
俄国马克思主义革命家、政治理论家，共产国际的创始人之一，“不断革命论”的主要倡导者。
description.en: Russian Marxist revolutionary and theorist, one of the founders of the Communist International.

zh-cn: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国

description.zh-cn: 古巴革命家和共产主义领导人，在肯尼迪任期内担任古巴总理，是猪湾事件和古巴导弹危机中的核心人物。
description.en: Cuban revolutionary and communist leader who served as Prime Minister of Cuba during Kennedy's presidency, a central figure in the Bay of Pigs Invasion and the Cuban Missile Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 奥地利裔英国哲学家。
奥地利裔英国经济学家、政治哲学家，奥地利经济学派的代表人物。
由弗拉基米尔·列宁领导的俄国社会民主工党的一个派别，后来成为苏联共产党。
description.en: A faction of the Russian Social Democratic Labour Party led by Vladimir Lenin, which later became the Communist Party of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 一种政治、经济和社会思想体系。五四运动促进了马克思主义在中国的传播，为中国共产党的成立创造了条件。
description.en: A political, economic, and social ideological system. The May Fourth Movement facilitated the spread of Marxism in China, creating conditions for the establishment of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的官方意识形态，由金日成创立。
description.en: The official state ideology of North Korea, developed by Kim Il-sung.

description.zh-cn: 于2025年成为金砖伙伴国。
东南亚国家。在1961年接受了中国的稻种援助。
description.en: A Southeast Asian country. It received rice seed aid from China in 1961.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约州伊萨卡的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in Ithaca, New York, USA.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥的弟弟，蒙古帝国第五代大汗，元朝的创建者、开国皇帝（元世祖）。他曾下令焚毁《道藏》，并追赠丘处机封号。
description.en: Möngke's younger brother, the fifth Great Khan of the Mongol Empire and the founder of the Yuan Dynasty. He ordered the burning of the Daozang and posthumously granted a title to Qiu Chuji.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京西北郊的清代大型皇家园林，被誉为“万园之园”，咸丰帝出生地，在第二次鸦片战争中被英法联军抢掠并焚毁。
description.en: A large imperial garden complex of the Qing Dynasty in the northwestern suburbs of Beijing, known as the 'Garden of Gardens,' the birthplace of the Xianfeng Emperor, which was looted and burned down by Anglo-French forces during the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 梁启超与李蕙仙之子，林徽因的丈夫。他是中国著名建筑学家、建筑史学家和教育家，宾夕法尼亚大学校友，并当选为中国科学院院士。
description.en: Son of Liang Qichao and Li Huixian, and husband of Lin Huiyin. He was a renowned Chinese architect, architectural historian, and educator, an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania, and an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 海南是中国设立的经济特区，同时也是中华人民共和国省级行政区。
description.en: Hainan is a special economic zone established by China, and also a provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 天主教会的主要男修会之一。在明末清初的西学东渐中扮演关键角色，派遣利玛窦等传教士来华，并于17世纪开始将《易经》引介至欧洲。
description.en: One of the main male religious orders of the Catholic Church. Its members, called Jesuits, played a key role in the first phase of West-to-East knowledge transfer by sending missionaries like Matteo Ricci to China, and began introducing the I Ching to Europe in the 17th century.

description.zh-cn: 战国四公子之一。
中华人民共和国的省份，井冈山位于其西南部。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China, where the Jinggang Mountains are located in the southwest.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一家完全由企业法人持股的股份制商业银行。
description.en: The first joint-stock commercial bank in the People's Republic of China wholly owned by corporate legal entities.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一家由企业创办的商业保险机构，也是中国第一家股份制保险企业，同时也是一个中国综合金融服务集团。郑建源曾通过其控股公司持有该公司大量股份。
description.en: The first commercial insurance institution in the People's Republic of China established by an enterprise, and also the first joint-stock insurance company in China. It is an integrated financial services group, in which Zheng Jianyuan once held a large number of shares through his holding companies.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。现任中共广东省委副书记，广东省人民政府省长、中共深圳市委书记。中共第二十届中央委员。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China. He is currently the Deputy Secretary of the Guangdong Provincial Committee of the CCP, Governor of Guangdong Province, and Secretary of the Shenzhen Municipal Committee of the CCP. He is a member of the 20th Central Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 由杨坚建立的中国朝代，历史上承南北朝、下启唐朝，结束了长期的分裂局面，重新统一了中国。该朝代开始将“省”用于中央政府的一级行政机关。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty founded by Yang Jian, succeeding the Northern and Southern dynasties and preceding the Tang dynasty. It ended a long period of division, reunifying China, and notably began using 'province' as a first-level administrative division of the central government.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第六位皇帝清高宗弘历。其在位期间，“省”作为行政区划名称获得官方认可，年号是清朝使用时间最长的年号，并曾下诏为袁崇焕平反，肯定其作为明朝忠臣的功绩。
description.en: The Qianlong Emperor, the sixth emperor of the Qing dynasty. During his reign, 'province' was officially recognized as an administrative division, his era name was the longest-used in the Qing dynasty, and an imperial edict was issued to posthumously rehabilitate Yuan Chonghuan, affirming his merits as a loyal official of the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一个省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 商朝帝王
晋公子
秦朝将军
中国古代北方的游牧民族政权，与新朝关系恶化。
与北宋同时期由党项族建立的政权，是宋神宗时期北宋在西部的主要军事对手。该政权后被蒙古所灭。
description.en: A state established by the Tangut people, coexisting with the Northern Song dynasty. It was the primary military adversary of the Northern Song in the west during Emperor Shenzong's reign.

description.zh-cn: 宋代名臣
中国远古传说中的部落首领，被道教认为是最早的思想源头。
香港岛是香港三大地域之一，根据《南京条约》被割让给英国。它是香港开埠时最早发展的地区，现为香港的政治、经济、金融和商业中心。岛上最高峰为太平山。
description.en: Hong Kong Island is one of the three main regions of Hong Kong. It was ceded to the United Kingdom under the Treaty of Nanking. As the earliest developed area during Hong Kong's founding, it now serves as the city's political, economic, financial, and commercial center. Its highest point is Victoria Peak.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，现任第六届香港特别行政区行政长官。
description.en: The current Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 最后一任香港总督。

zh-cn: 大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国
en: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland

description.zh-cn: 前香港的宗主国。
中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国省级行政区，由旧直隶省改称而来。
description.en: A province-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China, formerly known as Zhili Province.

description.zh-cn: 已故香港资深影视演员，四朵金花成员之一，担任队长及负责选曲。
description.en: A deceased veteran Hong Kong film and television actress, a member of the Four Golden Flowers, serving as the leader and responsible for song selection.

description.zh-cn: 网红达人。
中华民国国民政府行政院长兼财政部长，亦是银行家及富商，孔子第75代孙。
description.en: A Chinese banker and politician in the Republic of China, he served as Premier and Minister of Finance of the Executive Yuan. He was the 75th generation descendant of Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 张孝骞长期工作和任教的医学院，曾担任副校长等职务。
description.en: The medical school where Zhang Xiaoqian worked and taught for a long time, holding positions such as vice president.

description.zh-cn: 美国黑石集团董事长
清朝第九位皇帝，道光帝之子，孝钦显皇后之夫，光绪帝的伯父及嗣父。他即位后，面对太平天国起事，曾一度想重用林则徐，并罢免了阻挠此事的穆彰阿。作为第二次鸦片战争期间的中国君主，他在英法联军攻入北京后逃往承德避暑山庄，并于次年病逝。他是中国历史上最后一位掌握实际统治权的皇帝。
description.en: The ninth emperor of the Qing dynasty, son of the Daoguang Emperor. After ascending the throne, he faced the Taiping Rebellion and intended to reinstate Lin Zexu, dismissing Mujaangga who opposed the decision. As the reigning monarch of China during the Second Opium War, he fled to the Chengde Mountain Resort after Anglo-French forces entered Beijing and died there the following year.

description.zh-cn: 华人计算机科学家，2000年图灵奖得主，现任清华大学人工智能学院院长、交叉信息研究院院长。
description.en: A Chinese computer scientist, winner of the 2000 Turing Award, and the current Dean of the Institute for Artificial Intelligence and Dean of the Institute for Interdisciplinary Information Sciences at Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 中国汉朝第六位皇帝，汉武帝之父。
西汉第七位皇帝，庙号“世宗”，谥号“孝武皇帝”。他推行“罢黜百家，独尊儒术”，使儒家思想成为官方意识形态，并正式尊《周易》为儒家“五经”之一。在其统治下，征服多个百越王国。晚年多病猜忌，引发巫蛊之祸，错杀太子刘据，逼死皇后卫子夫，后深感后悔。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Western Han dynasty, with the temple name 'Shizong' and posthumous name 'Xiaowu Emperor'. He implemented the policy of 'dismissing the hundred schools of thought and exclusively revering Confucianism', making it the state ideology, and officially revered the I Ching as one of the Confucian 'Five Classics'. Under his reign, he conquered several Baiyue kingdoms. In his later years, due to illness and paranoia, he instigated the Witchcraft Delusion, wrongly executing Crown Prince Liu Ju and forcing Empress Wei Zifu to commit suicide, an act he later deeply regretted.

description.zh-cn: 明末农民起义领袖之一，大西政权的建立者，自称大西皇帝。
description.en: A leader of the peasant rebellions in the late Ming Dynasty and the founder of the Daxi regime.

description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙年间四川按察使。

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央特别行动科

description.zh-cn: 中共党员，因向忠发叛变供出其所在的机要处地址而被捕。
description.en: A CCP member who was arrested after Xiang Zhongfa betrayed the location of the secretarial office where he was.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝嫡长子，卫子夫所生，皇位法定继承人。在巫蛊之祸中，因被江充等人诬陷，无法自辩而被迫起兵，兵败后自缢而死。
description.en: The legitimate eldest son of Emperor Wu of Han and Empress Wei Zifu, and the legal heir to the throne. During the Witchcraft Disaster, he was framed by Jiang Chong and others. Unable to defend himself, he was forced to rebel. After the rebellion failed, he committed suicide by hanging.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝的第二任皇后，太子刘据之母。在巫蛊之祸中支持儿子起兵，兵败后交出皇后玉玺自缢身亡。
description.en: The second empress of Emperor Wu of Han and the mother of Crown Prince Liu Ju. She supported her son's rebellion during the Witchcraft Delusion and committed suicide after its failure.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝幼子，巫蛊之祸后，因其他年长皇子或死或不堪，最终被立为太子并继位为汉昭帝，是西汉第八位皇帝。
description.en: The youngest son of Emperor Wu. After the Witchcraft Delusion, with other elder princes either dead or deemed unworthy, he was made Crown Prince and eventually ascended the throne as Emperor Zhao, becoming the eighth emperor of the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 西汉权臣，霍去病异母弟。在巫蛊之祸中未受牵连，后成为汉武帝的托孤之臣，辅佐汉昭帝，并在昭帝死后拥立汉宣帝，掌握朝政大权。
description.en: A powerful statesman of the Western Han and half-brother of Huo Qubing. He remained unscathed by the Witchcraft Delusion and became one of the regents appointed by Emperor Wu. He assisted Emperor Zhao and later enthroned Emperor Xuan, holding significant power.

description.zh-cn: 西汉儒家学者，建议“罢黜百家，表彰六经”。
西汉将领，兵败投降匈奴。
中国历史上继秦朝之后的大一统王朝，分为西汉和东汉。王莽曾在此担任要职并篡位。此期间，《周易》被尊为“五经”之一。
description.en: A major unified dynasty in Chinese history that succeeded the Qin dynasty, divided into Western Han and Eastern Han. During this period, Wang Mang held important positions and later usurped the throne. The I Ching was also revered as one of the 'Five Classics'.

description.zh-cn: 中国清朝第三位皇帝，也是清朝入关后的第一位皇帝。他是康熙帝之父，孝庄太皇太后之子。他在位期间，对李自成焚毁的紫禁城进行了重建。
description.en: The third emperor of the Qing dynasty and the first to rule after entering the Central Plains via Shanhai Pass. He was the father of Emperor Kangxi and son of Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang. During his reign, he initiated the reconstruction of the Forbidden City which had been burned by Li Zicheng.

description.zh-cn: 顺治帝妃，康熙帝生母。
清朝初年权臣，康熙帝早期的辅政大臣之一。
description.en: A powerful minister in the early Qing dynasty, one of the four regents during the early reign of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 德国耶稣会传教士，与顺治帝建立了私人友谊。
清朝将领
源于孔子思想，由其创立的学术派别，是一个包含哲学、伦理、政治的中国思想体系。它以《论语》为核心经典之一，庄子曾对其部分主张持批评态度。
description.en: Originating from Confucius's thought, and founded by him as an academic school, it is a Chinese system of philosophical, ethical, and political thought. The Analects is one of its core classic texts, and some of its tenets were criticized by Zhuangzi.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝的嫡次子，曾两度被立为皇太子，后被废黜。
description.en: The second son of the Kangxi Emperor, he was twice appointed as Crown Prince and later deposed.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝皇贵妃，雍正帝生母。
description.en: An Imperial Noble Consort of the Kangxi Emperor and the birth mother of the Yongzheng Emperor.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防大学
en: People's Liberation Army National Defense University

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的最高军事学府，王抗平为该校校友。
description.en: The highest military academy of the People's Liberation Army, of which Wang Kangping is an alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军总后勤部副部长。
一份由中国知识分子、维权人士、异见人士等各界人士于2008年发起的宣言，旨在促进中国民主化、改善人权状况，并提出建立中华联邦共和国的构想。
description.en: A declaration initiated in 2008 by Chinese intellectuals, rights activists, dissidents, and others from various sectors, aiming to promote democratization and improve human rights in China, and proposing the establishment of a Federal Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国社会活动家及政治犯，因在西单民主墙发表大字报批评邓小平独裁而长期入狱，后流亡美国。
description.en: A Chinese social activist and political prisoner, imprisoned for a long time for criticizing Deng Xiaoping's dictatorship on the Xidan Democracy Wall, and later exiled to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 数学家，曾任清华大学与西南联合大学数学系主任。
杨振宁的原配妻子，杜聿明长女。
杨振宁的第二任妻子。
美国理论物理学家，曾任普林斯顿高等研究院院长，并在伯克利任教期间领导了曼哈顿计划。
description.en: American theoretical physicist who led the Manhattan Project while a professor at Berkeley.

description.zh-cn: 由杨振宁和李政道提出的关于弱相互作用中宇称不守恒的理论。
核物理学家，中国原子弹研制的关键人物。
明朝第四位皇帝，明成祖朱棣长子，明宣宗之父，朱高煦之兄。
description.en: The fourth Emperor of the Ming dynasty, eldest son of the Yongle Emperor, and elder brother of Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 明朝初年燕王朱棣与建文帝之间的一场因削藩引发的内战，最终燕王朱棣获胜并即位为明成祖。
description.en: A civil war in the early years of the Ming dynasty, resulting in the victory of Zhu Di, the Prince of Yan, who became the Yongle Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代最大的类书，由明成祖朱棣下令编纂，收录了明初之前各种学科的文献资料。
description.en: The largest leishu (a type of reference book) in ancient China, commissioned by the Yongle Emperor of the Ming dynasty. It collected a vast amount of literature and knowledge from before the early Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝的特务与秘密警察机构，由宦官掌管。魏忠贤在天启年间总督东厂，大肆缉捕迫害异己。
description.en: A spy agency of the Ming dynasty, controlled by eunuchs. Wei Zhongxian commanded the Eastern Depot during the Tianqi era, using it to arrest and persecute his opponents.

description.zh-cn: 明代学者、官员、文学家、儒学大师，建文帝时期翰林院侍讲、大臣。在其著作《叶郑传》和《先府君行状》中记载了空印案的相关情况。曾请求诛杀李景隆。靖难之变后因拒绝为朱棣草拟即位诏书而被杀。
description.en: A Ming dynasty scholar, official, literary figure, and renowned Confucian master, who served as a Hanlin Academy lecturer and minister during the Jianwen Emperor's reign. He recorded details about the Empty Seal Case in his works 'Biography of Ye and Zheng' and 'Conduct of My Late Father'. He also requested the execution of Li Jinglong. After the Jingnan Campaign, he was executed for refusing to draft the enthronement edict for Zhu Di.

description.zh-cn: 李景隆，明朝开国功臣李文忠之子，袭封曹国公。作为明朝初期将领，在靖难之役中初期任建文帝方主帅，屡败于燕王朱棣，后于南京开金川门投降。永乐年间被削爵圈禁，并于永乐末年去世。
description.en: Li Jinglong, son of Li Wenzhong, a founding duke of the Ming Dynasty, inherited the title Duke of Cao. As an early Ming general, he served as the chief commander of the Jianwen Emperor's forces during the early stages of the Jingnan campaign, suffering repeated defeats against Zhu Di, the Prince of Yan. He later surrendered by opening the Jinchuan Gate in Nanjing. He was stripped of his title and placed under house arrest during the Yongle era, and passed away towards the end of the Yongle reign.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖出兵攻占安南并设立郡县的军事行动。
明成祖朱棣第二子，明仁宗朱高炽之弟。初封高阳王，后晋封汉王。因发动“高煦之乱”谋反失败，被明宣宗废为庶人并以炮烙之刑处死。
description.en: The second son of the Yongle Emperor Zhu Di of the Ming Dynasty, and brother of the Hongxi Emperor. He was first enfeoffed as the Prince of Gaoyang, and later as the Prince of Han. He was executed by the Xuande Emperor after his failed rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖朱棣三子，明仁宗朱高炽之弟，封赵简王。
description.en: Third son of the Yongle Emperor, brother of the Hongxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 奉系军阀将领，张作霖的结拜兄弟，满洲国第二任国务总理大臣。
奉系军阀将领，张作霖的结拜兄弟。
中国政治人物。
中国1989年六四事件学生运动领袖之一。事件后遭通缉并流亡海外，先后在法国、美国求学和居住。现为网络“六四档案”、“孙文学校”创办人，柴玲前夫。
description.en: One of the student leaders of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests in China. He became a wanted fugitive after the event and went into exile, studying and residing in France and the United States. He is the founder of the 'June 4th Archive' website and the 'Sun Yat-sen School' online, and the ex-husband of Chai Ling.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任深圳市市长。

zh-cn: 卡瑟姆若马尔特·托卡耶夫

description.zh-cn: 哈萨克斯坦总统。

zh-cn: 2022年新疆乌鲁木齐高层住宅楼火灾

description.zh-cn: 一起引发公众对防疫政策不满的火灾事件。
于2025年成为金砖伙伴国。
清朝第十位皇帝，孝钦显皇后与咸丰帝的独子，光绪帝的堂兄。
咸丰帝皇后，与慈禧太后一同垂帘听政。
清朝宗室，康熙帝第八子，雍正帝异母弟，也是其政治对手。因参与九子夺嫡，被雍正帝圈禁，改名阿其那，后在禁所病故。人称“八贤王”。他曾获清朝亲王爵位。
description.en: An imperial prince of the Qing dynasty, the eighth son of the Kangxi Emperor and a half-brother of the Yongzheng Emperor. Due to his involvement in the nine sons' succession struggle, he was imprisoned by the Yongzheng Emperor, forced to change his name to Akina, and later died in confinement. He was known as the 'Eighth Virtuous Prince'. He once held a princely title of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝第九子，雍正帝的政治对手。
description.en: The ninth son of the Kangxi Emperor and a political rival of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝第十四子，雍正帝同母弟。
description.en: The fourteenth son of the Kangxi Emperor, a full brother of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，康熙帝第十三子，雍正帝异母弟、得力助手。清朝有史以来第九位铁帽子王，也是第一位因功受封的铁帽子王。雍正帝即位后，改名允祥，逝世后获准改回原名。谥号“贤”。
description.en: An imperial prince of the Qing dynasty, the 13th son of the Kangxi Emperor and a half-brother of the Yongzheng Emperor, and a key assistant to him. He was the 9th iron-cap prince in Qing history and the first to be granted the title for merit. He changed his name to Yunxiang after the Yongzheng Emperor's accession, and was allowed to revert to his original name posthumously. His posthumous name was 'Xian'.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝第三子。
康熙帝第十子。
清朝将领，雍正时期重臣，后被雍正帝赐死。
description.en: An important official during the Yongzheng era of the Qing Dynasty, later forced to commit suicide by the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙、雍正两朝重臣，佟国维之子，康熙帝表弟，孝懿仁皇后之弟，雍正帝舅舅。
description.en: An important official during the Kangxi and Yongzheng eras of the Qing Dynasty, son of Tung-gowei, cousin of the Kangxi Emperor, younger brother of Empress Xiaoyiren, and uncle of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙末年，九位皇子争夺皇位的历史事件。
description.en: A historical event during the late Kangxi era of the Qing dynasty where nine of his sons vied for the throne.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市东城区
location.en: Dongcheng District, Beijing, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 位于北京中轴线中心的宫殿建筑群，是中国明清两代二十四位皇帝的皇家宫殿。始建于1406年，1420年落成，是世界上现存规模最大、最完整的宫殿型建筑。孝庄太皇太后曾在此长期居住并逝世。现为故宫博物院所在地。
description.en: The palace complex at the center of Beijing's central axis served as the imperial palace for 24 emperors of the Ming and Qing dynasties. Construction started in 1406 and was completed in 1420, making it the world's largest and most complete preserved palace complex. Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang resided here for a long time and passed away. It now houses the Palace Museum.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝，唐高宗李治与武则天之幼子，唐玄宗李隆基之父，李显和安定公主之弟。他曾两次登基、两次禅位，是唐朝第五位和第九位皇帝。
description.en: An emperor of the Tang dynasty, the youngest son of Emperor Gaozong Li Zhi and Empress Wu Zetian, father of Emperor Xuanzong Li Longji, and younger brother of Li Xian and Princess Anding. He ascended the throne twice and abdicated twice, serving as the fifth and ninth emperor of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上唯一获正史承认的女性皇帝，武周皇帝，唐玄宗的祖母。她也是安定公主的母亲，在公主出生时为唐高宗的昭仪。
description.en: The only female emperor in Chinese history recognized by official history, Empress of the Wu Zhou dynasty, and grandmother of Emperor Xuanzong of Tang. She was also the mother of Princess Anding and Emperor Gaozong's Zhaoyi when the princess was born.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝宰相，杨贵妃的堂兄。与安禄山不和，是安史之乱的导火索之一，后在马嵬驿兵变中被杀。
description.en: Chancellor of the Tang Dynasty and cousin of Imperial Consort Yang. His conflict with An Lushan was a major catalyst for the rebellion, and he was killed during the Mawei Mutiny.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝公主，唐高宗李治与武则天的小女儿，唐玄宗的姑姑，安定公主的同胞妹妹。她曾与李隆基发生政治斗争。
description.en: A princess of the Tang dynasty, the youngest daughter of Emperor Gaozong Li Zhi and Empress Wu Zetian, an aunt of Emperor Xuanzong, and a full sister of Princess Anding. She was involved in a political struggle with Li Longji.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗时期宰相，因其“口蜜腹剑”的权术而著称。他为巩固自身权位，建议重用胡人将领，间接导致安禄山势力坐大，为安史之乱埋下隐患。
description.en: A chancellor during Emperor Xuanzong's reign, known for his 'sweet words and treacherous heart' (口蜜腹剑). To consolidate his own power, he advocated for the heavy use of non-Han generals, which indirectly led to An Lushan's growing influence and laid the groundwork for the An Lushan Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝是由李渊建立的中国历史上的一个重要朝代，被认为是中国的黄金时代之一，也是安定公主生活的时代背景。其国力因安史之乱由盛转衰。著名诗人白居易在此期间生活并担任官职。唐昭宗是其晚期的皇帝。
description.en: The Tang Dynasty, founded by Li Yuan, was an important period in Chinese history and is considered one of China's golden ages, and also the historical context for Princess Anding's life. Its national power declined from its peak due to the An Lushan Rebellion. The renowned poet Bai Juyi lived and served as an official during this era. Emperor Zhaozong was one of its late rulers.

description.zh-cn: 英国首都及最大都市，英格兰首府。由罗马人于公元43年建立，现为世界领先的全球城市之一，在艺术、商业、教育、金融、媒体、旅游和交通方面具有显著地位。这里也是马克思长期流亡、进行研究和最终逝世的地方。
description.en: The capital and largest city of the United Kingdom and England. Founded by the Romans in 43 AD, it is now one of the world's leading global cities, with significant influence in arts, commerce, education, finance, media, tourism, and transport. It is also the place where Marx lived in exile for a long time, conducted his research, and eventually died.

description.zh-cn: 1841年授予马克思哲学博士学位的大学。
description.en: The university that awarded Marx his PhD in Philosophy in 1841.

zh-cn: 格奥尔格·威廉·弗里德里希·黑格尔

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家，德国古典哲学的集大成者。其辩证法思想对马克思产生了深远影响。他曾批评《论语》为常识道德，并无出色之处。
description.en: A German philosopher and a major figure in German idealism. His dialectical method profoundly influenced Marx. He was also critical of the Analects, considering its content to be common-sense morality with nothing outstanding.

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰古典政治经济学家和哲学家，被誉为“经济学之父”，其自由市场经济理论影响了福泽谕吉。
description.en: A Scottish classical political economist and philosopher, known as 'The Father of Economics', whose theories on free-market economy influenced Fukuzawa Yukichi.

description.zh-cn: 张献忠养子。
明朝兵部尚书。
清朝肃亲王，皇太极长子，曾与多尔衮争夺皇位。
description.en: The eldest son of Hong Taiji, who contended with Dorgon for the throne.

description.zh-cn: 明朝灭亡后，由明朝宗室在南方建立的政权。
香港政治人物，2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举候选人。曾任香港特别行政区政务司司长、财政司司长。
description.en: Hong Kong politician, candidate in the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election. He previously served as Chief Secretary for Administration and Financial Secretary of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末代皇帝溥仪的嫡妻和皇后，亦是满洲国皇后。
description.en: The primary consort and empress of Puyi, the last emperor of the Qing Dynasty, and also the empress of Manchukuo.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末代皇帝溥仪的淑妃，后与溥仪离婚。她是中国历史上唯一一位担任过教职的皇妃。
description.en: The Shu Fei (Consort Shu) of Puyi, the last emperor of the Qing Dynasty, whom she later divorced. She is the only imperial consort in Chinese history to have worked as a schoolteacher.

description.zh-cn: 溥仪的福贵人。
溥仪的堂侄与嗣子。

en: International Military Tribunal for the Far East

description.zh-cn: 二战后审判日本甲级战犯的国际法庭。

en: United States Department of Foreign Affairs

location.zh-cn: 美国华盛顿特区哈里·S·杜鲁门大楼
location.en: Harry S. Truman Building, Washington, D.C., United States

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府负责外交事务的行政部门，等同于世界各国的“外交部”。其前身是美国第一个联邦外交机构，成立于1789年7月21日，至同年9月15日被国务院取代。该部门曾邀请张孝骞赴美考察讲学。
description.en: The federal executive department of the United States responsible for foreign policy and international relations, equivalent to the foreign ministry of other countries. Its predecessor was the first federal foreign affairs agency of the United States, established on July 21, 1789, and superseded by the Department of State on September 15, 1789. This department also invited Zhang Xiaoqian to the United States for an academic tour.

description.zh-cn: 本名倪聪，香港作家、编剧、评论家、演员，与金庸、黄沾、蔡澜并列为“香港四大才子”。他是亦舒的胞兄，也是古龙的莫逆之交。其作品以科幻小说《卫斯理系列》最为人所知，并以其鲜明的反共政治立场而闻名。
description.en: Ni Kuang, born Ni Cong, was a Hong Kong writer, screenwriter, critic, and actor, known as one of the 'Four Great Talents of Hong Kong', alongside Jin Yong, Wong Jim, and Chua Lam. He was the elder brother of Yi Shu and a very close friend of Gu Long. His works are best known for the science fiction series 'Wisely Series', and he was also famous for his outspoken anti-communist political stance.

description.zh-cn: 原福州军区政治部副主任，曾任驻福建的第三十一军政委。
李连杰的前妻
李连杰的妻子
香港电影导演、编剧、监制及演员，香港电影新浪潮的重要人物之一。
民国时期，由李宗仁、白崇禧等人领导的桂系军阀派系。
description.en: A Guangxi warlord clique during the Republic of China era, led by Li Zongren, Bai Chongxi, and others.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代画家、美术教育家
中国周朝时期位于今山东省的一个重要诸侯国，也是孔子和子路的家乡。
description.en: A major vassal state during the Zhou dynasty of ancient China, located in modern-day Shandong province, and the homeland of Confucius and Zi Lu.

description.zh-cn: 道家学派的创始人，被道教奉为道祖、教主，其思想对庄周产生了深远影响。
description.en: Founder of the Taoist school of thought, whose ideas profoundly influenced Zhuang Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期鲁国人，孔子最得意的弟子，位列孔门十哲和七十二贤之首，后世尊称为“复圣”。
description.en: A native of the State of Lu during the Spring and Autumn period, he was Confucius's most favored disciple, ranked first among the Ten Wise Ones of Confucianism and the Seventy-two Disciples. He is posthumously honored as the 'Continuator Sage'.

description.zh-cn: 孔子著名弟子，孔门十哲之一。以其勇武、忠诚、信守承诺而著称。曾任卫国蒲邑宰、大夫孔悝的家臣，在卫国内乱中为救孔悝而殉职。
description.en: A prominent disciple of Confucius and one of the Ten Philosophers of the Confucian school. Known for his bravery, loyalty, and trustworthiness. He served as the governor of Pu in the state of Wei and as a retainer to the grand master Kong Kui, and died during a coup in Wei while trying to save his lord.

description.zh-cn: 李锐之女，传记作家、机械工程师，斯坦福大学胡佛研究所客座研究员。
description.en: Daughter of Li Rui, a biographer, mechanical engineer, and visiting fellow at the Hoover Institution, Stanford University.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东长子毛岸英的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Mao Zedong's eldest son, Mao Anying.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府的决策局，负责维持公共秩序、出入境、海关、监狱、禁毒、纪律部队及内部保安等事务。该决策局曾提出《逃犯条例》修订草案。
description.en: The policy bureau of the Hong Kong SAR government, responsible for public order, immigration, customs, prisons, drug control, disciplined services, and internal security. This bureau proposed the extradition bill amendment.

description.zh-cn: 源自美国的全球最大视频分享网站，于2006年被Google收购，现为Google子公司。
description.en: The world's largest video-sharing website, acquired by Google in 2006.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲联盟的立法机构，同时是其下议院和唯一直接民选机构。该机构曾于1996年授予魏京生萨哈罗夫奖，并在2023年将萨哈罗夫奖追授给玛莎·阿米尼和“女性、生命、自由”运动，同时通过决议谴责伊朗政府。
description.en: The legislative body of the European Union, also its lower house and the only directly elected institution. It awarded the Sakharov Prize to Wei Jingsheng in 1996, and posthumously awarded the 2023 Sakharov Prize to Mahsa Amini and the 'Woman, Life, Freedom' movement, while also passing a resolution condemning the Iranian government.

description.zh-cn: 泰国总理
中华人民共和国的国家电视台，2018年并入新组建的中央广播电视总台。崔永元和芮成钢都曾在此工作，该台也播出了王林清的电视认罪画面。
description.en: China's national television broadcaster. In 2018, it was merged into the newly established China Media Group. Cui Yongyuan and Rui Chenggang formerly worked here, and the station also broadcasted Wang Linqing's televised confession.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯国防部长。
清朝皇帝，乾隆帝第十五子。他是中国清朝的第七位皇帝，也是清军入关后的第五位皇帝。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Qing dynasty, the 15th son of the Qianlong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 中国清朝乾隆帝第二任皇后
大学士，雍正帝遗命的辅政大臣之一。
清朝中期名将、重臣。
乾隆帝皇长子。
原重庆市公安局常务局长、副局长、司法局局长，在薄熙来发起的“打黑”运动中被查处并判处死刑。
description.en: Former Executive Deputy Director, Deputy Director of the Chongqing Public Security Bureau, and Director of the Justice Bureau, who was investigated and sentenced to death during the 'strike black' campaign initiated by Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共重庆市委副书记、重庆市市长。在薄熙来主政重庆期间，他长期担任市长一职，是重庆经济发展的重要人物。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Deputy Secretary of the Chongqing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China and Mayor of Chongqing. During Bo Xilai's tenure in Chongqing, he served as Mayor for a long time and was a key figure in the city's economic development.

description.zh-cn: 美国推行的贸易保护主义法案，提高了关税，被认为加剧了全球贸易崩溃和大萧条。
在德国兴起的一种极权主义意识形态，具体表现为与纳粹党相关的意识形态和实践。
description.en: A totalitarian ideology that emerged in Germany, specifically manifested as the ideology and practices associated with the Nazi Party.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大是一个位于北美洲北部的联邦制、君主立宪制及议会制国家，亦是英联邦和法语国家及地区国际组织的成员。其政府近期谴责伊朗镇压示威，并对伊朗道德警察及其他官员实施了制裁。
description.en: Canada is a federal, constitutional monarchy and parliamentary country located in northern North America, and is a member of the Commonwealth of Nations and the Organisation internationale de la Francophonie. Its government recently condemned Iran's crackdown on protests and imposed sanctions on Iran's morality police and other officials.

description.zh-cn: 大洋洲国家。其联邦政府于2021年废除了维多利亚州与中国签订的“一带一路”协议。邓亮洪曾在此寻求政治庇护。
description.en: An Oceanian country. Its federal government abolished the "Belt and Road" agreement signed by Victoria with China in 2021. Tang Liang Hong once sought political asylum here.

description.zh-cn: 美国的中央银行系统，在威尔逊总统任内通过《联邦储备法案》而建立。
description.en: The central banking system of the United States, created during the presidency of Woodrow Wilson with the enactment of the Federal Reserve Act.

description.zh-cn: 美国第31任总统，在大萧条开始时就任，并在1932年选举中被罗斯福击败。
description.en: 31st President of the United States, defeated by Roosevelt in the 1932 election.

description.zh-cn: 英国经济学家，凯恩斯主义的创始人。
奥地利裔德国政治人物，纳粹党领袖，1933年至1945年间担任德国总理和元首。作为第二次世界大战的发动者和墨索里尼在二战中的主要盟友，其崛起与大萧条密切相关。1944年盟军接近巴黎时，他曾下令摧毁埃菲尔铁塔及城市。
description.en: Austrian-born German politician and leader of the Nazi Party, who served as Chancellor and Führer of Germany from 1933 to 1945. As the initiator of World War II and Mussolini's main ally, his rise was closely linked to the Great Depression. In 1944, as the Allies approached Paris, he ordered the destruction of the Eiffel Tower and the city.

description.zh-cn: 路易十六的王后，奥地利皇帝的妹妹。
统治法国的君主王朝，在法国大革命中被推翻。
中国共产党内部对改革开放持保留或反对态度的政治派别。在八六学潮后，该派系将学潮归咎于胡耀邦的纵容，并成功施压使其下台。
description.en: A political faction within the Communist Party of China. After the 1986 student demonstrations, this faction blamed the protests on Hu Yaobang's leniency and successfully pressured him into resigning.

description.zh-cn: 意大利政治家、记者，国家法西斯党领袖，法西斯主义创始人。他于1922年至1943年担任意大利王国首相，期间代表意大利王国签署了《拉特兰条约》，并于1943年至1945年担任意大利社会共和国的国家元首。
description.en: Italian politician and journalist who founded and led the National Fascist Party. He was Prime Minister of Italy from 1922 to 1943, during which he signed the Lateran Treaty on behalf of Italy, and Duce of the Italian Social Republic from 1943 to 1945.

description.zh-cn: 由协约国与德国签订，正式结束第一次世界大战的和平条约。条约内容不仅包含建立国际联盟和对德国施加的严厉条款，其中关于山东问题的条款也引发了中国的五四运动。
description.en: The most important peace treaty signed between the Allied Powers and Germany that officially brought World War I to an end. It included the covenant for the League of Nations, and its clauses concerning the Shandong Problem also triggered the May Fourth Movement in China.

description.zh-cn: 西班牙国民军领袖，后成为西班牙独裁者。
1918年至1992年间存在的中欧国家。
description.en: A Central European country that existed from 1918 to 1992.

description.zh-cn: 因中巴经济走廊穿越其主权争议地区而多次反对“一带一路”倡议，并且是金砖国家创始成员国。
欧洲国家，欧盟创始成员国之一，梵蒂冈城邦位于其首都罗马市内。曾是七国集团中首个加入“一带一路”倡议的国家，但于2023年宣布退出。
description.en: A European country and an EU founding member, within whose capital, Rome, Vatican City is located. It was the first G7 country to join the 'Belt and Road Initiative', but announced its withdrawal in 2023.

description.zh-cn: 于2023年10月宣布退出“一带一路”倡议。
微软公司创始人，曾任董事长，“一带一路”计划的明确支持者，并将屠呦呦获得诺贝尔奖列为2015年的好消息之一。
description.en: Founder and former chairman of Microsoft Corporation, a clear supporter of the 'Belt and Road' initiative, who listed Tu Youyou's Nobel Prize win as one of the good news stories of 2015.

description.zh-cn: 四川总督
奥匈帝国是一个存在于1867年至1918年间的中欧二元君主国，由奥地利帝国和匈牙利王国组成。弗朗茨·斐迪南是其皇储，梅耶林惨案发生于该国。
description.en: Austria-Hungary was a dual monarchy in Central Europe from 1867 to 1918, consisting of the Austrian Empire and the Kingdom of Hungary. Franz Ferdinand was its heir presumptive, and the Mayerling incident took place there.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·路德维希大公的长子，在其父放弃继承权后成为奥匈帝国推定继承人，后于萨拉热窝被刺杀，引发第一次世界大战。
description.en: The eldest son of Archduke Karl Ludwig. He became the heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne after his father renounced his rights. His assassination in Sarajevo triggered World War I.

description.zh-cn: 前苏联加盟共和国，于1990年3月11日率先宣布独立。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第八十三集团军
约翰·菲茨杰拉德·肯尼迪

description.zh-cn: 第35任美国总统，1961年至1963年任职，任内处理了古巴导弹危机等重大事件，1963年11月22日在达拉斯遇刺身亡。
description.en: The 35th President of the United States, serving from 1961 until his assassination in 1963. His presidency included handling major events like the Cuban Missile Crisis. He was assassinated on November 22, 1963, in Dallas.

birth_place.zh-cn: 布鲁克莱恩 (马萨诸塞州)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家安全部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管国家安全的组成部门。
中国人民解放军空军上将，曾任空军司令员。
中华人民共和国提出的关于通过军事手段统一台湾的政治概念。
description.en: A political concept proposed by the People's Republic of China regarding the unification of Taiwan by military means.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆艺术家、社会活动家及异见人士，诗人艾青之子，活跃于建筑、艺术、影像和社会文化评论领域。他曾因调查川震遇难学生名单，其志愿者屡受地方政府扣留。
description.en: A Chinese contemporary artist, activist, and dissident. He is the son of poet Ai Qing and is active in the fields of architecture, art, film, and social and cultural criticism. He is notable for his investigation into the student casualties of the Sichuan earthquake, a process during which his volunteers were repeatedly detained by local authorities.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜半岛历史上的一个王朝，统治时间为1392年至1897年。它最初亲明，后在丁卯战争中被迫与后金结盟。当时是朝鲜半岛的统治政权，名义上为清朝的藩属国，是战争爆发的核心争端地区，并在征韩论时期采取锁国政策。在福泽谕吉的《脱亚论》中被视为应与之“绝交”的“恶友”。
description.en: A Korean dynastic kingdom that ruled the Korean Peninsula from 1392 to 1897. It was initially pro-Ming but was forced into an alliance with the Later Jin after the First Manchu invasion of Korea. It was the ruling power on the Korean peninsula at that time, nominally a vassal state of the Qing dynasty, and a core disputed area for the outbreak of war. During the Seikanron debate, it adopted a policy of isolationism. It was also regarded by Fukuzawa Yukichi in 'Datsu-A Ron' as a 'bad friend' with whom Japan should break ties.

description.zh-cn: 清朝与日本在甲午战争后签订的不平等条约。该条约导致中国割地赔款并丧失多项主权，同时规定重庆成为向日本开放的内陆通商口岸之一。
description.en: An unequal treaty signed between the Qing dynasty and Japan after the First Sino-Japanese War. It resulted in China ceding territory, paying indemnities, losing sovereignty, and stipulated that Chongqing would become one of the inland treaty ports opened to Japan.

description.zh-cn: 北洋水师提督，在威海卫之战后自杀殉国。
日本第122代天皇，大日本帝国第一代大元帅。作为国家元首，他在甲午战争和日俄战争期间积极推动军事扩张，并见证了日本从孤立的封建国家向工业化世界强国的转变。
description.en: The 122nd Emperor of Japan and the first Grand Marshal of the Empire of Japan. As head of state, he actively promoted military expansion during the First Sino-Japanese War and the Russo-Japanese War, and witnessed Japan's transformation from an isolated feudal state into an industrialized world power.

description.zh-cn: 日本近代政治家，明治维新元老，曾四次担任日本内阁总理大臣（亦是首任）。他曾于甲午战争期间担任日本首相，并任首任统监府统监。戊戌政变后，他帮助梁启超成功逃亡至日本。
description.en: Japanese modern politician and Meiji Restoration elder, who served four terms as Prime Minister of Japan (also the first). He served as Prime Minister during the First Sino-Japanese War and was the first Resident-General of Korea. After the Wuxu Coup, he helped Liang Qichao successfully escape to Japan.

description.zh-cn: 清朝户部尚书，曾奏准暂停海军购买外洋枪炮船只。
蔡英文政府首任行政院院长，其内阁上任后撤回对126名占领行政院行动者的刑事告诉。
太平天国早期核心领袖、东王，掌握军政实权，后在天京事变中被杀。
太平天国早期核心领袖，被封为翼王。因天京事变及洪秀全猜忌而出走。

en: Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea

description.zh-cn: 1919年至1948年间在朝鲜日治时期于中国上海成立的流亡政府。
description.en: An exile government established in Shanghai, China during the Japanese colonial period, active from 1919 to 1948.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国前总统，韩国民主运动领袖，金泳三的继任总统。他曾推行“阳光政策”，并与金泳三、金钟泌并称为“三金”，在韩国政坛上既是竞争对手也是合作伙伴。其三个儿子也曾担任国会议员。
description.en: A leader of the South Korean democracy movement and Kim Young-sam's successor as president of the Republic of Korea. He implemented the 'Sunshine Policy'. Along with Kim Young-sam and Kim Jong-pil, he was one of the 'Three Kims,' who were both rivals and partners in South Korean politics. His three sons also served as members of the National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 韩国史上首位女性总统，后遭弹劾下台。
韩国共同民主党党代表，强烈反对2024年戒严令，并呼吁民众保护国会。他本人也在尹锡悦的计划逮捕名单上。
description.en: Leader of the Democratic Party of Korea, who strongly opposed the 2024 martial law, called on citizens to protect the National Assembly, and was on Yoon Suk Yeol's planned arrest list.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的第三代最高领导人，金正日之子。现任朝鲜劳动党总书记和国务委员会委员长，并于2018年与文在寅共同签署了《板门店宣言》。
description.en: The third supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, son of Kim Jong-il. He is currently serving as the General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and Chairman of the State Affairs Commission, and co-signed the Panmunjom Declaration with Moon Jae-in in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国的立法机关，是韩国三权分立宪政体制中的重要组成部分。在2024年戒严期间，国会议员集会并通过决议，成功废除了戒严令。
description.en: The legislative body of the Republic of Korea, an important component of the country's constitutional system of separation of powers. During the 2024 martial law, its members convened and passed a resolution to successfully nullify the martial law decree.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国宪法裁判机构。
韩国政治人物，现任韩国国会议长。2024年戒严期间，他召集国会会议，并宣布废除戒严令的决议获通过。
description.en: South Korean politician and current Speaker of the National Assembly. During the 2024 martial law, he convened a session of the National Assembly and announced the passage of the resolution to nullify it.

description.zh-cn: 德国政治人物，德国候任总理。
德国政治家、外交家，首任德意志帝国首相。因其“铁血政策”而被称为“铁血宰相”，通过一系列战争主导了德意志的统一。
description.en: A German statesman and diplomat, and the first Chancellor of the German Empire. Known as the 'Iron Chancellor' for his 'iron and blood' policy, he orchestrated the unification of Germany through a series of wars.

description.zh-cn: 普鲁士国王及首任德意志皇帝。
description.en: King of Prussia and the first German Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 罗马公教会。
德国主要政党之一。
德国主要政党之一。
光绪帝的妃嫔。
光绪帝的妃嫔，珍妃之姐。
清朝第八位皇帝，光绪帝和载沣的祖父，咸丰帝之父。其在位期间爆发了第一次鸦片战争。在鸦片问题上，他最初支持林则徐的严禁政策并下令终止鸦片贸易，但在战争爆发后态度转变，将林则徐革职。
description.en: The eighth emperor of the Qing dynasty, grandfather of Guangxu and Zaifeng, and father of Xianfeng. During his reign, the First Opium War broke out. On the opium issue, he initially supported Lin Zexu's strict prohibition policy and ordered him to end the opium trade, but changed his stance after the war's outbreak, leading to Lin's dismissal.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期秦国蜀郡郡守，主持修建了都江堰。
description.en: The governor of Shu Commandery in the State of Qin during the Warring States period, who presided over the construction of Dujiangyan.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉开国皇帝，刘禅之父。他被张松视为可以取代刘璋的明主，并在张松的协助下进入益州，最终夺取了该地。
description.en: Founding emperor of Shu Han, father of Liu Shan. He was seen by Zhang Song as a worthy ruler to replace Liu Zhang, and with Zhang Song's assistance, he entered Yi Province and eventually seized control of it.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉是中国历史上三国时期西南方的国家之一，由刘备建立，国号为“汉”。在《三国演义》中，作者以蜀汉为中心，体现了“尊刘反曹”的倾向。
description.en: Shu Han was one of the three major states that competed for supremacy over China in the Three Kingdoms period, located in southwestern China, founded by Liu Bei with the official state name of 'Han'. In 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms', the narrative centers on Shu Han, reflecting a pro-Liu, anti-Cao bias.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏将领，率军灭亡蜀汉。
description.en: A general of Cao Wei who led the conquest of Shu Han.

zh-cn: 联合国教育、科学及文化组织

description.zh-cn: 联合国的专门机构之一，旨在通过教育、科学和文化促进国际合作。巩俐于2000年被任命为该组织的“促进和平艺术家”。
description.en: A specialized agency of the United Nations aimed at promoting international cooperation through education, science, and culture. Gong Li was appointed as a UNESCO Artist for Peace in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 南宋第三位皇帝。因即位前藩封于恭州（重庆古称），即位后认为这是“双重喜庆”，遂将恭州升格并赐名“重庆”。
description.en: The third emperor of the Southern Song dynasty. Before his accession, he was enfeoffed in Gongzhou (the ancient name of Chongqing). After ascending the throne, he considered this a 'double celebration' and thus elevated Gongzhou's status and renamed it 'Chongqing'.

description.zh-cn: 南宋第二位皇帝，宋高宗养子及继承人，宋太祖后裔。他为岳飞平反，是宋光宗赵惇之父。
description.en: The second emperor of the Southern Song dynasty, adopted son and successor of Emperor Gaozong, and a descendant of Emperor Taizu. He rehabilitated Yue Fei and was the father of Emperor Guangzong (Zhao Dun).

description.zh-cn: 战国时期秦国政治家。灭巴国后屯兵江州，修筑江州城，为史载重庆建城之始。
description.en: A politician of the Qin state during the Warring States period. After conquering the state of Ba, he stationed troops in Jiangzhou and built the city wall, marking the recorded beginning of Chongqing's city construction.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期秦国君主，秦朝开国皇帝，中国历史上首位完成华夏大一统的政治人物，也是中国首位称皇帝的君主。他下令实施“焚书坑儒”，导致《论语》等经典几近失传。
description.en: The first political figure to complete the unification of China, and the first monarch in China to be titled 'Emperor'. He also ordered the 'Burning of books and burying of scholars', which nearly led to the loss of classics like the Analects.

description.zh-cn: 南越国创建者，原为秦朝将领。
description.en: Founder of the Nanyue kingdom, originally a general of the Qin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 由秦朝将领赵佗在岭南地区建立的政权，领有今日广东、广西、海南及越南北部。
description.en: A kingdom founded by the Qin general Zhao Tuo in the Lingnan region, covering present-day Guangdong, Guangxi, Hainan, and northern Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 19世纪中叶，清朝与英国及法国等西方列强之间发生两场冲突，即第一次鸦片战争（1840-1842年）和第二次鸦片战争。其中，第一次鸦片战争是大清帝国与英国之间的战争，直接导致香港岛被割让。清政府战败后，刺激其推行洋务运动，并开启了第二阶段的西学东渐。
description.en: A series of two conflicts occurred between the Qing dynasty and Western powers (primarily Britain and France) in the mid-19th century: the First Opium War (1840-1842) and the Second Opium War. The First Opium War, a conflict between the Qing Empire and the United Kingdom, directly led to the cession of Hong Kong Island. The Qing government's defeat stimulated the launch of the Self-Strengthening Movement, initiating the second phase of the West-to-East knowledge transfer.

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期的政权之一，位于现广东、广西、海南、香港、澳门以及越南北部，后于971年被北宋所灭。
description.en: One of the states during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period, located in modern-day Guangdong, Guangxi, Hainan, Hong Kong, Macau, and northern Vietnam. It was conquered by the Northern Song dynasty in 971.

description.zh-cn: 1945年由胡志明宣布成立，通常被称为北越。该国是越南战争中的一方，曾向中国请求抗疟药物援助。
description.en: A state proclaimed by Hồ Chí Minh in 1945, commonly known as North Vietnam. It was a party in the Vietnam War that requested antimalarial drug assistance from China.

description.zh-cn: 1955年由吴廷琰建立的国家，通常被称为南越，在越南战争中与北越对峙。
description.en: A state established by Ngô Đình Diệm in 1955, commonly known as South Vietnam, which opposed North Vietnam during the Vietnam War.

description.zh-cn: 前越南共产党中央委员会总书记、越南社会主义共和国主席。
阮朝末代君主，越南帝国及越南国君主/国家元首。
越南历史上最后一个君主制王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国的创建者及首任皇帝（大汗），后被元朝追尊为元太祖，是蒙哥的祖父。
description.en: The founder and first Great Khan of the Mongol Empire, and the grandfather of Möngke Khan.

description.zh-cn: 中国古典文献之一，古代中国用于推演未来吉凶祸福的卜筮书。自汉代开始被尊奉为“五经”之一，其中心思想是用阴阳符号构成的六十四卦象代表世间万物的运行状态。同时，它也是元朝国号“大元”的出处。
description.en: One of the Chinese classic texts, an ancient Chinese divination text used to predict future fortunes. It has been revered as one of the 'Five Classics' since the Han Dynasty. Its central idea is to use the 64 hexagrams, composed of yin and yang symbols, to represent the state of all things in the world. Additionally, it is the source of the Yuan dynasty's name 'Dayuan'.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝的南迁政权，是中国南方的汉人政权，是宋朝的后半期，由宋高宗赵构建立。蒙哥在位期间曾对其发动大规模进攻，最终被元朝所灭。
