description.zh-cn: 王震接替乌兰夫出任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Wang Zhen succeeded Ulanhu as the Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 布赫是乌兰夫的长子。
description.en: Buhe is the eldest son of Ulanhu.

description.zh-cn: 在北京蒙藏学校学习期间，在李大钊、赵世炎、邓中夏等共产党人的帮助下，乌兰夫参加了马克思主义研究小组。
description.en: During his studies at the Mongolian and Tibetan School in Beijing, with the help of communists like Li Dazhao, Zhao Shiyan, and Deng Zhongxia, Ulanhu joined a Marxism study group.

description.zh-cn: “文化大革命”开始后，乌兰夫因“内人党”问题被批斗，并被撤销党政军领导职务软禁于北京。
description.en: After the start of the 'Cultural Revolution', Ulanhu was persecuted over the 'Inner Mongolian People's Party' issue, removed from his party, government, and military leadership positions, and placed under house arrest in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫在文革期间受到国务院总理周恩来的保护。
description.en: Ulanhu was protected by Premier Zhou Enlai during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 根据中共中央主席毛泽东的意见，乌兰夫等13位老干部被宣布解放。
description.en: According to the opinion of CPC Chairman Mao Zedong, Ulanhu and 12 other veteran cadres were declared liberated.

description.zh-cn: 在廖承志逝世后，中共中央政治局召开扩大会议，决定由乌兰夫替补为国家副主席候选人。
description.en: After the death of Liao Chengzhi, the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee held an enlarged meeting and decided that Ulanhu would be the replacement candidate for Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 因李景隆举止雍容华贵而多次瞩目于他。
信任李景隆，在耿炳文战败后任命其为大将军，北伐燕王。
在靖难之役中，作为建文帝的大将军，与燕王朱棣为敌对关系，并屡次败于朱棣。
与谷王朱橞开金川门投降，归顺燕王朱棣。
永乐二年（1404年），在周王朱橚及群臣的弹劾下，朱棣下令削去李景隆的爵位，将其全家软禁。
description.en: In 1404, following accusations by Prince of Zhou Zhu Su and other officials, Zhu Di ordered that Li Jinglong be stripped of his title and his entire family placed under house arrest.

description.zh-cn: 在燕军渡江后，请求建文帝诛杀李景隆。
宋哲元接替于右任担任陕西省政府主席。
description.en: Song Zheyuan succeeded Yu Youren as the Chairman of the Shaanxi Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 代表中国国民党赴苏联促使冯玉祥回国参加国民革命军北伐。
description.en: On behalf of the Kuomintang, traveled to the Soviet Union to persuade Feng Yuxiang to return to China and participate in the Northern Expedition.

description.zh-cn: 1982年，时任首相马哈迪·莫哈末邀请安华加入执政党巫统，开启了安华的政府官职生涯。
description.en: In 1982, then-Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad invited Anwar to join the ruling party UMNO, launching Anwar's career in government.

description.zh-cn: 1998年9月2日，首相马哈迪·莫哈末革除了安华的副首相兼财政部长职位。
description.en: On September 2, 1998, Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad dismissed Anwar from his positions as Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance.

description.zh-cn: 宋任穷是宋彬彬的父亲。
description.en: Song Renqiong is Song Binbin's father.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命使宋彬彬成为全国闻名的红卫兵领袖。
description.en: The Cultural Revolution made Song Binbin a nationally famous Red Guard leader.

description.zh-cn: 作为北京师范大学女附中的红卫兵领袖，宋彬彬对该校副校长卞仲耘在“红八月”期间被批斗致死的事件负有责任。她本人在2014年为此道歉。
description.en: As a leader of the Red Guards at the Beijing Normal University Affiliated Girls' Middle School, Song Binbin bore responsibility for the death of Vice Principal Bian Zhongyun, who was beaten to death during 'Red August'. She apologized for this in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 在天安门城楼上为毛泽东佩戴红卫兵袖章，并被毛泽东建议改名为“要武”。
description.en: On the Tiananmen Rostrum, she put a Red Guard armband on Mao Zedong, who then suggested she change her name to 'Yaowu'.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在天安门城楼接见宋彬彬，并为其建议名字“要武”，此举使宋彬彬闻名全国，推动了她的红卫兵领袖地位。
description.en: Mao Zedong received Song Binbin on the Tiananmen Rostrum and suggested the name 'Yaowu' for her. This act made her nationally famous and promoted her status as a Red Guard leader.

description.zh-cn: 在一次大会上点名批评宋任穷，导致宋家失势。
description.en: Publicly criticized Song Renqiong at a large meeting, leading to the Song family's downfall.

description.zh-cn: 批评宋彬彬去武汉保湖北省委的行为，导致宋彬彬和其母亲被软禁于沈阳。
description.en: Criticized Song Binbin for going to Wuhan to support the Hubei Provincial Party Committee, which led to Song Binbin and her mother being placed under house arrest in Shenyang.

description.zh-cn: 徐榛蔚是傅兆林的儿媳。
description.en: Hsu Chen-wei is Fu Zhaolin's daughter-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 傅兆林在就读高雄中学时亲身经历二二八事件中的高雄镇压。
description.en: Fu Zhaolin personally experienced the Kaohsiung suppression during the February 28 Incident while studying at Kaohsiung Senior High School.

description.zh-cn: 出席傅兆林告别式并致哀。
description.en: Attended Fu Zhaolin's funeral to pay respects.

description.zh-cn: 出席傅兆林告别式并致哀。
description.en: Attended Fu Zhaolin's funeral to pay respects.

description.zh-cn: 出席傅兆林告别式并致哀。
description.en: Attended Fu Zhaolin's funeral to pay respects.

description.zh-cn: 高力士幼年入宫，受到武则天赏识，并被其赐姓高。
唐玄宗驾崩的消息传到正被赦免回京途中的高力士耳中，他哀痛欲绝，最终吐血而亡。
追念高力士侍奉玄宗有功，追赠其为扬州大都督，并允许其陪葬泰陵。
夏宝龙兼任国务院港澳事务办公室主任。
description.en: Xia Baolong concurrently serves as the Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙担任第十三届全国政协副主席（2018年3月14日至2023年3月10日），并兼任秘书长（2018年3月14日至2020年5月19日）。
description.en: Xia Baolong served as the Vice Chairman of the 13th National Committee of the CPPCC (March 14, 2018 - March 10, 2023), and concurrently as its Secretary-General (March 14, 2018 - May 19, 2020).

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙担任中共浙江省委书记。
description.en: Xia Baolong served as the Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙于1973年11月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Xia Baolong joined the Communist Party of China in November 1973.

position.en: Deputy Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the CPC

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在担任中共浙江省委副书记期间，是时任省委书记习近平的副手。
description.en: When Xia Baolong served as Deputy Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Party Committee, he was the deputy to then-Provincial Party Secretary Xi Jinping.

position.zh-cn: 全国政协副主席、秘书长
position.en: Vice Chairman and Secretary-General of the CPPCC National Committee

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在担任全国政协副主席和秘书长期间，主席是汪洋。
description.en: While Xia Baolong served as Vice Chairman and Secretary-General of the CPPCC National Committee, the Chairman was Wang Yang.

position.zh-cn: 国务院港澳事务办公室主任
position.en: Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙担任国务院港澳事务办公室主任期间，国务院总理是李克强。
description.en: While Xia Baolong was Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council, the Premier was Li Keqiang.

position.zh-cn: 国务院港澳事务办公室主任
position.en: Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙担任国务院港澳事务办公室主任期间，国务院总理是李强。
description.en: While Xia Baolong is Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council, the Premier is Li Qiang.

position.zh-cn: 中共中央港澳工作办公室副主任
position.en: Deputy Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 周霁是中共中央港澳工作办公室主任夏宝龙的副手。
description.en: Zhou Ji is a deputy to Xia Baolong, Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙担任浙江省省长期间，龚正任常务副省长。
description.en: While Xia Baolong was Governor of Zhejiang, Gong Zheng served as Executive Vice Governor.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在宁波会见了马来西亚前首相马哈迪·莫哈末一行。
description.en: Xia Baolong met with former Malaysian Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad and his delegation in Ningbo.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在深圳主持座谈会，会见了香港特区行政长官李家超。
description.en: Xia Baolong chaired a symposium in Shenzhen and met with Hong Kong SAR Chief Executive John Lee Ka-chiu.

description.zh-cn: 袁崇焕在宁远之战和宁锦之战中，两次成功指挥明军击败后金的进攻。
description.en: Yuan Chonghuan successfully commanded the Ming forces to defeat the Later Jin invasions twice, in the Battle of Ningyuan and the Battle of Ningjin.

description.zh-cn: 袁崇焕以毛文龙骄横跋扈、虚报兵饷、不受节制等十二条罪状，用尚方宝剑将其在皮岛斩杀。
description.en: Yuan Chonghuan executed Mao Wenlong on Pi Island with an imperial sword, citing twelve crimes including arrogance, insubordination, and fraudulent reporting of military strength and expenses.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆皇帝下诏为袁崇焕平反，肯定他“尚能忠于所事”，认为其罹难是因“主暗政昏”，深表悯恻。
description.en: The Qianlong Emperor issued an edict posthumously rehabilitating Yuan Chonghuan, affirming that he was 'loyal to his duty' and attributing his tragic fate to a 'dim-witted and muddle-headed ruler,' expressing deep sympathy.

description.zh-cn: 宁锦之战后，魏忠贤党羽以袁崇焕不救锦州为由进行弹劾，导致袁崇焕被迫请求辞官归乡。
description.en: After the Battle of Ningjin, allies of Wei Zhongxian impeached Yuan Chonghuan on the grounds of failing to relieve Jinzhou, forcing Yuan to request retirement from his post.

description.zh-cn: 在位期间，明熹宗采纳朝臣建议，提拔袁崇焕至兵部任职，并在宁远之战后多次予以升迁和嘉奖，支持其在辽东的军事活动。
description.en: During his reign, the Tianqi Emperor adopted the advice of his officials to promote Yuan Chonghuan to a position in the Ministry of War. Following the Battle of Ningyuan, he repeatedly promoted and rewarded Yuan, supporting his military activities in Liaodong.

position.zh-cn: 普鲁士王国首相, 北德意志邦联首相, 德意志帝国首相
position.en: Minister President of Prussia, Chancellor of the North German Confederation, Chancellor of the German Empire

description.zh-cn: 奥托·冯·俾斯麦长期担任普鲁士及统一后的德国的政府首脑。
description.en: Otto von Bismarck served for a long time as the head of government of Prussia and later the unified Germany.

description.zh-cn: 在威廉一世担任普鲁士国王和德意志皇帝期间，被其任命为首相，两人形成了十分特别的牢固关系。
description.en: During Wilhelm I's reign as King of Prussia and German Emperor, Bismarck was appointed as his Minister President, and the two formed a particularly strong bond.

description.zh-cn: 在威廉二世执政初期担任首相，后因分歧被其解职。
description.en: Served as Chancellor during the early years of Wilhelm II's reign, but was later dismissed due to disagreements.

description.zh-cn: 因政策分歧和权力斗争，年少气盛的威廉二世解除了俾斯麦的首相职务，迫使其下野。
description.en: Due to policy disagreements and power struggles, the young and ambitious Wilhelm II dismissed Bismarck from his position as Chancellor, forcing him into retirement.

description.zh-cn: 大久保利通对推动明治维新做出了巨大贡献。
description.en: Ōkubo Toshimichi made significant contributions to advancing the Meiji Restoration.

description.zh-cn: 在外交部翻译室工作期间，曾为邓小平等国家领导人担任翻译。
description.en: While working at the Department of Translation and Interpretation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, he served as an interpreter for state leaders such as Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 因胡宗南身高不足，经时任军校党代表廖仲恺特许被录取。
description.en: Due to Hu Zongnan's insufficient height, he was admitted to the military academy with special permission from Liao Zhongkai, the party representative at the time.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南晚年曾感慨称周恩来是其“政治克星”。
description.en: In his later years, Hu Zongnan lamented that Zhou Enlai was his 'political nemesis'.

description.zh-cn: 介绍其学生叶霞翟与胡宗南相识，促成两人婚事。
description.en: Introduced his student Ye Xiazhai to Hu Zongnan, which led to their marriage.

description.zh-cn: 1879年从普林斯顿大学毕业。
description.en: Graduated from Princeton University in 1879.

degree.zh-cn: 历史与政治科学哲学博士
degree.en: Ph.D. in History and Political Science

description.zh-cn: 1886年从约翰·霍普金斯大学获得历史与政治科学的哲学博士学位。
description.en: Received a Ph.D. in History and Political Science from Johns Hopkins University in 1886.

description.zh-cn: 担任普林斯顿大学第13任校长。
description.en: Served as the 13th President of Princeton University.

description.zh-cn: 担任第28任美国总统。
description.en: Served as the 28th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 伍德罗·威尔逊是民主党成员，并作为其候选人当选新泽西州州长和美国总统。
description.en: Woodrow Wilson was a member of the Democratic Party and was elected Governor of New Jersey and President of the United States as its candidate.

description.zh-cn: 威尔逊于1917年4月2日请求国会宣战，将美国带入第一次世界大战。
description.en: Wilson asked Congress for a declaration of war on April 2, 1917, bringing the United States into World War I.

description.zh-cn: 威尔逊总统于1913年签署了《联邦储备法案》，从而建立了联邦储备系统。
description.en: President Wilson signed the Federal Reserve Act in 1913, establishing the Federal Reserve System.

description.zh-cn: 韩非曾拜儒家大师荀子为师。
description.en: Han Fei studied under the Confucian master Xunzi.

description.zh-cn: 李斯曾拜儒家大师荀子为师。
description.en: Li Si studied under the Confucian master Xunzi.

description.zh-cn: 韩非与李斯一同拜荀子为师，为同学关系。
description.en: Han Fei and Li Si studied under Xunzi together as fellow students.

description.zh-cn: 韩非的思想受商鞅影响。
description.en: Han Fei's thought was influenced by Shang Yang.

description.zh-cn: 韩非的思想受老子影响，并对《道德经》有深入研究。
description.en: Han Fei's thought was influenced by Laozi, and he conducted in-depth research on the Tao Te Ching.

description.zh-cn: 韩非反对儒家建构在私人情感与社会道德提升上的治国主张。
description.en: Han Fei opposed the Confucian approach to governance, which was based on personal emotional bonds and the elevation of social morality.

description.zh-cn: 韩非是《韩非子》的作者。
description.en: Han Fei is the author of the Han Feizi.

description.zh-cn: 《韩非子》一书传到秦国，其内容促使秦王政以战争为要挟，逼迫韩非出使秦国。
description.en: The book Han Feizi reached the state of Qin, and its contents prompted King Zheng of Qin to use the threat of war to compel Han Fei to be sent as an envoy to Qin.

description.zh-cn: 在战国后期，秦国对包括韩国在内的东方六国持续发动兼并战争，两国长期处于敌对状态。例如，秦国曾以战争为要胁，逼迫韩国派韩非出使。
description.en: In the late Warring States period, the State of Qin continuously waged wars of annexation against the six eastern states, including Han, leading to a long-term state of hostility between the two. For instance, the state of Qin used the threat of war to compel the state of Han to send Han Fei as an envoy.

description.zh-cn: 吴仪于1997年至2002年任中共中央政治局候补委员，2002年至2007年任委员。
description.en: Wu Yi served as an alternate member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee from 1997 to 2002, and as a full member from 2002 to 2007.

position.en: Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 在温家宝担任国务院总理的内阁中，吴仪出任国务院副总理。
description.en: In the cabinet where Wen Jiabao served as Premier of the State Council, Wu Yi was appointed Vice Premier.

description.zh-cn: 在朱镕基担任国务院总理期间，吴仪是国务委员。
description.en: While Zhu Rongji was Premier of the State Council, Wu Yi served as a State Councilor.

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记期间，吴仪是中央政治局委员。
description.en: While Hu Jintao was General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Wu Yi was a member of the Politburo.

description.zh-cn: 因小泉纯一郎等日本高官在二战历史问题上发出强硬表态，吴仪在访日期间断然决定取消与小泉的会面。
description.en: Due to strong statements from Japanese high officials including Junichiro Koizumi on WWII history issues, Wu Yi decisively canceled her meeting with Koizumi during her visit to Japan.

description.zh-cn: 2007年初，时任副总理的黄菊病重，吴仪全面接管了中国的经济和金融工作。
description.en: In early 2007, as then Vice Premier Huang Ju was critically ill, Wu Yi took full charge of China's economic and financial affairs.

description.zh-cn: 吴仪卸任排名第一的国务院副总理后，由李克强接任。
description.en: After Wu Yi stepped down as the first-ranking Vice Premier of the State Council, she was succeeded by Li Keqiang.

description.zh-cn: 吴仪接替李岚清，出任中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部部长。
description.en: Wu Yi succeeded Li Lanqing as the Minister of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 在巴基斯坦，因为受到伊斯兰教的征服和同化，种姓制度的影响力相对印度被弱化。
description.en: In Pakistan, due to the conquest and assimilation by Islam, the influence of the caste system was weakened compared to India.

position.zh-cn: 中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组副组长
position.en: Deputy Leader of the CMC Leading Group for Deepening National Defense and Military Reform

description.zh-cn: 在中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组中，许其亮担任副组长，是组长习近平的下属。
description.en: In the CMC Leading Group for Deepening National Defense and Military Reform, Xu Qiliang served as a deputy leader, subordinate to the leader Xi Jinping.

position.zh-cn: 中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组副组长
position.en: Deputy Leader of the CMC Leading Group for Deepening National Defense and Military Reform

description.zh-cn: 在中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组中，范长龙担任副组长，是组长习近平的下属。
description.en: In the CMC Leading Group for Deepening National Defense and Military Reform, Fan Changlong served as a deputy leader, subordinate to the leader Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 根据改革决定，自2018年1月1日起，武警部队由中共中央、中央军委集中统一领导，归中央军委建制。
description.en: According to the reform decision, from January 1, 2018, the People's Armed Police force is under the centralized and unified leadership of the CPC Central Committee and the Central Military Commission, and is placed under the command of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 地震引发的海啸重创了印度东南部沿海地区及安达曼和尼科巴群岛，造成超过1万人罹难。
description.en: The tsunami triggered by the earthquake severely impacted India's southeastern coastal regions and the Andaman and Nicobar Islands, causing over 10,000 deaths.

description.zh-cn: 地震引发的海啸对泰国南部的普吉岛等旅游胜地造成了严重破坏，导致超过5000人罹难，其中约一半为外国游客。
description.en: The tsunami triggered by the earthquake caused severe damage to tourist destinations in southern Thailand, such as Phuket, resulting in over 5,000 deaths, about half of whom were foreign tourists.

description.zh-cn: 该地震能量巨大，甚至在遥远的阿拉斯加地区触发了远距地震。
description.en: The energy from this earthquake was so immense that it even triggered remote seismicity in the distant region of Alaska.

description.zh-cn: 作为政府武装力量的一部分，中国人民武装警察部队被出动以武力镇压骚乱。
description.en: As part of the government's armed forces, the People's Armed Police were deployed to suppress the unrest by force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军部队被出动以武力平息冲突。
description.en: People's Liberation Army troops were deployed to quell the conflict by force.

description.zh-cn: 作为中共西藏自治区党委书记，胡锦涛是镇压拉萨骚乱的主要决策者和指挥者之一。
description.en: As the Party Secretary of the Tibet Autonomous Region, Hu Jintao was one of the key decision-makers and commanders in the suppression of the Lhasa unrest.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲议会通过决议，强烈谴责北京在西藏首府的暴力镇压行动，并要求解除戒严。
description.en: The European Parliament passed a resolution strongly condemning Beijing's violent crackdown in the Tibetan capital and demanded the lifting of martial law.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件的爆发促使欧洲议会对中国的人权问题采取更强硬的态度，包括对西藏问题的立场。
description.en: The outbreak of the Tiananmen Square protests prompted the European Parliament to adopt a tougher stance on China's human rights issues, including its position on Tibet.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛向中共中央政治局常委会汇报了西藏的情况，后者据此形成了指导西藏工作的意见。
description.en: Hu Jintao reported on the situation in Tibet to the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, which then formulated guiding opinions for work in Tibet based on his report.

description.zh-cn: 在长沙与周恩来共同审定并最终确定了被称为“长沙决策”的人事安排方案。
description.en: Jointly reviewed and finalized the personnel arrangement plan known as the 'Changsha Decision' with Zhou Enlai in Changsha.

description.zh-cn: 前往长沙向毛泽东汇报四届人大准备情况，并共同确定了“长沙决策”。
description.en: Traveled to Changsha to report to Mao Zedong on the preparations for the 4th National People's Congress and jointly finalized the 'Changsha Decision'.

description.zh-cn: 在王洪文告状后，批评了王洪文。
description.en: Criticized Wang Hongwen after Wang made accusations.

description.zh-cn: 致信江青，告诫其“不要多露面，不要批文件，不要由你组阁（当后台老板）”。
description.en: Sent a letter to Jiang Qing, warning her 'not to make too many public appearances, not to approve documents, and not to form a cabinet (be the boss behind the scenes)'.

description.zh-cn: 1974年12月23日，周恩来向毛泽东汇报四届人大准备情况。12月26日晚，两人单独长谈，最终确定了“长沙决策”。
description.en: On December 23, 1974, Zhou Enlai reported to Mao Zedong on the preparations for the 4th NPC. On the evening of December 26, the two had a long private talk and finalized the 'Changsha Decision'.

description.zh-cn: 1974年10月，王洪文前往长沙向毛泽东告状。12月23日，与周恩来一同向毛泽东汇报工作。
description.en: In October 1974, Wang Hongwen went to Changsha to complain to Mao Zedong. On December 23, he, along with Zhou Enlai, reported to Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 与王洪文一同前往长沙向毛泽东汇报四届人大准备情况。
description.en: Traveled to Changsha together with Wang Hongwen to report to Mao Zedong on the preparations for the 4th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福与温斯顿·丘吉尔在开罗会议期间举行会谈。
description.en: Franklin D. Roosevelt held talks with Winston Churchill during the Cairo Conference.

description.zh-cn: 《开罗宣言》声明盟国将坚持对日作战直至其无条件投降，并要求日本归还其所窃取的一切领土。
description.en: The Cairo Declaration stated that the Allied powers would persevere in the war against Japan until its unconditional surrender and demanded that Japan return all territories it had stolen.

description.zh-cn: 作为英国代表，贾德干建议将宣言草案中的“归还中华民国”改为“当然必须由日本放弃”。
description.en: As a British representative, Alexander Cadogan suggested changing the phrase "restored to the Republic of China" in the draft declaration to "must of course be relinquished by Japan."

description.zh-cn: 温斯顿·丘吉尔对宣言草案文字作了进一步修改，将“特别是”改为“例如”，并加上了“澎湖”。
description.en: Winston Churchill made further textual modifications to the draft declaration, changing "in particular" to "for example" and adding "the Pescadores."

description.zh-cn: 在德黑兰会议上，约瑟夫·斯大林表示“完全”赞成《开罗宣言》及其全部内容。
description.en: At the Tehran Conference, Joseph Stalin expressed his "full" approval of the Cairo Declaration and "all its contents."

description.zh-cn: 在开罗会议结束后，罗斯福前往德黑兰与斯大林举行德黑兰会议。
description.en: After the Cairo Conference, Roosevelt traveled to Tehran to hold the Tehran Conference with Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 在开罗会议结束后，丘吉尔前往德黑兰与斯大林举行德黑兰会议。
description.en: After the Cairo Conference, Churchill traveled to Tehran to hold the Tehran Conference with Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 《波茨坦公告》第八条明确规定“《开罗宣言》之条件必将实施”。
description.en: Article 8 of the Potsdam Declaration explicitly states that "The terms of the Cairo Declaration shall be carried out."

description.zh-cn: 针对民主派初选参与者的大搜捕严重打击了民主派的政治活动。
description.en: The mass arrests targeting participants in the pro-democracy primaries severely cracked down on the political activities of the pro-democracy camp.

description.zh-cn: 民主派对中国人权状况常有所批判，并以“结束一党专政”和“平反六四”作为其核心诉求之一。六四事件后，民主派与中共关系决裂。
description.en: The pro-democracy camp is often critical of the human rights situation in China and holds 'ending one-party rule' and 'vindicating the June 4th incident' as its core demands. After the June 4th incident, the relationship between the pro-democracy camp and the CCP broke down.

description.zh-cn: 在第十四届全国人大第二次会议主席台上，就最高人民法院工作报告内容进行口头讨论。
在第十四届全国人大第二次会议主席台上，就最高人民法院工作报告内容进行口头讨论，习近平还在报告上作了批注。
在第十四届全国人大第二次会议主席台上，就最高人民法院工作报告内容进行口头讨论。
在2025年“两会”召开前夕，当局针对政治异议人士的监控升级，北京资深媒体人高瑜面临“被旅游”、软禁或警告。
因呼吸道感染请假，缺席全国人大会议闭幕日会议。
因赵乐际请假缺席，代为主持闭幕会。
在缺席人大会议闭幕式次日，赵乐际与李鸿忠一同公开活动，看望参与“两会”报道的新闻工作者。
在缺席人大会议闭幕式次日，赵乐际与李书磊一同公开活动，看望参与“两会”报道的新闻工作者。
南非于1998年1月1日与中华人民共和国建立外交关系。
description.en: South Africa established diplomatic relations with the People's Republic of China on January 1, 1998.

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国在中国抗日战争期间扶植了汪精卫国民政府作为其傀儡政权。
description.en: The Empire of Japan established the Wang Jingwei regime as its puppet state during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行由中国人民银行的工商信贷和储蓄业务分离而设立。
description.en: ICBC was established by separating the industrial and commercial credit and savings business from the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 作为主要股东持有中国工商银行31.14%的股份。
description.en: Holds 31.14% of ICBC's shares as a major shareholder.

description.zh-cn: 德仁于2019年5月1日即位为日本天皇。
description.en: Naruhito ascended to the throne as the Emperor of Japan on May 1, 2019.

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国作为轴心国的主要成员之一，是第二次世界大战在亚太战场的主要侵略方。
description.en: The Empire of Japan, as one of the main members of the Axis powers, was the primary aggressor in the Asia-Pacific theater of World War II.

description.zh-cn: 美国在广岛和长崎投下原子弹，最终迫使大日本帝国投降。
description.en: The United States dropped atomic bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki, ultimately forcing the Empire of Japan to surrender.

description.zh-cn: 昭和天皇通过广播宣布日本无条件投降，标志着第二次世界大战的结束。
description.en: Emperor Shōwa announced Japan's unconditional surrender via radio broadcast, marking the end of World War II.

description.zh-cn: 德川家康于1603年开创江户幕府。
description.en: Tokugawa Ieyasu founded the Edo shogunate in 1603.

description.zh-cn: 耶稣是基督宗教的创始人，该宗教于公元一世纪由他创立。
description.en: Jesus is the founder of Christianity, which he established in the first century AD.

description.zh-cn: 基督宗教的大部分思想和信仰实践源自犹太教。
description.en: Much of Christianity's thought and faith practices originated from Judaism.

description.zh-cn: 罗马皇帝君士坦丁一世发布《米兰敕令》，结束了对基督徒的迫害，为基督教的发展提供了有利条件。
description.en: Roman Emperor Constantine I issued the Edict of Milan, ending the persecution of Christians and creating favorable conditions for the development of Christianity.

description.zh-cn: 在改信基督教前，使徒保罗信奉犹太教并将基督教视为异端进行迫害。
description.en: Before converting to Christianity, the Apostle Paul adhered to Judaism and persecuted Christianity as a heresy.

description.zh-cn: 在改信基督教后，保罗成为向非犹太人族群传播基督信仰的主要推动者。
description.en: After his conversion to Christianity, Paul became a major proponent of spreading the Christian faith to non-Jewish communities.

description.zh-cn: 以中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会主席名义签署命令，将东北边防军改名为“中国人民志愿军”，并决定其入朝作战。
description.en: As Chairman of the People's Revolutionary Military Commission of the Central People's Government, he signed the order to rename the Northeast Border Defense Army to the 'Chinese People's Volunteer Army' and decided on its entry into the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 于1950年10月19日跨过鸭绿江进入朝鲜参战，迅速击退联合国军，深刻影响了战争的进程和最终结局。
description.en: Crossed the Yalu River to enter the war in Korea on October 19, 1950, quickly pushing back the UN forces and profoundly influencing the course and outcome of the war.

description.zh-cn: 在军委会议上，将“支援军”改为“边防军”，并提出参战部队使用“志愿军”服装和旗帜，影响了部队的最终名称和形象。
description.en: At a Military Commission meeting, changed 'Support Army' to 'Border Defense Army' and proposed that combat troops use 'Volunteer Army' uniforms and flags, influencing the force's final name and image.

description.zh-cn: 同意了周恩来提出的苏联方面提供空军掩护和负责中国主要城市领空安全的要求，为志愿军出兵提供了重要支持。
description.en: Agreed to Zhou Enlai's request for Soviet air cover and responsibility for the air defense of major Chinese cities, providing crucial support for the Volunteer Army's deployment.

description.zh-cn: 在上甘岭战役中，黄继光用身体堵住了联合国军的机枪火力点。
description.en: During the Battle of Triangle Hill, Huang Jiguang blocked a UN machine gun emplacement with his body.

description.zh-cn: 作为中央军委主席，命令召回驻板门店军事停战委员会的中国人民志愿军代表团，结束了其在朝鲜半岛的官方使命。
description.en: As Chairman of the Central Military Commission, he ordered the recall of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army delegation from the Military Armistice Commission in Panmunjom, ending its official mission on the Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 为志愿军提供了绝大多数主战装备，如T-34坦克、米格-15战斗机等，并在1951年3月后帮助其逐步换装苏式武器。
description.en: Provided the vast majority of main combat equipment to the Volunteer Army, such as T-34 tanks and MiG-15 fighters, and helped it gradually re-equip with Soviet-made weapons after March 1951.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军是中华人民共和国派出的赴朝作战部队。
description.en: The Chinese People's Volunteer Army was the expeditionary force dispatched by the People's Republic of China to fight in Korea.

description.zh-cn: 731部队是关东军下属的防疫给水部本部。
description.en: Unit 731 was the headquarters of the Epidemic Prevention and Water Purification Department under the Kwantung Army.

description.zh-cn: 时任关东军参谋长的板垣征四郎正式提出设立“关东军防疫部”，即731部队的前身。
description.en: Seishirō Itagaki, then Chief of Staff of the Kwantung Army, formally proposed the establishment of the 'Kwantung Army Epidemic Prevention Department,' the predecessor of Unit 731.

description.zh-cn: 二战后，美国为了获取731部队的研究数据，给予了石井四郎及其他主要成员战争罪豁免权，使其免于被起诉。
description.en: After World War II, the United States granted immunity from war crimes prosecution to Shirō Ishii and other key members in exchange for Unit 731's research data, allowing them to avoid prosecution.

description.zh-cn: 京都帝国大学向731部队派出了多名医学专家，协助石井四郎进行研究。
description.en: Kyoto Imperial University sent numerous medical experts to Unit 731 to assist Shirō Ishii with his research.

description.zh-cn: 东京帝国大学向731部队派出了至少六名医学专家。
description.en: Tokyo Imperial University sent at least six medical experts to Unit 731.

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军直属中央军事委员会领导。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army was directly under the leadership of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军在衡阳、宝庆及阳江、阳春地区击败白崇禧部主力。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army defeated the main forces of Bai Chongxi in the Hengyang, Baoqing, and Yangjiang, Yangchun areas.

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军将第164师和第156师的朝鲜族士兵转移编入朝鲜人民军。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army transferred Korean soldiers from the 164th and 156th Divisions to the Korean People's Army.

description.zh-cn: 购买黑石集团价值30亿美元的无投票权有限合伙单位。
description.en: Purchased $3 billion worth of non-voting limited partnership units in The Blackstone Group.

description.zh-cn: 赵国最终为秦国所灭。
description.en: The State of Zhao was ultimately conquered by the State of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 前228年，秦将王翦攻破赵都邯郸，俘虏赵王迁，赵国灭亡。
description.en: In 228 BCE, the Qin general Wang Jian captured Handan, the capital of Zhao, and took King Qian captive, leading to the fall of the State of Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 赵国在胡服骑射改革后，于前295年灭亡了中山国。
description.en: After the 'Wearing Hun clothes and shooting from horseback' reform, the State of Zhao conquered the State of Zhongshan in 295 BCE.

description.zh-cn: 在长平之战后，秦将白起坑杀赵军降卒，使赵国受到重创。
description.en: After the Battle of Changping, the Qin general Bai Qi executed the surrendered Zhao soldiers, inflicting a devastating blow to the State of Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 1966年8月30日，全国政协机关因文化大革命停止办公。
description.en: On August 30, 1966, the offices of the CPPCC National Committee ceased operations due to the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 1973年2月28日，经周恩来批准，全国政协举行活动，标志着其开始恢复活动。
description.en: On February 28, 1973, with Zhou Enlai's approval, the CPPCC National Committee held an event, marking the beginning of its resumption of activities.

description.zh-cn: 孟晚舟是任正非的女儿。
description.en: Meng Wanzhou is the daughter of Ren Zhengfei.

description.zh-cn: 日本于1945年8月15日宣布无条件投降，并于9月2日正式签署降伏文书，结束了太平洋战争。
description.en: Japan announced its unconditional surrender on August 15, 1945, and formally signed the Instrument of Surrender on September 2, ending the Pacific War.

description.zh-cn: 通过广播发布《终战诏书》，向日本民众宣布接受《波茨坦公告》，决定投降。
description.en: Broadcast the Jewel Voice Broadcast, announcing to the Japanese people the acceptance of the Potsdam Declaration and the decision to surrender.

description.zh-cn: 《终战诏书》的发布标志着日本决定无条件投降。
description.en: The broadcast of the Imperial Rescript on the Termination of the War signaled Japan's decision to surrender unconditionally.

description.zh-cn: 在珍珠港事件后领导美国对日宣战，是同盟国在太平洋战争期间的主要领导人之一。
description.en: Led the United States to declare war on Japan after the attack on Pearl Harbor and was one of the principal Allied leaders during the Pacific War.

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党是越南唯一的执政党，对国家实行全面领导。
description.en: The Communist Party of Vietnam is the sole ruling party, exercising comprehensive leadership over the state.

description.zh-cn: 在越南战争期间，北越（越南民主共和国）与南越（越南共和国）处于敌对状态。
description.en: During the Vietnam War, North Vietnam (Democratic Republic of Vietnam) and South Vietnam (Republic of Vietnam) were in a state of hostility.

description.zh-cn: 在越南战争期间，苏联向北越（越南民主共和国）提供军事和经济援助。
description.en: During the Vietnam War, the Soviet Union provided military and economic aid to North Vietnam (Democratic Republic of Vietnam).

description.zh-cn: 在越南战争期间，中华人民共和国向北越（越南民主共和国）提供支援。
description.en: During the Vietnam War, the People's Republic of China provided support to North Vietnam (Democratic Republic of Vietnam).

description.zh-cn: 在越南战争期间，美国向南越（越南共和国）提供主要支援。
description.en: During the Vietnam War, the United States was the primary supporter of South Vietnam (Republic of Vietnam).

description.zh-cn: 1982年入读北京大学，后被保送至该校遥感技术应用研究所。
description.en: Enrolled in Peking University in 1982 and was later admitted to its Institute of Remote Sensing and GIS Application.

description.zh-cn: 作为学生领袖，担任北高联主席等多个领导职务，是运动的主要组织者和领导者之一。
description.en: As a student leader, he served as the chairman of the Beijing Students' Autonomous Federation and held several other leadership positions, making him one of the main organizers and leaders of the movement.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件后，封从德被北京市公安局通缉，在中国大陆逃亡十个月后流亡海外。
description.en: After the Tiananmen Square protests, Feng Congde was put on the wanted list by the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau, and he went into exile after being a fugitive in mainland China for ten months.

description.zh-cn: 作为八九民运学生领袖，遭中共当局通缉并流亡海外。其言论主张中共崩溃。
description.en: As a student leader of the 1989 democracy movement, he was wanted by the CCP authorities and went into exile. His statements advocate for the collapse of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 在黄安战役中，秦基伟率部护卫徐向前指挥夺回阵地。
description.en: During the Huang'an Campaign, Qin Jiwei led his troops to protect Xu Xiangqian while he commanded the recapture of the position.

description.zh-cn: 秦基伟任司令员的第九纵队隶属于陈赓、谢富治指挥的“陈谢集团”。
description.en: The 9th Column, commanded by Qin Jiwei, was subordinate to the 'Chen-Xie Group' led by Chen Geng and Xie Fuzhi.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间被批斗，并被下放至农场劳改，后于1973年恢复工作。
description.en: Was persecuted during the Cultural Revolution, sent to a farm for re-education through labor, and reinstated in 1973.

description.zh-cn: 在中华人民共和国成立35周年阅兵式上担任总指挥，陪同邓小平检阅部队。
description.en: Served as the general commander of the military parade for the 35th anniversary of the PRC, accompanying Deng Xiaoping to inspect the troops.

description.zh-cn: 接替张爱萍出任中华人民共和国国防部部长。
description.en: Succeeded Zhang Aiping as the Minister of National Defense of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 秦基伟卸任国防部长后，由迟浩田接任。
description.en: After Qin Jiwei stepped down as Minister of Defense, Chi Haotian succeeded him.

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利于1986年3月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Meng Fanli joined the Communist Party of China in March 1986.

description.zh-cn: 在南开大学会计系西方会计专业在职攻读硕士研究生。
description.en: Pursued a master's degree in Western accounting in the Department of Accounting at Nankai University while working.

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利任广东省省长时，黄坤明任中共广东省委书记，是其直接上级。
description.en: When Meng Fanli was Governor of Guangdong, Huang Kunming was the Party Secretary of Guangdong, his direct superior.

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利接替王伟中担任广东省省长及深圳市委书记职务。
description.en: Meng Fanli succeeded Wang Weizhong as Governor of Guangdong and Party Secretary of Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 王浩接替孟凡利担任中共烟台市委书记。
description.en: Wang Hao succeeded Meng Fanli as Party Secretary of Yantai.

description.zh-cn: 在孟凡利就任深圳市委书记的领导干部会议上，时任广东省委书记李希出席并讲话。
description.en: At the leadership cadre meeting for Meng Fanli's appointment as Shenzhen Party Secretary, Li Xi, then Party Secretary of Guangdong, attended and spoke.

description.zh-cn: 中央政治局在中央委员会全体会议闭会期间，行使中央委员会的职权。
description.en: The Political Bureau exercises the functions and powers of the Central Committee when the latter is not in session.

description.zh-cn: 李先念接替刘少奇（至1968年）担任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Li Xiannian succeeded Liu Shaoqi (until 1968) as the President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李先念的国家主席职务由杨尚昆接替。
description.en: Li Xiannian was succeeded by Yang Shangkun as the President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李先念的全国政协主席职务由李瑞环接替。
description.en: Li Xiannian was succeeded by Li Ruihuan as Chairman of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 李先念被认为是邓小平主政时期的“中共八大元老”之一。
description.en: Li Xiannian is considered one of the 'Eight Elders of the CCP' during Deng Xiaoping's era.

description.zh-cn: 在“六四天安门事件”中，李先念公开表态支持中央决定，支持武力镇压。
description.en: During the 'Tiananmen Square Incident', Li Xiannian publicly expressed support for the central government's decision and supported the use of force.

description.zh-cn: 张国焘拒绝执行中共中央的北上方针，率领红四方面军（包括李先念部）南下。
description.en: Zhang Guotao refused to follow the CPC Central Committee's northward policy, leading the Fourth Front Army (including Li Xiannian's troops) southward.

description.zh-cn: 陈云和滕代远奉命接应兵败的西路军余部，其中包括李先念。
description.en: Chen Yun and Teng Daiyuan were ordered to rescue the remnants of the defeated Western Route Army, including Li Xiannian.

description.zh-cn: 1945年1月，李先念率领的新四军第5师与王震的八路军南下支队会师。同年10月，共同组建中原军区。
description.en: In January 1945, the New Fourth Army's 5th Division led by Li Xiannian met with Wang Zhen's southward detachment of the Eighth Route Army. In October of the same year, they jointly established the Central Plains Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 李先念与邓小平在革命战争时期及建国后长期共事，在文革后期协助邓小平进行全面整顿。
description.en: Li Xiannian and Deng Xiaoping worked together for a long time during the revolutionary wars and after the founding of the PRC. In the later stages of the Cultural Revolution, he assisted Deng Xiaoping in the comprehensive rectification.

description.zh-cn: 1948年，李先念与邓子恢在开封参与领导淮海战役的后勤保障工作。
description.en: In 1948, Li Xiannian and Deng Zihui co-led the logistical support for the Huaihai Campaign in Kaifeng.

description.zh-cn: 1968年，李先念在文化大革命期间被下放到北京市北郊木材厂劳动。
description.en: In 1968, during the Cultural Revolution, Li Xiannian was sent to perform manual labor at a timber factory in the northern suburbs of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 在“二月逆流”后，江青称李先念为“附和错误路线”，使其受到批判。
description.en: After the 'February Countercurrent', Jiang Qing labeled Li Xiannian as 'adhering to an erroneous line', leading to his criticism.

description.zh-cn: 1940年10月24日，贝当与希特勒在卢瓦河畔蒙图瓦尔会面，商讨两国间的合作事宜。
description.en: On October 24, 1940, Pétain met with Hitler at Montoire-sur-le-Loir to discuss collaboration between their two countries.

description.zh-cn: 杜鲁门总统委任艾森豪威尔为美国陆军参谋长。
description.en: President Truman appointed Eisenhower as Chief of Staff of the United States Army.

description.zh-cn: 担任首位北大西洋公约组织最高指挥官。
description.en: Served as the first Supreme Commander of NATO.

description.zh-cn: 在艾森豪威尔担任总统期间任其副总统。
description.en: Served as Vice President during Eisenhower's presidency.

description.zh-cn: 在古巴导弹危机期间，应时任总统肯尼迪的请求，与其会谈商讨应对方案。
description.en: During the Cuban Missile Crisis, at the request of then-President Kennedy, he met with him to discuss response strategies.

description.zh-cn: 在总统任内推行冷战政策，以遏制苏联共产主义的扩张。
description.en: During his presidency, he implemented Cold War policies to contain the expansion of Soviet communism.

description.zh-cn: 在第一次朝核危机期间，金泳三与美国总统比尔·克林顿协调，成功劝阻了美国对朝鲜宁边核设施的军事打击计划。
description.en: During the First North Korean nuclear crisis, Kim Young-sam coordinated with U.S. President Bill Clinton and successfully dissuaded the U.S. from its plan to conduct a military strike on North Korea's Yongbyon nuclear facilities.

description.zh-cn: 受疫情打击，首都机场的旅客吞吐量大幅下滑。
description.en: Affected by the pandemic, the passenger throughput of Capital Airport declined sharply.

description.zh-cn: 机场建设因朝鲜战争爆发而搁置。
description.en: The construction of the airport was postponed due to the outbreak of the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 在苏联专家的指导下开始规划设计。
description.en: Planning and design began under the guidance of Soviet experts.

description.zh-cn: 温云松是温家宝的儿子。
description.en: Wen Yunsong is the son of Wen Jiabao.

description.zh-cn: 温云松是温如春的哥哥。
description.en: Wen Yunsong is the brother of Wen Ruchun.

description.zh-cn: 温家宝曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Wen Jiabao served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 因温云松身份敏感为由，拒绝其求职申请。
description.en: Rejected his job application due to his sensitive background.

description.zh-cn: 何晶是新加坡总理李显龙的夫人。
description.en: Ho Ching is the wife of Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

description.zh-cn: 据博讯新闻称，媒体对温云松的负面报道与当时温家宝和江泽民派系（上海帮）的政治权力斗争有关。
description.en: According to Boxun News, negative media reports about Wen Yunsong were related to the political power struggle between Wen Jiabao and the Jiang Zemin faction (Shanghai clique) at the time.

description.zh-cn: 由于防火长城的审查机制，“温云松”成为网络搜索敏感词，导致其信息在百度、搜狗、新浪微博等平台被封锁或限制。
description.en: Due to the Great Firewall's censorship mechanism, 'Wen Yunsong' became a sensitive search term, leading to the blocking or restriction of his information on platforms like Baidu, Sogou, and Sina Weibo.

description.zh-cn: 福泽谕吉曾受雇于江户幕府，从事政府公文的翻译工作，并随幕府使节团出访海外。
description.en: Fukuzawa Yukichi was employed by the Edo Shogunate to translate government documents and accompanied its missions abroad.

description.zh-cn: 福泽谕吉通过其教育和著述活动，极大地影响和推动了明治维新运动，传播西方思想，倡导“文明开化”。
description.en: Through his educational and literary activities, Fukuzawa Yukichi greatly influenced and promoted the Meiji Restoration by disseminating Western ideas and advocating for 'Civilization and Enlightenment'.

description.zh-cn: 福泽谕吉在其《脱亚论》中对清朝持蔑视态度，视其为“恶友”，主张与其绝交。
description.en: In his 'Datsu-A Ron', Fukuzawa Yukichi held a contemptuous attitude towards the Qing dynasty, regarding it as a 'bad friend' and advocating for breaking ties.

description.zh-cn: 福泽谕吉在其《脱亚论》中对朝鲜王朝持蔑视态度，视其为“恶友”，主张与其绝交。
description.en: In his 'Datsu-A Ron', Fukuzawa Yukichi held a contemptuous attitude towards the Joseon dynasty, regarding it as a 'bad friend' and advocating for breaking ties.

description.zh-cn: 福泽谕吉将中日甲午战争描述为一场“文野之战”，并支持日本对华开战。
description.en: Fukuzawa Yukichi described the First Sino-Japanese War as a 'war between civilization and barbarism' and supported Japan's decision to go to war with China.

description.zh-cn: 福泽谕吉在《劝学篇》中多次提及亚当斯密的自由市场经济论，其经济思想受到其影响。
description.en: Fukuzawa Yukichi repeatedly mentioned Adam Smith's free-market economic theory in 'An Encouragement of Learning', indicating his economic thought was influenced by it.

description.zh-cn: 福泽谕吉1860年访问美国，这次经历让他受到文化震撼，并深刻认识到学习英语和西方制度的必要性。
description.en: Fukuzawa Yukichi's visit to the United States in 1860 caused him culture shock and made him profoundly aware of the necessity of learning English and Western systems.

description.zh-cn: 列夫·托洛茨基是共产国际的创始人之一。
description.en: Leon Trotsky was one of the founders of the Communist International.

description.zh-cn: 为在反法西斯战争中拉拢英美等国，苏联主导解散了以反对资本主义国家为目的的共产国际。
description.en: In order to win over countries like the United Kingdom and the United States in the anti-fascist war, the Soviet Union led the dissolution of the Comintern, which was originally established to oppose capitalist countries.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培曾两度担任北京大学校长，期间革新北大，开“学术”与“自由”之风，大量引进新人物，使北大成为新文化运动的中心，并于五四运动期间担任校长，发挥了重要作用。
description.en: Cai Yuanpei served as the President of Peking University twice, during which he reformed the university, fostering a spirit of 'academics' and 'freedom'. He brought in many new figures, making Peking University the center of the New Culture Movement, and served as president during the May Fourth Movement, playing a significant role.

description.zh-cn: 1927年，蔡元培在主持教育行政委员会期间，筹设并创办了中央研究院。
description.en: In 1927, while presiding over the Education Administrative Committee, Cai Yuanpei planned and founded the Academia Sinica.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培担任中央研究院首任院长直至去世。
description.en: Cai Yuanpei served as the first President of Academia Sinica until his death.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培与吴稚晖、张静江、李石曾等人提出发动“护党救国”运动，并主持中央监察委员会会议，通过了要求对共产党人进行紧急处置的决议，推动了随后的“清党”行动。
description.en: Cai Yuanpei, along with Wu Zhihui, Zhang Jingjiang, Li Shizeng, and others, proposed the 'Protect the Party, Save the Nation' movement and presided over the Central Supervisory Committee meeting that passed resolutions for emergency measures against Communists, thus promoting the subsequent 'Party purge'.

description.zh-cn: 在1927年，蔡元培积极主张并参与了针对中国共产党的“清党”行动。
description.en: In 1927, Cai Yuanpei actively advocated for and participated in the 'Party purge' targeting the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培主持的国民党中央监察委员会会议审定了一份应予看管的共产党人名单，其中包括毛泽东。
description.en: A meeting of the KMT Central Supervisory Committee, presided over by Cai Yuanpei, approved a list of Communists to be placed under surveillance, which included Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培主持的国民党中央监察委员会会议审定了一份应予看管的共产党人名单，其中包括周恩来。
description.en: A meeting of the KMT Central Supervisory Committee, presided over by Cai Yuanpei, approved a list of Communists to be placed under surveillance, which included Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培主持的国民党中央监察委员会会议审定了一份应予看管的共产党人名单，其中包括陈独秀。
description.en: A meeting of the KMT Central Supervisory Committee, presided over by Cai Yuanpei, approved a list of Communists to be placed under surveillance, which included Chen Duxiu.

description.zh-cn: 1905年加入同盟会，并被孙中山委任为上海分会负责人。
description.en: Joined the Tongmenghui in 1905 and was appointed by Sun Yat-sen as the head of its Shanghai branch.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培因不满袁世凯的专制统治，于1912年7月辞去教育总长职务。
description.en: Cai Yuanpei resigned from his post as Minister of Education in July 1912 due to his dissatisfaction with Yuan Shikai's autocratic rule.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在蔡元培逝世后发出唁电，称其为“学界泰斗，人世楷模”，高度评价并巩固其历史地位。
description.en: After Cai Yuanpei's death, Mao Zedong sent a condolence telegram praising him as a 'titan of the academic world and a model for all,' highly evaluating and solidifying his historical status.

position.en: Head of Land Reform Work in Guangdong

description.zh-cn: 因不满广东土改进展缓慢，毛泽东于1951年11月将陶铸调往广东主管土改工作，以加强和加速运动，并推行更激进的政策。
description.en: Dissatisfied with the slow progress of land reform in Guangdong, Mao Zedong transferred Tao Zhu in November 1951 to take charge of the work there, aiming to strengthen and accelerate the movement and implement more radical policies.

position.en: Head of Land Reform Work in Guangdong

description.zh-cn: 因不满广东土改进展缓慢，毛泽东于1951年11月后将赵紫阳与陶铸一同调往广东参与领导土改工作，以推行更激进的政策。
description.en: Dissatisfied with the slow progress of land reform in Guangdong, Mao Zedong transferred Zhao Ziyang along with Tao Zhu after November 1951 to Guangdong to participate in supervising the land reform work and implement more radical policies.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命太原起义成功后，阎锡山被推举为山西都督。
description.en: After the success of the Taiyuan Uprising during the Xinhai Revolution, Yan Xishan was elected as the military governor of Shanxi.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯曾派兵进攻山西，阻挠阎锡山回太原。
description.en: Yuan Shikai once sent troops to attack Shanxi and obstruct Yan Xishan's return to Taiyuan.

description.zh-cn: 在中原大战中与冯玉祥结盟，共同反对蒋介石。
description.en: Allied with Feng Yuxiang during the Central Plains War to jointly oppose Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 在中原大战中与李宗仁结盟，共同反对蒋介石。
description.en: Allied with Li Zongren during the Central Plains War to jointly oppose Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 张学良通电支持蒋介石，并派兵入关，导致阎锡山在中原大战中失败。
description.en: Zhang Xueliang declared his support for Chiang Kai-shek and sent troops into the Shanhai Pass, leading to Yan Xishan's defeat in the Central Plains War.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战期间，阎锡山作为国民党将领与中国人民解放军作战。
description.en: During the second Chinese Civil War, Yan Xishan, as a KMT general, fought against the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 温斯顿·丘吉尔接替内维尔·张伯伦出任英国首相。
description.en: Winston Churchill succeeded Neville Chamberlain as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 辞去首相后，内维尔·张伯伦在丘吉尔的战时内阁中担任枢密院议长。
description.en: After resigning as Prime Minister, Neville Chamberlain served as Lord President of the Council in Churchill's war cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 北京卫戍区接受中央军事委员会直接指挥。
description.en: The Beijing Garrison receives direct command from the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 姚安娜是孟晚舟的异母妹妹。
description.en: Yao Anna is Meng Wanzhou's half-sister.

description.zh-cn: 姚安娜是任正非的女儿。
description.en: Yao Anna is the daughter of Ren Zhengfei.

description.zh-cn: 大学毕业后曾在中国建设银行工作。
description.en: Worked at China Construction Bank after graduating from university.

description.zh-cn: 应美国司法互助要求逮捕并拘留孟晚舟。
description.en: Arrested and detained Meng Wanzhou at the request of the U.S. for judicial assistance.

description.zh-cn: 在孟晚舟回国时发布微博表示欢迎，称其为自己的榜样。
description.en: Welcomed Meng Wanzhou's return to China with a Weibo post, calling her a role model.

description.zh-cn: 华罗庚在剑桥大学期间，受到了哈代-李特尔伍德学派的影响。
description.en: During his time at Cambridge University, Hua Luogeng was influenced by the Hardy-Littlewood school.

description.zh-cn: 邀请华罗庚建立中国科学院数学研究所。
description.en: Invited Hua Luogeng to establish the Institute of Mathematics of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 在担任清华大学教授期间，经历了西南联合大学时期（1937-1945）。
description.en: During his tenure as a professor at Tsinghua University, he was part of the National Southwestern Associated University (1937-1945).

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命中曾遭受冲击和批判。
description.en: He was impacted and criticized during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 在反右斗争、文化大革命等政治运动中，华罗庚受到毛泽东的特别关照和保护。
description.en: During political campaigns such as the Anti-Rightist Campaign and the Cultural Revolution, Hua Luogeng received special attention and protection from Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 在反右斗争、文化大革命等政治运动中，华罗庚受到周恩来的特别关照和保护。
description.en: During political campaigns such as the Anti-Rightist Campaign and the Cultural Revolution, Hua Luogeng received special attention and protection from Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 1952年9月加入中国民主同盟，1979年起任副主席。
description.en: Joined the China Democratic League in September 1952 and served as its Vice Chairman from 1979.

description.zh-cn: 1955年，捷克斯洛伐克加入华沙公约组织，与东欧大部分共产主义国家结成军事同盟。
description.en: In 1955, Czechoslovakia joined the Warsaw Pact, forming a military alliance with most of the communist countries in Eastern Europe.

description.zh-cn: 由于水门事件导致理查德·尼克松总统辞职，时任副总统杰拉尔德·福特继任成为美国总统。
description.en: Following President Richard Nixon's resignation due to the Watergate scandal, Vice President Gerald Ford succeeded to the presidency.

description.zh-cn: 明仁是昭和天皇的长子。
description.en: Akihito is the eldest son of Emperor Shōwa.

description.zh-cn: 明仁是香淳皇后的长子。
description.en: Akihito is the eldest son of Empress Kōjun.

description.zh-cn: 德仁是明仁的长子。
description.en: Naruhito is the eldest son of Akihito.

description.zh-cn: 明仁经由其家庭教师伊莉莎白·格雷·维宁的介绍与驻日盟军总司令麦克阿瑟见面。
description.en: Akihito met with Douglas MacArthur, the Supreme Commander for the Allied Powers, through an introduction by his tutor, Elizabeth Gray Vining.

description.zh-cn: 1992年10月，明仁天皇访华期间，与时任中共中央总书记江泽民会见。
description.en: In October 1992, during his visit to China, Emperor Akihito met with then-General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Jiang Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国国家主席杨尚昆邀请明仁天皇伉俪访问中国。
description.en: Then-President of China Yang Shangkun invited Emperor Akihito and his wife to visit China.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国于1948年在美国占领军的支持下建立。
description.en: The Republic of Korea was established in 1948 with the support of the U.S. occupation forces.

description.zh-cn: 周作人在日本留学时，曾师从章太炎学习《说文解字》。
description.en: While studying in Japan, Zhou Zuoren was a student of Zhang Taiyan, learning the 'Shuowen Jiezi'.

position.zh-cn: 国史编纂处编纂、文科教授、东方文学系主任、图书馆馆长、文学院院长
position.en: Compiler at the National History Compilation Office, Professor of the Faculty of Arts, Head of the Department of Oriental Literature, Director of the Library, Dean of the Faculty of Arts

description.zh-cn: 周作人自1917年起在北京大学任职，抗战期间留守北平后，于1939年起担任汪精卫政权下的北京大学图书馆馆长及文学院院长等职务。
description.en: Zhou Zuoren worked at Peking University starting in 1917. After staying in Beiping during the Anti-Japanese War, he served as the Director of the Peking University Library and Dean of the Faculty of Arts under the Wang Jingwei regime from 1939.

description.zh-cn: 1927年4月28日，奉系军阀张作霖在北京下令将中共创始人之一李大钊等20余名国民党及共产党员处以绞刑。
description.en: On April 28, 1927, warlord Zhang Zuolin ordered the execution by hanging of Li Dazhao, one of the founders of the CCP, and over 20 other Kuomintang and Communist party members in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命开始后，周作人遭到红卫兵的批斗和殴打，家产被查封，最终在迫害中于1967年5月去世。
description.en: After the Cultural Revolution began, Zhou Zuoren was denounced and beaten by Red Guards, his property was confiscated, and he eventually died amid the persecution in May 1967.

description.zh-cn: 根据周作人日记记载，毛泽东于1920年4月7日拜访了他。
description.en: According to Zhou Zuoren's diary, Mao Zedong visited him on April 7, 1920.

description.zh-cn: 在收到周作人的信后，毛泽东批示“养起来，做翻译工作”，使得周作人能在中华人民共和国成立后以翻译为生。
description.en: After receiving a letter from Zhou Zuoren, Mao Zedong instructed to 'support him and let him do translation work,' which allowed Zhou Zuoren to make a living as a translator after the founding of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 窝阔台是成吉思汗的第三子。
description.en: Ögedei was the third son of Genghis Khan.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥是拖雷的长子。
description.en: Möngke was the eldest son of Tolui.

description.zh-cn: 旭烈兀是拖雷的儿子。
description.en: Hulagu was a son of Tolui.

description.zh-cn: 阿里不哥是拖雷的幼子。
description.en: Ariq Böke was the youngest son of Tolui.

description.zh-cn: 宋哲宗是宋神宗的第六子和皇位继承人。
description.en: Emperor Zhezong was the sixth son and heir of Emperor Shenzong.

description.zh-cn: 宋神宗即位后，任命其所欣赏的王安石为宰相，推行变法。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Shenzong appointed Wang Anshi, whom he admired, as chancellor to implement reforms.

description.zh-cn: 宋神宗在作为太子时喜爱阅读《韩非子》，并对法家“富国强兵”之术很感兴趣，这影响了他后来的执政理念。
description.en: As Crown Prince, Emperor Shenzong enjoyed reading 'Han Feizi' and was interested in the Legalist methods of 'enriching the state and strengthening the military,' which influenced his later governing philosophy.

description.zh-cn: 宋神宗在即位前读过王安石的《上仁宗皇帝言事书》，非常赞赏其理财治国思想，这促使他后来任用王安石进行变法。
description.en: Before his accession, Emperor Shenzong read Wang Anshi's 'Memorial to Emperor Renzong' and greatly admired his ideas on financial management and state governance, which prompted him to later appoint Wang Anshi to carry out reforms.

description.zh-cn: 在位期间，宋神宗将西夏视为主要外部威胁，发动多次军事行动，意图一举将其歼灭。
description.en: During his reign, Emperor Shenzong regarded Western Xia as a major external threat and launched multiple military campaigns with the intent of annihilating it.

description.zh-cn: 宋真宗是宋太宗的第三个儿子。
description.en: Emperor Zhenzong was the third son of Emperor Taizong.

description.zh-cn: 经陈赓介绍，宋希濂加入中国共产党。
description.en: Through Chen Geng's introduction, Song Xilian joined the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 奉蒋介石之命，将瞿秋白枪决。
description.en: Under Chiang Kai-shek's orders, he executed Qu Qiubai by firing squad.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国人民解放军第五兵团司令员，其部队俘虏了宋希濂。
description.en: As the commander of the PLA's 5th Army Group, his troops captured Song Xilian.

position.en: Commissioner for Historical and Cultural Materials, Standing Committee Member

description.zh-cn: 1959年获特赦后，先后担任全国政协文史专员和常务委员。
description.en: After being granted amnesty in 1959, he served as a Commissioner for Historical and Cultural Materials and a Standing Committee Member of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在徐蚌会战末期的陈官庄被解放军包围，兵败阵亡。
description.en: He was surrounded by the People's Liberation Army at Chenguanzhuang in the final stage of the Huaihai Campaign, where he was defeated and killed in action.

description.zh-cn: 在徐蚌会战陈官庄被围期间，邱清泉所在的第二兵团归属杜聿明所主持的徐州剿匪总司令部前进指挥部指挥。
description.en: During the siege of Chenguanzhuang in the Huaihai Campaign, the 2nd Army Group commanded by Qiu Qingquan was under the command of the Xuzhou Bandit Suppression General Headquarters' forward command post, which was headed by Du Yuming.

description.zh-cn: 台中公馆机场于1966年3月20日改名为清泉岗机场，以纪念邱清泉。
description.en: Taichung's Kung Kuan Airport was renamed Ching Chuan Kang Airport on March 20, 1966, to commemorate Qiu Qingquan.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊接替黄坤明担任中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: Li Shulei succeeded Huang Kunming as the Head of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊先后在北京大学获得图书馆学学士、中国现代文学硕士和博士学位。
description.en: Li Shulei obtained his bachelor's degree in library science, and master's and doctoral degrees in modern Chinese literature from Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 在中央党校共事期间，李书磊受到时任校长习近平的赏识，为其后续的政治晋升奠定了基础。
description.en: During their time working together at the Central Party School, Li Shulei was appreciated by then-President Xi Jinping, which laid the foundation for his subsequent political advancement.

description.zh-cn: 担任福建省委宣传部长期间，亲自倡议、策划并修改了《福建日报》上关于习近平福建工作往事的三万余字系列报道，旨在宣传习近平的执政理念和经历。
description.en: While serving as the Head of the Propaganda Department of the Fujian Provincial Party Committee, he personally initiated, planned, and edited a series of reports in the Fujian Daily totaling over 30,000 words about Xi Jinping's past work in Fujian, aiming to promote Xi's governing philosophy and experience.

position.en: Deputy Director, Secretary of the Organ Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 李书磊于2020年7月当选机关党委书记，并于2020年12月26日卸任国家监委副主任职务。
description.en: Li Shulei was elected Secretary of the Organ Party Committee in July 2020 and resigned from his position as Deputy Director of the National Supervisory Commission on December 26, 2020.

description.zh-cn: 韩非出使秦国，后被迫侍奉秦始皇。
description.en: Han Fei went to the State of Qin as an envoy and was later forced to serve Qin Shi Huang.

description.zh-cn: 在担任山东巡抚期间，袁世凯采取强硬措施镇压义和团运动，维持了山东省的稳定。
description.en: As governor of Shandong, Yuan Shikai took strong measures to suppress the Boxer Rebellion, maintaining stability in the province.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯通过其手下段祺瑞等北洋将领通电威胁，迫使隆裕太后代表宣统皇帝颁布退位诏书，结束了清朝的统治。
description.en: Through his subordinate Duan Qirui and other Beiyang generals, Yuan Shikai threatened the court, forcing Empress Dowager Longyu to issue the abdication edict on behalf of the Xuantong Emperor, ending the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯在北京就任中华民国临时大总统，建立了北洋政府，开启了北洋军阀统治时期。
description.en: Yuan Shikai took office as the Provisional President of the Republic of China in Beijing, establishing the Beiyang government and initiating the Beiyang warlord era.

description.zh-cn: 袁克定是袁世凯与原配于氏所生的嫡长子。
description.en: Yuan Keding was the eldest legitimate son of Yuan Shikai and his primary wife, Lady Yu.

description.zh-cn: 在戊戌变法期间，康有为派谭嗣同秘密游说手握重兵的袁世凯，希望他发动兵变支持光绪帝。
description.en: During the Hundred Days' Reform, Kang Youwei sent Tan Sitong to secretly lobby Yuan Shikai, who controlled a powerful army, hoping he would launch a coup to support the Guangxu Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 在陈炯明部队炮轰总统府时，叶挺奉命守卫并掩护宋庆龄安全脱险。
陈炯明的部队炮轰总统府，叶挺率部抵抗。
在北伐战争中，叶挺率部讨伐吴佩孚势力。
广州起义失败后，叶挺在苏联受到李立三的无端指责，是其决定退出共产党的原因之一。
广州起义失败后，叶挺在苏联受到王明的无端指责，是其决定退出共产党的原因之一。
认为叶挺动摇，不允许其作报告，导致叶挺决定退出共产党。
周恩来多次与叶挺沟通，鼓励并说服其重返革命队伍，最终促成叶挺出任新四军军长并重返部队。
邀请叶挺访问延安，打消了中共方面对其脱党的疑虑，促使其顺利就任新四军军长。
两人在新四军的一系列战略问题上产生分歧，关系不睦，导致叶挺多次离军出走。
在皖南事变中，叶挺率领的新四军军部及皖南部队被国民党军队包围攻击，叶挺最终被俘，并被长期囚禁。
在岸信介内阁中担任邮政大臣。
description.en: Served as Minister of Posts in the cabinet of Nobusuke Kishi.

description.zh-cn: 1973年，田中角荣在美国白宫与时任美国总统理查·尼克森会面。
description.en: In 1973, Kakuei Tanaka met with then-US President Richard Nixon at the White House.

description.zh-cn: 在储位之争中，长孙无忌支持立晋王李治为太子。
description.en: During the succession struggle, Zhangsun Wuji supported the appointment of Prince Jin, Li Zhi, as the crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 在废黜李承干和排除李泰后，唐太宗最终决定立晋王李治为皇太子。
description.en: After deposing Li Chengqian and excluding Li Tai, Emperor Taizong decided to establish Prince Jin, Li Zhi, as the crown prince.

position.zh-cn: 公安部常务副部长、司法部部长
position.en: Executive Vice Minister of Public Security, Minister of Justice

description.zh-cn: 在李克强担任国务院总理期间，傅政华先后担任公安部常务副部长和司法部部长。
description.en: During Li Keqiang's premiership of the State Council, Fu Zhenghua served successively as Executive Vice Minister of Public Security and Minister of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 在郭声琨担任公安部部长期间，傅政华为其下属。
description.en: When Guo Shengkun was the Minister of Public Security, Fu Zhenghua was his subordinate.

position.en: Executive Vice Minister of Public Security

description.zh-cn: 在赵克志担任公安部部长期间，傅政华为其下属。
description.en: When Zhao Kezhi was the Minister of Public Security, Fu Zhenghua was his subordinate.

description.zh-cn: 接替张军出任中华人民共和国司法部部长。
description.en: Succeeded Zhang Jun as the Minister of Justice of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 司法部部长一职由唐一军接任。
description.en: His position as Minister of Justice was succeeded by Tang Yijun.

description.zh-cn: 2008年结识孙力军，后成为孙力军政治团伙的重要成员，并承认对其唯命是从。
description.en: Met Sun Lijun in 2008, later became an important member of Sun Lijun's political clique, and admitted to being completely subservient to him.

description.zh-cn: 在担任公安部副部长期间，曾负责调查周永康案。
description.en: While serving as Vice Minister of Public Security, he was responsible for investigating the Zhou Yongkang case.

description.zh-cn: 法轮功团体指控傅政华多次参与取缔法轮功的行动。
description.en: Falun Gong groups accused Fu Zhenghua of participating multiple times in actions to suppress Falun Gong.

description.zh-cn: 张纯如毕业于伊利诺伊大学厄巴纳-香槟分校新闻系。
description.en: Iris Chang graduated from the Department of Journalism at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign.

description.zh-cn: 张纯如在约翰·霍普金斯大学获得写作研讨班的文学硕士学位。
description.en: Iris Chang received her Master of Arts degree from the Writing Seminars at Johns Hopkins University.

description.zh-cn: 张纯如在遗书中声称自己被中央情报局等组织盯上，这加剧了她的精神压力。
description.en: In her suicide note, Iris Chang claimed she was being targeted by organizations like the CIA, which exacerbated her mental distress.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国总统马英九亲自颁发褒扬令以表彰已故的张纯如。
description.en: Then-President of the Republic of China, Ma Ying-jeou, personally issued a presidential citation to honor the late Iris Chang.

description.zh-cn: 在Alphabet成立后，桑德尔·皮蔡接任成为Google的首席执行官。
description.en: After the formation of Alphabet, Sundar Pichai took over as the CEO of Google.

description.zh-cn: 2011年4月，拉里·佩奇接替埃里克·施密特担任Google首席执行官。
description.en: In April 2011, Larry Page succeeded Eric Schmidt as the CEO of Google.

description.zh-cn: 由于中华人民共和国政府的网络审查政策，Google将其搜索服务移出中国大陆，此后Google的服务在中国大陆持续受到防火长城的干扰和屏蔽。
description.en: Due to the Chinese government's internet censorship policies, Google moved its search services out of mainland China. Since then, Google's services have been continuously interfered with and blocked by the Great Firewall in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 北京政权实际上由北洋军阀中的不同派系所控制。
description.en: The Beijing government was actually controlled by various factions within the Beiyang Warlords.

description.zh-cn: 冯玉祥使用暗杀的手段除去了皖系重要人物徐树铮。
description.en: Feng Yuxiang eliminated Xu Shuzheng, an important figure of the Anhui clique, by assassination.

description.zh-cn: 墨索里尼与希特勒是政治盟友，共同组建了轴心国联盟。
description.en: Mussolini and Hitler were political allies who formed the Axis powers.

description.zh-cn: 曹昂是曹操的长子。
description.en: Cao Ang was the eldest son of Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 在宛城之战中，曹昂将自己的坐骑让给被射伤的曹操，并步行保护其突围，使曹操得以幸免于难。
description.en: During the Battle of Wancheng, Cao Ang gave his own horse to the wounded Cao Cao and protected him on foot during the breakout, allowing Cao Cao to escape.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕称帝后，于黄初二年（221年）追尊曹昂为丰悼公，黄初五年（224年）追封为丰悼王，以示哀悼和尊崇。
description.en: After becoming emperor, Cao Pi posthumously honored Cao Ang as Duke Dao of Feng in 221 AD and later as King Dao of Feng in 224 AD, to show mourning and respect.

description.zh-cn: 魏明帝曹叡继位后，于太和三年（229年）改谥曹昂为丰愍王。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Ming of Wei, Cao Rui, changed Cao Ang's posthumous title to King Min of Feng in 229 AD.

description.zh-cn: 曹昂在二十岁时被举为孝廉，这是东汉的一种官吏选拔科目。
description.en: At the age of twenty, Cao Ang was nominated as a Xiaolian, which was a category for official selection in the Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 与张申府一同在德国柏林介绍朱德加入中国共产党。
description.en: Together with Zhang Shenfu, introduced Zhu De to join the Communist Party of China in Berlin, Germany.

description.zh-cn: 在上海初次会面时，因认为朱德军阀气息太重而拒绝其入党申请。
description.en: During their first meeting in Shanghai, rejected Zhu De's application to join the party, believing he had too much of a warlord air.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，任改编后的八路军（后称第十八集团军）总指挥/总司令。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, he served as the Commander-in-Chief of the reorganized Eighth Route Army (later known as the 18th Group Army).

description.zh-cn: 作为八路军总司令，指挥部队在华北敌后开辟根据地，开展游击战争。
description.en: As the Commander-in-Chief of the Eighth Route Army, he commanded troops to open up base areas and conduct guerrilla warfare behind enemy lines in North China.

description.zh-cn: 朱德是中国人民解放军的主要缔造者之一。
description.en: Zhu De is one of the main founders of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 在庐山会议期间，因朱德在批判彭德怀时肯定其积极一面，而批评朱德“未抓到痒处”。
description.en: During the Lushan Conference, criticized Zhu De for 'not scratching the itch' because Zhu affirmed Peng Dehuai's positive side while criticizing him.

description.zh-cn: 长期作为军事搭档，共同指挥了多次重要战役。在1959年庐山会议上，朱德因发言肯定彭德怀的积极面而受到毛泽东批评。
description.en: Served as long-term military partners, jointly commanding numerous important campaigns. At the 1959 Lushan Conference, Zhu De was criticized by Mao Zedong for affirming Peng Dehuai's positive aspects in his speech.

description.zh-cn: 颜回是孔子最得意的弟子，位居孔门七十二贤之首。
description.en: Yan Hui was Confucius's most favored disciple, ranked first among the Seventy-two Disciples.

description.zh-cn: 颜回是鲁国人。
description.en: Yan Hui was a native of the State of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 颜回与子路同为孔子弟子，曾一同侍奉孔子。
description.en: Yan Hui and Zilu were fellow disciples of Confucius and once served him together.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗于贞观二年（628年）下诏尊称颜回为“先师”，提升了其历史地位。
description.en: In 628 (the 2nd year of the Zhenguan era), Emperor Taizong of Tang issued an edict honoring Yan Hui as 'Former Master', elevating his historical status.

description.zh-cn: 唐高宗于总章元年（668年）追封颜回为太子少保。
description.en: In 668 (the 1st year of the Zongzhang era), Emperor Gaozong of Tang posthumously enfeoffed Yan Hui as 'Junior Guardian of the Heir Apparent'.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗于开元二十七年（739年）封颜回为“兖公”。
description.en: In 739 (the 27th year of the Kaiyuan era), Emperor Xuanzong of Tang enfeoffed Yan Hui as 'Duke of Yan'.

description.zh-cn: 宋真宗于大中祥符二年（1009年）加封颜回为“兖国公”。
description.en: In 1009 (the 2nd year of the Dazhong Xiangfu era), Emperor Zhenzong of Song further enfeoffed Yan Hui as 'Duke of the State of Yan'.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗于嘉靖九年（1530年）改封颜回为“复圣”。
description.en: In 1530 (the 9th year of the Jiajing era), the Jiajing Emperor changed Yan Hui's title to 'Continuator Sage'.

description.zh-cn: 因被怀疑是江南案主谋，蒋孝武从此失宠，被外放至新加坡及日本。
description.en: Suspected of being the mastermind behind the Henry Liu case, Chiang Hsiao-wu fell out of favor and was posted to Singapore and Japan.

description.zh-cn: 时任行政院院长郝柏村出席蒋孝武的丧礼并致祭。
description.en: Then-Premier Hau Pei-tsun attended and paid his respects at the funeral of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 担任马来西亚政府首脑。
description.en: Serves as the head of government of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰于1641年联合柔佛攻下葡属马六甲。
description.en: The Dutch, in alliance with Johor, captured Portuguese Malacca in 1641.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰是欧洲联盟（其前身为欧洲经济共同体）的创始成员国之一。
description.en: The Netherlands is one of the founding members of the European Union (formerly the European Economic Community).

description.zh-cn: 荷兰是北大西洋公约组织的创始成员国之一。
description.en: The Netherlands is one of the founding members of NATO.

description.zh-cn: 1949年，荷兰承认前殖民地荷属东印度独立为印度尼西亚。
description.en: In 1949, the Netherlands recognized the independence of its former colony, the Dutch East Indies, as Indonesia.

description.zh-cn: 身为军人及学生来到天安门参加了天安门抗议。
description.en: As a soldier and student, he went to Tiananmen Square to participate in the protests.

description.zh-cn: 发文对中国不断的封城表达不满，表示只有成本可控的清零才更有意义，过度清零后果严重。
description.en: Published an article expressing dissatisfaction with China's continuous lockdowns, stating that only a zero-COVID policy with controllable costs is meaningful and that excessive measures would have severe consequences.

description.zh-cn: 据香港《明报》报道，习近平肯定了胡锡进的宣传方式，并要求中共文宣系统加以效仿。
description.en: According to Hong Kong's Ming Pao, Xi Jinping affirmed Hu Xijin's propaganda methods and instructed the CCP's propaganda system to emulate them.

description.zh-cn: 因组织公款旅游，中纪委驻人民日报社纪检组对其进行调查并给予行政警告处分。
description.en: Due to organizing a tour with public funds, the CCDI's discipline inspection group stationed at the People's Daily investigated him and issued an administrative warning.

description.zh-cn: 就中国官方微博发布的“中国点火VS印度点火”图片，沈逸反驳胡锡进应高举人道主义大旗的观点，引发论战。
description.en: Regarding the 'China ignition vs. India ignition' image posted on an official Chinese Weibo account, Shen Yi rebutted Hu Xijin's view that China should uphold the banner of humanitarianism, sparking a debate.

description.zh-cn: 建立后周。
description.en: Established the Later Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 赵匡胤通过陈桥兵变篡夺后周，结束五代。
description.en: Zhao Kuangyin usurped the Later Zhou through the Chen Bridge Mutiny, ending the Five Dynasties period.

description.zh-cn: 后周于957年发兵南征南唐，南唐战败，割让江北十四州，称臣。
description.en: In 957, the Later Zhou launched a southern campaign against the Southern Tang. The Southern Tang was defeated, ceded fourteen prefectures north of the Yangtze River, and submitted as a vassal.

description.zh-cn: 粟裕是淮海战役的指挥官之一。
description.en: Su Yu was one of the commanders of the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平是淮海战役的指挥官之一。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping was one of the commanders of the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东评价粟裕在淮海战役中“立了第一功”。
description.en: Mao Zedong commented that Su Yu 'achieved the premier merit' in the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 1928年8月由中国共产主义青年团转为中国共产党党员。
description.en: Transferred from the Communist Youth League of China to become a member of the Communist Party of China in August 1928.

description.zh-cn: 在赵紫阳担任国务院总理期间，张爱萍先后任副总理和国防部长。
description.en: During Zhao Ziyang's premiership, Zhang Aiping served successively as Vice Premier and Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 1938年3月，奉周恩来之命前往徐州面见李宗仁。
description.en: In March 1938, under the order of Zhou Enlai, he went to Xuzhou to meet Li Zongren.

description.zh-cn: 文革期间，在周恩来关照下，张爱萍得以匿名保外就医。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, under the care of Zhou Enlai, Zhang Aiping was able to get medical parole anonymously.

description.zh-cn: 1938年3月，张爱萍前往徐州面见李宗仁，提出对日作战意见。
description.en: In March 1938, Zhang Aiping went to Xuzhou to meet with Li Zongren and propose opinions on the war against Japan.

description.zh-cn: 1949年4月23日华东军区海军成立，张爱萍成为第一任司令员，负责组建该部队。
description.en: On April 23, 1949, the East China Military Region Navy was established, and Zhang Aiping became its first commander, responsible for its formation.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命中，张爱萍受到批判，被关押五年，左腿致残。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Zhang Aiping was criticized, imprisoned for five years, and his left leg was disabled.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平1975年主持整顿工作后，张爱萍得以复出。
description.en: After Deng Xiaoping presided over the rectification work in 1975, Zhang Aiping was able to make a comeback.

description.zh-cn: 1989年六四事件中，张爱萍与其他六位将军共同强调，人民解放军的枪口不能对着人民群众。
description.en: During the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, Zhang Aiping, along with six other generals, emphasized that the guns of the People's Liberation Army should not be aimed at the people.

description.zh-cn: 1989年六四事件中，叶飞与其他六位将军共同强调，人民解放军的枪口不能对着人民群众。
description.en: During the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, Ye Fei, along with six other generals, emphasized that the guns of the People's Liberation Army should not be aimed at the people.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东曾评价张爱萍：“好犯上！”
description.en: Mao Zedong once commented on Zhang Aiping: 'Likes to offend superiors!'

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英曾评价张爱萍：“浑身带刺！”
description.en: Ye Jianying once commented on Zhang Aiping: 'Covered in thorns!'

description.zh-cn: 邓小平曾评价张爱萍：“军队中有两个人惹不起，你张爱萍，就是一个！”
description.en: Deng Xiaoping once commented on Zhang Aiping: 'There are two people in the army you can't mess with, and you, Zhang Aiping, are one of them!'

description.zh-cn: 1989年，张爱萍与王震在一个“重大问题”（指六四事件）上发生了争执。
description.en: In 1989, Zhang Aiping and Wang Zhen had a dispute over a 'major issue' (referring to the Tiananmen Square protests).

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝时期，汉朝为打击匈奴势力，积极寻求与西域各国建立军事同盟。
description.en: During the reign of Emperor Wu, the Han dynasty actively sought military alliances with states in the Western Regions to attack the Xiongnu forces.

description.zh-cn: 在北宋时期，西夏政权地处河西走廊，阻隔了宋朝与西域的传统陆上商路。
description.en: During the Northern Song Dynasty, the Western Xia regime was located in the Hexi Corridor, blocking the traditional overland trade route between the Song court and the Western Regions.

description.zh-cn: 通过西征和建立蒙古帝国，重新打通并保障了欧亚大陆的商路（尤其是草原丝绸之路）的畅通。
description.en: Through his western conquests and the establishment of the Mongol Empire, he reopened and secured the trade routes across Eurasia, especially the Steppe Silk Road.

description.zh-cn: 在辖境内推行驿站交通系统，极大地促进了丝绸之路的畅通和沿线商贸往来。
description.en: Implemented the Yam (postal station) system within its territory, greatly facilitating the flow of traffic and trade along the Silk Road.

description.zh-cn: 佛教自于阗沿丝绸之路全面传入西域各国，并最终传播至中原。
description.en: Buddhism spread comprehensively from Khotan to the states of the Western Regions along the Silk Road, and eventually reached the Central Plains of China.

description.zh-cn: 李克农担任副总参谋长期间，黄克诚为时任总参谋长。
description.en: When Li Kenong served as Deputy Chief of the General Staff, Huang Kecheng was the Chief of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 李克农担任副总参谋长期间，罗瑞卿为时任总参谋长。
description.en: When Li Kenong served as Deputy Chief of the General Staff, Luo Ruiqing was the Chief of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 在抗日战争期间从事统战和情报工作。
description.en: Engaged in united front and intelligence work during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 作为朝鲜停战谈判中方代表团的总指挥和最高负责人，参与停战谈判。
description.en: Participated in the armistice negotiations as the commander-in-chief and highest responsible person of the Chinese delegation for the Korean War Armistice Negotiations.

description.zh-cn: 同为“龙潭三杰”成员，在中共中央特科共事。
description.en: Both were members of the 'Longtan Three Heroes' and worked together in the CCP Central Special Branch.

description.zh-cn: 获取顾顺章叛变的情报后，派人通知李克农。
description.en: After obtaining intelligence about Gu Shunzhang's defection, sent someone to inform Li Kenong.

description.zh-cn: 及时转报顾顺章叛变的情报，使中共中央机关得以安全转移。
description.en: Promptly relayed the intelligence of Gu Shunzhang's defection, allowing the CCP Central Committee organs to safely relocate.

description.zh-cn: 在中共中央特科领导下从事秘密情报工作。
description.en: Engaged in secret intelligence work under the leadership of the CCP Central Special Branch.

description.zh-cn: 作为中共代表团秘书长，协助周恩来处理西安事变，促进国共谈判。
description.en: As secretary-general of the CCP delegation, assisted Zhou Enlai in handling the Xi'an Incident and promoting KMT-CCP negotiations.

description.zh-cn: 在西安事变及日内瓦会议等多个场合，作为周恩来的助手开展工作。
description.en: Worked as Zhou Enlai's assistant on multiple occasions, including the Xi'an Incident and the Geneva Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在张国焘叛逃中共时将其扣留。
description.en: Detained Zhang Guotao when he defected from the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 在中共中央后方委员会期间，于叶剑英领导下开展情报工作。
description.en: During his time at the CCP Central Rear Committee, he conducted intelligence work under the leadership of Ye Jianying.

description.zh-cn: 与康生共同下令将王实味秘密处死。
description.en: Jointly with Kang Sheng, ordered the secret execution of Wang Shiwei.

description.zh-cn: 李克农接替康生出任中共中央社会部（前身为情报部）部长。
description.en: Li Kenong succeeded Kang Sheng as Minister of the Central Social Affairs Department (formerly the Intelligence Department).

description.zh-cn: 领导破获了国民党特工密谋刺杀毛泽东的案件，保护了其安全。
description.en: Led the effort to foil a Kuomintang assassination plot against Mao Zedong, ensuring his safety.

description.zh-cn: 在李克农诞辰九十周年时，作为中华人民共和国主席高度评价李克农。
description.en: As President of the People's Republic of China, highly praised Li Kenong on the 90th anniversary of his birth.

position.en: Prefect of the Gentlemen of the Palace, Middle Chancellor

description.zh-cn: 秦二世登基后，赵高升任郎中令，后又成为中丞相，独揽朝政。
description.en: After Qin Er Shi ascended the throne, Zhao Gao was promoted to Prefect of the Gentlemen of the Palace and later became the Middle Chancellor, monopolizing state power.

description.zh-cn: 赵高曾担任公子胡亥（后来的秦二世）的老师，教授他决断讼案。
description.en: Zhao Gao served as a tutor to Prince Huhai (later Qin Er Shi), teaching him how to adjudicate legal cases.

description.zh-cn: 在沙丘之变后，赵高挑唆秦二世，致使蒙恬被囚禁并最终服毒自尽。
description.en: After the Shaqiu Coup, Zhao Gao incited Qin Er Shi, leading to Meng Tian's imprisonment and eventual suicide by poison.

description.zh-cn: 赵高为测试群臣，策划了指鹿为马事件，以清除异己，巩固权力。
description.en: To test the ministers, Zhao Gao orchestrated the 'pointing to a deer and calling it a horse' incident to eliminate dissenters and consolidate power.

description.zh-cn: 在巨鹿之战中，项羽率领的军队击败了章邯率领的秦军主力。
description.en: At the Battle of Julu, the army led by Xiang Yu defeated the main force of the Qin army led by Zhang Han.

description.zh-cn: 章邯派长史司马欣向赵高请示，赵高拒不接见，加剧了章邯的恐惧和不信任，最终导致其投降。
description.en: Zhang Han sent his chief clerk Sima Xin to consult Zhao Gao, but Zhao Gao refused to see him, exacerbating Zhang Han's fear and distrust, which ultimately led to his surrender.

description.zh-cn: 赵高在杀死秦二世后，曾派使者联络刘邦，欲与关东诸侯共同瓜分秦朝，但遭到刘邦拒绝。
description.en: After killing Qin Er Shi, Zhao Gao sent an emissary to contact Liu Bang, intending to divide the Qin territory with the eastern lords, but was refused by Liu Bang.

description.zh-cn: 李斯死后，秦二世任命赵高任中丞相。
description.en: After the death of Li Si, Qin Er Shi appointed Zhao Gao as the Middle Chancellor.

description.zh-cn: 1950年，孟小冬在香港与杜月笙办理结婚手续，成为其妾室，直至1951年杜月笙去世。
description.en: In 1950, Meng Xiaodong married Du Yuesheng in Hong Kong, becoming his concubine until his death in August 1951.

description.zh-cn: 1927年与梅兰芳结合，但此段关系未被梅家正式承认，被视为外室。两人于1931年正式分手。
description.en: She entered into a relationship with Mei Lanfang in 1927, but it was not formally recognized by Mei's family, and she was considered his outside wife. they formally separated in 1931.

description.zh-cn: 1966年文化大革命爆发后，香港亦受影响，促使孟小冬于1967年迁居台湾。
description.en: After the Cultural Revolution broke out in 1966, Hong Kong was affected, prompting Meng Xiaodong to move to Taiwan in 1967.

description.zh-cn: 马克思在工业革命的社会背景下，创立了共产主义学说。
description.en: Karl Marx founded the doctrine of communism against the social backdrop of the Industrial Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 时任湖广总督的张之洞推荐黄兴入武昌两湖书院读书。
description.en: Zhang Zhidong, then Viceroy of Huguang, recommended Huang Xing to study at Lianghu Academy in Wuchang.

description.zh-cn: 拥护孙中山将华兴会等团体合并，成立中国同盟会。
description.en: Supported Sun Yat-sen in merging groups like the Huaxinghui to establish the Tongmenghui.

description.zh-cn: 发动二次革命武装讨伐袁世凯。
description.en: Launched the Second Revolution, an armed campaign against Yuan Shikai.

description.zh-cn: 时任大总统黎元洪遵国会议决，颁令为黄兴举行国葬。
description.en: Then-President Li Yuanhong, following a resolution of the National Assembly, issued an order for a state funeral for Huang Xing.

description.zh-cn: 黄兴逝世时，蔡锷写下挽联悼念，两人同为革命元勋，并同葬于岳麓山。
description.en: When Huang Xing passed away, Cai E wrote a couplet in mourning. Both were founding fathers of the revolution and are buried together on Yuelu Mountain.

description.zh-cn: 章太炎很敬重黄兴，曾愿拥戴其为同盟会领袖，并在其追悼会上送挽联：“无公则无民国，有史必有斯人。”
description.en: Zhang Taiyan held great respect for Huang Xing, once wishing to support him as the leader of the Tongmenghui, and sent a couplet to his memorial service that read: 'Without you, there would be no Republic; as long as there is history, there will be this man.'

description.zh-cn: 陈平使用反间计，成功使项羽猜忌范增，导致范增辞归，最终病死途中，为刘邦清除了一个重要障碍。
description.en: Chen Ping used a stratagem to successfully make Xiang Yu suspicious of Fan Zeng, which led to Fan Zeng's resignation and subsequent death, removing a major obstacle for Liu Bang.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦还定三秦时，击败章邯，将其围困于废丘，章邯最终自杀。
description.en: When Liu Bang conquered the Three Qins, he defeated Zhang Han and besieged him in Feiqiu, leading to Zhang Han's suicide.

description.zh-cn: 太平洋战争爆发后，日本对英美等国宣战，随即全面占领了上海租界。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Pacific War, Japan declared war on countries like the UK and the US, and subsequently occupied the entire Shanghai concessions.

description.zh-cn: 章伯钧是中国民主同盟的主要创始人之一。
description.en: Zhang Bojun was one of the main founders of the China Democratic League.

description.zh-cn: 1948年1月，民盟公开宣布与中国共产党合作，共同反对国民党的一党专政。
description.en: In January 1948, the China Democratic League publicly announced its cooperation with the Communist Party of China to jointly oppose the Kuomintang's one-party dictatorship.

description.zh-cn: 1949年中华人民共和国成立后，民盟接受中国共产党的政治领导，成为参政党。
