description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China in 1949, the China Democratic League accepted the political leadership of the Communist Party of China and became a participating political party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，毛泽东建议包括民盟在内的八个民主党派继续保留下来。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Mao Zedong suggested that the eight democratic parties, including the China Democratic League, should be preserved.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，民盟各级组织被迫停止活动。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, all levels of the China Democratic League's organizations were forced to cease their activities.

description.zh-cn: “粉碎四人帮”事件后，民盟逐步恢复组织活动。
description.en: After the 'Smashing of the Gang of Four', the China Democratic League gradually resumed its organizational activities.

description.zh-cn: 费孝通自1987年起担任民盟中央主席，直至1996年辞职。
description.en: Fei Xiaotong served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League from 1987 until his resignation in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 丁仲礼自2017年起担任民盟中央主席。
description.en: Ding Zhongli has served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League since 2017.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰与澳大利亚在政治、经济与军事上有密切的合作关系。
description.en: New Zealand has close political, economic, and military cooperation with Australia.

description.zh-cn: 在林彪出逃的“九一三事件”中，周恩来全程主持了对该事件的处理工作。
description.en: During the 'September 13 Incident' of Lin Biao's defection, Zhou Enlai managed the handling of the entire event.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命后期，四人帮通过“批林批孔”等政治运动，将矛头指向周恩来。
description.en: In the later stages of the Cultural Revolution, the Gang of Four targeted Zhou Enlai through political campaigns such as 'Criticize Lin, Criticize Confucius'.

description.zh-cn: 1966年8月5日，北京师范大学附属女子中学的红卫兵将时任学校副校长卞仲耘活活打死。
description.en: On August 5, 1966, Red Guards from the Experimental High School Attached to Beijing Normal University beat Vice Principal Bian Zhongyun to death.

description.zh-cn: 时任公安部长谢富治发表讲话，要求保护红卫兵，并表示“打死就打死了，我们根本管不着”，纵容了暴力行为。
description.en: Then Minister of Public Security Xie Fuzhi gave speeches demanding the protection of Red Guards, stating, 'If they are killed, they are killed, we can't manage it at all,' thus condoning the violence.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的大字报不点名地指责以刘少奇为首的中央领导“实行白色恐怖”，加剧了对刘少奇的批判。
description.en: Mao Zedong's big-character poster implicitly accused the central leadership headed by Liu Shaoqi of 'implementing a White Terror,' intensifying the criticism against him.

description.zh-cn: 在“榄杆市事件”后，周恩来下令由政府组织“红卫兵联络站”并派人民解放军保护红卫兵的抄家行动。
description.en: After the 'Langan'shi Incident,' Zhou Enlai ordered the government to organize 'Red Guard Liaison Stations' and dispatched the People's Liberation Army to protect the Red Guards' home-raiding actions.

description.zh-cn: 因节目调整，凤凰卫视旗下节目《锵锵三人行》于2017年9月12日突然停播，该事件发生于中共十九大召开前夕，引发外界关于内容审查的争议。
description.en: Due to program adjustments, the Phoenix TV show 'Qiang Qiang San Ren Xing' was abruptly suspended on September 12, 2017. This occurred just before the 19th National Congress of the CCP, sparking controversy about content censorship.

description.zh-cn: 铁凝在第十四届全国人民代表大会上当选为全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Tie Ning was elected as a Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress at the 14th National People's Congress.

position.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会副委员长
position.en: Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 在赵乐际担任全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长期间，铁凝担任副委员长。
description.en: Tie Ning serves as Vice Chairperson while Zhao Leji is the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 铁凝接替巴金，担任中国作家协会主席。
description.en: Tie Ning succeeded Ba Jin as the Chairperson of the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 铁凝是中共第十六届、十七届中央候补委员，以及第十八届、十九届、二十届中央委员。
description.en: Tie Ning was an alternate member of the 16th and 17th Central Committees, and a full member of the 18th, 19th, and 20th Central Committees of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 1932年一二八事变后，田汉经瞿秋白主持加入中国共产党。
description.en: After the January 28 incident of 1932, Tian Han joined the Communist Party of China with Qu Qiubai presiding over his admission.

description.zh-cn: 1932年加入中国共产党。1975年被死后“永远开除党籍”，1979年平反并恢复党籍。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in 1932. He was posthumously "permanently expelled from the party" in 1975, and was rehabilitated and had his membership restored in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命中，田汉遭到批斗、监禁和非人虐待，最终于1968年被迫害致死。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Tian Han was subjected to public criticism sessions, imprisonment, and inhuman abuse, ultimately leading to his death from persecution in 1968.

description.zh-cn: 1966年7月，田汉被红卫兵批斗。
description.en: In July 1966, Tian Han was subjected to struggle sessions by the Red Guards.

description.zh-cn: 1966年12月4日，田汉被北京卫戍区司令部监押。
description.en: On December 4, 1966, Tian Han was arrested and imprisoned by the Beijing Garrison Command.

description.zh-cn: 1979年4月，中共为田汉平反，恢复其党籍和名誉。
description.en: In April 1979, the CCP posthumously rehabilitated Tian Han, restoring his party membership and reputation.

description.zh-cn: 禹元植是第22届大韩民国国会的议长。
description.en: Woo Won-shik is the Speaker of the 22nd National Assembly of the Republic of Korea.

position.en: First Speaker of the National Assembly

description.zh-cn: 1948年5月31日，李承晚在首届国会全体会议上被选举为首任国会议长。
description.en: On May 31, 1948, Syngman Rhee was elected as the first Speaker of the National Assembly at its first plenary session.

description.zh-cn: 1948年7月20日，国会在间接选举中选出李承晚为首任韩国总统。
description.en: On July 20, 1948, the National Assembly elected Syngman Rhee as the first President of South Korea in an indirect election.

description.zh-cn: 金泳三是韩国国会历史上担任过9届议员的任期最长者之一，并于1954年以26岁之龄首次当选，成为最年轻议员。
description.en: Kim Young-sam was one of the longest-serving members in the history of the National Assembly, serving nine terms. He was first elected in 1954 at the age of 26, becoming the youngest member.

position.en: Seal-holding Eunuch of the Directorate of Ceremonial

description.zh-cn: 魏忠贤是明熹宗的司礼监秉笔太监，深受其宠信，逐渐专擅朝政。
description.en: Wei Zhongxian served as the Seal-holding Eunuch for Emperor Xizong of Ming. Deeply trusted by the emperor, he gradually came to dominate the court.

description.zh-cn: 魏忠贤于天启三年十二月开始总督东厂，利用这一特务机构大肆清除异己。
description.en: Wei Zhongxian took charge of the Eastern Depot in December 1623, using this spy agency to extensively eliminate his opponents.

description.zh-cn: 在与东林党的斗争中，魏忠贤利用其权力，诬陷、罢黜乃至杀害了大量东林党人，包括“东林六君子”和“东林七君子”。
description.en: In his struggle against the Donglin Party, Wei Zhongxian used his power to frame, dismiss, and even kill a large number of its members, including the 'Six Gentlemen of Donglin' and the 'Seven Gentlemen of Donglin'.

description.zh-cn: 为在朝中自保，时任辽东巡抚的袁崇焕曾上疏颂扬魏忠贤的功德，并为其请求建立生祠。
description.en: To protect his position at court, Yuan Chonghuan, then governor of Liaodong, submitted a memorial praising Wei Zhongxian's merits and requested the construction of a living shrine in his honor.

description.zh-cn: 优酷网是《穹顶之下》的首播平台之一，为该片的迅速传播提供了渠道。
description.en: Youku was one of the initial distributors of 'Under the Dome', providing a channel for its rapid dissemination.

description.zh-cn: 在接到中共中央宣传部的指示后，优酷网下架了《穹顶之下》的视频，并停止了留言功能。
description.en: After receiving the directive from the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee, Youku removed the video of 'Under the Dome' and disabled its comment function.

description.zh-cn: 方舟子撰文质疑《穹顶之下》的科学严谨性，并指责柴静编造其女儿患肿瘤的故事以博取同情。
description.en: Fang Zhouzi wrote an article questioning the scientific rigor of 'Under the Dome' and accused Chai Jing of fabricating the story of her daughter's tumor to gain sympathy.

description.zh-cn: 朱高煦在靖难之役时立有战功，多次营救其父明成祖于危难之中。
description.en: Zhu Gaoxu achieved military merits during the Jingnan Campaign, repeatedly rescuing his father, the Yongle Emperor, from danger.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋于洪武二十八年（1395年）封朱高煦为高阳王。
description.en: In 1395, the Hongwu Emperor Zhu Yuanzhang enfeoffed Zhu Gaoxu as the Prince of Gaoyang.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖朱棣于永乐二年（1404年）封朱高煦为汉王。
description.en: In 1404, the Yongle Emperor Zhu Di enfeoffed Zhu Gaoxu as the Prince of Han.

description.zh-cn: 永乐十四年，明成祖得知朱高煦作恶多端，欲废其为庶人，后经太子力劝，于次年将其强行迁封至山东乐安州。
description.en: In the 14th year of Yongle, the Yongle Emperor learned of Zhu Gaoxu's many wrongdoings and intended to demote him to a commoner. After the crown prince's intercession, he forcibly relocated his fief to Le'an Prefecture in Shandong the following year.

description.zh-cn: 朱高煦投降后，被明宣宗废为庶人并囚禁。后因朱高煦伸腿绊倒宣宗，宣宗大怒，命人将其置于铜缸内以炮烙之刑处死。
description.en: After surrendering, Zhu Gaoxu was demoted to a commoner and imprisoned by the Xuande Emperor. Later, because Zhu Gaoxu tripped the emperor, the enraged emperor ordered him to be placed in a bronze vat and executed by burning.

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利现任中共深圳市委书记。
description.en: Meng Fanli currently serves as the Secretary of the Shenzhen Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 朱温于882年率部投降唐朝，被授以官职，成为唐末的藩镇节度使。
description.en: In 882, Zhu Wen surrendered to the Tang dynasty with his troops and was appointed as an official, becoming a provincial military governor (jiedushi) in the late Tang period.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记是设立于中央书记处的领导职务，负责处理其运作。
description.en: The General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee was a leading position established within the Central Secretariat, responsible for managing its operations.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命爆发后，总书记职务被撤销。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Cultural Revolution, the position of General Secretary was abolished.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平担任中央书记处总书记，负责处理中央书记处运作。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping served as the General Secretary of the Central Secretariat, responsible for its operations.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦在中央书记处重新设立后担任总书记。
description.en: Hu Yaobang served as General Secretary after the Central Secretariat was re-established.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在担任中央书记处总书记期间，兼任中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: While serving as General Secretary of the Central Secretariat, Deng Xiaoping concurrently held the position of a member of the Standing Committee of the CPC Politburo.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦在担任中央书记处总书记期间，兼任中共中央主席。
description.en: While serving as General Secretary of the Central Secretariat, Hu Yaobang concurrently held the position of Chairman of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦在担任中央书记处总书记期间，兼任中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: While serving as General Secretary of the Central Secretariat, Hu Yaobang concurrently held the position of a member of the Standing Committee of the CPC Politburo.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦在担任中央书记处总书记期间，兼任中央纪委第三书记。
description.en: While serving as General Secretary of the Central Secretariat, Hu Yaobang concurrently held the position of Third Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 1946年至1951年在北京大学物理系、机械系学习。
description.en: Studied in the Department of Physics and the Department of Mechanics at Peking University from 1946 to 1951.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件中，胡启立因同情学生运动，支持时任中共中央总书记赵紫阳，而被免去中共中央政治局常委等党内领导职务。
description.en: During the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, Hu Qili was dismissed from his party leadership positions, including his post on the Politburo Standing Committee, for sympathizing with the student movement and supporting the then-General Secretary Zhao Ziyang.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件中，同情学生运动并支持赵紫阳。
description.en: During the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, he sympathized with the student movement and supported Zhao Ziyang.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命开始后，胡启立被下放到“五七干校”劳动，直到1972年才被恢复工作。
description.en: After the Cultural Revolution began, Hu Qili was sent to a 'May Seventh Cadre School' for labor and was not reinstated until 1972.

description.zh-cn: 粉碎四人帮后，胡启立的政治生涯得以恢复和发展，历任清华党委副书记兼副校长，团中央书记处书记等职务。
description.en: After the smashing of the Gang of Four, Hu Qili's political career was restored and developed, and he subsequently served as Deputy Party Secretary and Vice President of Tsinghua University, and Secretary of the Secretariat of the CYL Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1955年8月，胡启立在当选中华全国学生联合会主席后，受到毛泽东的接见。
description.en: In August 1955, after being elected chairman of the All-China Students' Federation, Hu Qili was received by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝的建立取代了北周。
description.en: The establishment of the Sui dynasty replaced the Northern Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 隋炀帝大规模兴建并连接运河，形成了贯通南北的隋唐大运河。
description.en: Emperor Yang of Sui undertook the large-scale construction and connection of canals, forming the Sui-Tang Grand Canal that ran from north to south.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝的建立标志着以长安为中心的隋朝正统的终结。
description.en: The establishment of the Tang dynasty marked the end of the legitimate Sui dynasty centered in Chang'an.

description.zh-cn: 世界卫生组织呼吁停止供应和使用单一青蒿素药物治疗疟疾，以防止疟原虫产生耐药性，并推广青蒿素联合疗法。
description.en: The WHO called for a halt to the provision and use of single-drug artemisinin malaria pills to prevent the development of drug resistance in parasites, promoting artemisinin-based combination therapies instead.

description.zh-cn: 在宣布戒严后，指示国军防谍司令部以“反国家势力”为由将其列入逮捕名单。
description.en: After declaring martial law, instructed the Defense Counterintelligence Command to add him to an arrest list under the pretext of being an "anti-state force."

description.zh-cn: 在宣布戒严后，指示国军防谍司令部以“反国家势力”为由将其列入逮捕名单。
description.en: After declaring martial law, instructed the Defense Counterintelligence Command to add him to an arrest list under the pretext of being an "anti-state force."

description.zh-cn: 毛泽民是毛泽东的弟弟。
description.en: Mao Zemin is Mao Zedong's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽民是毛泽覃的哥哥。
description.en: Mao Zemin is Mao Zetan's elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 1922年冬，毛泽民加入中国共产党。
description.en: In the winter of 1922, Mao Zemin joined the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1942年，盛世才投靠蒋介石，转而采取反苏反共政策，并扣押、杀害了在新疆工作的中共党员。
description.en: In 1942, Sheng Shicai defected to Chiang Kai-shek, adopted an anti-Soviet and anti-communist policy, and detained and killed CCP members working in Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 多次向国民党当局交涉，要求释放被盛世才扣押的毛泽民等人。
description.en: Repeatedly negotiated with the Kuomintang authorities, demanding the release of Mao Zemin and others detained by Sheng Shicai.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党在1980年放弃马克思列宁主义，将其从党和国家的指导思想中删除。
description.en: The Workers' Party of Korea abandoned Marxism–Leninism in 1980, removing it as the guiding ideology of the party and state.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜删除了宪法中的共产主义作为指导思想。
description.en: North Korea removed communism as a guiding ideology from its constitution.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党在1980年将主体思想确立为唯一指导思想。
description.en: The Workers' Party of Korea established Juche as the sole guiding ideology in 1980.

description.zh-cn: 俞正声是俞启威（黄敬）的儿子。
description.en: Yu Zhengsheng is the son of Yu Qiwei (Huang Jing).

description.zh-cn: 因母亲范瑾在文革中被打倒，俞正声毕业后被分配到河北张家口的工厂当技术员，影响了其早期职业生涯。
description.en: Because his mother Fan Jin was overthrown during the Cultural Revolution, Yu Zhengsheng was assigned to a factory in Zhangjiakou, Hebei as a technician after graduation, which affected his early career.

description.zh-cn: 1984年，受好友邓朴方力邀，俞正声出任中国残疾人福利基金会负责人。
description.en: In 1984, at the strong invitation of his friend Deng Pufang, Yu Zhengsheng became the head of the China Disabled Persons' Federation.

description.zh-cn: 据中国大陆媒体《财经》杂志暗指，俞正声曾涉入与李薇的不伦关系。
description.en: According to the mainland Chinese media outlet Caijing Magazine, it was implied that Yu Zhengsheng was involved in an illicit affair with Li Wei.

description.zh-cn: 俞正声主政上海期间，成功举办了2010年上海世博会，但也因经济停滞、外来人口激增等问题引发争议和市民不满。
description.en: During his tenure as the head of Shanghai, Yu Zhengsheng successfully hosted the 2010 Shanghai Expo, but also faced controversy and public dissatisfaction due to issues such as economic stagnation and a sharp increase in the migrant population.

position.en: Member of the Politburo Standing Committee

description.zh-cn: 在习近平担任中共中央总书记期间，俞正声任中央政治局常委。
description.en: While Xi Jinping served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, Yu Zhengsheng was a member of the Politburo Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 汪洋接替俞正声，担任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席职务。
description.en: Wang Yang succeeded Yu Zhengsheng as the Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 俞正声曾就读于哈尔滨军事工程学院（现中国人民解放军国防科技大学），并于1968年毕业。
description.en: Yu Zhengsheng studied at the Harbin Military Engineering Institute (now the National University of Defense Technology) and graduated in 1968.

description.zh-cn: 越南战争是冷战在东南亚地区激化的表现，是两大阵营对抗的局部热战。
description.en: The Vietnam War was a manifestation of the intensification of the Cold War in Southeast Asia, a local hot war in the confrontation between the two major blocs.

description.zh-cn: 美国作为南越的主要盟友，与北越直接交战。
description.en: The United States, as the main ally of South Vietnam, was in direct conflict with North Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 肯尼迪政府时期，美国开始向南越派遣特种作战部队，开启了美军战斗部队进入越南的先河。肯尼迪任内，将派往越南的美军顾问从800人增加至16300人，进一步加深了美国对越南战争的介入。
description.en: During the Kennedy administration, the United States began sending special operations forces to South Vietnam, pioneering the entry of U.S. combat troops. Kennedy also increased the number of U.S. military advisors from 800 to 16,300, significantly deepening American involvement in the Vietnam War.

description.zh-cn: 北越在战胜南越后，于1976年将南北统一，成立了越南社会主义共和国。
description.en: After defeating South Vietnam, North Vietnam unified the north and south in 1976, establishing the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

position.zh-cn: 越南劳动党主席，越南民主共和国主席
position.en: Chairman of the Workers' Party of Vietnam, President of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam

description.zh-cn: 胡志明是北越的最高领导人，直到他于1969年去世。
description.en: Ho Chi Minh was the supreme leader of North Vietnam until his death in 1969.

description.zh-cn: 时任国务院总理温家宝提名刘志军担任中华人民共和国铁道部部长。
description.en: Then-Premier Wen Jiabao nominated Liu Zhijun to be the Minister of Railways of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 时任国家主席胡锦涛根据全国人民代表大会的决定，任命刘志军为铁道部部长。
description.en: Then-President Hu Jintao appointed Liu Zhijun as Minister of Railways in accordance with the decision of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 刘志军在此期间担任铁道部部长及党组书记。
description.en: Liu Zhijun served as the Minister and Party Group Secretary of the Ministry of Railways during this period.

description.zh-cn: 在刘志军担任铁道部部长期间，温家宝是其上级（国务院总理）。
description.en: During Liu Zhijun's tenure as Minister of Railways, Wen Jiabao was his superior (Premier of the State Council).

description.zh-cn: 中共中央纪委对刘志军涉嫌严重违纪问题进行立案调查，并最终决定开除其党籍。
description.en: The CCDI of the CPC investigated Liu Zhijun for suspected serious violations of discipline and ultimately decided to expel him from the party.

description.zh-cn: 于1969年至1978年间加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China between 1969 and 1978.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命开始时，秦晖是初中学生，后成为广西“四二二派”的一员，这段经历深刻影响了他的早年生活。
description.en: When the Cultural Revolution began, Qin Hui was a middle school student and later became a member of the 'April 22 Faction' in Guangxi, an experience that profoundly influenced his early life.

description.zh-cn: 根据天主教会的信仰，教会由耶稣基督建立于公元33年的耶路撒冷。
description.en: According to Catholic belief, the Church was founded by Jesus Christ in Jerusalem in 33 AD.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面信息框，良十四世是天主教会的领袖教宗。
description.en: According to the page's infobox, Leo XIV is the Pope, the leader of the Catholic Church.

description.zh-cn: 利玛窦是耶稣会的会士。
description.en: Matteo Ricci was a member of the Society of Jesus (Jesuits).

description.zh-cn: 利玛窦在明朝中叶成功进入中国传教，使天主教再次在中国传播开来。
description.en: Matteo Ricci successfully entered China to conduct missionary work in the mid-Ming Dynasty, leading to the renewed spread of Catholicism in China.

description.zh-cn: 清政府任命左宗棠为钦差大臣，督办新疆军务，负责收复被阿古柏占据的新疆。
张高丽曾是中国共产党第十八届中央政治局常务委员会委员。
description.en: Zhang Gaoli was a member of the 18th Politburo Standing Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 张高丽曾任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Zhang Gaoli served as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1962年至1967年在北京大学历史系学习。
description.en: Studied in the Department of History at Peking University from 1962 to 1967.

description.zh-cn: 担任第十届全国人大常委。
description.en: Served as a member of the Standing Committee of the 10th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 2014年4月秘访日本期间，与时任首相安倍晋三会晤。
description.en: During a secret visit to Japan in April 2014, met with then-Prime Minister Shinzo Abe.

description.zh-cn: 在庐山会议上，彭德怀因对“大跃进”提出异议而被毛泽东打倒。
description.en: At the Lushan Conference, Peng Dehuai was purged by Mao Zedong for criticizing the 'Great Leap Forward'.

description.zh-cn: 陈梦是黄晓明的表妹。
description.en: Chen Meng is Huang Xiaoming's cousin.

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明于2000年毕业于北京电影学院表演系本科班。
description.en: Huang Xiaoming graduated from the undergraduate program of the Performing Arts Department at Beijing Film Academy in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明于2007年至2010年签约华谊兄弟文化经纪公司。
description.en: Huang Xiaoming was signed with Huayi Brothers Culture and Brokerage Co. from 2007 to 2010.

description.zh-cn: 托洛茨基主义是马克思主义的一个流派，托洛茨基自视为正统马克思主义者。
description.en: Trotskyism is a school of Marxism, and Trotsky considered himself an orthodox Marxist.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林将托洛茨基及其领导的左翼反对派强力镇压，并于1929年将其流放出苏联。
description.en: Stalin forcefully suppressed Trotsky and the Left Opposition he led, and exiled him from the Soviet Union in 1929.

description.zh-cn: 托洛茨基主义者称苏联为“堕落的工人国家”，并支持在苏联进行一场政治革命以重建社会主义民主。
description.en: Trotskyists referred to the Soviet Union as a 'degenerated workers' state' and supported a political revolution within it to re-establish socialist democracy.

description.zh-cn: 明朝洪武三十一年（1398年），为防倭寇袭扰，在奇山北麓建奇山守御千户所城，并在“北山”设烽火台。
description.en: In 1398, during the reign of the Hongwu Emperor of the Ming dynasty, the Qishan Guard was established at the northern foot of Mount Qi, and a beacon tower was set up on the 'North Mountain' to defend against raids by Wokou pirates.

description.zh-cn: 杨国忠因杨贵妃受到唐玄宗宠信而获得重用，得以任官。
description.en: Yang Guozhong was appointed to high office due to Imperial Consort Yang being favored by Emperor Xuanzong.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗赐名杨钊为“国忠”。
description.en: Emperor Xuanzong bestowed the name 'Guozhong' upon Yang Zhao.

position.zh-cn: 执行董事, 首席执行长

description.zh-cn: 何晶于2002年5月被任命为淡马锡控股的执行董事，2004年1月出任首席执行长，直至2021年10月退休。
孙氏原为贵妃，1428年被册立为皇后，取代了胡善祥。
description.en: Lady Sun was originally a consort and was made Empress in 1428, replacing Hu Shanxiang.

description.zh-cn: 为胡善祥追上尊谥“恭让诚顺康穆静慈章皇后”，并修陵寝，恢复其皇后名分。
description.en: Posthumously honored Hu Shanxiang with the title 'Empress Gongrang Chengshun Kangmu Jingci Zhang', restored her tomb, and reinstated her status as empress.

description.zh-cn: 公元前313年，张仪担任楚国相国。
description.en: In 313 BC, Zhang Yi served as the chancellor of the State of Chu.

description.zh-cn: 在局长胡佛的指令下，联邦调查局对金进行监视、窃听，并试图通过揭露其私生活和寄送匿名信等方式来胁迫他，以削弱其作为民权领袖的地位。
description.en: Under Director Hoover's orders, the FBI conducted surveillance, wiretapped King, and attempted to coerce him by exposing his private life and sending an anonymous letter, aiming to neutralize him as a civil rights leader.

description.zh-cn: 马丁·路德·金公开发表反越战演说，谴责美国政府是“当今世界最大的暴力供应商”。
description.en: Martin Luther King Jr. publicly delivered an anti-Vietnam War speech, denouncing the U.S. government as 'the greatest purveyor of violence in the world today.'

description.zh-cn: 刘备与公孙瓒在卢植门下学习时结为好友，刘备视其为兄长。
description.en: Liu Bei and Gongsun Zan became good friends while studying under Lu Zhi, with Liu Bei treating him as an elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 离开袁绍后，刘备南下荆州投靠刘表，并被委任屯兵新野。
description.en: After leaving Yuan Shao, Liu Bei went south to Jing Province to join Liu Biao, and was assigned to station troops in Xinye.

description.zh-cn: 在关羽北伐期间，孙权背弃盟约，派吕蒙率军偷袭荆州。此举导致关羽兵败，最终被捕杀。
description.en: During Guan Yu's northern campaign, Sun Quan broke the alliance and dispatched Lü Meng to lead troops in a surprise attack on Jing Province. This led to Guan Yu's defeat and ultimate capture and execution.

description.zh-cn: 陈云被认为是1980年代保守派的代表人物。
description.en: Chen Yun is considered a representative figure of the conservative faction in the 1980s.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来被认为是保守派人物。
description.en: Bo Xilai is considered a conservative figure.

description.zh-cn: 因对胡耀邦在八六学潮中过于软弱不满，保守派促使其下台。
description.en: Dissatisfied with Hu Yaobang's perceived weakness in handling the 1986 student protests, the conservative faction contributed to his downfall.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平南巡讲话后，重新确立改革开放大趋势，保守派势力大减。
description.en: After Deng Xiaoping's southern tour speeches, the trend of reform and opening-up was re-established, and the influence of the conservative faction was greatly diminished.

description.zh-cn: 中共保守派指戈尔巴乔夫是苏联解体、苏共崩溃的罪魁祸首。
description.en: CCP conservatives blamed Mikhail Gorbachev as the main culprit for the dissolution of the Soviet Union and the collapse of the CPSU.

description.zh-cn: 因批评习近平的“独裁统治”，原中共中央党校教授蔡霞被开除党籍。
description.en: For criticizing Xi Jinping's 'dictatorial rule', former Central Party School professor Cai Xia was expelled from the party.

description.zh-cn: 习近平在中共二十大上获得第三个总书记任期，全面巩固了其领导地位。
description.en: Xi Jinping secured a third term as General Secretary at the 20th National Congress of the CPC, fully consolidating his leadership position.

position.en: President; Chairman of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 李承晚曾先后担任大韩民国临时政府的首任总统和末任国务委员会主席。
description.en: Syngman Rhee served as the first president and the last Chairman of the State Council of the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争在李承晚的总统任期内爆发，深刻影响了他的执政和韩国的命运。
description.en: The Korean War broke out during Syngman Rhee's presidency, profoundly affecting his administration and the fate of South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 李承晚为游说美国维护韩国独立而与时任美国总统罗斯福会面，但未获支持。
description.en: Syngman Rhee met with then-U.S. President Theodore Roosevelt to lobby for the maintenance of Korean independence, but did not receive support.

description.zh-cn: 李承晚因在著作《日本内幕记》中成功预告太平洋战争的爆发，在珍珠港事件后成为美国知名人物。
description.en: After successfully predicting the outbreak of the Pacific War in his book 'Japan Inside Out', Syngman Rhee became a well-known figure in the United States after the attack on Pearl Harbor.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅是朴槿惠的主要政治对手，曾在2012年总统选举中败给朴槿惠，后在2017年朴槿惠被弹劾后当选总统。朴槿惠政府曾将文在寅列入政治黑名单。
description.en: Moon Jae-in was a major political rival to Park Geun-hye. He lost to her in the 2012 presidential election but was elected in 2017 after Park's impeachment. Park's government had placed Moon on a political blacklist.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅卸任后参加了继任者尹锡悦的总统就职典礼。
description.en: After leaving office, Moon Jae-in attended the presidential inauguration of his successor, Yoon Suk-yeol.

description.zh-cn: 尹锡悦就任总统后，韩国检方对文在寅前政府展开了多项调查，被文在寅方面认为是政治报复。
description.en: After Yoon Suk-yeol took office, South Korean prosecutors launched several investigations into the former Moon Jae-in administration, which Moon's side considered political retaliation.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯当选为首任中华民国大总统，象征着北洋政府的正式成立。
description.en: Yuan Shikai's election as the first President of the Republic of China symbolized the formal establishment of the Beiyang government.

description.zh-cn: 五四运动因抗议巴黎和会对山东问题的处理而爆发，通过全国性的罢课、罢工、罢市，向北洋政府施加了巨大压力。运动迫使北洋政府罢免了三名亲日官员，并最终导致其代表未在《凡尔赛条约》上签字。
description.en: The May Fourth Movement erupted in protest against the handling of the Shandong Problem at the Paris Peace Conference. Through nationwide student strikes, labor strikes, and business shutdowns, it exerted immense pressure on the Beiyang government, forcing it to dismiss three pro-Japanese officials and ultimately leading to its representatives not signing the Treaty of Versailles.

description.zh-cn: 在府院之争中，大总统黎元洪解除了段祺瑞的国务总理职务。
description.en: During the conflict between the Presidential Palace and the State Council, President Li Yuanhong dismissed Duan Qirui from his position as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 1943年12月赴延安入中共中央党校学习。
description.en: Went to Yan'an in December 1943 to study at the Party School of the Central Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 1925年12月由中国共产主义青年团团员转为中国共产党党员。
description.en: Transferred from a member of the Communist Youth League of China to a member of the Communist Party of China in December 1925.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波曾两度担任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Bo Yibo served twice as Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波担任中顾委常务副主任，主持日常工作。
description.en: Bo Yibo served as the Executive Deputy Director of the Central Advisory Commission, presiding over its daily work.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，薄一波因“六十一人叛徒集团案”被诬陷打倒，并遭到迫害。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Bo Yibo was falsely accused, overthrown, and persecuted in connection with the 'Case of 61 Renegades'.

description.zh-cn: 1978年12月，胡耀邦主持为薄一波彻底平反，恢复了其名誉。
description.en: In December 1978, Hu Yaobang presided over the complete rehabilitation of Bo Yibo, restoring his reputation.

description.zh-cn: 八六学潮被中共元老归咎于胡耀邦的纵容，成为其下台的直接原因。
description.en: The 1986 student protests were blamed by CCP elders on Hu Yaobang's indulgence, becoming the direct cause of his downfall.

description.zh-cn: 与薄一波等中共元老一同商议并推动了胡耀邦的去职。
description.en: Along with Bo Yibo and other CCP elders, discussed and promoted the removal of Hu Yaobang from his post.

description.zh-cn: 在1989年六四天安门事件前夕，薄一波向邓小平提出要采取果断措施，并参加了决定对北京实施戒严的会议。
description.en: On the eve of the 1989 Tiananmen Square incident, Bo Yibo proposed to Deng Xiaoping to take decisive measures and attended the meeting that decided to impose martial law in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 经刘少奇领导的中共中央北方局建议，薄一波于1936年得以出狱。
description.en: Following a proposal from the CCP Central Committee's Northern Bureau led by Liu Shaoqi, Bo Yibo was released from prison in 1936.

description.zh-cn: 于凤至是张学良的原配妻子，两人于1916年结婚，1964年在蒋介石的压力下被迫离婚。
description.en: Yu Fengzhi was Zhang Xueliang's first wife. They married in 1916 and were forced to divorce in 1964 under pressure from Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 在皇姑屯事件后，于凤至秘不发丧，巧妙周旋，帮助张学良顺利继承了在东北的军政大权。
description.en: After the Huanggutun Incident, Yu Fengzhi concealed the news of Zhang Zuolin's death and skillfully maneuvered, helping Zhang Xueliang smoothly inherit military and political power in the Northeast.

description.zh-cn: 为了稳固军权、争夺大权，张学良于1929年1月10日派高纪毅将奉系旧派代表杨宇霆秘密处决于元帅府“老虎厅”。
description.en: To consolidate his military power and due to a power struggle, Zhang Xueliang ordered Gao Jiyi to secretly execute Yang Yuting, a representative of the old guard of the Fengtian clique, at the 'Tiger Hall' of the Marshal's Mansion on January 10, 1929.

description.zh-cn: 在张学良犹豫是否处置杨宇霆、常荫槐时，于凤至的意见使其下定决心处决二人。
description.en: When Zhang Xueliang hesitated whether to deal with Yang Yuting and Chang Yinhuai, Yu Fengzhi's opinion made him decide to execute them.

description.zh-cn: 1933年，于凤至随丈夫张学良出访意大利时会见了墨索里尼。
description.en: In 1933, Yu Fengzhi met Mussolini while visiting Italy with her husband Zhang Xueliang.

description.zh-cn: 在局势升级之际，美国向乌克兰运送了致命武器和军事训练计划，以提高其抵抗能力。
description.en: As tensions escalated, the United States sent lethal weapons and provided military training programs to Ukraine to enhance its defense capabilities.

description.zh-cn: 四一二事件是对中国共产党党员及其支持者的大规模搜捕与处决。
description.en: The April 12th Incident was a large-scale roundup and execution of Chinese Communist Party members and their supporters.

description.zh-cn: 中共早期领导人赵世炎在四一二事件后被杀害。
description.en: Zhao Shiyan, an early leader of the CCP, was killed after the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 1927年4月6日，张作霖的军警搜查了苏联驻北京大使馆，查获了苏联和共产国际企图赤化中国的文件。
description.en: On April 6, 1927, Zhang Zuolin's military police raided the Soviet embassy in Beijing and seized documents detailing Soviet and Comintern plots to communize China.

description.zh-cn: 伊隆·马斯克是宾夕法尼亚大学的校友。
description.en: Elon Musk is an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 林徽因是宾夕法尼亚大学的校友。
description.en: Lin Huiyin is an alumna of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 担任第二十届中共中央政治局常务委员会总书记，排名第一。
description.en: Serves as the General Secretary of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, ranking first.

description.zh-cn: 担任第二十届中共中央政治局常务委员会委员，排名第二。
description.en: Serves as a member of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, ranking second.

description.zh-cn: 担任第二十届中共中央政治局常务委员会委员，排名第三。
description.en: Serves as a member of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, ranking third.

description.zh-cn: 担任第二十届中共中央政治局常务委员会委员，排名第四。
description.en: Serves as a member of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, ranking fourth.

description.zh-cn: 担任第二十届中共中央政治局常务委员会委员，排名第五。
description.en: Serves as a member of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, ranking fifth.

description.zh-cn: 担任第二十届中共中央政治局常务委员会委员，排名第六。
description.en: Serves as a member of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, ranking sixth.

description.zh-cn: 担任第二十届中共中央政治局常务委员会委员，排名第七。
description.en: Serves as a member of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, ranking seventh.

description.zh-cn: 习近平出任总书记后，大幅度提升总书记的地位和权力，改变了原来的集体领导制度，导致政治局常委会的决策权和重要性下降。
description.en: After Xi Jinping became General Secretary, he significantly enhanced the status and power of the General Secretary, changing the original collective leadership system, which led to a decline in the decision-making power and importance of the Politburo Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2014年12月5日，周永康被开除中国共产党党籍。
description.en: On December 5, 2014, Zhou Yongkang was expelled from the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 在《要民主还是要新的独裁》中批评邓小平是“独裁者”。
description.en: Criticized Deng Xiaoping as a 'dictator' in 'Do We Want Democracy or New Dictatorship?'.

description.zh-cn: 因“反革命罪”和“阴谋颠覆政府罪”两次被判刑，累计服刑超过十八年。
description.en: Was twice sentenced to prison for 'counter-revolutionary crimes' and 'conspiring to subvert the government', serving a total of over 18 years.

description.zh-cn: 在魏京生在囚期间授予其1996年萨哈罗夫奖。
description.en: Awarded the 1996 Sakharov Prize to Wei Jingsheng while he was imprisoned.

description.zh-cn: 八九民运领袖王丹称呼魏京生为“民主斗士”，两人均为海外知名民运人士。
description.en: 1989 democracy movement leader Wang Dan called Wei Jingsheng a 'democracy fighter'; both are prominent overseas democracy activists.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国总统马英九称赞魏京生为“民主先锋”。
description.en: Then-President of the Republic of China Ma Ying-jeou praised Wei Jingsheng as a 'pioneer of democracy'.

description.zh-cn: 魏京生在文化大革命初期参加了红卫兵，这段经历促使他对江青等人产生了怀疑。
description.en: Wei Jingsheng joined the Red Guards in the early days of the Cultural Revolution, an experience that led him to become suspicious of Jiang Qing and others.

description.zh-cn: 在文革串联期间，魏京生开始对江青等人产生怀疑，形成反对立场。
description.en: During the networking phase of the Cultural Revolution, Wei Jingsheng began to harbor suspicions about Jiang Qing and others, forming an oppositional stance.

description.zh-cn: 在安徽金寨看到大跃进饿死人的废墟后，魏京生认为毛泽东是“刽子手”。
description.en: After seeing the ruins left by the Great Leap Forward famine in Jinzhai, Anhui, Wei Jingsheng came to believe that Mao Zedong was a 'butcher'.

description.zh-cn: 在克林顿总统1998年访华前，作为中美“人质外交”的一部分，中国政府以“保外就医”名义将魏京生释放并流放到美国。
description.en: Prior to President Clinton's 1998 visit to China, as part of US-China 'hostage diplomacy', the Chinese government released Wei Jingsheng on 'medical parole' and exiled him to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 在魏京生流亡美国后，哥伦比亚大学为其提供了办公室、公寓等支持。
description.en: After Wei Jingsheng was exiled to the US, Columbia University provided him with support including an office and an apartment.

description.zh-cn: 于2001年6月中止了对魏京生的财务支出。
description.en: Terminated its financial support for Wei Jingsheng in June 2001.

description.zh-cn: 2001年访问台湾时与时任民主进步党前主席施明德会晤。
description.en: Met with former Democratic Progressive Party chairman Shih Ming-teh during a visit to Taiwan in 2001.

description.zh-cn: 在1979年发表报道，对魏京生进行批判，并引述群众言论支持法院对魏的判决。
description.en: Published a report in 1979 criticizing Wei Jingsheng and citing public opinion in support of the court's verdict against him.

description.zh-cn: 自1824年起，新加坡正式成为英国殖民地，直到1963年加入马来西亚联邦才完全脱离英国统治。
description.en: From 1824, Singapore officially became a British colony, and only fully broke away from British rule when it joined the Federation of Malaysia in 1963.

description.zh-cn: 1963年，新加坡以独立城邦的形式加入马来西亚联邦，成为新加坡州。
description.en: In 1963, Singapore joined the Federation of Malaysia as an independent city-state, becoming the State of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 在新加坡并入马来西亚期间，李光耀与马来西亚联邦政府在种族权利分配上意见不合，反对“马来人至上”政策，导致政治对立。
description.en: During Singapore's time in Malaysia, Lee Kuan Yew disagreed with the Malaysian federal government on the allocation of racial rights and opposed the 'Malay supremacy' policy, leading to political antagonism.

description.zh-cn: 时任马来西亚首相东姑阿都拉曼下令将新加坡州自马来西亚联邦中除名，是新加坡被迫独立的关键一步。
description.en: Then-Prime Minister of Malaysia Tunku Abdul Rahman ordered the expulsion of the State of Singapore from the Federation of Malaysia, a critical step towards Singapore's forced independence.

description.zh-cn: 隆科多是满洲镶黄旗人。
description.en: Longkodo was a Manchu of the Bordered Yellow Banner.

description.zh-cn: 拥有美国国籍，后于2015年放弃。
description.en: Held United States citizenship, which he renounced in 2015.

description.zh-cn: 2015年起拥有中华人民共和国国籍。
description.en: Has held People's Republic of China citizenship since 2015.

description.zh-cn: 杨宇霆深受张作霖信任，历任奉军参谋长、东北陆军训练总监等要职。
description.en: Yang Yuting was deeply trusted by Zhang Zuolin and held key positions such as Chief of Staff of the Fengtian Army and Inspector-General of the Northeast Army Training.

description.zh-cn: 杨宇霆是奉系军阀的重要将领，长期担任奉军总参谋长等职务。
description.en: Yang Yuting was an important general of the Fengtian clique, serving as the Chief of General Staff of the Fengtian Army for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 郭松龄素遭杨宇霆排挤，这是其起兵反奉的原因之一。
description.en: Guo Songling was consistently sidelined by Yang Yuting, which was one of the reasons for his rebellion against the Fengtian clique.

description.zh-cn: 郭松龄于1925年起兵反奉。
description.en: Guo Songling launched a rebellion against the Fengtian clique in 1925.

description.zh-cn: 郭松龄兵败后被奉军处死。
description.en: After his military defeat, Guo Songling was executed by the Fengtian army.

description.zh-cn: 1928年9月，杨宇霆两次与白崇禧在冀东会晤。
description.en: In September 1928, Yang Yuting met with Bai Chongxi twice in eastern Hebei.

description.zh-cn: 徐树铮枪杀陆建章后，张作霖与徐树铮不和。
description.en: After Xu Shuzheng killed Lu Jianzhang, Zhang Zuolin and Xu were at odds.

description.zh-cn: 在是否将孔教立为国教的问题上，康有为代表的支持方与陈独秀代表的反对方形成了尖锐的政治和思想对立。
description.en: On the issue of establishing Confucianism as the state religion, Kang Youwei, representing the proponents, and Chen Duxiu, representing the opponents, were in sharp political and ideological opposition.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳得到中共领导人毛泽东的赏识，毛泽东甚至称呼他为“梅老板”。
description.en: Mei Lanfang was admired by the Communist Party leader Mao Zedong, who even addressed him as "Boss Mei".

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳拒绝为汪精卫政府演出，并蓄须明志，导致在此期间经济来源断绝。
description.en: Mei Lanfang refused to perform for the Wang Jingwei government and grew a beard to show his resolve, which cut off his source of income during this period.

description.zh-cn: 1945年日本投降后，梅兰芳于10月重出舞台。
description.en: After Japan's surrender in 1945, Mei Lanfang returned to the stage in October.

description.zh-cn: 以蒙哥为养子，并由其皇后昂灰抚育长大。
description.en: Adopted Möngke as his son, and had his queen Anghui raise him.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥是蒙古帝国第四任大汗。
description.en: Möngke was the fourth Great Khan of the Mongol Empire.

description.zh-cn: 以长支宗王的身份召集忽里台，极力称赞并推举蒙哥为大汗。
description.en: As the senior prince, he convened a Kurultai and strongly praised and nominated Möngke to be the Great Khan.

description.zh-cn: 任命其弟忽必烈统领漠南汉地军政事务，并命其南征大理国。
description.en: Appointed his younger brother Kublai to oversee military and political affairs in Northern China and ordered him to conquer the Dali Kingdom to the south.

description.zh-cn: 命令其弟旭烈兀率领大军西征。
description.en: Ordered his younger brother Hulagu to lead a large army to the west.

description.zh-cn: 1258年，蒙哥亲率主力大举进攻南宋四川地区。
description.en: In 1258, Möngke personally led the main army in a major invasion of the Sichuan region of the Southern Song.

description.zh-cn: 元朝建立后，忽必烈追尊蒙哥庙号为宪宗，谥号为桓肃皇帝。
description.en: After the establishment of the Yuan Dynasty, Kublai Khan posthumously honored Möngke with the temple name Xianzong and the posthumous title Emperor Huansu.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军隶属于东部战区陆军。
description.en: The PLA 73rd Group Army is subordinate to the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典检方以涉嫌性犯罪为由对阿桑奇展开调查并寻求引渡，该调查最终于2019年11月中止。
description.en: Swedish prosecutors initiated an investigation and sought the extradition of Assange on allegations of sexual offenses, an investigation that was ultimately dropped in November 2019.

description.zh-cn: 据雅虎新闻报道，在维基解密发布“七号保险库”文件后，时任中情局局长迈克·蓬佩奥领导下的中情局曾讨论绑架甚至暗杀在厄瓜多尔大使馆的阿桑奇。
description.en: According to Yahoo News, after WikiLeaks published the 'Vault 7' documents, the CIA, under then-Director Mike Pompeo, discussed kidnapping and even assassinating Assange while he was in the Ecuadorian embassy.

description.zh-cn: 1949年至1971年间，由于冷战格局，中美处于全面敌对状态。美国承认退守台湾的中华民国政府，并在朝鲜战争中与中国直接交战。
description.en: From 1949 to 1971, due to the Cold War structure, China and the U.S. were in a state of comprehensive hostility. The U.S. recognized the Republic of China government in Taiwan and directly fought against China in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争爆发后，中国共产党对美国发表的《中美关系白皮书》反应强烈，毛泽东连续撰文批判，双方关系急速恶化。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Korean War, the Chinese Communist Party reacted strongly to the US 'China White Paper', with Mao Zedong writing successive articles of criticism, leading to a rapid deterioration in relations.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争的爆发，使得中美建立外交关系的可能性破灭，美国派遣第七舰队巡逻台湾海峡。
description.en: The outbreak of the Korean War shattered the possibility of establishing diplomatic relations between China and the US, and the US dispatched the Seventh Fleet to patrol the Taiwan Strait.

description.zh-cn: 911袭击事件后，美国不再将中国看作是最大的潜在威胁，转而注重中东局势以及恐怖主义威胁，并寻求与中国在反恐方面进行合作。
description.en: After the 9/11 attacks, the U.S. no longer viewed China as its greatest potential threat, shifting its focus to the situation in the Middle East and the threat of terrorism, and sought cooperation with China on counter-terrorism.

description.zh-cn: 特朗普政府正式对中国进口钢铁和铝产品征收关税，并采取措施限制中国投资，引发了中美贸易战。
description.en: The Trump administration officially imposed tariffs on imported steel and aluminum products from China and took measures to restrict Chinese investment, triggering the US-China trade war.

position.zh-cn: 警务局长；内务总长；主席；国务委员会主席
position.en: Chief of Police Affairs Bureau; Minister of Home Affairs; President; Chairman of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 金九在不同时期担任大韩民国临时政府的多个要职，并长期是其实际领导人。
description.en: Kim Gu held several key positions in the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea at different times and was its de facto leader for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 李承晚接替金九成为大韩民国临时政府主席。
description.en: Syngman Rhee succeeded Kim Gu as the President of the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 金九与中国共产党保持着良好的关系。
description.en: Kim Gu maintained a good relationship with the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 金九与金日成在平壤举行的“四月南北联席会议”上会面，商讨南北统一问题。
description.en: Kim Gu and Kim Il-sung met at the 'April Joint Conference of North and South' in Pyongyang to discuss the issue of Korean unification.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国中央人民委员会追授金九祖国统一奖，以肯定他对南北统一的努力。
description.en: The Central People's Committee of the DPRK posthumously awarded Kim Gu the National Reunification Prize in recognition of his efforts for the unification of North and South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 金九多次被日本当局逮捕入狱，包括因安重根事件和安明根事件。
description.en: Kim Gu was arrested and imprisoned by Japanese authorities multiple times, including in connection with the An Jung-geun incident and the An Myeong-geun incident.

description.zh-cn: 在金九回国前，周恩来等中共政要为其举行了送别宴会。
description.en: Before Kim Gu returned to Korea, CCP dignitaries including Zhou Enlai held a farewell banquet for him.

description.zh-cn: 在九届二中全会华北组讨论中，陈伯达带头对张春桥进行批判，指责有人反对毛主席和毛泽东思想。
description.en: During the North China group discussion at the Second Plenary Session of the 9th Central Committee, Chen Boda led the criticism against Zhang Chunqiao, accusing some people of opposing Chairman Mao and Mao Zedong Thought.

description.zh-cn: 叶群是林彪的妻子。
description.en: Ye Qun was the wife of Lin Biao.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行是国务院组成部门之一。
description.en: The People's Bank of China is one of the constituent departments of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 根据董必武的提议，中共中央于1947年10月决定筹备建立中国人民银行。
description.en: Based on the proposal of Dong Biwu, the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China decided in October 1947 to prepare for the establishment of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 742年，李白因其才名获唐玄宗征召入京，出任翰林供奉，但两年后即被赐金放还。
description.en: In 742, Li Bai was summoned to the capital by Emperor Xuanzong due to his fame and appointed as an attendant in the Hanlin Academy, but he was dismissed with a grant of gold two years later.

description.zh-cn: 李白于742年至744年间在翰林院担任供奉官。
description.en: Li Bai served as an Attendant Scholar in the Hanlin Academy from 742 to 744.

description.zh-cn: 陈炯明是中国致公党的创始人之一，并被推举为首任总理。
description.en: Chen Jiongming was one of the founders of the China Zhi Gong Party and was elected as its first Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中国致公党是接受中国共产党政治领导的参政党。
description.en: The China Zhi Gong Party is a participating party that accepts the political leadership of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，致公党与其他民主党派一同被查禁。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, the Zhi Gong Party, along with other democratic parties, was banned.

description.zh-cn: 1978年，经邓小平决定，中国致公党恢复活动。
description.en: In 1978, by the decision of Deng Xiaoping, the China Zhi Gong Party resumed its activities.

description.zh-cn: 在收到红二十军伪造的信件后，彭德怀判断其为伪造，并率红三军团发表声明支持毛泽东。
description.en: After receiving a forged letter from the Red 20th Army, Peng Dehuai judged it to be a fake and led the 3rd Army Group to issue a statement in support of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 在王明主导下，主张温和处理富田事变的项英被解除中共苏区中央局代理书记职务。
description.en: Under Wang Ming's direction, Xiang Ying, who advocated a moderate handling of the Futian Incident, was removed from his position as acting secretary of the CPC Central Soviet Area Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 项英被免职后，毛泽东接替其成为中共苏区中央局代理书记及中革军委负责人。
description.en: After Xiang Ying's dismissal, Mao Zedong replaced him as the acting secretary of the CPC Central Soviet Area Bureau and head of the Central Revolutionary Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 根据卢卡奇的观点，恩格斯将辩证法扩展到自然界是受到了黑格尔的错误引导。
description.en: According to Lukács's view, Engels was misguided by Hegel in extending dialectics to nature.

description.zh-cn: 就2019冠状病毒病疫情进行书信往来，盖茨在信中表达了对中国防疫行动的支持，习近平则回信表示感谢。
description.en: Corresponded regarding the COVID-19 pandemic, with Gates expressing support for China's epidemic prevention actions in his letter, and Xi Jinping replying with a letter of thanks.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党提出并不断发展中国特色社会主义理论，将其作为党的全部理论和实践的主题。
description.en: The Communist Party of China proposed and continuously developed the theory of socialism with Chinese characteristics, making it the theme of all the Party's theories and practices.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国共产党的指导思想，马克思列宁主义是中国特色社会主义的理论基础之一。
description.en: As a guiding ideology of the Communist Party of China, Marxism–Leninism is one of the theoretical foundations of socialism with Chinese characteristics.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国共产党的指导思想，毛泽东思想是中国特色社会主义的理论基础之一。
description.en: As a guiding ideology of the Communist Party of China, Mao Zedong Thought is one of the theoretical foundations of socialism with Chinese characteristics.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十二大上提出，要把中国建设成为高度文明、高度民主的社会主义国家，明确了中国特色社会主义初期的发展目标。
description.en: At the 12th Party Congress, he proposed to build China into a socialist country with a high level of civilization and democracy, clarifying the development goals for the initial stage of socialism with Chinese characteristics.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十三大上作报告，将中国特色社会主义的发展目标明确为建设“富强、民主、文明”的社会主义现代化国家。
description.en: Delivered a report at the 13th Party Congress, defining the development goal of socialism with Chinese characteristics as building a 'prosperous, democratic, and civilized' socialist modernized country.

description.zh-cn: 认为中国特色社会主义是社会帝国主义。
description.en: Considers socialism with Chinese characteristics to be social imperialism.

description.zh-cn: “两个凡是”原则的核心是维护毛泽东生前作出的所有决策和指示，完全基于其个人权威。
description.en: The core of the 'Two Whatevers' principle was to uphold all decisions and instructions made by Mao Zedong during his lifetime, based entirely on his personal authority.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十一届三中全会上，邓小平等人批评了与华国锋有直接关系的“两个凡是”，最终导致华国锋下台。
description.en: At the Third Plenum of the 11th CPC Central Committee, Deng Xiaoping and others criticized the 'Two Whatevers', which were directly linked to Hua Guofeng, ultimately leading to Hua's removal from power.

description.zh-cn: 因坚持“两个凡是”的错误，华国锋先后辞去国务院总理、中共中央主席和中央军委主席职务。
description.en: Due to his insistence on the mistake of the 'Two Whatevers', Hua Guofeng resigned successively from his posts as Premier, CPC Chairman, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 1960年，沈殿霞被邵氏电影公司招聘为童星，开始其演艺生涯。
description.en: In 1960, Lydia Shum was recruited by Shaw Brothers Studio as a child star, beginning her acting career.

description.zh-cn: 在怀仁堂召开的中央政治局碰头会上，严厉批评张春桥打倒陈丕显的做法，该事件后被定性为“二月逆流”。
description.en: At a Politburo meeting in Huairen Hall, he severely criticized Zhang Chunqiao's actions in overthrowing Chen Pixian. The incident was later labeled the 'February Countercurrent'.

description.zh-cn: 1980年考入北京大学法律系，就读于新开设的经济法专业。
description.en: Enrolled in the Law Department of Peking University in 1980, studying in the newly established Economic Law program.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命初期被关押到伊克昭盟的牛棚。
description.en: Was detained in a cowshed in Ikh Juu League during the early stages of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 在袁世凯担任大总统期间，黎元洪任副总统。
description.en: Li Yuanhong served as Vice President while Yuan Shikai was President.

description.zh-cn: 1913年12月，黎元洪被段祺瑞等人胁迫进入北京，并被袁世凯迁入瀛台居住，实际上是加以软禁。
description.en: In December 1913, Li Yuanhong was coerced into Beijing by Duan Qirui and others and was moved into the Yingtai by Yuan Shikai, effectively placing him under house arrest.

description.zh-cn: 投票赞成授权对伊拉克使用军事力量的决议，但后来成为该战争的批评者。
description.en: Voted in favor of the resolution authorizing military force against Iraq, but later became a critic of the war.

description.zh-cn: 在2022年俄罗斯入侵乌克兰后，坚决支持乌克兰，并领导国际社会对俄罗斯实施制裁和向乌克兰提供援助。
description.en: After the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine, strongly supported Ukraine, leading international efforts to sanction Russia and provide aid to Ukraine.

description.zh-cn: 大力支持芬兰加入北大西洋公约组织。
description.en: Strongly supported Finland's accession to NATO.

description.zh-cn: 大力支持瑞典加入北大西洋公约组织。
description.en: Strongly supported Sweden's accession to NATO.

description.zh-cn: 作为副总统和总统，多次与俄罗斯总统普京会晤，讨论军控和地缘政治问题。
description.en: As Vice President and President, has met with Russian President Vladimir Putin on several occasions to discuss arms control and geopolitical issues.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东是毛贻昌的儿子。
description.en: Mao Zedong was the son of Mao Yichang.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部是中国共产党中央委员会的职能部门。
description.en: The Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee is a functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1924年5月，中共中央正式决定分设宣传、组织、工农等部，成立了中央组织部。
description.en: In May 1924, the CPC Central Committee formally decided to establish several departments including propaganda, organization, and workers-peasants, thus founding the Central Organization Department.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命开始后不久，中共中央组织部业务工作停顿。
description.en: Shortly after the beginning of the Cultural Revolution, the operational work of the Central Organization Department of the CPC came to a halt.

description.zh-cn: 戈尔巴乔夫在1985年上台后，谴责勃列日涅夫政府的无能且不灵活。
description.en: After coming to power in 1985, Gorbachev condemned the Brezhnev government for its incompetence and inflexibility.

description.zh-cn: 勃列日涅夫执政时期，苏联与毛泽东领导下的中华人民共和国爆发了珍宝岛等地的边界冲突，两国关系长期敌对。
description.en: During Brezhnev's rule, the Soviet Union and the People's Republic of China under Mao Zedong had border conflicts at places like Zhenbao Island, leading to a long period of hostile relations.

description.zh-cn: 1979年，勃列日涅夫与美国总统卡特签订SALT II条约。
description.en: In 1979, Brezhnev and U.S. President Carter signed the SALT II treaty.

description.zh-cn: 1974年，勃列日涅夫与美国总统福特签订SALT I条约。
description.en: In 1974, Brezhnev and U.S. President Ford signed the SALT I treaty.

description.zh-cn: 纳尔逊·曼德拉在1998年至1999年间担任不结盟运动秘书长。
description.en: Nelson Mandela served as the Secretary-General of the Non-Aligned Movement from 1998 to 1999.

description.zh-cn: 杨尚昆时任中共中央办公厅主任。
description.en: Yang Shangkun was the Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee at the time.

description.zh-cn: 汪东兴时任中共中央办公厅主任。
description.en: Wang Dongxing was the Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee at the time.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东的指示下，阎明复于1975年4月获释出狱。
description.en: Under Mao Zedong's instruction, Yan Mingfu was released from prison in April 1975.

position.zh-cn: 全国人大常委会副秘书长
position.en: Deputy Secretary-General of the NPC Standing Committee

description.zh-cn: 彭真时任全国人大常委会委员长。
description.en: Peng Zhen was the Chairman of the NPC Standing Committee at the time.

description.zh-cn: 1985年，经杨尚昆推荐，阎明复出任中共中央统战部部长。
description.en: In 1985, upon Yang Shangkun's recommendation, Yan Mingfu was appointed as the Head of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 赵紫阳时任中共中央总书记。
description.en: Zhao Ziyang was the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee at the time.

description.zh-cn: 因在六四事件过程中的表现，阎明复被免去中央书记处书记等职务。
description.en: Due to his actions during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, Yan Mingfu was dismissed from his positions, including Secretary of the Central Secretariat.

description.zh-cn: 2018年11月，温家宝前往医院看望阎明复。
description.en: In November 2018, Wen Jiabao visited Yan Mingfu in the hospital.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争的爆发迫使中国人民解放军放弃跨海进攻台湾的计划。
description.en: The outbreak of the Korean War forced the People's Liberation Army to abandon its plan to attack Taiwan across the sea.

description.zh-cn: 第十二师是新疆生产建设兵团的下属师级单位。
description.en: The 12th Division is a subordinate division-level unit of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps.

description.zh-cn: 2012年12月，新疆生产建设兵团农业建设第十二师更名为新疆生产建设兵团第十二师。
description.en: In December 2012, the 12th Agricultural Construction Division of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps was renamed the 12th Division of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps.

description.zh-cn: 根据1997年全国金融工作会议的决定，中国证监会接管了原由中国人民银行监管的证券经营机构。
description.en: Following the decision of the 1997 National Financial Work Conference, the CSRC took over the regulation of securities operating institutions from the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 2023年3月，国家发展和改革委员会的企业债券发行审核职责划入中国证监会。
description.en: In March 2023, the responsibility for reviewing corporate bond issuance was transferred from the National Development and Reform Commission to the CSRC.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军对驻守金门的国军部队发动了榴弹炮突击，引发第二次台湾海峡危机。
description.en: The People's Liberation Army launched a howitzer assault on the ROC forces stationed in Kinmen, triggering the Second Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 金门防卫司令部副司令官吉星文在金门炮战中阵亡。
description.en: Ji Xingwen, Deputy Commander of the Kinmen Defense Command, was killed in action during the Kinmen Artillery Duel.

description.zh-cn: 由第十一届全国人民代表大会选举产生。
description.en: Elected by the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗被瓦剌送还后，景泰帝将其软禁于南内崇质宫，长达七年。
description.en: After Emperor Yingzong was returned by the Oirats, the Jingtai Emperor placed him under house arrest in the Southern Palace for seven years.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗在识破曹石之变后，将曹吉祥凌迟处死。
description.en: After uncovering the Cao-Shi Rebellion, Emperor Yingzong had Cao Jixiang executed by slow slicing.

description.zh-cn: 在土木堡之变期间，明朝与瓦剌处于战争状态。
description.en: During the Tumu Crisis, the Ming Dynasty was in a state of war with the Oirats.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军是中国共产党领导的武装力量。
description.en: The Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army was the armed force led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 胡温政府需要打击削弱江泽民派系（上海帮）的势力，陈良宇事件被视为这一政治斗争的一部分。
description.en: The Hu-Wen administration needed to weaken the power of the Jiang Zemin faction (Shanghai clique), and the Chen Liangyu incident is seen as part of this political struggle.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇因反对中央的宏观调控政策，曾反驳顶撞时任总理温家宝。
description.en: Chen Liangyu, opposing the central government's macroeconomic control policies, once confronted and contradicted then-Premier Wen Jiabao.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局会议决定对陈良宇立案调查，并免去其在上海市一切职务，停止其在中央担任的职务。
description.en: A meeting of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee decided to open an investigation into Chen Liangyu, remove him from all his posts in Shanghai, and suspend his duties at the central level.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本，金晓昀是中华人民共和国的政治人物。
description.en: According to the text, Jin Xiaoyun is a politician of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 金晓昀曾任第七届全国人大代表。
description.en: Jin Xiaoyun served as a delegate to the 7th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 金晓昀是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Jin Xiaoyun is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 代表中共中央军委发出二月来信，要求毛泽东脱离部队前往中央，试图以此调解争端。
description.en: On behalf of the CCP Central Military Commission, sent the 'February Letter' requesting Mao Zedong to leave the army for the central headquarters, in an attempt to mediate the dispute.

description.zh-cn: 林彪在不同历史时期多次支持毛泽东。1929年6月8日，在朱毛之争的白沙会议上，林彪坚定支持毛泽东，为他赢得了长久信任。1962年1月，在七千人大会上，尽管党内高层普遍批评大跃进，林彪仍公开支持毛泽东的路线和“三面红旗”，进一步巩固了毛的地位。
description.en: Lin Biao consistently supported Mao Zedong during different historical periods. On June 8, 1929, amidst the Zhu-Mao controversy, particularly at the Baisha Conference, Lin Biao firmly sided with Mao, earning his long-term trust. Later, in January 1962, at the Seven Thousand Cadres Conference, despite widespread criticism of the Great Leap Forward among high-level party leaders, Lin Biao publicly endorsed Mao Zedong's line and the 'Three Red Banners,' further consolidating Mao's position.

description.zh-cn: 在朱毛之争中，向其老上级朱德、陈毅反戈一击，转而支持毛泽东。
description.en: During the Zhu-Mao controversy, he turned against his old superiors Zhu De and Chen Yi to support Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 在白沙会议上坚决支持毛泽东。
description.en: Resolutely supported Mao Zedong at the Baisha Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在富田事变后，利用其造成的不利影响轻易夺取了毛泽东的军权。
description.en: After the Futian Incident, he took advantage of its negative impact to easily seize military power from Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 八七会议后，瞿秋白欣赏毛泽东，并建议他到上海的中共中央机关工作。
description.en: After the August 7th Conference, Qu Qiubai appreciated Mao Zedong and suggested that he work at the CCP Central Committee's office in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东谢绝了瞿秋白让他去上海中央机关工作的建议，选择上山。
description.en: Mao Zedong declined Qu Qiubai's suggestion to work at the Central Committee's office in Shanghai, choosing to go to the mountains instead.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在三湾改编中推行的一系列军队改革，当时并没有得到中共中央的支持。
description.en: The series of military reforms implemented by Mao Zedong during the Sanwan Reorganization did not receive support from the CCP Central Committee at the time.

description.zh-cn: 1987年，张艺谋在其导演处女作《红高粱》中启用巩俐为女主角，使其一举成名，开启了她的演艺生涯。
description.en: In 1987, Zhang Yimou cast Gong Li as the lead actress in his directorial debut 'Red Sorghum', which made her famous overnight and launched her acting career.

description.zh-cn: 巩俐于2008年11月8日宣誓入籍新加坡，成为新加坡公民。
description.en: Gong Li took an oath to become a Singaporean citizen on November 8, 2008.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命前期，巩俐的父亲调入山东大学教书，导致全家迁往山东济南。
description.en: In the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, Gong Li's father was transferred to teach at Shandong University, leading the entire family to move to Jinan, Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 2000年5月，巩俐被任命为联合国教科文组织“促进和平艺术家”。
description.en: In May 2000, Gong Li was appointed as a UNESCO Artist for Peace.

description.zh-cn: 巩俐曾担任第九届、第十届中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会委员。
description.en: Gong Li served as a member of the 9th and 10th National Committees of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 公元前262年，秦国大将白起率军进攻韩国，占领了野王，对韩国构成了严重军事威胁。
description.en: In 262 BC, the Qin general Bai Qi led an army to attack the State of Han, capturing the territory of Yewang and posing a serious military threat to Han.

description.zh-cn: 赵国因接受韩国上党郡而与意图夺取该地的秦国爆发了长平之战，两国成为敌对交战方。
description.en: The State of Zhao's acceptance of Shangdang Commandery from Han led to the Battle of Changping with the State of Qin, which also intended to seize the territory, making the two states adversaries in the war.

description.zh-cn: 非常喜爱《永乐大典》，为避免其因火灾等意外而亡佚，于嘉靖四十一年（1562年）下令重录一部副本。
description.en: Greatly admired the Yongle Encyclopedia and, to prevent its loss from fire or other accidents, ordered the creation of a duplicate manuscript copy in 1562.

description.zh-cn: 据郭沫若、张升等人推测，《永乐大典》正本可能在明末李自成入京时被其农民军焚毁。
description.en: According to scholars like Guo Moruo and Zhang Sheng, the original manuscript of the Yongle Encyclopedia may have been destroyed by Li Zicheng's peasant army when they entered Beijing at the end of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 在教育部任职时，提议将陆润庠私藏的翰林院《大典》残本交由京师图书馆收藏保管，促进了其保护。
description.en: While working at the Ministry of Education, he proposed that the remaining volumes of the Yongle Encyclopedia from the Hanlin Academy, then privately held by Lu Runxiang, be transferred to the Capital Library for safekeeping, thus promoting their preservation.

description.zh-cn: 习近平自2012年11月起担任中国共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Xi Jinping has served as the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China since November 2012.

description.zh-cn: 金日成在朝鲜战争期间担任朝鲜人民军最高司令官。
description.en: Kim Il-sung served as the Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜战争中，朝鲜人民军与中国人民志愿军是并肩作战的盟友。
description.en: During the Korean War, the Korean People's Army and the Chinese People's Volunteer Army were allies fighting side by side.

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜战争中，朝鲜人民军与联合国军是敌对的交战方。
description.en: During the Korean War, the Korean People's Army and the United Nations Command were opposing belligerents.

description.zh-cn: 在御前会议上，裕仁天皇做出了接受《波茨坦宣言》条款、结束战争的“圣断”。
description.en: At the Imperial conference (Gozen Kaigi), Emperor Hirohito made the 'sacred decision' (Seidan) to accept the terms of the Potsdam Declaration and end the war.

description.zh-cn: 在雅尔塔会议上，苏联承诺在德国投降后三个月内对日作战。
description.en: At the Yalta Conference, the Soviet Union committed to entering the war against Japan within three months of Germany's surrender.

description.zh-cn: 至正十五年（1355年），常遇春归附朱元璋，自请为前锋，成为其麾下重要将领，直至去世。
description.en: In 1355, Chang Yuchun joined Zhu Yuanzhang, volunteering as a vanguard, and became one of his key generals until his death.

description.zh-cn: 在鄱阳湖之战中，常遇春协同诸将作战，最终击败并导致陈友谅战死。
description.en: During the Battle of Lake Poyang, Chang Yuchun fought alongside other generals, ultimately defeating and causing the death of Chen Youliang.

position.zh-cn: 开国名将、鄂国公、太子少保、中书平章军国重事、征虏副将军
position.en: Founding General, Duke of E, Junior Guardian of the Crown Prince, Grand Marshal, Deputy General for the Northern Expedition

description.zh-cn: 常遇春是明朝的开国功臣。
description.en: Chang Yuchun was a founding father of the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 小周后在大周后去世三年后成为李煜的第二任皇后（继室）。
description.en: Lesser Empress Zhou became Li Yu's second empress (successor wife) three years after the death of the Great Empress Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 在大周后病重期间，小周后借探病之机与姐夫李煜发生私情。
description.en: During the illness of the Great Empress Zhou, Lesser Empress Zhou had an affair with her brother-in-law Li Yu under the pretext of visiting the sick.

description.zh-cn: 南唐灭亡后，李煜被俘至开封，受封为违命侯，处于宋太宗赵光义的控制之下。
description.en: After the fall of the Southern Tang, Li Yu was captured and taken to Kaifeng, where he was enfeoffed as the Marquis of Disobedience and lived under the control of Emperor Taizong, Zhao Guangyi.

description.zh-cn: 在2024年台湾大选前，与胞妹柯美兰和时任新竹市长高虹安一同出席民众党的造势活动。
description.en: Before the 2024 Taiwan general election, attended a Taiwan People's Party rally with his sister Ko Mei-lan and then-Hsinchu City Mayor Ann Kao.

description.zh-cn: 黄忠是刘备麾下将领，时任征西将军。
description.en: Huang Zhong was a general under Liu Bei, holding the title of General Who Conquers the West.

description.zh-cn: 赵云是刘备麾下的重要将领。
description.en: Zhao Yun was an important general serving under Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 在汉中之战中，赵云率部与曹操大军正面交锋，并使用空城计将其击退。
description.en: During the Battle of Hanzhong, Zhao Yun led his troops to confront Cao Cao's main army and repelled them using the empty fort strategy.

description.zh-cn: 根据小说《三国演义》的描述，黄忠在定军山之战中斩杀了夏侯渊。
description.en: According to the novel 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms', Huang Zhong killed Xiahou Yuan in the Battle of Mount Dingjun.

description.zh-cn: 习近平被官方认定为习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的主要创立者，该思想是在他2012年11月当选中共中央总书记后逐步形成的。
description.en: Xi Jinping is officially recognized as the main founder of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, which was gradually formed after he was elected General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee in November 2012.

description.zh-cn: 批准在中国社会科学院成立10家习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想研究中心之一。
description.en: Approved the establishment of one of the 10 research centers for Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era at the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 在投降清朝前，吴三桂是明朝驻守辽东的总兵。
description.en: Before surrendering to the Qing dynasty, Wu Sangui was the Ming dynasty's commanding general stationed in Liaodong.

description.zh-cn: 投降后，多尔衮封吴三桂为平西王。
description.en: After his surrender, Dorgon enfeoffed Wu Sangui as the Prince of Pacifying the West.

description.zh-cn: 在宁远战役中，明朝将领袁崇焕成功击败了努尔哈赤的进攻，并可能使其负伤。
description.en: During the Battle of Ningyuan, Ming general Yuan Chonghuan successfully defeated Nurhaci's attack and possibly wounded him.

description.zh-cn: 苏联支持冯玉祥及其领导的西北军。
description.en: The Soviet Union supported Feng Yuxiang and his Northwest Army.

description.zh-cn: 林剑是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Lin Jian is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1999年进入外交部工作。
description.en: Began working at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs in 1999.

description.zh-cn: 林剑与毛宁同为中华人民共和国外交部发言人。
description.en: Lin Jian and Mao Ning are colleagues as spokespersons for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 林剑与郭嘉昆同为中华人民共和国外交部发言人。
description.en: Lin Jian and Guo Jiakun are colleagues as spokespersons for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞于1969年加入中国共产党，后于2020年8月17日被开除党籍。
description.en: Cai Xia joined the Chinese Communist Party in 1969 and was expelled on August 17, 2020.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央党校于2020年8月17日宣布开除蔡霞的中国共产党党籍，并取消其相关退休待遇。
description.en: On August 17, 2020, the Central Party School of the CCP announced the expulsion of Cai Xia from the Chinese Communist Party and the cancellation of her related retirement benefits.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞于1969年参军入伍，1978年退伍。
description.en: Cai Xia joined the army in 1969 and was discharged in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞在文化大革命期间曾是红卫兵。
description.en: Cai Xia was a Red Guard during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞于1992年考入中共中央党校，先后攻读硕士和博士学位，2000年获法学博士学位。
description.en: Cai Xia was admitted to the Central Party School of the CCP in 1992, where she pursued master's and doctoral degrees, obtaining her Doctor of Law degree in 2000.

position.en: Professor at the Party Building Teaching and Research Department

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞在中共中央党校任教，直至2012年退休。
description.en: Cai Xia taught at the Central Party School of the CCP until her retirement in 2012.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞反对2018年取消国家主席任期制的修宪，认为其从党内程序上不合法。
description.en: Cai Xia opposed the 2018 constitutional amendment that removed presidential term limits, believing it was procedurally illegitimate within the party.

description.zh-cn: 1989年的六四事件使蔡霞对解放军向学生开火的行为感到十分震惊，影响了她的政治观点。
description.en: The 1989 Tiananmen Square incident deeply shocked Cai Xia due to the PLA's use of force against students, influencing her political views.

description.zh-cn: 2017年左右，刘亚洲因写信建议习近平调整新疆政策而被警告不要再妄议习近平的政策。
description.en: Around 2017, Liu Yazhou was warned not to question Xi Jinping's policies again after writing a letter suggesting adjustments to the Xinjiang policy.

description.zh-cn: 2020年1月上旬，习近平拒绝了总理李克强就新冠疫情启动应急响应机制的提议。
description.en: In early January 2020, Xi Jinping rejected Premier Li Keqiang's proposal to activate an emergency response mechanism for the COVID-19 outbreak.

description.zh-cn: 2003年，蔡霞参与了《“三个代表”重要思想学习纲要》的编写工作。
description.en: In 2003, Cai Xia participated in the compilation of the 'Study Outline for the Important Thought of Three Represents'.

description.zh-cn: 祝贺习近平当选中国共产党第十九届中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Congratulated Xi Jinping on his election as General Secretary of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 祝贺习近平当选中国共产党第十九届中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Congratulated Xi Jinping on his election as General Secretary of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: Google向京东投资5.5亿美元。
description.en: Google invested $550 million in JD.com.

description.zh-cn: 洛克的政治理论激励了后来的法国大革命。
description.en: Locke's political theories inspired the later French Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 在胡志明担任越南劳动党中央委员会主席期间，黎笋作为第一书记，是党内的二号领导人。
description.en: While Ho Chi Minh was Chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Vietnam, Lê Duẩn, as First Secretary, was the party's second-in-command.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋接替胡志明出任越南劳动党中央委员会第一书记。
description.en: Lê Duẩn succeeded Ho Chi Minh as the First Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 长征接替黎笋出任越南共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Trường Chinh succeeded Lê Duẩn as the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋在位期间，由于其亲苏立场、否认中国对南海诸岛的主权以及发动排华运动，与中国的关系十分紧张。
description.en: During Lê Duẩn's time in power, relations with China were very tense due to his pro-Soviet stance, his denial of China's sovereignty over the South China Sea islands, and the launch of an anti-Chinese movement.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋是越南民主共和国的主要缔造者和领导人之一。
description.en: Lê Duẩn was one of the main founders and leaders of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋是越南社会主义共和国的主要缔造者和领导人之一。
description.en: Lê Duẩn was one of the main founders and leaders of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 通过无记名投票方式，选举产生了由205名中央委员、171名中央候补委员组成的十八届中央委员会。
description.en: Elected the 18th Central Committee, composed of 205 full members and 171 alternate members, through a secret ballot.

description.zh-cn: 代表中国共产党第十七届中央委员会向大会作了题为《坚定不移沿着中国特色社会主义道路前进、为全面建成小康社会而奋斗》的报告。
description.en: On behalf of the 17th Central Committee of the CPC, delivered a report to the Congress titled 'Firmly March on the Path of Socialism with Chinese Characteristics and Strive to Complete the Building of a Moderately Prosperous Society in All Respects'.

description.zh-cn: 李克强在2013年3月的第十二届全国人民代表大会会议上接替温家宝出任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Li Keqiang succeeded Wen Jiabao as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China at the session of the 12th National People's Congress in March 2013.

description.zh-cn: 于十八大召开前，到北京市、河北省检查为十八大安保施工的“环京护城河”修建情况，以保障大会安全。
description.en: Before the 18th National Congress, inspected the construction of the 'Circum-Beijing Moat' security project in Beijing and Hebei to ensure the security of the Congress.

description.zh-cn: 于1988年11月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in November 1988.

degree.zh-cn: 法律专业在职大学学历

description.zh-cn: 1996年6月至1999年6月，在武汉大学法律专业在职大学学习。
description.en: From June 1996 to June 1999, pursued an in-service university degree in Law at Wuhan University.

degree.en: Master's degree in Electronics and Communication Engineering

description.zh-cn: 2001年4月至2003年12月，在华中科技大学攻读电子与通信工程硕士学位。
description.en: From April 2001 to December 2003, studied for a Master's degree in Electronics and Communication Engineering at Huazhong University of Science and Technology.

position.zh-cn: 中共中央香港工作委员会书记
position.en: Secretary of the Hong Kong Work Committee of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 习近平是中共中央总书记。
description.en: Xi Jinping is the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

position.zh-cn: 中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区联络办公室主任
position.en: Director of the Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 李强是中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Li Qiang is the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

position.zh-cn: 中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区联络办公室主任
position.en: Director of the Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 丁薛祥为中央港澳工作领导小组组长，该小组领导中联办的工作。
description.en: Ding Xuexiang is the head of the Central Leading Group on Hong Kong and Macau Affairs, which oversees the work of the Liaison Office.

description.zh-cn: 周霁在香港特别行政区维护国家安全委员会担任国家安全事务顾问，该委员会主席为李家超。
description.en: Zhou Ji serves as the National Security Affairs Adviser to the Committee for Safeguarding National Security of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, which is chaired by John Lee Ka-chiu.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝于前112年派兵十万分五路进攻南越国，并于次年将其平定。
description.en: In 112 BC, Emperor Wu of Han dispatched 100,000 troops in five columns to attack the Nanyue kingdom, pacifying it the following year.

description.zh-cn: 受秦二世急令，率军迎击周文军。
description.en: Under urgent orders from Qin Er Shi, he led an army to counter Zhou Wen's forces.

description.zh-cn: 率领汉军在陈县追击项羽，并大破楚军。
description.en: Led the Han army to pursue Xiang Yu to Chen County and defeated the Chu army.

description.zh-cn: 两人在2012年香港行政长官选举中是主要竞争对手，选战过程激烈。
description.en: The two were major rivals in the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election, which was a fierce contest.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央总书记、国家主席胡锦涛为梁振英及香港第四届政府主要官员监誓。
description.en: Then-General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and President of the PRC, Hu Jintao, administered the oath of office for Leung Chun-ying and the principal officials of the fourth-term Hong Kong government.

description.zh-cn: 盛传唐英年早获前中共中央总书记江泽民钦点为2012年的新一届特首。
description.en: It was widely rumored that Henry Tang had been handpicked by former CCP General Secretary Jiang Zemin to be the new Chief Executive in 2012.

description.zh-cn: 时任国家副主席习近平在会见港澳政协委员时，先与梁振英阵营的委员刘梦熊握手，此举被外界解读为中央政府对梁振英的支持。
description.en: Then-Vice President Xi Jinping's handshake with Lew Mon-hung, a member of Leung Chun-ying's camp, during a meeting with Hong Kong and Macau CPPCC members was interpreted by outsiders as a sign of the central government's support for Leung.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛瞻是诸葛亮的亲生儿子。
description.en: Zhuge Zhan was the biological son of Zhuge Liang.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑在1804年称帝，与神圣罗马皇帝弗朗茨二世对立，并在战争中击败后者，最终迫使其解散帝国。
description.en: Napoleon crowned himself emperor in 1804, opposing Holy Roman Emperor Francis II, defeated him in war, and ultimately forced him to dissolve the empire.

position.en: Acting Chairman, President of the Executive Yuan

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫是汪精卫国民政府的首任及核心领导人。
description.en: Wang Jingwei was the first and core leader of the Wang Jingwei regime.

description.zh-cn: 1945年8月15日日本宣布投降，次日汪精卫国民政府宣布解散，政权终结。
description.en: On August 15, 1945, Japan announced its surrender. The following day, the Wang Jingwei regime announced its dissolution, bringing the regime to an end.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府于1943年1月9日对美国宣战。
description.en: The Wang Jingwei regime declared war on the United States on January 9, 1943.

description.zh-cn: 1943年，汪精卫在东京会见时任日本内阁总理大臣东条英机。
description.en: In 1943, Wang Jingwei met with the then Prime Minister of Japan, Hideki Tojo, in Tokyo.

position.zh-cn: 赞军校尉、汉昌太守、偏将军、横江将军
position.en: Colonel of Military Aid, Grand Administrator of Hanchang, General of the Standard, General Who Crosses the River

description.zh-cn: 在周瑜推荐下，鲁肃开始为孙权效力，成为其重要的战略顾问和军事将领，直至去世。
description.en: Recommended by Zhou Yu, Lu Su began serving Sun Quan, becoming his key strategic advisor and military general until his death.

description.zh-cn: 周瑜向孙策和孙权多次引荐鲁肃，认为其才堪当大任，是成就功业不可或缺的人才。
description.en: Zhou Yu repeatedly recommended Lu Su to Sun Ce and Sun Quan, believing his talents were crucial for their great cause and that he was an indispensable figure.

description.zh-cn: 周瑜病逝后，鲁肃根据其遗言推荐，接替了他的兵权和职务。
description.en: After Zhou Yu's death from illness, Lu Su took over his military command and duties as per Zhou Yu's dying recommendation.

description.zh-cn: 鲁肃去世后，吕蒙接替了他的职务。
description.en: After Lu Su's death, Lü Meng succeeded him in his position.

description.zh-cn: 鲁肃在与刘备会面时结识了诸葛亮，二人因共同促成孙刘联盟的目标而结为好友。
description.en: Lu Su met Zhuge Liang during his meeting with Liu Bei, and the two became good friends due to their shared goal of forging the Sun-Liu alliance.

description.zh-cn: 在鲁肃的劝说下，孙权将南郡等地借给刘备，为刘备提供了发展的基地。
description.en: Persuaded by Lu Su, Sun Quan lent Nan Commandery and other territories to Liu Bei, providing him with a base for development.

description.zh-cn: 南汉与南唐曾经是友好邻邦，两国关系被形容为“情若弟兄，义同交契”。
description.en: Southern Han and Southern Tang were once friendly neighboring states, with their relationship described as being 'like brothers in affection, and united by a common bond'.

description.zh-cn: 宋太祖赵匡胤授意南唐国主李煜，劝说南汉后主刘𬬮主动归降宋朝。
description.en: Emperor Taizu of Song, Zhao Kuangyin, instructed Li Yu, the ruler of Southern Tang, to persuade Liu Chang, the Last Ruler of Southern Han, to voluntarily submit to the Song.

description.zh-cn: 刘盈在位期间，朝政深受母亲吕后干预，吕后成为实际统治者。吕后将戚夫人制成“人彘”给刘盈观看，导致其大受打击，从此不理朝政。
description.en: During Liu Ying's reign, state affairs were heavily influenced by his mother, Empress Lü, who became the de facto ruler. Empress Lü had Consort Qi mutilated into a 'human swine' and showed her to Liu Ying, which traumatized him to the point of neglecting his governmental duties.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦认为刘盈为人仁弱，不像自己，常想废掉他，改立戚夫人的儿子刘如意为太子。
description.en: Liu Bang considered Liu Ying to be too benevolent and weak, unlike himself, and often wanted to depose him and install Liu Ruyi, the son of Consort Qi, as the crown prince instead.

description.zh-cn: 在刘邦意图废黜太子刘盈时，张良为吕后献策，请来商山四皓辅佐太子，最终使刘邦放弃了废黜太子的想法。
description.en: When Liu Bang intended to depose Crown Prince Liu Ying, Zhang Liang advised Empress Lü to invite the Four Whiteheads of Mount Shang to assist the prince, which ultimately led Liu Bang to abandon the idea of deposing him.

description.zh-cn: 刘盈知道母亲吕雉欲加害刘如意，亲自到霸上迎接，并与之同吃同住，设法保护他。
description.en: Knowing that his mother Empress Lü intended to harm Liu Ruyi, Liu Ying personally went to Bashang to welcome him, and then lived and ate with him in an effort to protect him.

description.zh-cn: 汉惠帝刘盈于前195年至前188年间担任汉朝皇帝，在位7年。
