description.en: Emperor Hui of Han, Liu Ying, reigned as the emperor of the Han Dynasty from 195 BC to 188 BC, for a period of 7 years.

description.zh-cn: 1949年，傅作义投向中国共产党。
description.en: In 1949, Fu Zuoyi defected to the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 根据《帝国主义与革命》的观点，毛泽东思想是来自托洛茨基主义等意识形态的融合。
description.en: According to 'Imperialism and the Revolution', Mao Zedong Thought is a fusion of ideologies including Trotskyism.

description.zh-cn: 根据《帝国主义与革命》的观点，毛泽东思想是来自现代修正主义等意识形态的融合。
description.en: According to 'Imperialism and the Revolution', Mao Zedong Thought is a fusion of ideologies including modern revisionism.

description.zh-cn: 根据《帝国主义与革命》的观点，孔子等中国哲学家的旧思想直接影响了毛泽东思想的形成。
description.en: According to 'Imperialism and the Revolution', old ideas from Chinese philosophers like Confucius directly influenced the formation of Mao Zedong Thought.

description.zh-cn: 根据《帝国主义与革命》的观点，孟子等中国哲学家的旧思想直接影响了毛泽东思想的形成。
description.en: According to 'Imperialism and the Revolution', old ideas from Chinese philosophers like Mencius directly influenced the formation of Mao Zedong Thought.

description.zh-cn: 根据《帝国主义与革命》的观点，毛泽东思想带有佛教色彩的印记。
description.en: According to 'Imperialism and the Revolution', Mao Zedong Thought bears the imprint of Buddhist colors.

description.zh-cn: 汉成帝因无子，于绥和元年（前8年）立侄子刘欣为太子。
description.en: Lacking an heir, Emperor Cheng appointed his nephew Liu Xin as crown prince in the first year of the Suihe era (8 BCE).

description.zh-cn: 作为西汉皇帝在位。
description.en: Reigned as an emperor of the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 汉哀帝为重振皇权，屡次打击以王莽为首的王氏外戚集团。
description.en: To restore imperial authority, Emperor Ai repeatedly targeted the Wang consort clan led by Wang Mang.

position.en: Secretary-General, Member of the Standing Committee

description.zh-cn: 2002年11月至2006年12月，孙政才担任中共北京市委秘书长、市委常委。
description.en: From November 2002 to December 2006, Sun Zhengcai served as Secretary-General and a member of the Standing Committee of the Beijing Municipal Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2012年11月15日当选中共中央政治局委员，至2017年9月29日被处分。
description.en: Elected as a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee on November 15, 2012, until he was disciplined on September 29, 2017.

description.zh-cn: 2012年11月20日至2017年7月14日，孙政才担任中共重庆市委书记。
description.en: From November 20, 2012, to July 14, 2017, Sun Zhengcai served as the Secretary of the Chongqing Municipal Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 评论认为，习近平主导了对孙政才的查处，以清除政治障碍并巩固权力。
description.en: Commentators believe that Xi Jinping led the investigation and removal of Sun Zhengcai to eliminate political obstacles and consolidate power.

description.zh-cn: 该决议由中共中央通过，认定毛泽东在文化大革命中“犯了严重错误”。
description.en: This resolution, passed by the CPC Central Committee, concluded that Mao Zedong had 'made serious mistakes' during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 作为“林彪、江青反革命集团案”主犯，被最高人民法院特别审判庭判处死刑，缓期两年执行。
description.en: As a main culprit in the 'Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques', she was sentenced to death with a two-year reprieve by the Special Court of the Supreme People's Court.

description.zh-cn: 作为“林彪、江青反革命集团案”主犯，被最高人民法院特别审判庭判处死刑，缓期两年执行。
description.en: As a main culprit in the 'Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques', he was sentenced to death with a two-year reprieve by the Special Court of the Supreme People's Court.

description.zh-cn: 作为“林彪、江青反革命集团案”主犯，被最高人民法院特别审判庭判处无期徒刑。
description.en: As a main culprit in the 'Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques', he was sentenced to life imprisonment by the Special Court of the Supreme People's Court.

description.zh-cn: 作为“林彪、江青反革命集团案”主犯，被最高人民法院特别审判庭判处有期徒刑。
description.en: As a main culprit in the 'Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques', he was sentenced to a term of imprisonment by the Special Court of the Supreme People's Court.

description.zh-cn: 作为“林彪、江青反革命集团案”主犯，被最高人民法院特别审判庭判处有期徒刑。
description.en: As a main culprit in the 'Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques', he was sentenced to a term of imprisonment by the Special Court of the Supreme People's Court.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命导致普通高等学校招生全国统一考试（高考）长期中断。
description.en: The Cultural Revolution caused a long-term suspension of the National College Entrance Examination (Gaokao).

description.zh-cn: 1977年8月，邓小平主持召开科学和教育工作座谈会，决定恢复高考。
description.en: In August 1977, Deng Xiaoping presided over a symposium on science and education, where the decision was made to restore the Gaokao.

description.zh-cn: 在其引发的内战中被杀。
description.en: Was killed in the civil war it triggered.

description.zh-cn: 在其引发的内战中政权最终垮台。
description.en: His regime ultimately collapsed in the civil war it triggered.

description.zh-cn: 极端组织伊斯兰国趁阿拉伯之春造成的乱局崛起。
description.en: The extremist organization ISIS rose to prominence amidst the chaos caused by the Arab Spring.

description.zh-cn: 作为多国联盟的一部分，参与轰炸亲卡扎菲部队。
description.en: As part of a multinational coalition, participated in the bombing of pro-Gaddafi forces.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来曾任中共重庆市委书记，于2012年3月15日被免职。
description.en: Bo Xilai served as the Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee and was dismissed on March 15, 2012.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来担任中共重庆市委书记期间，黄奇帆担任重庆市市长，两人是“重庆模式”时期的主要党政领导。
description.en: While Bo Xilai was the CPC Secretary of Chongqing, Huang Qifan was the Mayor. They were the main party and government leaders during the 'Chongqing Model' era.

position.en: President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛在2003年至2013年期间担任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Hu Jintao served as the President of the People's Republic of China from 2003 to 2013.

description.zh-cn: 在收到请求恢复外交学院的联名信后，批示“请先念同志考虑”。
description.en: After receiving a joint letter requesting the re-establishment of China Foreign Affairs University, he instructed: 'Please have Comrade Xiannian consider it.'

description.zh-cn: 马氏是明太祖朱元璋的结发妻子和皇后。
description.en: Lady Ma was the primary wife and empress consort of the Hongwu Emperor, Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 洪武元年正月初四，朱元璋登基当日册封马氏为皇后。
description.en: On January 23, 1368, the day he ascended the throne, the Hongwu Emperor created Lady Ma as Empress.

description.zh-cn: 正史记载，朱标为马皇后长子。
description.en: According to official histories, Zhu Biao was the eldest son of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 正史记载，朱樉为马皇后次子。
description.en: According to official histories, Zhu Shuang was the second son of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 宋濂因孙子犯罪被论死，马皇后为他求情，最终使朱元璋赦免了他。
description.en: When Song Lian was sentenced to death due to his grandson's crime, Empress Ma interceded on his behalf, ultimately persuading the Hongwu Emperor to pardon him.

description.zh-cn: 洪武三十一年六月，建文帝朱允炆追尊祖母马皇后，为其上谥号“孝慈昭宪至仁文德承天顺圣高皇后”。
description.en: In June 1398, the Jianwen Emperor honored his grandmother, Empress Ma, with the posthumous title 'Xiaoci Zhaoxian Zhiren Wende Chengtian Shunsheng Gao Empress'.

description.zh-cn: 永乐十九年正月，明成祖朱棣重尊其为“孝慈昭宪至仁文德承天顺圣高皇后”。
description.en: In January 1421, the Yongle Emperor re-honored her with the title 'Xiaoci Zhaoxian Zhiren Wende Chengtian Shunsheng Gao Empress'.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖十七年，明世宗朱厚熜再次追尊马皇后，为其加上尊谥“孝慈贞化哲顺仁徽成天育圣至德高皇后”。
description.en: In 1538, the Jiajing Emperor further extended Empress Ma's posthumous title to 'Xiaoci Zhenhua Zheshun Renhui Chengtian Yusheng Zhide Gao Empress'.

description.zh-cn: 1961年考入哈尔滨工业大学，在工程力学系学习，1966年毕业。
description.en: Admitted to Harbin Institute of Technology in 1961, studied in the Department of Engineering Mechanics, and graduated in 1966.

description.zh-cn: 于1965年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in 1965.

description.zh-cn: 由于文化大革命爆发，李继耐于1966年至1967年在校待分配，推迟了其职业生涯的开始。
description.en: Due to the outbreak of the Cultural Revolution, Li Jinai was waiting for assignment at his university from 1966 to 1967, which delayed the start of his career.

description.zh-cn: 1967年12月通过冬季征兵入伍，加入中国人民解放军，直至2013年退役。
description.en: Joined the People's Liberation Army through winter conscription in December 1967 and served until his retirement in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 自1969年4月起在第二炮兵部队（火箭军前身）任职，曾任副排长、干事、副政治委员、基地副政委等职务。
description.en: Served in the Second Artillery Corps (predecessor of the Rocket Force) from April 1969, holding positions such as deputy platoon leader, officer, deputy political commissar, and deputy political commissar of a base.

position.zh-cn: 干部管理部部长、副主任、主任
position.en: Director of the Cadre Management Department, Deputy Director, Director

description.zh-cn: 李继耐曾两度在总政治部任职，早期任干部管理部部长、副主任，后期担任总政治部主任。
description.en: Li Jinai served in the General Political Department twice, early in his career as Director of the Cadre Management Department and Deputy Director, and later as Director of the General Political Department.

position.zh-cn: 中央候补委员、中央委员
position.en: Alternate Member of the Central Committee, Member of the Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 于中共十四大当选为中央候补委员，十五、十六、十七大当选为中央委员。
description.en: Elected as an alternate member of the Central Committee at the 14th Party Congress, and as a full member at the 15th, 16th, and 17th Party Congresses.

description.zh-cn: 1998年总装备部成立后，李继耐与部长曹刚川搭档，分别担任政治委员和部长。
description.en: After the establishment of the General Armaments Department in 1998, Li Jinai worked alongside Director Cao Gangchuan, serving as Political Commissar and Director respectively.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十六大和十七大后被任命为中共中央军事委员会委员，并在第十届和第十一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议上被任命为中华人民共和国中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: He was appointed as a member of the CPC Central Military Commission after the 16th and 17th National Congresses of the CPC, and subsequently appointed as a member of the Central Military Commission of the PRC at the first sessions of the 10th and 11th National People's Congresses.

description.zh-cn: 李继耐接替徐才厚担任总政治部主任，因徐才厚被增补为中央军委副主席。
description.en: Li Jinai succeeded Xu Caihou as Director of the General Political Department after Xu was promoted to Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 2012年10月，张阳接替李继耐升任总政治部主任。
description.en: In October 2012, Zhang Yang succeeded Li Jinai as Director of the General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 马克思向耶拿大学提交了博士论文，并于1841年4月获得哲学博士学位。
description.en: Marx submitted his doctoral dissertation to the University of Jena and was awarded a Doctor of Philosophy degree in April 1841.

description.zh-cn: 毛主义被其拥护者认为是马克思列宁主义的第三个和更高的阶段。
description.en: Maoism is considered by its proponents to be the third and higher stage of Marxism-Leninism.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命初期，中国官方媒体将毛泽东思想宣传为“当代最高水平的马克思列宁主义”。
description.en: In the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, Chinese state media promoted Mao Zedong Thought as 'the highest level of contemporary Marxism-Leninism'.

description.zh-cn: 肯尼迪于1940年6月以优异成绩从哈佛大学毕业。
description.en: Kennedy graduated from Harvard University with honors in June 1940.

description.zh-cn: 在1960年美国总统选举中，肯尼迪作为民主党候选人与共和党候选人尼克松竞争并获胜。
description.en: In the 1960 United States presidential election, Kennedy, as the Democratic candidate, competed against and defeated the Republican candidate, Nixon.

description.zh-cn: 在条约即将到期时，邓小平希望中国不要与苏联谈判，除非苏联同意中国的要求，例如从阿富汗、蒙古和中苏边境撤军，以及停止支持越南入侵柬埔寨。
description.en: As the treaty was nearing expiration, Deng Xiaoping wished for China not to negotiate with the Soviet Union unless it agreed to China's demands, such as withdrawing troops from Afghanistan, Mongolia, and the Sino-Soviet border, and stopping support for Vietnam's invasion of Cambodia.

description.zh-cn: 在谈判初期，斯大林拒绝了毛泽东希望苏联为进攻台湾计划提供空中支持的请求，理由是这会给美国干预的借口。
description.en: In the early stages of negotiations, Stalin rejected Mao Zedong's request for Soviet air support for the planned invasion of Taiwan, citing it would give the United States a pretext for intervention.

description.zh-cn: 根据毛泽东的说法，中国在朝鲜战争中的表现赢得了苏联的信任，促使苏联后续提供了更多的援助与合作，包括156个重点工业项目。
description.en: According to Mao Zedong, China's performance in the Korean War won the trust of the Soviet Union, prompting it to provide more aid and cooperation subsequently, including 156 key industrial projects.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大拒绝了美国提出的出兵伊拉克战争的邀请，未参与该次军事行动。
description.en: Canada declined the United States' invitation to send troops to the Iraq War and did not participate in the military operation.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大与美国有着世界上最长的不设防边境，在军事和经济上有着广泛的合作，并且互为对方最大的贸易伙伴。
description.en: Canada and the United States share the world's longest undefended border, have extensive military and economic cooperation, and are each other's largest trading partners.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大是北大西洋公约组织的创始成员国之一。
description.en: Canada is one of the founding members of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO).

description.zh-cn: 加拿大是联合国的创始成员国之一。
description.en: Canada is one of the founding members of the United Nations.

description.zh-cn: 1953年4月26日成为预备党员，1956年6月转正，1980年5月被开除党籍。
description.en: Became a probationary member on April 26, 1953, became a full member in June 1956, and was expelled from the party in May 1980.

description.zh-cn: 徐景贤在调回市委文艺工作部后认识了时任部长张春桥。
description.en: Xu Jingxian met Zhang Chunqiao, then the department minister, after being transferred back to the Municipal Party Committee's Literature and Art Work Department.

description.zh-cn: 张海阳是张震的儿子。
description.en: Zhang Haiyang is the son of Zhang Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 于1969年参军。
description.en: Joined the army in 1969.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央总书记的张闻天代表党中央批准了刘少奇关于保释61名干部的决定。
description.en: Zhang Wentian, then General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, approved Liu Shaoqi's decision to bail out the 61 cadres on behalf of the Party Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 汪东兴阻挠胡耀邦为六十一人叛徒集团案平反，认为该案由毛泽东定性，不能翻案。
description.en: Wang Dongxing obstructed Hu Yaobang's efforts to rehabilitate the Case of the 61 Renegades, arguing that the case was decided by Mao Zedong and could not be overturned.

description.zh-cn: 纪登奎阻挠胡耀邦为六十一人叛徒集团案平反。
description.en: Ji Dengkui obstructed Hu Yaobang's efforts to rehabilitate the Case of the 61 Renegades.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦指示中组部坚持对六十一人案进行调查以促成平反。
description.en: Hu Yaobang instructed the Central Organization Department to persist in investigating the Case of the 61 to facilitate its rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 潘汉年于1925年11月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Pan Hannian joined the Communist Party of China in November 1925.

description.zh-cn: 秦邦宪（博古）邀请潘汉年参与孙中山追悼会的筹备工作，并将其介绍给恽代英，为潘汉年开启了革命生涯。
description.en: Qin Bangxian (Bo Gu) invited Pan Hannian to participate in the preparation of Sun Yat-sen's memorial service and introduced him to Yun Daiying, which started Pan's revolutionary career.

description.zh-cn: 邀请潘汉年赴南昌编辑《革命军日报》，使其在国民革命军总政治部担任职务。
description.en: Invited Pan Hannian to Nanchang to edit the 'Revolutionary Army Daily', leading to his position in the General Political Department of the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 同意潘汉年与汪精卫政权特务头子李士群进行接触。
description.en: Approved Pan Hannian's contact with Li Shiqun, the head of the secret service of the Wang Jingwei regime.

description.zh-cn: 在李士群的安排下与汪精卫会面。潘汉年此事对中共中央隐瞒长达十二年，成为其后来被判内奸罪的重要依据。
description.en: Met with Wang Jingwei, arranged by Li Shiqun. Pan Hannian concealed this meeting from the CPC Central Committee for twelve years, which became a key piece of evidence in his later conviction as a traitor.

description.zh-cn: 在潘汉年向其坦白曾会见汪精卫后，将此事转呈给毛泽东，直接导致了潘汉年的被捕。
description.en: After Pan Hannian confessed to him about meeting Wang Jingwei, he reported the matter to Mao Zedong, which directly led to Pan's arrest.

description.zh-cn: 在收到陈毅转呈的潘汉年报告后，批示“此人从此不可信用”，并手谕“立即逮捕审查潘汉年”，将其定性为内奸并导致其被长期监禁。
description.en: After receiving Pan Hannian's report forwarded by Chen Yi, Mao Zedong wrote the directive 'This person is henceforth not to be trusted' and ordered 'Immediately arrest and investigate Pan Hannian,' labeling him a traitor and leading to his long-term imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 时任公安部部长，根据毛泽东的指示，在北京饭店亲自秘密逮捕了潘汉年。
description.en: As the Minister of Public Security at the time, he personally and secretly arrested Pan Hannian at the Beijing Hotel under Mao Zedong's instructions.

description.zh-cn: 在潘汉年被捕后，向中共中央政治局和书记处报告，从情报工作的角度反驳了潘汉年的内奸嫌疑。
description.en: After Pan Hannian's arrest, he reported to the Politburo and Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee, refuting the suspicion of Pan being a traitor from an intelligence work perspective.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，指控潘汉年等人为反革命集团，导致潘汉年被重新收监并被判处无期徒刑。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, she accused Pan Hannian and others of being a counter-revolutionary clique, leading to Pan's re-imprisonment and a life sentence.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命开始后，潘汉年被重新收监，并最终被判处无期徒刑，永久开除党籍。
description.en: After the start of the Cultural Revolution, Pan Hannian was re-imprisoned, and eventually sentenced to life imprisonment and permanently expelled from the party.

description.zh-cn: 公开表示应当为潘汉年平反，并向陈云写信阐明观点，对案件的复查起到了推动作用。
description.en: Publicly stated that Pan Hannian should be rehabilitated and wrote to Chen Yun to clarify his views, which helped promote the review of the case.

description.zh-cn: 在收到陈云转交的信件后，同意并支持了对潘汉年案的复查工作。
description.en: After receiving the letter forwarded by Chen Yun, he agreed to and supported the review of Pan Hannian's case.

description.zh-cn: 正式发出《关于为潘汉年同志平反昭雪恢复名誉的通知》，为其公开恢复名誉，推翻了所有不实之词。
description.en: Officially issued the 'Notice on the Rehabilitation and Restoration of Comrade Pan Hannian's Reputation,' publicly clearing his name and overturning all false accusations.

description.zh-cn: 蔡锷曾是梁启超在长沙时务学堂的学生，后在护国运动中成为其重要的政治盟友。
description.en: Cai E was a student of Liang Qichao at the Academy of Current Affairs in Changsha and later became his important political ally during the National Protection War.

description.zh-cn: 聂曦是中国共产党的秘密地下党员。
description.en: Nie Xi was a secret underground member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在得知宋彬彬的名字后说“要武嘛”，此后“宋要武”的名字闻名全国，深刻影响了宋彬彬的公众形象。
description.en: After learning Song Binbin's name, Mao Zedong said, "Be martial (要武嘛)." Subsequently, the name "Song Yaowu" became known nationwide, profoundly influencing Song Binbin's public image.

description.zh-cn: 邓楠是邓小平的女儿。
description.en: Deng Nan is the daughter of Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 邓楠于1970年毕业于北京大学物理系。
description.en: Deng Nan graduated from the Department of Physics at Peking University in 1970.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，邓楠在陕西汉中地区劳动，中断了正常的学术或职业发展。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Deng Nan labored in the Hanzhong area of Shaanxi, which interrupted her normal academic or professional development.

description.zh-cn: 邓楠曾在中国科学院半导体研究所任研究实习员。
description.en: Deng Nan once served as a research intern at the Institute of Semiconductors, Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 邓楠于2007年10月当选为中国共产党第十七届中央委员会委员。
description.en: Deng Nan was elected as a member of the 17th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party in October 2007.

position.zh-cn: 委员、常务委员、教科文卫体委员会副主任
position.en: Member, Standing Committee Member, Vice Director of the Committee for Education, Science, Culture, Health and Sports

description.zh-cn: 邓楠于2003年当选第十届全国政协委员，2011年增补为第十一届全国政协委员、教科文卫体委员会副主任，2013年当选第十二届全国政协常委及科教文卫体委员会副主任。
description.en: Deng Nan was elected as a member of the 10th National Committee of the CPPCC in 2003, was added as a member of the 11th National Committee and Vice Director of its Committee for Education, Science, Culture, Health and Sports in 2011, and was elected as a Standing Committee member of the 12th National Committee and Vice Director of its Committee for Education, Science, Culture, Health and Sports in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 邓楠是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Deng Nan is a member of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 蔡正元曾任第五、六、七、八届立法委员。
description.en: Tsai Cheng-yuan served as a legislator for the 5th, 6th, 7th, and 8th terms.

description.zh-cn: 在周恩来担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Zhou Enlai's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在华国锋担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Hua Guofeng's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在赵紫阳担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Zhao Ziyang's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 担任国防部长期间，中越战争爆发。
description.en: The Sino-Vietnamese War broke out during his tenure as Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 在赵紫阳担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Zhao Ziyang's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Deng Xiaoping was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 习近平曾担任耿飚的秘书。
description.en: Xi Jinping once served as Geng Biao's secretary.

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Deng Xiaoping was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 在李鹏担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Li Peng's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Deng Xiaoping was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 在江泽民担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Jiang Zemin was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件期间担任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 在李鹏担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Li Peng's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在朱镕基担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Zhu Rongji's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在江泽民担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Jiang Zemin was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 在温家宝担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Wen Jiabao's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在江泽民担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Jiang Zemin was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Hu Jintao was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 在温家宝担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Wen Jiabao's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Hu Jintao was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 在李克强担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Li Keqiang's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在习近平担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Xi Jinping was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 被开除党籍。
description.en: Expelled from the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 全国人大常委会通过免去李尚福的国务委员、国防部长职务。
description.en: The Standing Committee of the National People's Congress approved the removal of Li Shangfu from his posts as State Councilor and Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 在李强担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Serves as Minister of National Defense during Li Qiang's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在习近平担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Serves as Minister of National Defense while Xi Jinping is Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 国防部部长人选由全国人民代表大会投票表决通过。
description.en: The candidate for Minister of National Defense is approved by a vote of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 铁凝于1975年11月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Tie Ning joined the Communist Party of China in November 1975.

description.zh-cn: 习近平任命铁凝为国家主席特使，出席墨西哥总统权力交接仪式。
description.en: Xi Jinping appointed Tie Ning as his special presidential envoy to attend the Mexican presidential inauguration.

description.zh-cn: 林立果是林彪的儿子。
description.en: Lin Liguo is the son of Lin Biao.

description.zh-cn: 九一三事件的发生导致《“571工程”纪要》政变计划败露并最终失败。
description.en: The occurrence of the September 13th Incident led to the exposure and ultimate failure of the coup plan outlined in the "Project 571 Outline".

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东不顾周恩来等人劝阻，执意批准将《“571工程”纪要》全文下发全国进行传达和批判。
description.en: Disregarding the advice of Zhou Enlai and others, Mao Zedong insisted on approving the nationwide distribution of the full text of the "Project 571 Outline" for circulation and criticism.

description.zh-cn: 经毛泽东首肯后，中共中央以文件的形式将《“571工程”纪要》向全国人民传达。
description.en: After Mao Zedong's approval, the CCP Central Committee circulated the "Project 571 Outline" to the entire nation in the form of an official document.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来等人曾劝阻毛泽东，反对将《“571工程”纪要》全文下发。
description.en: Zhou Enlai and others advised Mao Zedong against distributing the full text of the "Project 571 Outline".

description.zh-cn: 《“571工程”纪要》中的思想和语句对1976年天安门广场“四五运动”中的诗篇和言论产生了明显影响。
description.en: The ideas and phrases from the "Project 571 Outline" significantly influenced the poems and speeches during the 1976 "Four-Five Movement" in Tiananmen Square.

description.zh-cn: 该纪要对毛泽东的直接批判以及其在全国的传达，客观上揭示了文化大革命的内部矛盾和弊病，起到了启蒙作用，动摇了文革的群众基础。
description.en: The document's direct criticism of Mao Zedong and its nationwide circulation objectively revealed the internal contradictions and problems of the Cultural Revolution, serving an enlightening role and shaking the movement's mass support.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的逝世是导致文化大革命结束的关键事件之一。
description.en: Mao Zedong's death was one of the key events that led to the end of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 根据魏京生的评论，邓小平后来的改革，除了不反毛泽东之外，其余内容均是按照《“571工程”纪要》来的。
description.en: According to commentary by Wei Jingsheng, Deng Xiaoping's later reforms, apart from not opposing Mao Zedong, followed the contents of the "Project 571 Outline".

description.zh-cn: 大清帝国在鸦片战争中战败，是导致香港岛被割让的直接原因。
description.en: The Qing Empire was defeated in the Opium War, which was the direct cause of the cession of Hong Kong Island.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战结束后，香港岛人口剧增，岛上不少地方开始发展。
description.en: After the end of World War II, the population of Hong Kong Island surged, and many areas on the island began to develop.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉以承继汉室为名，与篡汉的曹魏分庭抗礼，多次进行北伐。
description.en: Shu Han, claiming to be the legitimate successor to the Han dynasty, rivaled the usurping state of Cao Wei and launched multiple northern expeditions against it.

description.zh-cn: 面对邓艾军队的进攻，刘禅接受投降建议，带领成都文武百官出降，蜀汉正式灭亡。
description.en: Facing the advance of Deng Ai's army, Liu Shan accepted advice to surrender and led the officials of Chengdu to capitulate, formally ending Shu Han.

description.zh-cn: 邓艾在进攻成都途中，击败并斩杀了负责防守的卫将军诸葛瞻。
description.en: On his way to attack Chengdu, Deng Ai defeated and killed General-in-Chief of the Guards Zhuge Zhan, who was in charge of the defense.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛瞻与董厥等大臣因姜维多次北伐无功、耗费国力而感到反感，曾上书要求剥夺其兵权。
description.en: Zhuge Zhan, along with other ministers like Dong Jue, disapproved of Jiang Wei's repeated fruitless northern expeditions that drained national resources, and they once petitioned to have his military command revoked.

description.zh-cn: 刘备在汉中之战中击败了曹操，成功夺取了汉中。
description.en: Liu Bei defeated Cao Cao in the Hanzhong Campaign and successfully captured Hanzhong.

description.zh-cn: 1943年冬天，时任抗大校长何长工写信向习仲勋介绍齐心，促成了他们的相识与婚姻。
description.en: In the winter of 1943, He Changgong, then president of the Counter-Japanese Military and Political University, wrote a letter to Xi Zhongxun introducing Qi Xin, which led to their acquaintance and marriage.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，康生将齐心列入500人黑名单，导致她受到审查。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Kang Sheng placed Qi Xin on a blacklist of 500 people, which led to her being investigated.

description.zh-cn: 因丈夫习仲勋的问题，齐心在文化大革命期间受到审查，并在五七干校劳动了7年。
description.en: Due to her husband Xi Zhongxun's problems, Qi Xin was investigated during the Cultural Revolution and spent 7 years in labor at a May Seventh Cadre School.

description.zh-cn: 在齐心写信求助后，周恩来作出批复，安排齐心母子见到了被关押的习仲勋，并帮助解决了其生活困难。
description.en: After Qi Xin wrote a letter asking for help, Zhou Enlai gave instructions to arrange for her and her children to meet the imprisoned Xi Zhongxun and helped solve their living difficulties.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命结束后，为帮助丈夫习仲勋复出而四处奔走“上访”。
description.en: After the end of the Cultural Revolution, she traveled extensively to petition for her husband Xi Zhongxun's political rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 受齐心所托，向邓小平为习仲勋说情，促成了其政治复出。
description.en: At the request of Qi Xin, he interceded with Deng Xiaoping on behalf of Xi Zhongxun, which led to his political rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平等元老对胡锦涛的赏识是其最终能成为最高领导人的重要因素。
description.en: The appreciation from party elders like Deng Xiaoping was a significant factor in Hu Jintao's ultimate rise to the paramount leadership position.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛在胡耀邦担任总书记期间获得提拔。
description.en: Hu Jintao was promoted during Hu Yaobang's tenure as General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 1983年，时任共青团书记的胡锦涛看中李克强，将其引荐至共青团中央委员会并视其为门徒。李克强由此成为胡锦涛政治上的重要盟友和潜在继任者之一。
description.en: In 1983, Hu Jintao, then secretary of the Communist Youth League, recognized Li Keqiang's potential, brought him into the CYL Central Committee, and regarded him as a protégé. Li Keqiang subsequently became one of Hu Jintao's key political allies and potential successors.

description.zh-cn: 胡春华由胡锦涛举荐，曾被视为隔代指定的接班人。
description.en: Hu Chunhua was recommended by Hu Jintao and was once seen as the designated successor for the next generation.

description.zh-cn: 以“枉法诬贤”、“蠹害政治”等罪名，将时任宰相胡惟庸凌迟处死。
description.en: Executed Chancellor Hu Weiyong by lingchi (death by a thousand cuts) on charges such as 'perverting the law and framing the virtuous' and 'harming politics'.

description.zh-cn: 在诛杀胡惟庸后，朱元璋宣布废除丞相制度，以加强皇权。
description.en: After executing Hu Weiyong, Zhu Yuanzhang announced the abolition of the chancellery system to strengthen imperial power.

description.zh-cn: 胡惟庸于洪武六年任右丞相，后升任左丞相，独相数年。
description.en: Hu Weiyong was appointed Right Chancellor in the 6th year of the Hongwu reign, later promoted to Left Chancellor, and served as the sole chancellor for several years.

description.zh-cn: 2008年于伦敦帝国学院物理系毕业。
description.en: Graduated from the Department of Physics at Imperial College London in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 李治廷与范冰冰合作主演电影《一夜惊喜》并合唱同名主题曲。
description.en: Aarif Rahman co-starred with Fan Bingbing in the film 'One Night Surprise' and they sang the theme song of the same name together.

description.zh-cn: 子路是孔子的著名弟子，也是侍奉孔子最久的学生。
description.en: Zi Lu was a prominent disciple of Confucius and the student who served him the longest.

description.zh-cn: 孔子十分信赖子路，曾说若自己理想无法实现，会跟随自己的只有子路。当听闻子路殉职并被处以醢刑后，孔子极为伤心，并誓言此后不再食用肉酱。
description.en: Confucius trusted Zi Lu deeply, once saying that if his ideals failed, only Zi Lu would follow him. Upon hearing of Zi Lu's death and mutilation, Confucius was extremely grieved and vowed never to eat meat paste again.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗追尊子路为“卫侯”。
description.en: Emperor Xuanzong of Tang posthumously honored Zi Lu as 'Marquis of Wei'.

description.zh-cn: 宋真宗加封子路为“河内公”。
description.en: Emperor Zhenzong of Song granted Zi Lu the title 'Duke of Henei'.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗改称子路为“先贤仲子”。
description.en: The Jiajing Emperor of Ming changed Zi Lu's title to 'Former Worthy, Master Zhong'.

description.zh-cn: 子路随孔子周游列国，是十四年间始终追随孔子服侍左右的弟子。
description.en: Zi Lu accompanied Confucius on his travels through the states and was the disciple who followed and served him throughout the fourteen years.

description.zh-cn: 后金自努尔哈赤发布“七大恨”起，便与明朝进入长期的战争状态。
description.en: Starting from Nurhaci's issuance of the 'Seven Grievances', the Later Jin entered a state of prolonged warfare with the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 后金是清朝的前身，1636年皇太极改国号为大清。
description.en: The Later Jin was the predecessor of the Qing dynasty; Hong Taiji renamed the state to Great Qing in 1636.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤是后金的开国君主。
description.en: Nurhaci was the founding monarch of the Later Jin.

description.zh-cn: 陈吉宁是中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: Chen Jining is a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命的结束以及毛泽东的逝世，为华国锋提出和奉行“两个凡是”创造了政治背景。
description.en: The end of the Cultural Revolution and the death of Mao Zedong created the political context for Hua Guofeng to propose and implement the 'Two Whatevers'.

description.zh-cn: 1963年，金庸鼓励倪匡在《明报》副刊连载小说，促成了《卫斯理系列》的诞生。
description.en: In 1963, Jin Yong encouraged Ni Kuang to serialize a novel in the Ming Pao supplement, which led to the creation of the 'Wisely Series'.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡曾帮助朋友金庸代笔《天龙八部》的部分章节。
description.en: Ni Kuang once helped his friend Jin Yong by ghostwriting parts of 'Demi-Gods and Semi-Devils'.

description.zh-cn: 纪登奎于1938年4月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Ji Dengkui joined the Communist Party of China in April 1938.

description.zh-cn: 纪登奎于1969年6月至1973年8月任中共中央政治局候补委员，1973年8月至1980年2月任委员。
description.en: Ji Dengkui served as an Alternate Member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee from June 1969 to August 1973, and as a full Member from August 1973 to February 1980.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东晚年赏识和培养纪登奎，称其为“老朋友”，并将其从地方提拔至中央核心领导层。
description.en: In his later years, Mao Zedong appreciated and cultivated Ji Dengkui, calling him an 'old friend' and promoting him from local government to the central core leadership.

description.zh-cn: 纪登奎在文化大革命期间获得毛泽东提拔，进入中央核心，成为活跃的政治人物。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Ji Dengkui was promoted by Mao Zedong, entered the central leadership core, and became an active political figure.

description.zh-cn: 庐山会议后，毛泽东任命无军队任职经验的纪登奎进入军委办事组，意在“掺沙子”以牵制林彪，两人形成政治对立关系。
description.en: After the Lushan Conference, Mao Zedong appointed Ji Dengkui, who had no military experience, to the Military Commission's administrative group, intending to 'mix in sand' to counterbalance Lin Biao, thus creating a political rivalry between them.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在中共十一届三中全会后掌握实权，纪登奎作为被视为“凡是派”的代表人物之一，在政治上受到指责、被边缘化，并最终辞去所有职务。
description.en: After Deng Xiaoping gained power following the Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee, Ji Dengkui, as a representative of the 'Whatever Faction', was politically criticized, marginalized, and ultimately resigned from all his posts.

description.zh-cn: 在讨论隔离审查“四人帮”的文件时，纪登奎提出应在文件中指出“文革”的错误，表明其对“四人帮”路线的否定态度。
description.en: When discussing the document for the quarantine and investigation of the 'Gang of Four', Ji Dengkui proposed that the errors of the 'Cultural Revolution' should be pointed out in the document, indicating his negative stance on the 'Gang of Four's' line.

description.zh-cn: 赵王张敖将姬妾赵姬献给刘邦侍寝，赵姬因此怀孕生下刘长。
description.en: Zhang Ao, King of Zhao, presented his concubine Consort Zhao to Liu Bang, who then became pregnant with Liu Chang.

description.zh-cn: 吕后因嫉妒，对身陷囹圄的赵姬不予理会，导致赵姬在生下刘长后愤而自杀。
description.en: Out of jealousy, Empress Lü ignored the plight of the imprisoned Consort Zhao, leading to Zhao's suicide after giving birth to Liu Chang.

description.zh-cn: 在1959年庐山会议后，时任中国人民解放军总参谋长黄克诚被打倒。
description.en: After the 1959 Lushan Conference, then Chief of the General Staff of the PLA Huang Kecheng was purged.

description.zh-cn: 在黄克诚被打倒后，时任国防部长林彪提议让罗瑞卿担任总参谋长。
description.en: After Huang Kecheng was purged, then Minister of National Defense Lin Biao proposed Luo Ruiqing for the position of Chief of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命结束后，邓小平上台主政，罗瑞卿得以平反。
description.en: After the Cultural Revolution ended, Deng Xiaoping came to power, and Luo Ruiqing was rehabilitated.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东就罗瑞卿事件表态后，江青等人继续寻找借口，拖延对罗瑞卿的平反。
description.en: After Mao Zedong expressed his view on the Luo Ruiqing incident, Jiang Qing and others continued to find excuses to delay Luo's rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 谢尔盖·绍伊古被认为是俄罗斯总统普京的亲密盟友，属于普京西罗维基核心圈子的成员。
description.en: Sergey Shoigu is considered a close ally of Russian President Vladimir Putin and a member of Putin's siloviki inner circle.

position.zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦安全会议秘书长
position.en: Secretary of the Security Council of the Russian Federation

description.zh-cn: 在弗拉基米尔·普京总统任内担任俄罗斯联邦安全会议秘书长。
description.en: Serves as the Secretary of the Security Council of the Russian Federation under President Vladimir Putin.

description.zh-cn: 乌克兰对谢尔盖·绍伊古提起刑事检控，指控他协助乌克兰东部的非法军事团体。
description.en: Ukraine initiated criminal proceedings against Sergey Shoigu, accusing him of assisting 'illegal military groups' in eastern Ukraine.

description.zh-cn: 因俄罗斯入侵乌克兰，加拿大对谢尔盖·绍伊古实施制裁。
description.en: Canada imposed sanctions on Sergey Shoigu due to the Russian invasion of Ukraine.

description.zh-cn: 谢尔盖·绍伊古下令指挥官每天早上在军营播放俄罗斯国歌。
description.en: Sergey Shoigu ordered commanders to play the Russian national anthem in barracks every morning.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋从张士诚部将吕珍的围攻中救出韩林儿。
description.en: Zhu Yuanzhang rescued Han Lin'er from the siege by Lü Zhen, a general under Zhang Shicheng.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖（朱棣）通过发动靖难之变，成功从其侄子建文帝手中夺取了皇位。
description.en: The Yongle Emperor (Zhu Di) successfully seized the throne from his nephew, the Jianwen Emperor, by launching the Jingnan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 在靖难之变中，明成祖击败并推翻了建文帝的统治。建文帝从此下落不明，寻找其踪迹成为郑和下西洋的动机之一。
description.en: During the Jingnan Campaign, the Yongle Emperor defeated and overthrew the rule of the Jianwen Emperor. The Jianwen Emperor's subsequent disappearance became one of the motivations for Zheng He's voyages.

position.en: Dean of the School of Letters at Peking University

description.zh-cn: 1917年1月，时任北京大学校长的蔡元培聘请陈独秀出任文科学长，使《新青年》总部随之迁往北京。
description.en: In January 1917, Cai Yuanpei, then president of Peking University, appointed Chen Duxiu as the Dean of the School of Letters, which led to the relocation of the 'New Youth' headquarters to Beijing.

position.en: Dean of the School of Letters

description.zh-cn: 1917年1月11日，陈独秀受蔡元培聘请，出任北京大学文科学长。
description.en: On January 11, 1917, at the invitation of Cai Yuanpei, Chen Duxiu became the Dean of the School of Letters at Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 王洪文是“四人帮”成员之一。
description.en: Wang Hongwen was a member of the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 张春桥是“四人帮”成员之一。
description.en: Zhang Chunqiao was a member of the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 姚文元是“四人帮”成员之一。
description.en: Yao Wenyuan was a member of the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东支持下，江青与张春桥指使姚文元编写《评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉》。
description.en: With Mao Zedong's support, Jiang Qing and Zhang Chunqiao instructed Yao Wenyuan to write 'On the New Historical Drama "Hai Rui Dismissed from Office"'.

description.zh-cn: 在林彪九一三事件后，王洪文从上海上调中央，并与张、江、姚结成联盟。
description.en: After the Lin Biao September 13 Incident, Wang Hongwen was transferred from Shanghai to the central government and formed an alliance with Zhang, Jiang, and Yao.

description.zh-cn: 在汉文帝时期，刘启担任皇太子，后继位为汉景帝。
description.en: During the reign of Emperor Wen, Liu Qi served as the Crown Prince before succeeding to the throne as Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 1836年，伦敦大学学院与伦敦国王学院成为新成立的伦敦大学的两位始创成员学院。
description.en: In 1836, University College London and King's College London became the two founding constituent colleges of the newly established University of London.

description.zh-cn: 1985年，女王伊利沙伯二世主持了伦敦大学学院本部大楼的启用仪式，标志其最终完工。
description.en: In 1985, Queen Elizabeth II presided over the opening ceremony of the main building of University College London, marking its final completion.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，伦敦大学学院的本部大楼被炸毁，多数院系被迫搬离伦敦。
description.en: During World War II, the main building of University College London was bombed, and most of its departments were forced to evacuate London.

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃俄国是苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟的创始成员国。
description.en: Soviet Russia was a founding member of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics.

description.zh-cn: 李景隆是李文忠的儿子。
description.en: Li Jinglong was the son of Li Wenzhong.

description.zh-cn: 李景隆是朱元璋外甥李文忠的儿子，即朱元璋的外甥孙。
description.en: Li Jinglong was the son of Zhu Yuanzhang's nephew, Li Wenzhong, making him Zhu Yuanzhang's grandnephew.

description.zh-cn: 在靖难之役期间，李景隆被建文帝任命为大将军，率领朝廷军队对抗燕王朱棣。
description.en: During the Jingnan Campaign, Li Jinglong was appointed Grand General by the Jianwen Emperor to lead the imperial army against Zhu Di, the Prince of Yan.

description.zh-cn: 白沟河惨败后，建文帝下诏将李景隆召回，并以盛庸替代其大将军之职。
description.en: After the disastrous defeat at Baigou River, the Jianwen Emperor recalled Li Jinglong and replaced him as Grand General with Sheng Yong.

description.zh-cn: 燕军渡江后，方孝孺请求建文帝诛杀李景隆。
description.en: After the Yan army crossed the Yangtze River, Fang Xiaoru requested that the Jianwen Emperor execute Li Jinglong.

description.zh-cn: 2022年12月起，袁家军担任中共重庆市委书记。
description.en: Since December 2022, Yuan Jiajun has served as the Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 因其即位是“双重喜庆”，遂将自己曾藩封的恭州升为重庆府，重庆由此得名。
description.en: Because his enthronement was a 'double celebration', he elevated his former fief of Gongzhou to Chongqing Fu, from which the city gets its name.

description.zh-cn: 赵惇是宋孝宗的第三子。
description.en: Zhao Dun was the third son of Emperor Xiaozong of Song.

description.zh-cn: 1956年9月起，兼任国务院副总理。
description.en: Starting from September 1956, he also served as Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 1966年文革开始后，林彪一度成为仅次于毛泽东的接班人。
description.en: After the Cultural Revolution began in 1966, Lin Biao became the designated successor to Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 1989年5月，陈云提出“以邓小平为头子（核心）的党中央”，巩固了邓小平的领导核心地位。
description.en: In May 1989, Chen Yun proposed 'the Party Central Committee with Deng Xiaoping as its head (core)', consolidating Deng's core leadership position.

description.zh-cn: 作为首批签署人之一签署了《零八宪章》。
description.en: Signed Charter 08 as one of the first signatories.

description.zh-cn: 作为首批签署人之一签署了《零八宪章》。
description.en: Signed Charter 08 as one of the first signatories.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府禁止了与《零八宪章》相关的活动，并逮捕多名发起人。
description.en: The government of the People's Republic of China banned activities related to Charter 08 and arrested several of its initiators.

description.zh-cn: 在《零八宪章》发布前夕拘留刘晓波，并随后以“煽动颠覆国家政权罪”将其逮捕判刑，直至其在监禁中去世。
description.en: Detained Liu Xiaobo on the eve of Charter 08's release, and later arrested and sentenced him for 'inciting subversion of state power', until his death in custody.

description.zh-cn: 对《零八宪章》表示了支持和赞赏。
description.en: Expressed support and admiration for Charter 08.

description.zh-cn: 陈元是陈云的长子。
description.en: Chen Yuan is the eldest son of Chen Yun.

description.zh-cn: 陈元在中国人民银行任职期间，曾在行长朱镕基领导下工作。
description.en: During his tenure at the People's Bank of China, Chen Yuan worked under Governor Zhu Rongji.

description.zh-cn: 陈元在俞正声担任全国政协主席期间任副主席。
description.en: Chen Yuan served as Vice Chairman while Yu Zhengsheng was the Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2013年3月，陈元当选全国政协副主席，成为党和国家领导人。
description.en: In March 2013, Chen Yuan was elected Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee, becoming a Party and state leader.

description.zh-cn: 2013年清明节期间，陈元为薄一波敬献花篮，以示纪念。
description.en: During the Qingming Festival in 2013, Chen Yuan presented a flower basket in memory of Bo Yibo.

description.zh-cn: 2013年4月11日，陈元在《人民日报》发表文章，称赞江泽民的反腐功绩。
description.en: On April 11, 2013, Chen Yuan published an article in the People's Daily praising Jiang Zemin's anti-corruption achievements.

description.zh-cn: 陈云曾任国务院副总理。
description.en: Chen Yun once served as Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 有评论称，江泽民为陈元安排了全国政协副主席的职务。
description.en: According to some commentators, Jiang Zemin arranged the position of Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee for Chen Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 陈晓丹2007年毕业于杜克大学经济系。
description.en: Chen Xiaodan graduated from the Department of Economics at Duke University in 2007.

description.zh-cn: 在被迫同意离婚后，溥仪为挽回体面，登报发布“上谕”，宣布撤去文绣的原封位号，废为庶人。
description.en: After being forced to agree to the divorce, Puyi, in order to save face, published an 'imperial edict' in the newspapers, announcing the revocation of Wenxiu's title and demoting her to the status of a commoner.

description.zh-cn: 文绣的家族是蒙古八旗中的鄂尔德特氏，隶属于上三旗的镶黄旗。
description.en: Wenxiu's family, the Erdet clan of the Mongol Eight Banners, belonged to the Bordered Yellow Banner of the Upper Three Banners.

description.zh-cn: 文绣是清朝末代皇帝溥仪的淑妃。
description.en: Wenxiu was the Consort Shu of Puyi, the last emperor of the Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 为准备称帝，将太和殿、中和殿、保和殿等主要建筑改名。
description.en: In preparation for his enthronement, he renamed major buildings such as the Hall of Supreme Harmony, Hall of Central Harmony, and Hall of Preserving Harmony.

description.zh-cn: 1966年8月，周作人被红卫兵鞭打批斗，家也被多次查封和洗劫。
description.en: In August 1966, Zhou Zuoren was beaten and denounced by Red Guards, and his house was raided and sealed multiple times.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，刘永清被下放到宁夏青铜峡的五七干校。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Liu Yongqing was sent down to the May Seventh Cadre School in Qingtongxia, Ningxia.

description.zh-cn: 在刘永清担任北京市城乡规划委员会副主任的时期，贾庆林是时任中共北京市委书记，为刘永清的上级领导。
description.en: During Liu Yongqing's tenure as Deputy Director of the Beijing Municipal Commission of Urban Planning, Jia Qinglin was the then-serving Party Secretary of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee, making him Liu's superior.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝误信太子谋反的谎言，派遣丞相刘屈牦发兵镇压，最终导致太子兵败自杀。
description.en: Emperor Wu mistakenly believed the lie that the Crown Prince was rebelling and dispatched Chancellor Liu Qumao with troops to suppress him, ultimately leading to the prince's defeat and suicide.

description.zh-cn: 刘据是汉武帝的长子。
description.en: Liu Ju was the eldest son of Emperor Wu of Han.

description.zh-cn: 刘据是皇后卫子夫所生之子。
description.en: Liu Ju was the son of Empress Wei Zifu.

description.zh-cn: 卫子夫是汉武帝的皇后。
description.en: Wei Zifu was the empress of Emperor Wu of Han.

description.zh-cn: 刘弗陵是汉武帝的幼子。
description.en: Liu Fuling was the youngest son of Emperor Wu of Han.

description.zh-cn: 李克强担任两届中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Li Keqiang served two terms as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李克强自中共十七届一中全会起担任三届中央政治局常委。
description.en: Li Keqiang served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee for three terms, starting from the 1st Plenary Session of the 17th CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在温家宝总理任期内，李克强担任排名第一的国务院副总理。
description.en: During Premier Wen Jiabao's term, Li Keqiang served as the first-ranking Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 外界普遍认为李克强与习近平在经济政策和治理理念上存在分歧，流传有“习李不和”的说法。李克强倡导的“地摊经济”等务实政策与习近平的政治议程时有冲突，导致其被边缘化。
description.en: It is widely believed that Li Keqiang and Xi Jinping had disagreements on economic policies and governance philosophies, leading to rumors of discord. Li's pragmatic policies, such as the 'stall economy,' often conflicted with Xi's political agenda, resulting in his marginalization.

description.zh-cn: 李强接替李克强成为中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Li Qiang succeeded Li Keqiang as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李克强在深圳向邓小平铜像献花，并重申改革开放的决心，此举被解读为他试图传承邓小平的政治遗产，以表达其政治立场。
description.en: Li Keqiang's gesture of presenting a flower basket to Deng Xiaoping's statue in Shenzhen and reaffirming his commitment to 'Reform and Opening Up' was interpreted as an attempt to carry on Deng's political legacy and express his own political stance.

description.zh-cn: 1203年，丘处机接替刘处玄成为全真道第五任掌教，直至1227年去世。
description.en: In 1203, Qiu Chuji succeeded Liu Chuxuan to become the fifth leader of the Quanzhen School, a position he held until his death in 1227.

description.zh-cn: 1222年，丘处机向成吉思汗阐述“敬天爱民”、减少屠杀、清心寡欲等治国养生之道，对其产生影响。
description.en: In 1222, Qiu Chuji expounded on the principles of 'revering Heaven and loving the people,' reducing slaughter, and practicing asceticism to Genghis Khan, influencing his approach to governance and personal cultivation.

description.zh-cn: 成吉思汗对丘处机极为敬重，下诏豁免全真道的赋役，并于1227年赐金虎牌，命其掌管天下道教事务。
description.en: Genghis Khan held Qiu Chuji in high esteem, issuing an edict to exempt the Quanzhen School from taxes and corvée labor, and in 1227, granted him a golden tiger tablet, appointing him to oversee all Taoist affairs in the empire.

description.zh-cn: 1269年，元世祖忽必烈下诏追赠丘处机为“长春演道主教真人”的封号。
description.en: In 1269, Emperor Shizu of Yuan, Kublai Khan, issued an edict posthumously granting Qiu Chuji the title 'Perfect Man Changchun, Who Expounds the Tao and Leads the Religion'.

description.zh-cn: 就读于哲学系。
description.en: Studied in the Department of Philosophy.

description.zh-cn: 王思聪曾担任万达集团董事，但不负责任何事务，后于2022年8月30日卸任。
description.en: Wang Sicong served as a director of the Wanda Group, but was not responsible for any specific affairs, and he stepped down on August 30, 2022.

description.zh-cn: 提供约5亿元人民币作为启动资金，鼓励王思聪成立北京普思投资有限公司进行创业实践。
description.en: Provided about 500 million RMB as start-up capital to encourage Wang Sicong to establish Beijing Pusi Investment Co., Ltd. for entrepreneurial practice.

description.zh-cn: 因发表关于连花清瘟和核酸检测的争议性言论，王思聪的新浪微博账号被注销。
description.en: Wang Sicong's Sina Weibo account was deleted due to his controversial remarks about Lianhua Qingwen and nucleic acid testing.

description.zh-cn: 抗战胜利后，苏联支援大批的中国共产党行政人员与中国人民解放军进入东北进行接收。
description.en: After the victory of the war, the Soviet Union supported a large number of CCP administrators and PLA forces to enter Northeast China for takeover.

description.zh-cn: 汉室后人刘秀通过武力统一天下，光复汉朝，定都洛阳，史称东汉。
description.en: Liu Xiu, a descendant of the Han imperial family, reunified the realm by force, restored the Han dynasty, and established the capital at Luoyang, known historically as the Eastern Han.

description.zh-cn: 何进被杀后，袁绍率军攻入皇宫，对宦官进行屠杀，十常侍也被杀死。
description.en: After He Jin was killed, Yuan Shao led troops to storm the imperial palace and massacre the eunuchs, including the Ten Attendants.

description.zh-cn: 地方官员不满董卓的专权，推举袁绍为盟主，组成关东联军讨伐董卓。
description.en: Dissatisfied with Dong Zhuo's tyranny, regional officials elected Yuan Shao as their leader and formed the Guandong Coalition to campaign against Dong Zhuo.

description.zh-cn: 大臣王允唆使董卓的部将吕布，合作谋杀了董卓。
description.en: The minister Wang Yun instigated Dong Zhuo's general Lü Bu to cooperate in assassinating Dong Zhuo.

description.zh-cn: 高嘉瑜是民主进步党籍的政治人物。
description.en: Kao Chia-yu is a politician and a member of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 高嘉瑜担任第10届中华民国立法委员。
description.en: Kao Chia-yu served as a legislator in the 10th Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 在2018年台北市长选举的造势晚会上，姚文智暗指高嘉瑜在其发言时离开，引发支持者对高的不满。
description.en: During a rally for the 2018 Taipei mayoral election, Pasuya Yao implied that Kao Chia-yu left while he was speaking, inciting discontent among his supporters towards her.

description.zh-cn: 丁纯是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Ding Chun is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 吕蒙以“白衣渡江”之计奇袭荆州，最终俘虏并斩杀了关羽。
description.en: Lü Meng used the tactic of 'crossing the river in civilian clothes' to launch a surprise attack on Jing Province, ultimately capturing and executing Guan Yu.

description.zh-cn: 魏将邓艾偷渡阴平，兵临成都，后主刘禅投降，蜀汉灭亡。其后司马氏篡魏建晋。
description.en: The Wei general Deng Ai crossed Yinping by a treacherous route and appeared before Chengdu. The Shu emperor Liu Shan surrendered, and Shu Han fell. The Sima clan later usurped Wei and established Jin.

description.zh-cn: 三年困难时期的严重后果导致中共中央开始调整经济政策，并于1961年批准“八字方针”，实际上停止了大跃进运动。
description.en: The severe consequences of the Three Years of Difficult Period led the CPC Central Committee to adjust its economic policies, approving the 'Eight-Character Policy' in 1961, which effectively ended the Great Leap Forward movement.

description.zh-cn: 因支持“包产到户”，邓子恢在1962年北戴河会议及八届十中全会上遭到毛泽东的严厉批判，并被降职。
description.en: For supporting 'fixing output quotas on a household basis,' Deng Zihui was severely criticized by Mao Zedong at the 1962 Beidaihe Conference and the 8th Plenary Session of the 10th Central Committee, and was subsequently demoted.

description.zh-cn: 在自身发生严重饥荒的情况下，中国于1960年援助阿尔巴尼亚15000吨小麦，并于1961年赠予其五亿卢布及额外的小麦。
description.en: Despite its own severe famine, China provided Albania with 15,000 tons of wheat in 1960, and in 1961, granted it 500 million rubles and additional wheat.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来代表中国政府，拒绝了赫鲁晓夫主动提出的对华援助以缓解饥荒的建议。
description.en: On behalf of the Chinese government, Zhou Enlai rejected Khrushchev's unsolicited offer of aid to alleviate the famine.

description.zh-cn: 在被推翻前的数十年间，美国一直是伊朗国王穆罕默德·礼萨·巴列维的主要支持者，为其提供了大量军事和经济援助。
description.en: For decades before he was overthrown, the United States was the main supporter of Shah Mohammad Reza Pahlavi of Iran, providing him with extensive military and economic aid.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大政府及其驻伊朗大使肯·泰勒为六名逃脱的美国外交官提供了庇护和虚假护照，帮助他们安全离开伊朗。
description.en: The Canadian government and its ambassador to Iran, Ken Taylor, provided shelter and false passports for six escaped American diplomats, helping them to leave Iran safely.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝采纳“罢黜百家，独尊儒术”的政策，将《周易》与《诗》、《书》、《礼》、《春秋》并列为《五经》，确立了其官方经典的地位。
description.en: Emperor Wu of Han adopted the policy of 'dismissing the hundred schools and revering only Confucianism,' elevating the I Ching along with the 'Poetry', 'Documents', 'Rites', and 'Spring and Autumn Annals' to the status of the 'Five Classics', thereby establishing its official canonical status.

description.zh-cn: 自汉代开始，《易经》被官方尊奉为“五经”之一。
description.en: Since the Han Dynasty, the I Ching has been officially revered as one of the 'Five Classics'.

description.zh-cn: 在秦始皇“焚书坑儒”期间，时任丞相李斯将《周易》归类为医术占卜之书，从而使其免于被焚毁。
description.en: During Qin Shi Huang's 'burning of books and burying of scholars', Chancellor Li Si classified the I Ching as a book of medicine and divination, thus sparing it from being burned.

description.zh-cn: 自17世纪起，耶稣会的传教士开始将《易经》翻译并介绍到西方世界。
description.en: Starting in the 17th century, Jesuit missionaries began to translate and introduce the I Ching to the Western world.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林在中共十三届一中全会上当选为中央政治局常委。
description.en: Yao Yilin was elected as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee at the First Plenary Session of the 13th Central Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林长期担任国务院副总理，分管经济工作。
description.en: Yao Yilin served as Vice Premier of the State Council for a long time, in charge of economic work.

description.zh-cn: 1937年左右考入南开大学经济系学习。
description.en: Enrolled in the Department of Economics at Nankai University around 1937.

description.zh-cn: 服役期间参与了中国抗日战争和第二次国共内战。
description.en: During his service, he participated in the Second Sino-Japanese War and the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林在文化大革命期间受到严重迫害，直到1973年才复出工作。
description.en: Yao Yilin was severely persecuted during the Cultural Revolution and did not return to work until 1973.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林反对华国锋提出的“两个凡是”方针。
description.en: Yao Yilin opposed the "Two Whatevers" policy proposed by Hua Guofeng.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林坚决支持对学生运动采取军事镇压，是唯一一位没有与学生对话的政治局常委。
description.en: Yao Yilin firmly supported the military suppression of the student movement and was the only Politburo Standing Committee member who did not engage in dialogue with the students.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林担任中央政治局常委期间，江泽民是中共中央总书记。
description.en: While Yao Yilin was a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, Jiang Zemin was the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林在担任国家计划委员会主任和国务院副总理期间，李鹏是国务院总理。
description.en: While Yao Yilin served as Director of the State Planning Commission and Vice Premier, Li Peng was the Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林在担任中央办公厅主任、商业部长和国务院副总理期间，华国锋是党主席或国务院总理。
description.en: While Yao Yilin served as Director of the General Office of the Central Committee, Minister of Commerce, and Vice Premier, Hua Guofeng was the Party Chairman or Premier.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林担任中央办公厅主任期间，胡耀邦是中共中央主席。
description.en: While Yao Yilin was Director of the General Office of the Central Committee, Hu Yaobang was the Chairman of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 段宜康是民主进步党的党员，并曾代表该党担任多项公职。
description.en: Duan Yi-kang is a member of the Democratic Progressive Party and has held several public offices on behalf of the party.

description.zh-cn: 孝定景皇后是光绪帝的嫡妻皇后。
description.en: Empress Xiaodingjing was the primary empress consort of the Guangxu Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 因慈禧太后强行指定婚事，光绪帝厌恶孝定景皇后，夫妻关系不睦。
description.en: Due to the marriage being arranged against his will by Empress Dowager Cixi, the Guangxu Emperor disliked Empress Xiaodingjing, leading to a strained marital relationship.

description.zh-cn: 孝定景皇后是慈禧太后之弟桂祥的女儿，即慈禧太后的侄女。
description.en: Empress Xiaodingjing was the daughter of Guixiang, the younger brother of Empress Dowager Cixi, making her Cixi's niece.

description.zh-cn: 慈禧太后选定自己的侄女叶赫那拉氏为光绪帝的皇后，以便监视光绪帝。
description.en: Empress Dowager Cixi selected her niece, the future Empress Xiaodingjing, to be the Guangxu Emperor's empress in order to monitor his actions.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝驾崩后，孝定景皇后成为宣统帝溥仪的养母，并负责抚养他。
description.en: After the death of the Guangxu Emperor, Empress Xiaodingjing became the adoptive mother of the Xuantong Emperor Puyi and was responsible for raising him.

description.zh-cn: 在宣统帝年幼时，作为皇太后垂帘听政，代行国家最高统治权。
description.en: During the Xuantong Emperor's childhood, she ruled as Empress Dowager regent, exercising supreme state power on his behalf.

description.zh-cn: 隆裕太后逝世后，北洋政府为其举行了高规格的国葬，并通告全国下半旗致哀三日。
description.en: After Empress Dowager Longyu's death, the Beiyang Government held a high-profile state funeral for her and ordered national flags to be flown at half-mast for three days in mourning.

description.zh-cn: 在隆裕太后逝世后，时任副总统黎元洪致唁电称赞其“德至功高，女中尧舜”。
description.en: After the death of Empress Dowager Longyu, then Vice President Li Yuanhong sent a condolence telegram praising her as having 'the virtue of Yao and Shun among women'.

description.zh-cn: 珍妃是光绪帝宠爱的妃子。
description.en: Consort Zhen was a favored consort of the Guangxu Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝厌恶皇后而独宠珍妃，导致皇后与珍妃关系不睦。
description.en: The Guangxu Emperor's dislike for the empress and exclusive favor towards Consort Zhen led to an antagonistic relationship between the two women.

description.zh-cn: 八国联军攻入北京后，孝定景皇后与瑾妃一同随慈禧太后、光绪帝逃往西安。
description.en: After the Eight-Nation Alliance entered Beijing, Empress Xiaodingjing, along with Consort Jin, fled to Xi'an with Empress Dowager Cixi and the Guangxu Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 吉米·卡特是佐治亚理工学院1946届校友。
description.en: Jimmy Carter is an alumnus of Georgia Institute of Technology, class of 1946.

description.zh-cn: 明宣宗以皇后无子多病为由，废黜了胡善祥的皇后之位。
description.en: The Xuande Emperor deposed Empress Hu Shanxiang on the grounds of her being childless and frequently ill.

description.zh-cn: 当张太皇太后欲处死王振时，年幼的明英宗跪下求情，使其得以幸免。
description.en: When Grand Empress Dowager Zhang intended to execute Wang Zhen, the young Emperor Yingzong knelt and pleaded for him, allowing him to be spared.

description.zh-cn: 全国人大常委会委员长是党和国家领导人之一。
description.en: The Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress is one of the leaders of the Party and the State.

description.zh-cn: 全国人大常委会委员长由全国人民代表大会选举产生，并向其负责。
description.en: The Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress is elected by and responsible to the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 全国人大常委会委员长的人选根据中共中央的建议进行提名。
description.en: The candidate for the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress is nominated based on the recommendation of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 全国人大常委会委员长由全国人民代表大会选举产生。
description.en: The Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress is elected by the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 1982年宪法重新设立了中华人民共和国主席职位。
description.en: The 1982 Constitution re-established the office of the President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 自1993年乔石当选委员长起，该职务一直由中共中央政治局常委担任。
description.en: Since Qiao Shi was elected Chairman in 1993, this position has been held by a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 自1993年起，全国人大常委会委员长职务一直由中共中央政治局常委担任。
description.en: Since 1993, the position of Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress has been held by a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 自1993年起，全国人大常委会委员长职务一直由中共中央政治局常委担任。
description.en: Since 1993, the position of Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress has been held by a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 自1993年起，全国人大常委会委员长职务一直由中共中央政治局常委担任。
description.en: Since 1993, the position of Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress has been held by a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 自1993年起，全国人大常委会委员长职务一直由中共中央政治局常委担任。
description.en: Since 1993, the position of Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress has been held by a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯联合酋长国于1972年12月9日成为联合国会员国。
description.en: The United Arab Emirates became a member of the United Nations on December 9, 1972.

description.zh-cn: 栗战书在哈尔滨工业大学获得高级工商管理硕士学位。
description.en: Li Zhanshu obtained an Executive Master of Business Administration (EMBA) degree from Harbin Institute of Technology.

description.zh-cn: 1983年，时任无极县委书记的栗战书与邻近的正定县县委书记习近平相识并建立良好关系，后被视为习近平最信任的心腹之一。
description.en: In 1983, Li Zhanshu, then Party Secretary of Wuji County, became acquainted with Xi Jinping, Party Secretary of the neighboring Zhengding County, and established a good relationship. He was later regarded as one of Xi Jinping's most trusted confidants.

description.zh-cn: 1982年，时任中共中央主席的胡耀邦批转了栗战书建议高唱《社会主义好》的信件，该信件随后在《人民日报》发表，使栗战书名声大增。
description.en: In 1982, then-CPC Chairman Hu Yaobang approved Li Zhanshu's letter suggesting the promotion of the song 'Socialism is Good'. The letter was subsequently published in the People's Daily, greatly increasing Li's fame.

description.zh-cn: 栗战书接替令计划，担任中共中央办公厅主任。
description.en: Li Zhanshu succeeded Ling Jihua as Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 人民公社化运动是大跃进的重要组成部分和“三面红旗”之一，旨在农村地区建立集工农兵学商为一体的组织。
description.en: The People's Commune Movement was an important component of the Great Leap Forward and one of the 'Three Red Banners', aiming to establish organizations integrating industry, agriculture, military, education, and commerce in rural areas.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争的爆发导致华北高校南迁，最终在昆明组建了国立西南联合大学。
description.en: The outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War led to the southward relocation of universities from North China, eventually resulting in the formation of the National Southwestern Associated University in Kunming.

description.zh-cn: 国立清华大学是组成国立西南联合大学的三所大学之一。
description.en: National Tsinghua University was one of the three universities that formed the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 南开大学是组成国立西南联合大学的三所大学之一。
description.en: Nankai University was one of the three universities that formed the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 1937年7月29日，南开大学校园遭到日军轰炸，校舍被付之一炬。
description.en: On July 29, 1937, the Nankai University campus was bombed by the Japanese army and its buildings were destroyed.

description.zh-cn: 两国因西沙群岛主权争议爆发西沙海战。
description.en: The two countries fought the Battle of the Paracel Islands over a sovereignty dispute concerning the islands.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来电话指示叶剑英召集领导小组，到总参谋部指挥作战。
description.en: Zhou Enlai instructed Ye Jianying via telephone to convene a leading group to command the battle from the General Staff Department.

description.zh-cn: 巴金在文化大革命期间受到上海作家协会“造反派”批判，被关进“牛棚”，并被《人民日报》点名批评。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Ba Jin was criticized by the 'rebel faction' of the Shanghai Writers Association, confined to a 'cowshed', and singled out for criticism in a People's Daily article.

description.zh-cn: 茅盾是中国作家协会主席，巴金于1984年接任其职务。
description.en: Mao Dun was the chairman of the China Writers Association, and Ba Jin succeeded him in 1984.

description.zh-cn: 在巴金的遗体告别仪式上为其送别。
description.en: Attended Ba Jin's farewell ceremony.

description.zh-cn: 在巴金的遗体告别仪式上为其送别。
description.en: Attended Ba Jin's farewell ceremony.

description.zh-cn: 在巴金的遗体告别仪式上为其送别。
description.en: Attended Ba Jin's farewell ceremony.

description.zh-cn: 唐高宗是武则天的丈夫。
description.en: Emperor Gaozong was the husband of Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥在北京市八一学校就读小学。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao attended primary school at Beijing Bayi School.

description.zh-cn: 邓家贵于1990年与齐桥桥相识。
description.en: Deng Jiagui met Qi Qiaoqiao in 1990.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋让女儿习桥桥随母姓，改名齐桥桥。
description.en: Xi Zhongxun had his daughter Xi Qiaoqiao take her mother's surname, changing her name to Qi Qiaoqiao.

description.zh-cn: 曹洪是曹操麾下的重要将领，为其效力。
description.en: Cao Hong was an important general under Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕称帝后，曹洪在其麾下任职。
description.en: After Cao Pi became emperor, Cao Hong served under him.

description.zh-cn: 曹叡即位后，曹洪在其麾下任职。
description.en: After Cao Rui ascended the throne, Cao Hong served under him.

description.zh-cn: 曹洪是曹操的堂弟。
description.en: Cao Hong was Cao Cao's younger paternal cousin.

description.zh-cn: 曹洪是曹魏的开国功臣和重要将领。
description.en: Cao Hong was a founding contributor and important general of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 在荥阳之战中，曹操兵败失去坐骑，曹洪将自己的马让给曹操，并说出“天下可无洪，不可无公”的话，救了曹操一命。
description.en: In the Battle of Xingyang, after Cao Cao was defeated and lost his horse, Cao Hong gave his own horse to Cao Cao, saying 'The world can do without Hong, but not without you, my lord,' saving his life.

description.zh-cn: 官渡之战中，张郃前来投降时，曹洪心存疑虑，荀攸劝说曹洪接纳了张郃。
description.en: During the Battle of Guandu, when Zhang He came to surrender, Cao Hong was suspicious. Xun You persuaded Cao Hong to accept Zhang He.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕称帝后，借口曹洪的食客犯法，将其收监并准备处死，后虽免死但仍被削爵贬为庶民。
description.en: After becoming emperor, Cao Pi used the excuse of Cao Hong's retainer breaking the law to imprison him and prepare for his execution. Although spared death, he was stripped of his titles and reduced to a commoner.

description.zh-cn: 曹叡即位后，恢复了曹洪的名誉和爵位。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Cao Rui restored Cao Hong's reputation and titles.

description.zh-cn: 司马懿耻于和曹洪来往，以生病为由拒绝了曹洪的邀请。
description.en: Sima Yi was ashamed to associate with Cao Hong and declined his invitation on the grounds of illness.

description.zh-cn: 因司马懿拒绝与自己来往，曹洪心生怨恨并向曹操告状。
description.en: Because Sima Yi refused to associate with him, Cao Hong became resentful and reported him to Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 陈伯达在文化大革命初期担任中央文革小组组长，是运动的主要领导者之一。
description.en: Chen Boda served as the leader of the Central Cultural Revolution Group in the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, and was one of the main leaders of the movement.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，陈伯达作为中央文革小组组长，参与了对时任国家主席刘少奇的批判和迫害。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, as the head of the Central Cultural Revolution Group, Chen Boda participated in the criticism and persecution of then-State Chairman Liu Shaoqi.

position.zh-cn: 中共中央北方局宣传部部长
position.en: Minister of the Propaganda Department of the Northern Bureau of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 1936年春，时任中共中央北方局书记的刘少奇提名陈伯达担任宣传部部长。
description.en: In the spring of 1936, Liu Shaoqi, then Secretary of the Northern Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, nominated Chen Boda to be the Minister of the Propaganda Department.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来在华北会议上作总结讲话，系统地揭露了陈伯达的罪行。
description.en: Zhou Enlai delivered a concluding speech at the North China Conference, systematically exposing Chen Boda's crimes.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在给毛泽东的信中，将陈伯达与林彪并列为反革命集团，并对其个人品质作出负面评价。
description.en: In a letter to Mao Zedong, Deng Xiaoping equated Chen Boda with Lin Biao as a counter-revolutionary clique and made negative comments on his personal character.

description.zh-cn: 在该案的审判中，陈伯达被判处有期徒刑18年。
description.en: In the trial of this case, Chen Boda was sentenced to 18 years in prison.

description.zh-cn: 在中共六大后，向忠发当选为中央政治局主席兼中央政治局常委会主席，党内习惯称之为“总书记”。
description.en: After the 6th National Congress of the CCP, Xiang Zhongfa was elected Chairman of the Central Politburo and its Standing Committee, a position customarily referred to within the party as 'General Secretary'.

description.zh-cn: 在向忠发担任湖北省总工会委员长期间，刘少奇是其副委员长。
description.en: While Xiang Zhongfa was Chairman of the Hubei Provincial General Labor Union, Liu Shaoqi was his Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 在向忠发担任湖北省总工会委员长期间，李立三是其副委员长。
description.en: While Xiang Zhongfa was Chairman of the Hubei Provincial General Labor Union, Li Lisan was his Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 在向忠发担任湖北省总工会委员长期间，项英是其副委员长。
description.en: While Xiang Zhongfa was Chairman of the Hubei Provincial General Labor Union, Xiang Ying was his Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 在周恩来前往苏联期间，向忠发听信李立三的建议，推行了“立三路线”的冒险主义政策。
description.en: While Zhou Enlai was in the Soviet Union, Xiang Zhongfa heeded Li Lisan's advice and implemented the adventurist policies of the 'Lisan Line'.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际派遣周恩来和瞿秋白回国，在中共六届三中全会上纠正了李立三的错误路线。
description.en: The Comintern dispatched Zhou Enlai and Qu Qiubai back to China, where they corrected Li Lisan's erroneous line at the Third Plenum of the 6th CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际派遣周恩来和瞿秋白回国，在中共六届三中全会上纠正了李立三的错误路线。
description.en: The Comintern dispatched Zhou Enlai and Qu Qiubai back to China, where they corrected Li Lisan's erroneous line at the Third Plenum of the 6th CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 向忠发在中共六大后接替陈独秀（及其后的瞿秋白），成为中共最高领导人。
description.en: After the 6th National Congress of the CCP, Xiang Zhongfa succeeded Chen Duxiu (and his successor Qu Qiubai) to become the top leader of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 设立中央顾问委员会是为解决干部领导职务终身制问题、实现新老交替而采取的一种过渡性措施。
description.en: The establishment of the Central Advisory Commission was a transitional measure taken to address the issue of lifelong tenure for leading cadres and to achieve the transition from the old to the new generation of leaders.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平是设立中央顾问委员会的主要倡导者和推动者，多次提出并最终促成了该机构的建立。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping was the main advocate and promoter for the establishment of the Central Advisory Commission, proposing it multiple times and ultimately facilitating its creation.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在1973年曾考虑设立一个以老干部为主的“中央顾问委员会”，提出了该机构的初步设想，尽管当时未能实现。
description.en: In 1973, Mao Zedong considered establishing a 'Central Advisory Committee' mainly composed of veteran cadres, putting forward the initial concept for the body, although it was not realized at the time.

description.zh-cn: 根据党章规定，中央顾问委员会是中央委员会的政治上的助手、参谋，在中央委员会的领导下工作。
description.en: According to the party constitution, the Central Advisory Commission was a political assistant and advisor to the Central Committee and worked under its leadership.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平担任中央顾问委员会第一届主任。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping served as the Director of the first Central Advisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 陈云担任中央顾问委员会第二届主任。
description.en: Chen Yun served as the Director of the second Central Advisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 宋任穷于1985年增选为中顾委副主任，并在第二届中连任。
description.en: Song Renqiong was elected as a Vice Director of the Central Advisory Commission in 1985 and was re-elected for the second term.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在1989年9月明确提出从中共十四大起不再设立中顾委的设想，并在此后坚持中顾委必须撤销。
description.en: In September 1989, Deng Xiaoping clearly proposed the idea of not establishing the Central Advisory Commission from the 14th National Congress of the CPC onwards, and subsequently insisted that it must be abolished.

description.zh-cn: 1991年上半年，时任中顾委主任陈云表示自己将在中共十四大后退下，并建议研究不再设立中顾委。
description.en: In the first half of 1991, Chen Yun, then Director of the Central Advisory Commission, stated that he would step down after the 14th National Congress of the CPC and suggested that the abolition of the commission be considered.

description.zh-cn: 杨尚昆接替李先念担任中华人民共和国第四任主席。
description.en: Yang Shangkun succeeded Li Xiannian as the fourth President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 杨尚昆在任期内担任中国共产党中央军事委员会和中华人民共和国中央军事委员会的副主席。
description.en: During his tenure, Yang Shangkun served as Vice Chairman of both the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China and the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China.

position.zh-cn: 中共中央军委副主席、秘书长
position.en: Vice Chairman and Secretary-General of the CPC Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平担任中央军委主席期间，杨尚昆担任副主席及秘书长。
description.en: While Deng Xiaoping was Chairman of the Central Military Commission, Yang Shangkun served as Vice Chairman and Secretary-General.

position.en: Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 在江泽民接任中央军委主席后，杨尚昆继续担任副主席。
description.en: After Jiang Zemin took over as Chairman of the Central Military Commission, Yang Shangkun continued to serve as Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 杨尚昆长期担任中共中央办公厅主任。
description.en: Yang Shangkun served as the Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 长征期间，杨尚昆与彭德怀共同率领红三军团。
description.en: During the Long March, Yang Shangkun and Peng Dehuai jointly led the Third Red Army Corps.

description.zh-cn: 在六四天安门事件期间，杨尚昆最终表明坚决支持李鹏、邓小平的决定，支持对事件的武力镇压。
description.en: During the 1989 Tiananmen Square incident, Yang Shangkun ultimately expressed firm support for the decisions of Li Peng and Deng Xiaoping, endorsing the military crackdown.

description.zh-cn: 1992年春，杨尚昆陪同邓小平进行南方巡视，并和其弟杨白冰公开表态军方坚定支持改革开放。
description.en: In the spring of 1992, Yang Shangkun accompanied Deng Xiaoping on his Southern Tour, and together with his brother Yang Baibing, publicly declared the military's firm support for the reform and opening-up policy.

description.zh-cn: 科大讯飞由中国科学技术大学背景的“讯飞信息科技有限公司”整体变更设立，体现了其与该大学的紧密渊源。
description.en: iFlytek was established through the overall transformation of 'Xunfei Information Technology Co., Ltd.', a company with ties to the University of Science and Technology of China, reflecting its close origins with the university.

description.zh-cn: 《纽约时报》于2017年12月5日发文，评价科大讯飞的人工智能技术背后存在反乌托邦可能性，对其公众形象和声誉造成了负面影响。
description.en: On December 5, 2017, The New York Times published an article evaluating the dystopian possibilities behind iFlytek's artificial intelligence technology, negatively impacting its public image and reputation.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅是直接隶属于中国共产党中央委员会的工作机关。
description.en: The General Office of the CPC Central Committee is a working organ directly subordinate to the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会统一战线工作部是直接隶属于中国共产党中央委员会的工作机关。
description.en: The United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee is a working organ directly subordinate to the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央党校是直接隶属于中国共产党中央委员会的事业单位。
description.en: The Party School of the CPC Central Committee is a public institution directly subordinate to the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 自1989年起长期在中央党校工作，曾任副校长（2008-2014），后返回担任常务副校长（2020-2022）。
description.en: Worked at the Central Party School for a long term since 1989, served as Vice President (2008-2014), and later returned as Executive Vice President (2020-2022).

position.en: Vice President of the Central Party School

description.zh-cn: 习近平任中共中央党校校长期间，李书磊任副校长，受到习的赏识，并经常参与起草习近平等高层的重要讲话稿。
description.en: While Xi Jinping was President of the Central Party School, Li Shulei served as Vice President, was appreciated by Xi, and often participated in drafting important speeches for Xi and other senior leaders.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊最敬佩的人是唐代诗人白居易。
description.en: The person Li Shulei admires most is the Tang dynasty poet Bai Juyi.

description.zh-cn: 茂德帝姬是宋徽宗的女儿。
description.en: Princess Maode is the daughter of Emperor Huizong.

description.zh-cn: 蔡京于熙宁三年进士及第，在北宋朝廷中任官，先后四次担任宰相，最高至太师。
description.en: Cai Jing passed the imperial examination in 1070 and served in the Northern Song court, serving as prime minister four times and reaching the highest position of Grand Preceptor.

description.zh-cn: 宋孝宗即位后，下诏为已故的蔡京平反昭雪，恢复其官职并追赠鲁国公，此举被视为对其政治遗产的某种程度的重新评价。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Xiaozong of Song issued an edict to posthumously rehabilitate the deceased Cai Jing, restoring his official titles and conferring upon him the title of Duke of Lu. This act is seen as a re-evaluation of his political legacy to some extent.

description.zh-cn: 根据朝鲜劳动党党章，金日成是朝鲜劳动党的创建者。
description.en: According to the charter of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Il-sung is the founder of the party.

description.zh-cn: 金日成在1955年12月28日的演讲中首次提出“主体”概念，创立了主体思想。
description.en: Kim Il-sung first introduced the concept of 'Juche' in a speech on December 28, 1955, thereby creating the Juche Idea.

description.zh-cn: 金日成通过一系列党内清洗巩固权力后，于1974年确立了金正日的接班人地位。
description.en: After consolidating power through a series of internal purges, Kim Il-sung established Kim Jong-il's status as his successor in 1974.

description.zh-cn: 金正恩是现任朝鲜劳动党总书记，为该党的最高领导人。
description.en: Kim Jong-un is the current General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, serving as its supreme leader.

description.zh-cn: 根据朝鲜劳动党党章，朝鲜人民军是该党的革命武装力量。
description.en: According to the charter of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Korean People's Army is the party's revolutionary armed force.

description.zh-cn: 根据大韩民国的《国家保安法》，朝鲜劳动党被禁止在该国活动。
description.en: According to the National Security Act of the Republic of Korea, the Workers' Party of Korea is banned from operating in the country.

description.zh-cn: 赵本山与宋丹丹在央视春晚舞台上多次合作表演小品。
description.en: Zhao Benshan and Song Dandan collaborated on several skits for the CCTV Spring Festival Gala.

description.zh-cn: 在2014年赵本山陷入政治风波时，崔永元公开出面力挺赵本山。
description.en: In 2014, when Zhao Benshan was caught in a political storm, Cui Yongyuan publicly supported him.

description.zh-cn: 2009年，中国航空工业集团的民用喷射机业务被分拆成为中国商用飞机公司。
description.en: In 2009, the civil jet business of AVIC was spun off to become the Commercial Aircraft Corporation of China.

description.zh-cn: 经国务院国资委批复同意，中国航空工业集团完成了公司制改制。
description.en: With the approval of the SASAC, Aviation Industry Corporation of China completed its corporate restructuring.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇被罢免后，国家主席职位开始长期缺位。
description.en: After Liu Shaoqi was dismissed, the post of President became vacant for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央向全国人大提出了关于修改宪法部分内容的建议，包括取消国家主席的任期限制。
description.en: The CCP Central Committee proposed to the NPC suggestions for amending parts of the Constitution, including the removal of term limits for the President.

description.zh-cn: 该修正案取消了国家主席和副主席“连续任职不得超过两届”的限制。
description.en: This amendment removed the restriction that the President and Vice President shall serve no more than two consecutive terms.

description.zh-cn: 第十四届全国人大一次会议选举习近平为中华人民共和国主席，使其开启第三个任期。
description.en: The first session of the 14th National People's Congress elected Xi Jinping as President of the PRC, beginning his third term.

description.zh-cn: 随着大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国的成立，大不列颠王国作为独立政治实体不复存在。
description.en: With the establishment of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland, the Kingdom of Great Britain ceased to exist as an independent political entity.

description.zh-cn: 作为18世纪的主要殖民竞争对手，两国在西班牙王位继承战争和七年战争中敌对。战争结果导致法国向英国割让了包括新法兰西在内的大片北美殖民地，英国确立了海上霸权。
description.en: As the main colonial rivals of the 18th century, the two kingdoms were adversaries in the War of the Spanish Succession and the Seven Years' War. The wars resulted in France ceding vast North American colonies, including New France, to Britain, establishing British maritime supremacy.

description.zh-cn: 在西班牙王位继承战争中，大不列颠王国与法国和西班牙作战。战后，西班牙向英国割让了直布罗陀和梅诺卡岛。
description.en: During the War of the Spanish Succession, Great Britain fought against France and Spain. After the war, Spain ceded Gibraltar and Menorca to Great Britain.

description.zh-cn: 对《开罗宣言》的公报草案文字作了修改，加入了“澎湖”。
description.en: He personally revised the draft of the communiqué for the Cairo Declaration, adding the 'Pescadores'.

description.zh-cn: 主张《开罗宣言》具有法律约束力，是构成中华民国光复台湾的法律基础。
description.en: Argued that the Cairo Declaration is legally binding and constitutes the legal basis for the retrocession of Taiwan to the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 安史之乱后，吐蕃从唐军手中夺取了对西宁的控制权。
description.en: After the An Lushan Rebellion, the Tibetan Empire seized control of Xining from the Tang army.

description.zh-cn: 金朝于1129年占领了原属北宋的西宁州。
description.en: In 1129, the Jin dynasty occupied Xiningzhou, which had previously belonged to the Northern Song.

description.zh-cn: 西夏于1136年占领了原属金朝的西宁州。
description.en: In 1136, the Western Xia occupied Xiningzhou, which had previously belonged to the Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 成吉思汗于1227年率蒙古军队攻占西宁州，结束了西夏对此地的统治。
description.en: In 1227, Genghis Khan led the Mongol army to capture Xiningzhou, ending the rule of the Western Xia over the area.
